story:
So, What is the M.A.D. USB Watch?

Technically, the MAD USB WATCH is the first digital watch with a microSD card-slot integrated into a full high speed (2.0) USB flash in a very comfortable silicone strap which makes it practically water resistant. Its frontal digital screen not only displays time and date, but it can also display your total USB Flash capacity as well as how much memory space is available for use. There is no need to connect your USB into a laptop or PC to know if you have enough free memory to save those important documents, pictures or videos into your portable memory. How cool is that?

That was the "technical" description of the MAD USB Watch. But there's more to it than just a very practical portable USB with cool display functions. 

There are so many issues going around our planet that need our attention and our support, many of which we are not even aware of.  Since I was a kid I dreamed of being a superhero with powers to fly around the planet and help millions of people, but sadly I am not.  

Millions of people like me have the will and desire to help others and our planet. So I came up with an innovative way to help accomplish this: 

The M.A.D. (Make A Difference) USB Watches Awareness Campaign.

 

How does the MAD USB WATCH help Make A Difference in our needed planet?

The idea behind The M.A.D. Watch is to use this innovative and practical technological tool to help spread the word across the planet creating awareness for all those issues in need of our attention and our collaboration. 

There are so many different causes, campaigns, foundations and charities out there that need our awareness and support that we don't even know where to start. It is time we combine technology to help raise awareness and help those organizations currently working to raise funds for their work. 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise at least $8000 to be able to manufacture a minimum quantity of MAD USB Watches in the five colors listed at a lower cost. Also to develop and include the first comprehensive list of awareness campaigns available globally ever placed inside a USB Flash.

If we reach our goal, your contirbution will provide you with a Digital Watch, which is also a USB Flash drive with a cool digital display that can be used to store all your personal files or apps. But our hopes are that we can reach way above our minimum goal.

The Impact of your contribution:

This campaign needs your support. Your contribution will help spread awareness in adults, teens and kids accross the planet in a fun and usefull way.

This is the World's First USB Flash Watch used to Create Awareness, carrying inside a file with all the necessary information about where and how you can make a difference. 

Also, for every MAD USB WATCH you purchase, we will donate 10% to one of your preferred awareness campaign, charity or foundation. You will, not only be purchasing a very cool and practical USB flash you can carry on your wrist and use to save your important files, but you will be helping spread the word and create awareness globally.

If we don't reach our goal, many of us will be sad! Your contributions will be refunded completely and we will not be able to execute our project at this time. :(

 

 

Each MAD USB Watch includes a custom designed file that, when connected to your computer, displays a very comprehensive list of charities, foundations, movement and campaigns around the globe created to help others in need, with subjects such as Diseases (Cancer, AIDS..), Movements (Greenpeace, PETA, Earth Hour...), Charity Organizations and Foundations (Help for Heroes, World Wide Fund For Nature, Make-A-Wish, American Red Cross, World Vision, Save the Children, Doctors Without Borders...) etc. Some of them are well recognized by most people as they run large worldwide campaigns through TV, Newspapers and other media. Others, very small or recently created, run by individuals or small groups with a low budget trying to spread their word across their country or around the globe, in desperate need to create awareness and receive support for their program or cause.

(If anyone reading this is a member of a new charity, foundation or even a small group that has an important cause to raise awareness and wants it to be included in our list, please feel free to send us an email before this project ends and we will do our best to add it into our first production. Spread the word!! ).

 

Here are some you might not know about: 

Iraq and Afganistan Veterans of America (IAVA) (2004)- the first nonprofit, nonpartisan organization for Iraq and Afghanistan veterans 
PACER’s National Bullying Prevention Month (2006)- Unites communities nationwide in October to raise awareness of bullying prevention 
The RBC Decathlon (2008) Combines athletics, the financial services industry, entertainment, and charitable giving to raise millions annually for cancer research. 

 

The M.A.D. USB WATCH comes in different colors* where each one can represent an Awareness Cause** you want to support: 

LIGHT RED- Substance Abuse Prevention (Red Ribbon Week- Oct 23-31); Heart Disease...
ORANGE- Human Treatment of Animals;- Bullying Prevention (Unity Oct 12)...
TEAL/LIGHT BLUE- Sexual Assault Awareness (nsvrc.org) ;Child Abuse...
PINK- Breast Cancer Awareness (Breast Cancer Care UK- October Event) 
LIGHT GREEN- Environmental Awareness (eeweek.org); Organ Transplant...

* other awareness colors will be available in the near future for your favorite cause.

** keep in mind that some colors usually represent more than one awareness cause. Those listed here are examples of the most representative, but you may very well show your awareness for your favorite cause that matches a color even if its not listed here by pledging for your corresponding color.

 ---- ----- UPDATE Sept 18th: ----------------------------------

* We have added three (3) more colors to choose from: Black, Dark Blue and Purple. Now you have a total of eight (8) colors to choose from.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

For every MAD USB WATCH that you purchase, we will donate 10% to one of your preferred awareness campaign, charity or foundation.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to this campaign at this moment, there are other ways you can help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign so that others can contribute to the success of the campaign.
  • You may use the Indiegogo share tools to share with others. Spread the word!

 

The M.A.D. USB watch has a built in lithium rechargeable battery that charges when connected to your USB port. It's flexible and comfortable silicone strap design makes it water resistant too.

 

BONUS Campaign Feature:

So, what's more portable than a laptop, a tablet or a smartphone? A USB flash drive! And they aren't only for storing documents and pictures anymore. You can now use them for things like: (1)- Running Portable Apps, Games and Utilities; (2)- Scan your PC or laptop for Malware and bring it back to life; (3)- Install and test-drive Windows 8; (4)- Maintain your Windows computer, (5)- Install Windows 7 on a Mac Book and now to (6)- Raise Global Awareness, among other things. (CNET article).

As a bonus feature and if we are able to go above our set goal and collect above $10,000 we will also have pre-installed, inside each MAD USB WATCH, a very nice Apps launcher which has been highly recommended by well recognized sites like CNET.com and PCMAG.com called "PortableApps":

 

"PortableApps" lets you carry all your favorite apps on your USB Flash and use them on any PC. Now you can have your own browser with all your bookmarks and extensions, your full office suite, your photo editor, your whole music collection, your favorite games, your development tools and more. You can have everything you need for work and play with you on every PC you use. At work, at home, at school, visiting family and friends, even while traveling. And all your bookmarks, emails, personal files and settings stay right on your drive, so you keep your files private and do not modify the host pc's settings. Now, every PC becomes your PC.".

 

 

Install from a large list of open source and free portable apps including those for Education , Graphics and Pictures, Internet, Music and Video, Office, Security, Utilities, and Games.  (click HERE to see a list of all the Portable Apps you will be able to install in your new USB flash using this Apps Launcher.)

"The next time you insert your USB flash drive into a computer, the PortableApps drive apps menu will automatically pop up. If it doesn't, you can just browse to the USB flash drive and double-click on Start.exe. You can browse the Internet with Firefox or Chrome, scan the computer for viruses with ClamWin, work on documents with OpenOffice, and a whole lot more. The best part is, everything is stored on the USB flash drive so no trace is left behind on the host computer!"

(PortableApps is a free Open Source portable platform with no adware, spyware or malware.)

----------------------

Spread the word!! ).
 
Here are some you might not know about: Iraq and Afganistan Veterans of America (IAVA) (2004)- the first nonprofit, nonpartisan organization for Iraq and Afghanistan veterans PACER’s National Bullying Prevention Month (2006)- Unites communities nationwide in October to raise awareness of bullying prevention The RBC Decathlon (2008) Combines athletics, the financial services industry, entertainment, and charitable giving to raise millions annually for cancer research. 
 
The M.A.D. USB WATCH comes in different colors* where each one can represent an Awareness Cause** you want to support: 

LIGHT RED- Substance Abuse Prevention (Red Ribbon Week- Oct 23-31); Heart Disease...ORANGE- Human Treatment of Animals;- Bullying Prevention (Unity Oct 12)...TEAL/LIGHT BLUE- Sexual Assault Awareness (nsvrc.org) ;Child Abuse...PINK- Breast Cancer Awareness (Breast Cancer Care UK- October Event) LIGHT GREEN- Environmental Awareness (eeweek.org); Organ Transplant...
* other awareness colors will be available in the near future for your favorite cause.
** keep in mind that some colors usually represent more than one awareness cause. Those listed here are examples of the most representative, but you may very well show your awareness for your favorite cause that matches a color even if its not listed here by pledging for your corresponding color.
 ---- ----- UPDATE Sept 18th: ----------------------------------
* We have added three (3) more colors to choose from: Black, Dark Blue and Purple. Now you have a total of eight (8) colors to choose from.

--------------------------------------------------------------------
For every MAD USB WATCH that you purchase, we will donate 10% to one of your preferred awareness campaign, charity or foundation.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute to this campaign at this moment, there are other ways you can help:

Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign so that others can contribute to the success of the campaign.
You may use the Indiegogo share tools to share with others. Spread the word!
 

The M.A.D. USB watch has a built in lithium rechargeable battery that charges when connected to your USB port. It's flexible and comfortable silicone strap design makes it water resistant too.
 
BONUS Campaign Feature:
So, what's more portable than a laptop, a tablet or a smartphone? A USB flash drive! And they aren't only for storing documents and pictures anymore. You can now use them for things like: (1)- Running Portable Apps, Games and Utilities; (2)- Scan your PC or laptop for Malware and bring it back to life; (3)- Install and test-drive Windows 8; (4)- Maintain your Windows computer, (5)- Install Windows 7 on a Mac Book and now to (6)- Raise Global Awareness, among other things. (CNET article).
As a bonus feature and if we are able to go above our set goal and collect above $10,000 we will also have pre-installed, inside each MAD USB WATCH, a very nice Apps launcher which has been highly recommended by well recognized sites like CNET.com and PCMAG.com called "PortableApps":

 
"PortableApps" lets you carry all your favorite apps on your USB Flash and use them on any PC. Now you can have your own browser with all your bookmarks and extensions, your full office suite, your photo editor, your whole music collection, your favorite games, your development tools and more. You can have everything you need for work and play with you on every PC you use. At work, at home, at school, visiting family and friends, even while traveling. And all your bookmarks, emails, personal files and settings stay right on your drive, so you keep your files private and do not modify the host pc's settings. Now, every PC becomes your PC.".
 

 
Install from a large list of open source and free portable apps including those for Education , Graphics and Pictures, Internet, Music and Video, Office, Security, Utilities, and Games.  (click HERE to see a list of all the Portable Apps you will be able to install in your new USB flash using this Apps Launcher.)

"The next time you insert your USB flash drive into a computer, the PortableApps drive apps menu will automatically pop up. If it doesn't, you can just browse to the USB flash drive and double-click on Start.exe. You can browse the Internet with Firefox or Chrome, scan the computer for viruses with ClamWin, work on documents with OpenOffice, and a whole lot more. The best part is, everything is stored on the USB flash drive so no trace is left behind on the host computer!"
(PortableApps is a free Open Source portable platform with no adware, spyware or malware.)
----------------------

story:
Developed by a team of industrial designers and mechanical engineers, Mighty Mug, is the world's only Mug that grips to your desk when knocked into, but lifts naturally. 

 Featured in over 100 publications and television shows worldwide, Mighty Mug and it's patented Smartgrip Technology is sure to excite and amaze your friends and family. 

What is SmartGrip Technology? 

 SmartGrip Technology is what allows Mighty Mug to withstand accidental bumps by gripping down to any smooth, flat surface when knocked into. 

  

And what's better, is when you're ready for a sip, Mighty Mug lifts right up! 

  

 Whether you are looking for a vacuum insulated mug to keep your beverage warm on the go, an ice tumbler for those hot summer days, or a travel mug to fit your single serve coffee machine, there is a Mighty Mug tailored to your needs. 

Mighty Mug Go SS - Stainless Steel Copper

Mighty Mug Go SS - Stainless Steel Copper

story:
Off-grid Power is dependent on having charged, healthy, Lead Acid or LiFEPO4 Batteries.

                                                              

This SiriusM3 system monitors the DC Voltage of a 12v or 24v battery bank (or can tell you if the grid goes down), along with Temperature & Humidity, then sounds an alarm and alerts your cell phone if any data is out of your acceptable pre-set range.  It records values (every minute, hour, etc) over a long duration of time, and enables you to easily graph parameters on your laptop. We designed the SiriusM3 for consumer and industrial applications where power is critical to safeguard important operations, data and valuables.  SiriusM3 Monitor includes the SiriusM3 device, DC to DC converter, AC adapter, cabling, two AAA rechargeable batteries, and the system's  setup, operations and graphing software. The system uses a GSM SIM card of your choice to enable the use of cell phone SMS text message alerts to one or more phones upon parameters falling out of an acceptable range, that you set. If you use a solar hybrid system it will provide you insight on if your configuration is keeping your application running reliably. Using the AC adapter plug accessory you can even recharge your 12v battery system and optionally use a small solar panel to keep your battery healthy and charged as it is being monitored.  The SiriusM3 can run off of the battery it monitors, reducing site inspection visits and operational costs.

Consumer Application Examples

The SiriusM3 Monitor can help you keep a proactive watch on your valuable off-grid or grid connected systems.  From monitoring the DC Voltage of a fishing, motor, or sailboat battery bank to ensure that the bilge pump is operational (to prevent boats from sinking)  to alerting you of a vacation home's grid going down (to prevent freezing pipes) or sump pump battery failing, the SiirusM3 can prevent damages due to storms or power and battery failures.  When you depend on a battery system to provide you with power to start your boat engine at sea or automatically start your sump pump during a storm, the SiriusM3 Monitor is well worth the small investment.

Industrial Application Examples

There are hundreds of off-grid mission and data critical application devices that provide safety, security and continuous information to centralized systems.  Keeping an eye on your battery bank voltage levels for surveillance, detection systems, traffic signage, etc will save site visits and ensure that reliable power is available for their operation.  If the SiriusM3 saves you one site visit to a remote location it will pay for itself several times over.  Temperature and humidity monitoring can help you keep your refrigeration trucks, freezers, wine cellars, and outdoor off-grid electronics enclosures all within their operational ranges to prevent loss or operational failures.

SiriusM3 Monitor

The SiriusM3 monitors and records all DC Voltage, Temperature, and Humidity values over time so that you can connect the system up to a laptop to analyze data.  The system uses a low cost SIM Card, purchased separately based on the optimal GSM cell service in your area, if you would like cell phone alerts to be texted to you real-time.  If any of the values for these three parameters fall outside of your acceptable range the SiriusM3 sounds an alarm and sends a warning SMS text message.  Values can be checked every minute, hour, day (whatever  you setup).  On your SiriusM3 screen you will see the Temperature and Humidity in either Celsius or Fahrenheit (℃ or ℉) based on your preference.  You can also see if the parameter is out of range and if the alarm is activated.  From the front buttons you can start and stop the alarm and logging activities as well as set the date and time.

 

Software for setting up the SiriusM3 Monitor is included and enables you to setup the alert thresholds, cell phone numbers to be contacted upon an alert, and makes graphing data easy. The USB cabling for connecting the SiriusM3 to your laptop is included.

In real-time, when connected to your laptop, you can view the current values for DC Voltage, Temperature and Humidity.

You can setup up to five cell phones to receive text messages if any parameters fall out of range.  This can be helpful if the primary user doesn't check their phone (or ran out of power) and that low battery equates to troublesome operations or dangerous outcomes.

The SiriusM3 comes with graphing software and with a few keystrokes you could see detailed plots of all three parameters over the timeline of your use.  This can be useful in analyzing if improvements could be made to your equipment's operation during different seasons of the year.  Configuration improvements can equate to reduced site visits and TCO (total cost of ownership).  Your data is day/time stamped as it is being recorded for the interval you set for logging parameters.

Product Stage

The SiriusM3 Monitor, accessories and software are in an advanced Prototype Stage and the Indiegogo Campaign will provide the funding for our first large production run.  We've been using a few prototypes and have tested the system's capabilities and communications using a GSM SIM card from within the United States.  This SiriusM3 Monitor Indiegogo Campaign will also provide us with visibility in the interest level of consumers and industrial customers that need proactive monitoring of their off-grid systems.

Frequently Asked Questions

1. What voltage battery systems can you use the SiriusM3 Monitor?

Answer:  0-30v battery systems or banks.  That means that primarily 12v and 24v battery systems, most commonly used for off-grid configurations would be monitored.

2.  When will a text message alert be sent to my phone or phone numbers?

Answer:  A text message will be sent to the phone number or phone numbers, that you setup using the laptop software, if DC Voltage, Temperature or Humidity falls out of the acceptable range that you set.  You can have all or any of these three parameters activated to alarm and text message.  They do not have to all be actively monitored. 

3. How much power does the SiriusM3 Monitor device use? 

Answer:   The SiriusM3 uses a very small amount of power of 20ma continuous.  The device utilizes two rechargeable AAA batteries that is supplied with the system.  We supply the cabling and a DC 12v to DC 5v converter to enable you to optionally continuously operate the SIriusM3 from the battery bank you are monitoring and recharge your battery from an AC adapter plug.  You can also optionally connect a small solar panel to your configuration to keep your battery healthy when it is being used in your application.

4.  Can I use the SiriusM3 without a GSM SIM Card and use of cell phone SMS text alerts?

Answer:  Yes, you can record your values over time and review the associated graphs to optimize your off-grid configuration operations that are dependent on DC Voltage, Temperature and Humidity values.  The SIM card is not included in this offering but are widely available for rates as low as a few dollars per month from companies like Ting at https://zq8o9e52opf.ting.com.

5.  What will the SiriusM3 Monitor be priced at for it's MSRP (Retail Price)?

Answer:  MSRP will be $ 195 but Indiegogo supporters and volume wholesale reselling partners will be offered highly discounted prices for the system and optional add-ons.

6. Can I recharge my battery system with the DC to DC converter setup?

Answer:  Yes, we include an AC Adapter plug to enable you to recharge the SiriusM3 rechargeable batteries and your battery that is being monitored through the DC 12v to DC 5v converter.  If your battery's DC voltage gets low you can take it out of use and plug it into an AC wall outlet to recharge the battery bank system.

7. What are the optional add-ons outside of the offered packages?

Answer: 

   a.  A special cable for monitoring the 'grid is down' scenario.  If you would like to use the SIriusM3 to watch the 'grid down' scenario, rather than a battery system's voltage, you will need an additional cable for an additional small charge.

   b.  If you are using a 24v battery bank and want to continuously operate your SiriusM3 off of the battery's power you will need a DC 24v to DC 5v converter (rather than the DC 12v to 5v converter that comes with these offered indiegogo packages).  This converter change will be at a small additional cost.

   c.  If you would like the SiriusM3 with GPRS capabilities for a mobile fleet, please notify us and we could plan a custom system enhancement for a minimum quantity of systems.  One example:  If you would like to use the SiriusM3 Monitor to watch the Temperature and Humidity values of your refrigeration trucks or auxiliary power along with having google mobile tracking of that truck's location on an online google map.

8.  If we are outside the United States and Canada, can we resell the system?

Answer:  Yes, please contact us about being a global reseller outside of North America.

9.  Do you have enhancements planned for the SiriusM3 Monitor? 

Answer  Yes, we would like to add GPRS capabilities for mobile asset tracking but that will be planned at a future time, following a successful Indiegogo Campaign.

10.  Can the Graphs be customized?

Answer:  Yes, the graphing software enables you to customized your output via the supplied laptop PC software for specific timeframes of your deployment and for specific data parameters.

11. If our SiriusM3 alarm goes off due to a parameter falling out of an acceptable range, how do you reset it? 

Answer:  You can setup the system to reset itself after sending the text message and sounding the audio alarm.  As an example; if you set the system to check on the temperature every hour and the temperature alarm is triggered.  It will then stop after a set number of seconds and retest the temperature value after one hour.  This allows for an ongoing longterm remote operation without visiting an off-grid site for alarm resets. 

12. If I am from a large reseller and want to request larger discounts for larger quantity commitments or customized packages would this be available?

Answer:  Yes, please contact us for customized offerings and project enhancements.  The QTY 5 and 10 Indiegogo packages offered are a reseller minimum order quantities for this campaign and for future orders.  If one selected package is purchased and you support our project, the reduced price and minimum quantity purchase is reserved for that North American reseller.  Larger distributors can request a 50 unit secret perk.

story:
Thank you!

We might now have something truly game changing. And because of this new opportunity we stopped this campaign. 

Please don't contribute! We can't take this site down, so we use this now only to thank you for you support and feedback. That's highly appreciated. 

We'll be back!

JOIKUSPEED.COM



It's all about transparency in operator and phone model speeds!

JoikuSpeed.com measures, compares, and analyzes mobile operator and phone model internet speed performance on the spot – at certain time – at certain place – worldwide... And hands the speed results to you both on mobile and web, with map and list view, and via in-depth personal speed performance analysis, for you to draw a conclusion and decide! 

It’s about operator and phone model choice, and it’s about where and when!

story:
WHAT IS THE DashCrab?

The DashCrab is a UNIVERSAL Mount for Android & Apple Smartphones that works great with or without cases, has an easy one hand mount and swivel design, and can be used on most surfaces virtually anywhere in the home, office, car etc. The DashCrab is the number one seller in Asia and we would like to distribute the DashCrab in USA by USA family owned companies.

Benefits of having USA distribution:

  • Fast shipping directly from US
  • Full customer service support and quick warranty services
  • Help support USA distributors, workers, and families
  • Create new US friendly packaging from 99designs





QUESTION: Why don't we have these made in USA? Well, this product was made and designed in Korea and we love it. As a patent holder, we feel it would be wrong to knock it off and have copies made in USA. Instead, we want to promote, support, and distribute the DashCrab in USA. We are small family owned businesses that feel strongly that the DashCrab deserves to become a top selling product.


OUR MISSION WITH THE FUNDS:

  1. The DashCrab Duet is the newest design and we need to go into mass production phase to lower cost.
  2. The DashCrab FX was enhanced with a swing jaw that swivels upward to allow "One Hand Operation" and we need to complete patents.
  3. The DashCrab Packaging needs to be designed for US Markets and help us establish USA based distribution to give customers better service, faster shipping, and headache free warranty exchanges.

WHY DASHCRAB?  We know a good thing when we find one. Most mounts look like robots & transformers, lock your phone in one position, cannot work with a case, require bolts and screws, and usually mount where you cannot see the screen easily.


What sets the DashCrab apart from other smartphone mounts on the market?

  • It's sexy, sophisticated, and comes in one piece.
  • Mounts to most any surface
  • Designed with Easy One Hand Operation
  • Requires no bolts or screws
  • Has the Easy Pivot Swivel System for Perfect Viewing Position
  • If you use a case on your phone, it works great!

Safe driving priority. Everyday we see people holding their phones while driving, even though hands free driving is required by law. If you are caught holding the phone it can cost you hundreds of dollars in fines, and more. 


A good mount solution prevents you from fumbling for your phone and taking your eyes off the road. Having a direct line of sight on the road is critical and millions of dollars are invested in high tech gadgets to help keep driver's hands on the wheel. A good dash or windshield mount is crucial.


What is hands free?

Basically it's hands off the phone. Even if you use a Bluetooth device or feature, hands free headsets, or speaker device, these only solve one one aspect of "Safe Hands Free Driving Practices."

Where do you place your phone while driving?

Most drivers use the built-in cup holder, place the phone on the passenger seat or between their legs, and even rubber band the phone to the visor. This is DANGEROUS! In each case Drivers take their eyes off the road to answer, screen a call or view a GPS map. 

DASHCRAB FEATURES:

The mount's best feature is in the name, Dash Crab because it simply mounts securely on the "Dash" (we know it mounts on the windshield as well. But Dash-Crab sounds better than Windshield-Crab).


1) LOW PROFILE DESIGN: The low profile design opens up the view of the road. On Dash in Line of Sight of Highway

Above: Dashcrab Duet 


2) EASY PIVOT: DashCrab models include the fluid Swivel Ease Pivot System with multi directional viewing positions from high, low, left, and right.ix Degree of Rotation for Easy View, see image below.


3) ONE HAND operation makes it easy to insert your smartphone. Once in, you can adjust the viewing angle to your liking without having to tighten any bolts, screws, or fasteners.

Easy One Hand Operation

above: Dashcrab Duet and FX


4) SILICON SUCTION CUP: The super suction chamber draws more air in and creates a better seal. The advanced silicon materials can withstand heat, cold, rough surfaces, and can be easily washed and regain it's tackiness.Washable and Weather Tested Silicon. Resulting in the best car mount for phones on the market.


HOW THE FUNDS WILL BE USED?

ON OUR AWESOME PRODUCTION & GO TO MARKET PLAN.

We have been informed by retailers, buyers, and mass marketers that we need to design new packaging, reduce costs by building inventory, and complete our US patents. Thus, Your Wireless Consultants and TY Industries will use the funds to:

  • Pay 99Designs to have new USA packaging developed (see steps 1-3)
  • Complete our U.S. patents
  • Increase order quantities to reduce costs


Personal Note: We are small family owned business, our factory is a small family business in Korea, and our US distributor is also family owned and operated. It is very difficult to succeed as a small business as Kevin says on Shark Tank, "The big companies will squash you like the little cockroaches you are." With your help, our hard work, and great ideas, we will succeed. Good time here to Tweet!



 


1) MISSION CRITICAL PACKAGING - with a fun twist!

It is extremely difficult to get products into retail stores these days and poor packaging can prevent even the best products from reaching the shelves. 

Although it will be a challenge, we came up with a unique idea to solve our packaging crisis, and get hundreds of packaging designers to compete for the job. How? By having a contest.

How the New Package Design Contest Works!


The day we reach our goal we will unleash 99designs.com to begin designing the packaging. Ten days later, each one of our backers will be able to vote on the new packaging design. Criteria are that the new design must be retail friendly and within our budget.




Launching our contest, we will provide 99designs.com the criteria to build our new packaging. They will in turn list our design contest to hundreds of designers in their marketplace. The total community of designers is more than 291,000 designers from Berlin to Bombay, professional and amateur designers will read our packaging brief and begin to brainstorm ideas just for us.



You Decide what packaging we go with! Posting the winning designs online for you to vote on. You can earn votes by contributing to our campaign. Every contributor on Indiegogo will have the ability to vote for best packaging and design. Imagine, one day they may walk into a store and see the new packaging on the shelf and say, “Hey, I helped design that!”


What is a packaging design contest?

A design contest is a competition between designers to create the winning packaging design for a client’s design brief.

Dash Crab USA will launch the contest through the day our crowd-funding goal is met. On that day, we will give 99designs our criteria and become a contest holder. DashCrabUSA contest holder:

  1. writes a design brief
  2. names the contest’s cash prize
  3. starts their contest.

The contest has four stages, and lasts around 7 days.

Subscribed 99designs designers from around the world see the contest listing in the 99designs marketplace. They compete for the prize by submitting designs that meet the brief.

The contest holder gives feedback and direction to the designers to help them improve on their designs through two rounds of competition.

Finally, the contest holder (DashCrab and You) will pick the winning design. The winning designer receives the prize money, and the contest holder gets the design files, and full copyright to the winning design.99designs.com Packaging Contest


GOT THE WINNER, THEN WHAT?

We will submit a formal RFP from several packaging facilities. The factory that is best suitable for our project as established by our criteria will receive a purchase order (PO).

Packaging factory selection criteria:

  • 1-Price
  • 2-Quality
  • 3-Lead times (how long it takes for them to produce the packaging)

Other packaging and logistical issues regarding USA friendly packaging includes: friendly master cartons, inner cartons, and shippers (displays) that are EDI compliant, minimizing weights and dimensions, and protect the product.

FINAL PACKAGING COMPLETE, THEN WHAT?

Once the final packaging is complete, we will fulfill all Indiegogo.com orders, seed the marketplace and buyers with samples, and finalize distribution.

We will create Decks, Sales Sheets, and Marketing Materials to support our sales efforts. The suggested retail or MSRP is currently set at $29.99

Packaging Concepts will be posted once we reach our goal.




Packaging Concepts To Come

The Packaging Concepts and Samples will be posted soon.


2) MISSION CRITICAL PRODUCTION

The next step is to increase our purchase order size to reduce the costs of the goods. Made in Korea products are much more expensive than China made products. The environmental laws, the material costs, and the craftsman ship is more involved and the product quality is at a much higher level. When we produce inventory, the labor costs, set-up costs, assembly costs are all relative to the price.

Once the factory is set-up to start producing, the machines, labor, and assembly line run continuously and the longer it runs, the cheaper it gets. When you take into consideration all the prep time and clean up time when units are not being made, those expenses and costs are absorbed into the average price of the unit. We would like to make a larger run and lower our costs.


3) UNIQUE PRODUCT PROTECTION

As a patent holder and a true believer that counterfeits and cheep knock off products effect families and companies, we are looking to complete our Patents and Trademark filings in the USA. With the funds, we will complete the Utility and Design patents with hopes to gain control over the Brand. A provisional patent has already been filed. We have two more improvements and claims not disclosed in the original filing that we are looking to include in the next round.


FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

How does the DashCrab Duet move in 6 directions?
The arm and the slide have tempered steel springs. The arms expand when stretched and then retract, creating a squeezing effect and securing the phone.

Will it work with my case?

Absolutely. The size, shape, and groves of the arms have been engineered to work with most all Smartphones on the market today. Includes a non-slip rubberized material to keep your phone secure and safe.

Will the suction cup damage my dash?

After  years of testing and looking for the perfect solution, we identified a manufacture that specializes in Silicon and we will contract them for our pad. That being said, they are the experts and designed the cup and materials to be super safe and friendly. They provided TY with weather test results that show how well it works in extreme heat and cold situations.

Can the mount be used on any surface?

As long as there is a flat-like surface that is clean, the mount will work just fine. The locking mechanism was designed with a deep chamber that creates a vacuum seal when locked. Thus, as long as the attaching surface is hard and clean, it will work.

Can the mount be used for GPS or other Devices?

There are some limits on what you can use. Many GPS devices are "Deep" or "Thick" and the arms of the DashCrab Duet is an inch wide. As you can see from the image, the Duet can hold unusual items. The DashCrab FX on the other hand has a wider and deeper grasps and that allows you to hold silly things such as Tennis Ball Cans, etc.

MORE ABOUT US AND YOUR RISKS

Rest assured that when the funding goal is reached, we are confident and the new packaging will be designed and manufactured and all contributors will receive the units. One of our team members has years experience in manufacturing and packaging.

The true risks is whether the new packaging designs meet our expectations. The contributors vote is very important. It is possible the new packaging will not be accepted by retail. However, this will not effect the contributors for we will still ship at the end of the campaign.

Packaging is like an art, it's very subjective and can be perceived on any side of the like, dislike spectrum.

We figure that by using 99designs and having you (our contributors) vote on the packaging, we can find the best packaging.

When creating something from scratch and bringing it through fruition, the rewards can be overwhelming.

In order to break free from the confines of any given packaging firm where new ideas are less frequent, we decided to hit the refresh button and turn to 99designs.com designers to create our new packaging.

The criteria is challenging with so many variables that we feel it's in our best interest to submit the job to as many designers as possible.

The challenge is to design new packaging that is affordable, sturdy, US retail friendly, and can convey the DashCrab Value Propositions accurately.

Other challenges:

Some of the key objectives that need to be met when designing new packaging for our distribution channels are:

- Protect the product from being damaged.

- Use materials that will not scratch, dent, or tear.

- Ship safely from factory to the retail locations.

- Avoid design flaws such as plastic outer shells that damage easily.

- Design copy and graphics that are simple, yet to the point

- Become EDI compliant including the Master Cartons, Inner Cartons, and Individual Units.

- Use recycled or ROHS and environmentally safe materials when possible

- If using a hang-tag, make sure it's sturdy and does not tear.

- Make sure the printing quality and registration is flawless.

- Insure proper use and design for the QR and UPC Codes

Other risks is that we fail to secure the patents or claims granted. We have teamed up with a powerful patent attorney with years of experience and she is confident that we can get our claims issued.

*If we are unable to get the patents granted, it will "NOT" effect delivery, production, or business moving forward so all contributors will still get their rewards.

How we enjoy the Dash Crabs....

As you can see, the Universal Mount works great with:
Apple iPhone, Android, Samsung Note, Samsung Galaxy, S5, HTC One, HTC M8, Motorola Droid, RAZR MAXX, iPod, iPhone 5, 5s, 5c, and most smart phones.

Referral Contest, Win a Free DashCrab Duet

Win one of two (or both) Dash Crab prizes! Friends! From now until 11:59 PM on April 30th, 2014, we are running a contest to see which supporter can refer in the most friends, family and followers! Everyone is eligible! All you have to do is go to our campaign homepage, grab a unique URL in the “Share this Campaign” field and get the word out as best you can.
    


There will be two winners: one for most total referrals to the site, and one for most overall contributions dollars referred in (min $20). Anytime anyone clicks your unique link to get to our page, Indiegogo tracks that activity and “credits” you with the referral. I can then see who has generated the most traffic to the site. Click, then grab your unique link to share! FYI, using the “Share” tools on the homepage works as well, as it automatically ties you to your post on Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus or Email.

QUESTION: I see that the Dash Crab is already on the market.
ANSWER: Not directly in the USA. The Dash Crab FX is brand new design and the Dash Crab Duet is exclusive and patented. Both offer the "One Hand Operation" where as the original Dash Crab and Dash Crab 2 was a two hand model and sold under different brands. We ODM/OEM for other customers.

Q: We see the DashCrab on eBay and Amazon, are they the same as what you see here?
A: Yes the factory sells to Asian distributors in a plastic packaging that is made for Asian markets. We need your support to become a distributor in the USA and manufacture USA packaging.
story_txt:
WHAT IS THE DashCrab?The DashCrab is a UNIVERSAL Mount for Android & Apple Smartphones that works great with or without cases, has an easy one hand mount and swivel design, and can be used on most surfaces virtually anywhere in the home, office, car etc. The DashCrab is the number one seller in Asia and we would like to distribute the DashCrab in USA by USA family owned companies. Benefits of having USA distribution: 
Fast shipping directly from US
Full customer service support and quick warranty services
Help support USA distributors, workers, and families
Create new US friendly packaging from 99designs
QUESTION: Why don't we have these made in USA? Well, this product was made and designed in Korea and we love it. As a patent holder, we feel it would be wrong to knock it off and have copies made in USA. Instead, we want to promote, support, and distribute the DashCrab in USA. We are small family owned businesses that feel strongly that the DashCrab deserves to become a top selling product.OUR MISSION WITH THE FUNDS:
The DashCrab Duet is the newest design and we need to go into mass production phase to lower cost.
The DashCrab FX was enhanced with a swing jaw that swivels upward to allow "One Hand Operation" and we need to complete patents.
The DashCrab Packaging needs to be designed for US Markets and help us establish USA based distribution to give customers better service, faster shipping, and headache free warranty exchanges.

WHY DASHCRAB?  We know a good thing when we find one. Most mounts look like robots & transformers, lock your phone in one position, cannot work with a case, require bolts and screws, and usually mount where you cannot see the screen easily.What sets the DashCrab apart from other smartphone mounts on the market?
It's sexy, sophisticated, and comes in one piece.
Mounts to most any surface
Designed with Easy One Hand Operation
Requires no bolts or screws
Has the Easy Pivot Swivel System for Perfect Viewing Position
If you use a case on your phone, it works great!

Safe driving priority. Everyday we see people holding their phones while driving, even though hands free driving is required by law. If you are caught holding the phone it can cost you hundreds of dollars in fines, and more. A good mount solution prevents you from fumbling for your phone and taking your eyes off the road. Having a direct line of sight on the road is critical and millions of dollars are invested in high tech gadgets to help keep driver's hands on the wheel. A good dash or windshield mount is crucial. What is hands free?Basically it's hands off the phone. Even if you use a Bluetooth device or feature, hands free headsets, or speaker device, these only solve one one aspect of "Safe Hands Free Driving Practices." Where do you place your phone while driving?Most drivers use the built-in cup holder, place the phone on the passenger seat or between their legs, and even rubber band the phone to the visor. This is DANGEROUS! In each case Drivers take their eyes off the road to answer, screen a call or view a GPS map. 
DASHCRAB FEATURES:The mount's best feature is in the name, Dash Crab because it simply mounts securely on the "Dash" (we know it mounts on the windshield as well. But Dash-Crab sounds better than Windshield-Crab). 1) LOW PROFILE DESIGN: The low profile design opens up the view of the road. On Dash in Line of Sight of Highway

Above: Dashcrab Duet 2) EASY PIVOT: DashCrab models include the fluid Swivel Ease Pivot System with multi directional viewing positions from high, low, left, and right.ix Degree of Rotation for Easy View, see image below.3) ONE HAND operation makes it easy to insert your smartphone. Once in, you can adjust the viewing angle to your liking without having to tighten any bolts, screws, or fasteners. Easy One Hand Operationabove: Dashcrab Duet and FX4) SILICON SUCTION CUP: The super suction chamber draws more air in and creates a better seal. The advanced silicon materials can withstand heat, cold, rough surfaces, and can be easily washed and regain it's tackiness.Washable and Weather Tested Silicon. Resulting in the best car mount for phones on the market.
HOW THE FUNDS WILL BE USED?
ON OUR AWESOME PRODUCTION & GO TO MARKET PLAN.We have been informed by retailers, buyers, and mass marketers that we need to design new packaging, reduce costs by building inventory, and complete our US patents. Thus, Your Wireless Consultants and TY Industries will use the funds to:
Pay 99Designs to have new USA packaging developed (see steps 1-3)

Complete our U.S. patents
Increase order quantities to reduce costs
Personal Note: We are small family owned business, our factory is a small family business in Korea, and our US distributor is also family owned and operated. It is very difficult to succeed as a small business as Kevin says on Shark Tank, "The big companies will squash you like the little cockroaches you are." With your help, our hard work, and great ideas, we will succeed. Good time here to Tweet!

story:
Hello potential partners, media gurus, and family men & women - Media Battles is excited to invite you to get involved and help support our streaming filter technology to  shape the world and ultimately make it a better place for our kids.



Stop feeling helpless about what your kids are being exposed to. At Mediaxus, our rating and filtering system isn’t an afterthought. In fact, it’s one of the highest priorities we had when building our system.

We’re proud to have created the most unique and customizable filter on the planet.

Take back control of what your children are watching.

·  Language (From 1-5 or input what specific words you want filtered)

·  By Community Rating (From 1-5)

·  Sexual Content (From 1-5)

·  Violence (From 1-5)

·  By Rating (G, PG, PG13, R, NR)

·  Alcohol or Drinking (From 1-5)

·  Action (From 1-5)

·  By Category (Action, Adventure, etc.)

·  And more

 That's right. One of the biggest things we as parents have problems with is the amount of language in some movies, music, and shows that our kids want to watch or do watch. 


With this new kind of filter technology we can silent (or mute so to speak) words we don't want our kids to hear. It could be anything, from a word as simple as "is" to something like the "F!@#" word.

When you give to support the project, you're not just supporting the effort of keeping our children safe from inappropriate language, but you're also helping build a cleaner, safer world.


In order to unveil the nitty gritty details of how the filter works, you'll need to sign our NDA found here:

The reason you must sign an NDA is because this filter has never been done before. It's Patent Pending, and the technology is confidential.

Our beta is just about done for those of you who have purchased beta access. Below is video demo of the filter in action. 

Note: final design has not been completed, the video is to demonstrate the workings of our filter technology.


We need your support to get this filter technology off the ground. Right now we're working with a staff of about ten people. We've invested all we can to get us where we are now. The funds will go toward expanding the technology, hiring people to advance the software and ultimately get it into the hands of families, single parents, and other like minded family men and women. 


 Below is list of advances we've accomplished with our own investments and what we can accomplish if we get funded. 

What's already been accomplished:

1. Legal & Corporate mentalities. (All of our legal work has been taken care of. This includes everything from becoming incorporated to getting a patent pending)

2. Manual input audio filter, and the basic 1-5 filter system (Click here to sign our NDA to see a more in depth analysis on how the filter works)

3. Licensing - We've established licensing to cover over 5.1 million artists through ASCAP.

4. Web/server side of the software has started development. (We have started development on the Mediauxs software.)

What we can accomplished if we get funded

1. Filter technology advances - We can further expand on our streaming filter technology. The filter will go from manual to a more automatic system. This is a huge advance - when the filter is automatic, you'll be able to filter out any word from any streaming audio.

2. We'll be able to develop for mobile devices. Integrating our filter on smart phones, and tablets ranging from a number of OS's.

3. Developing TV apps. Integrating Mediaxus across multiple television manufactures. 

4. Developing DVD & Blue-ray apps. Integrating Mediaxus across  multiple DVD & Blue-ray players. 

5.  We'll be able to start developing our own content targeted for our supports and users. 

6. Establish more licenses - We'll have leverage to establish content licenses with other studios around the world. 



Risks and challenges

Our biggest challenge starting out was legal and basic "where do we start"questions. We overcame this challenge by investing our own money and time into the company. We strove and persevered through it while creating a demo and working through the start-up phase.

After getting funded there will be a few challenges such as establishing licensing with studios, and not to mention the everyday challenges that go with advancing the technology and the Mediaxus software.

But, with our remarkable team and amazing supporters we'll overcome the challenges that will present themselves. By the end of 2014 Mediaxus will be in the homes of families, on the phones of kids, and on the tablets in the car.

Mediaxus will be the next wave of parental entertainment technology. Changing the world, teaching the next generation the essence and importance of family and purity. By giving control back to the parents when it comes to entertainment. Help us do this, help us change the world.

1. Filter technology advances - We can further expand on our streaming filter technology. The filter will go from manual to a more automatic system. This is a huge advance - when the filter is automatic, you'll be able to filter out any word from any streaming audio.
2. We'll be able to develop for mobile devices. Integrating our filter on smart phones, and tablets ranging from a number of OS's.
3. Developing TV apps. Integrating Mediaxus across multiple television manufactures. 
4. Developing DVD & Blue-ray apps. Integrating Mediaxus across  multiple DVD & Blue-ray players. 
5.  We'll be able to start developing our own content targeted for our supports and users. 
6. Establish more licenses - We'll have leverage to establish content licenses with other studios around the world. 









Risks and challenges
Our biggest challenge starting out was legal and basic "where do we start"questions. We overcame this challenge by investing our own money and time into the company. We strove and persevered through it while creating a demo and working through the start-up phase.
After getting funded there will be a few challenges such as establishing licensing with studios, and not to mention the everyday challenges that go with advancing the technology and the Mediaxus software.
But, with our remarkable team and amazing supporters we'll overcome the challenges that will present themselves. By the end of 2014 Mediaxus will be in the homes of families, on the phones of kids, and on the tablets in the car.
Mediaxus will be the next wave of parental entertainment technology. Changing the world, teaching the next generation the essence and importance of family and purity. By giving control back to the parents when it comes to entertainment. Help us do this, help us change the world.

story:
Sam-ple

Hi, my name is Jan. I have a background selling software packages to both small and large business, but my true passion is music. I have many ideas for technology in this field, and would love to share this one.

Like me, you will own a music dock somewhere in your home or workplace. You may also own an android phone, like the Samsung Galaxy or Note, which holds your current music store. Can you connect your smart phone to utilise your dock with the full remote and charging capabilty using one cable? No, we believe not.

Using our Xiom brand, we have created such a cable by hand, and as you can see from our video and pictures it also looks sleek and tidy. You will also notice the different colours on the cable, this indicates different dock compatibilities which can be changed by touching the touch sensitive front of the cable.

We have spent many hours and spent a reasonable amount of funds to develop our cable to its current state, which works! To get this cable to full production using the many protocols on thousands of different docks we require your kind backing for final development and legal costs. This cable involves plastics, software and electronics, all have been sourced we just need to pay for the final development and production. The money will also enable further development of the cable for other Android devices.

This cable will be developed in the United States.

This project is obviously complicated technology for a new business, a project normally taken on by the larger companies with R&D departments, so how did we do it? The answer Richard Wileman. He is an expert in automation and electronics, and has consulted, designed and developed new and innovative products for various large organizations. He has also provided advice regarding airport access control systems. Richard is a forward thinking, innovative design engineer, and is the reason why you can have faith in the capability of this cable. The other members of the team are Mike and Derek, both qualified accountants, so hopefully the figures will add up!

Features

The Sam-ple cable provides the following capabilities:

  • use the existing dock remote control to play,pause and change track
  • touch sensitive button on cable to change settings to suit different docking devices
  • charging facility for your smart phone (dock dependent)
  • audio through micro USB
  • Potential Jelly Bean compatibility with other handsets
  • firmware upgradeable.

This cable will allow full features to Samsung Galaxy S2, S3 and Note running Ice Cream Sandwich. It will allow the same features for the S1 excluding the remote control, which is pending.

We evaluated the possibility of using Bluetooth for our product but decided against it for the following reasons:

  • It has already been implemented by other developers and we don’t want to be “just another one”
  • Smart phones use enough battery power as it is. Why not have the ability to charge while playing rather than running your battery down even more?
  • You can use apps already available in the Google store to use your phone as a media server when docked – for example changing tracks from a web interface on your PC

The more funds we raise the more features and compatibilities we can add such as other brands and functionality, we thank you for your support in advance.

Please note that international shipping costs and Canadian shipping costs may be lower if sales volume allow. We are aiming to deliver by Christmas 2012.

story:
The goal

MicroUPS is a new device for microcomputers like Raspberry, CubieBoard or BeagleBone that functions not only as a UPS (Uninterrupted Power Supply) but as an ATX Style Power Switch.

First and foremost, MicroUPS provides safety for your operating system and your valuable data. What’s more, it enables you to safely turn your operating system on and off without logging in, or plugging a wire - just by pressing a button.

MicroUPS also has 4 LEDs which can be used to indicate the status of the operating system or the status of the applications running on that system. The LEDs can be turned on and off with binary command provided by the MicroUPS software. Alternatively, they can be controlled from the user application by writing directly to the MicroUPS daemon via local socket which the daemon is listening on

Using MicroUPS you can work with your microcomputer with greater freedom, similar to a laptop. You can start it on battery power, plug it in to an electrical socket, unplug it during work, or leave it plugged in to recharge the batteries.
MicroUPS will charge Li-Ion cells regardless of whether computer is on or not.

www.microups.net

VERY IMPORTANT UPDATE

By Changing suppliers and ordering large quantities I was able to cut price more than a half. Moreover cases by default are made from clear, transparent plexi, one of perks called "Fluorescent case" is the case upgrade to Fluorescent Perspex. If you just need the functionality, then clear case will do. I have also upgraded battery packs to 1500, 3000, 8000 and 16000 mAh
I'm on a very tight budget now, so please if you like it, back it up.


Project status

MicroUPS is fully working device, the software is written and the cases are designed.
We now need to test it for CE and FCC safety compliance to make it available for sales.
Otherwise, we would like to provide custom, specially-made cables to easily connect MicroUPS to your microcomputer.


Project description

Hardware

The PCB is made using SMD technology. It is compact - just 52 mm x 55 mm. Power output is 5V 1A and the power input socket is the standard microUSB. MicroUPS uses about 480 mA when charging batteries. This means a power supply adapter with 2A power output is more than enough. In fact, 1200mA output power supply adapter was sufficient to power our Raspberry Pi model B (including an active wi-fi module) in all our tests.
There are two buttons 'ON' and 'OFF', and four LEDs designed to be used by the end user. The fifth LED is dual color (red/green) to indicate the status of the device.
Device uses 3.3v for the serial data connection, so it works with Raspberry, Beaglebone, or Cubieboard using a serial port. However, you can also connect MicroUPS device by FTDI-TTL cable and use USB port from microcomputer, or through USB hub (see video clip in gallery and updates) - you can still use on-board serial port for a serial console. 
The main components of the MicroUPS PCB is a Linear Technology DC to DC converter with battery charger LTC1980EGN. It also has an energy efficient ATmega8A microcontroller to manage the device.


Tested platforms

The following platforms have been tested so far:

  • Raspberry Pi model B, system Raspbian/Wheezy
  • BeagleBone Black, system Debian/Wheezy
  • CubieBoard, system Debian/Wheezy

Other platforms: 

Cubie Truck, Hummingbird, Banana Pi, Pandaboard, Parallella, pcDuino, UDOO, Arduino will be tested soon.


Li-Ion cells

Li-Ion batteries are available in four battery packs.
Every battery pack has a built-in PCM which ensures your battery never discharges below a safe level. The PCM is set for discharge current 1A, and charge current 0,5A.
The four cell types are:

    1500 mAh - Single Li-Ion cell, Raspberry Pi B runs for about 80 minutes
    3000 mAh - Two Li-Ion cells, Raspberry Pi B runs for about 135 minutes
    8000 mAh - Four Li-Ion cells, Raspberry Pi B runs for more than 8 hours
    16000 mAh - Eight Li-Ion cells, Raspberry Pi B runs for more than 16 hours
Detail characteristics of each battery pack are available on the Facebook public Fanpage or in the gallery, or on our website www.microups.net


Software

MicroUPS comes with a software package that consists of: the MicroUPS daemon, configuration files and binaries to manage the daemon. This binary is a command that a user can interact with when controlling daemon or user LEDs.
MicroUPS software uses a serial data connection to communicate with microcomputer. On Raspberry you need to comment out the last line in /etc/inittab file, to use /dev/ttyAMA0 serial port, which is otherwise used by Raspbian as a serial console.
The daemon configuration file has a few options that control the serial port, battery low level, notifications and logging. The most important option is 'poweroff_timeout' by which you can set how many seconds MicroUPS should provide power to your microcomputer before cutting it off during a power off procedure. In our tests it was set for 15 seconds which was more than enough. 

MicroUPS software will be available as an OpenSource package on GitHub, and our website. For Wheezy and any other platforms we will provide binary packages.


Case

All perks that include MicroUPS case, are made from Perspex clear plexi. To order the Fluorescent one, please include Perk called "Fluorescent case". MicroUPS cases are laser cut from high quality Perspex glass, they come in 7 eye catching colors: Helios Yellow, Acid Green, Lava Orange, Mars Red, Neptune Blue (Perspex Fluorescent Colors). Perspex Fluorescent Color sports a vivid, fluorescent edge which appears to glow under ambient light as though having its own light source. 

Cases are available in four types:

  • Small case for MicroUPS
  • Small case for MicroUPS and Raspberry
  • Big case for MicroUPS
  • Big case for MicroUPS and Raspberry

For a special request cases are modified to hold Pi Camera, either inside the case, or on separate stand outside the case.


Check out the pictures in gallery or our Facebook public fanpage
or at our website www.microups.net

The Perks
MicroUPS is available with 4 different battery packs
    1500 mAh
    3000 mAh
    8000 mAh
    16000 mAh
You can order any of these:
  • without case,
  • with a single case for MicroUPS + battery.
  • with a dual case for MicroUPS + Raspberry.
If you included Perk called "Fluorescent case", you can order the case in one of 7 colors: Transparent, Helios Yellow, Acid Green, Orange Lava, Mars Red, Neptune Blue, and Black, and you will be able to pick color later, otherwise all Perks that include MicroUPS comes with clear cases.

story:
Adnonify - Take back your privacy

Adnonify is a simple plug & play network device that will enable you to anonimize your surfing behaviour, avoid you being tracked by media/advertising companies and remove all intrusive advertising without any changes to your computer or network configuration.

We decided to launch this project to contribute something back to the community which will enable people without the technical know-how to access information freely and without any government control, filtering, censorship, tracking and intrusive advertising.

Over the years we have seen privacy laws erode and become less important:

  • Governments tracking every website your surf and storing this information on you.
  • Media companies tracking your likes and dislike
  • Censorship by ISP's, Media companies, Governments
  • Intrusive advertising
  • Limits on information access depending on which location you are
  • Bandwith throttling for certain protocolls (P2P, Torrents, ...)
  • Companies storing information about you without your knowledge or conscent


Why is this so important to us?

Growing up with the internet as an engineers we have seen the technical aspects of technology change for the worse. Innovation is spurred by media companies and certain governments who push for tracking systems, cookies, intrusive javascripts that pull cookies from other sites you have visited and collecting all this information on your in huge databases.

There used to be a saying "You can be who you want on the internet". This used to be true 10 years ago and maybe still applies for tech-savy people who know how to protect themself.
We want our children to be able to express themself freely, surf the net without being tracked, profiled and put into some database. Giving them the ability to be who they want to be and access whatever information they want freely! 

What We Need & What You Get

To make Adnonify we need to

  • Design PCB printplate
  • Manufacture a PCB (electronic printplate) 
  • Design and manufacture plastic casing for the printplate & packaging
  • Build, debug, test the software
  • Optimize the software so the device is plug&play and userfriendly

Technical hardware specification are currently being discussed with several manufacturers and we will update this page in the coming days and weeks when the PCB design is finalized! (To Be Updated)

We have been working on the sofware fulltime for several weeks now and its currently being tested, debugged and improved. Powering the Adnonify will be a custom-written Peer-2-Peer decentralized, encrypted VPN software to hide your location, block advertising and trackers. The VPN network will run on standard HTTPS port 443 making the traffic indistinguisible from standard HTTPS websites like your bank or email account making it impossible for ISP's to block or tamper or throttle the Adnonify traffic. The adnonify will allow you to chose the country or jurisdiction where your traffic/connection is terminated onto the internet, allowing you to bypass government/geographic restrictions and hide your location.

Keeping in line with aproximate manufacture cost and development cost we have calculated that to make this feasable we would need to order 1 000 pieces of the Adnonify to make this a successtory, however we will be able to fill demand for more devices if we surpass our goal.

If we are not able to reach our goal of 1 000 pieces being preordered, all the funds will be simply refunded to all the contributers;

The Impact

Adnonify will change the way we surf and behave on the internet giving us back our basic rights & freedoms.

Currently there is no alternative to the Adnonify and media companies and governments just continue to blatently ignore privacy laws.

With the Adnonify we hope to change the behaviour of these companies when advertising income drops and users completely block ads and trackers on the edge of their network.

Who are we?

Isidro Larrubia - Electronics engineer, graduate of university of Malaga and lead hardware designer for Adnonify. Most of my time is spent designing new devices based on Raspberry PI, Arduino breakout boards.

Adnan Ahmad - Systems engineer, Systems Architect, with over 10 years of experience working at several fortune-500 companies, banks and government institutions designing, deploying, and managing mission critical systems and mainframes based on *nix (Cisco, CEH, RHEL)

Together we are making the Adnonify a reality.

How You Can Help

Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about Adnonify or Pre-order your device! 

 

For press relations please e-mail to: press@adnonify.com

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/Adnonify
