Companies storing information about you without your knowledge or conscent


Why is this so important to us?
Growing up with the internet as an engineers we have seen the technical aspects of technology change for the worse. Innovation is spurred by media companies and certain governments who push for tracking systems, cookies, intrusive javascripts that pull cookies from other sites you have visited and collecting all this information on your in huge databases.
There used to be a saying "You can be who you want on the internet". This used to be true 10 years ago and maybe still applies for tech-savy people who know how to protect themself.We want our children to be able to express themself freely, surf the net without being tracked, profiled and put into some database. Giving them the ability to be who they want to be and access whatever information they want freely! 


What We Need & What You Get
To make Adnonify we need to

Design PCB printplate
Manufacture a PCB (electronic printplate) 
Design and manufacture plastic casing for the printplate & packaging
Build, debug, test the software
Optimize the software so the device is plug&play and userfriendly

Technical hardware specification are currently being discussed with several manufacturers and we will update this page in the coming days and weeks when the PCB design is finalized! (To Be Updated)
We have been working on the sofware fulltime for several weeks now and its currently being tested, debugged and improved. Powering the Adnonify will be a custom-written Peer-2-Peer decentralized, encrypted VPN software to hide your location, block advertising and trackers. The VPN network will run on standard HTTPS port 443 making the traffic indistinguisible from standard HTTPS websites like your bank or email account making it impossible for ISP's to block or tamper or throttle the Adnonify traffic. The adnonify will allow you to chose the country or jurisdiction where your traffic/connection is terminated onto the internet, allowing you to bypass government/geographic restrictions and hide your location.
Keeping in line with aproximate manufacture cost and development cost we have calculated that to make this feasable we would need to order 1 000 pieces of the Adnonify to make this a successtory, however we will be able to fill demand for more devices if we surpass our goal.
If we are not able to reach our goal of 1 000 pieces being preordered, all the funds will be simply refunded to all the contributers;


The Impact
Adnonify will change the way we surf and behave on the internet giving us back our basic rights & freedoms.
Currently there is no alternative to the Adnonify and media companies and governments just continue to blatently ignore privacy laws.
With the Adnonify we hope to change the behaviour of these companies when advertising income drops and users completely block ads and trackers on the edge of their network.


Who are we?
Isidro Larrubia - Electronics engineer, graduate of university of Malaga and lead hardware designer for Adnonify. Most of my time is spent designing new devices based on Raspberry PI, Arduino breakout boards.
Adnan Ahmad - Systems engineer, Systems Architect, with over 10 years of experience working at several fortune-500 companies, banks and government institutions designing, deploying, and managing mission critical systems and mainframes based on *nix (Cisco, CEH, RHEL)
Together we are making the Adnonify a reality.
How You Can Help
Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about Adnonify or Pre-order your device! 
 
For press relations please e-mail to: press@adnonify.com
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/Adnonify

story:
Please visit our web-page:

www.easymount.at



EasyMount: An easy, seamless and invisible mount for your mobile devices. [DEUTSCH]


Hi,
 we were looking for a simple mounting solution for mobile devices. As we found only clunky mounting solutions we started to develop EasyMount.

EasyMount is a simple nice looking mount for almost any mobile device. The special mounting techniques offer you a seamless, invisible mount.
After 2 years of testing in different cars and with different mobile phones we are able to offer you a fully developed product.
And the best: The installation is very easy. Just put EasyMount in a seam of your dashboard.

Various mobile phones can be mounted on EasyMount. Therefore only ONE holder is required for all you mobile devices.
When changing a vehicle EasyMount can be easily disassembled and assembled.

NO gluing, NO drilling, NO suction cap.

Early bird supporter takes part in the draw for one Samsung Galaxy Tab 2.

The mobile device can be mounted horizontal, vertical or at any angle.

How it works: 

Easymount consists of two parts.

1. EasyMount-holder:

The holder is made of brushed stainless steel. There are no weak plastic parts which can break.

EasyMount holder guarantees a long lifetime, magnets and  rubber bumpers ensure  high holding force.

By applying the mobile device on the holder the magnets are pulling the mobile device onto the rubber bumpers. The rubber bumpers assure a good grip and there is no slipping of the mobile device.  

2. EasyMount-Thinplate

This is a special very thin (0,2mm) metal sheet with a high content of ferrite. This assures a high resulting magnetic force. The Thinplate can be mounted inside of the mobile cover.

If you have a thick cover you could install two Thinplates and double the holding force. If necessary, Thinplate could be easily adjusted to any size by using common scissors.

Installing the Thinplate

Mobile devices with removable battery cover (for example: Samsung):

The Thinplate is thin enough to fit inside the battery cover.

Mobile devices with phone case (for example: I-Phone):

The Thinplate is thin enough to fit inside the phone case.

Is your car Easymount ready?

With a plastic card you can easily check if EasyMount can be installed in your car.

1. Look for a seam in your dashboard

2. If you are not able to push the plastic card 1cm in the dashboard, try to look for another seam that may be suitable.

3. If it is possible to push the plastic card 1cm in the seam your car is ready for EasyMount.

4. You can push now the EasyMount-holder into the seam like you did before with the plastic card.

Note: older cars often have large gaps in there seams.  A transparent plastic sheet is enclosed in the shipment for filling these gaps. For the very big gaps you can use several plastic sheets to assure the proper grip of the holder in the dashboard. The plastic sheet can be resized with a scissors if necessary. 

Safety Note: EasyMount is strong enough to hold any mobile device.
Due to the special design of the mount we achieved a holding force up to 1 kg (force measured parallel to the surface area*). Nevertheless we do not recommend mounting big (>6” screen) and heavy (>300g) devices on the EasyMount.
*The test method and the test results are available on request. Please note that the holding force is depending on the thickness of the case or the battery cover of the mobile device.

Content of delivery:

  • EasyMount-holder
  • 2 piece plastic plate (3x6cm for filling large gaps in the seam)
  • 4 pieces Thinplate for up to 4 mobile devices (3x6cm, Thinplate could be easily adjusted to any size by using common scissors)
  • installation instruction

Who are we?

We are a small team founded by Ulrike Unterlechner located in Tyrol Austria.

 FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

Will the magnet damage NFC chips, memory, etc?

Memory cards are not magnetic data carriers and will therefore not be damaged by static magnetic fields.
Cell phones and smart phones contain non-magnetic storage media. Therefore, static magnetic fields near those devices cannot delete data. There are countless covers with magnetic closures or magnetic holders on the market, which also speaks against the notion that magnets can damage these devices.

My car has large gaps. Can EasyMount be mounted in these large gaps?

Yes.
For this purpose, a transparent plastic sheet is enclosed in the shipment for filling these gaps.
The plastic sheet can be resized with a scissors if necessary.
The sheet is inserted into the gap. Push the sheet into the gap until the sheet is flush with the edge of the dashboard. The sheet should not be visible any more.

If you have questions please send us an email. info.easymount@gmail.com

THANK YOU

Thanks to everyone who supported EasyMount in any possible way.

COMMENTS, QUESTIONS, PRESS ENQUIRIES

For supporters please feel free to comment or ask any questions. For any other enquiry please email info.easymount@gmail.com

 

EasyMount: Die einfach zu installierende, rahmenlose Handyhalterung für ihr Auto. [ENGLISH]

Hallo,
wir haben nach einer einfachen Montage-Lösung für das Handy gesucht. Da wir nur klobige Montage-Lösungen gefunden haben, haben wir damit begonnen, EasyMount zu entwickeln.

EasyMount ist eine einfache gut aussehende Handy-Halterung für fast jedes mobile Gerät. Die spezielle Montage bietet Ihnen eine rahmenlose unsichtbare Befestigung.
Nach 2 Jahren der Erprobung in verschiedenen Autos und mit verschiedenen Handys können wir Ihnen ein ausgereiftes Produkt anbieten.
Und das Beste: Die Installation ist sehr einfach. Einfach EasyMount in einen Spalt am Armaturenbrett stecken und der Halter ist montiert.

Auf EasyMount können verschiedene Handys montiert werden. Das heißt nur mehr EIN Halter für alle Handys.
Beim Wechseln eines Fahrzeuges kann EasyMount einfach demontiert bzw. montiert werden.

Kein Kleben, kein Bohren, kein Saugnapf.

Frühbucher-Fans nehmen an der Verlosung eines Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 teil.

Das Handy kann horizontal, vertikal oder in einen beliebigen Winkel montiert werden.

Funktion: 

Easymount besteht aus zwei Teilen.

1. EasyMount-Halter:

Der Halter ist aus gebürstetem Edelstahl. Es gibt keine schwachen Kunststoffteile die brechen können.

EasyMount garantiert eine lange Lebensdauer.

Die Magneten und die Gummipuffer sorgen für einen guten Halt.

2. EasyMount-Thinplate

Dies ist ein dünnes (0,2 mm) Blech mit einem hohen Ferritgehalt. Dies gewährleistet eine hohe magnetische Kraft. Die Thinplate kann innerhalb des Handys oder der Handyschale montiert werden.

Wenn Sie eine dickere Abdeckung verwenden, können Sie zwei Thinplates installieren um die Haltekraft zu verdoppeln. Gegebenenfalls können Sie die Thinplate mit einer Schere auf die beliebige Größe zuschneiden.

Installieren der Thinplate

Handy mit abnehmbarer Akkudeckel (zum Beispiel: Samsung Handy).

Die Thinplate wird in die Akkuabdeckung gelegt..

Handy mit Handyschale (zum Beispiel: I-Phone):

Die Thinplate wird in die Handyschale gelegt.

Kann Easymount in Ihrem Auto installiert werden?

Mit einer Plastikkarte können Sie leicht überprüfen, ob EasyMount in Ihrem Auto installiert werden kann.

1. Suchen Sie nach einem Spalt in Ihrem Armaturenbrett

2. Wenn es nicht möglich ist die Plastikkarte 1cm in diesen Spalt zu schieben, versuchen Sie es bei einem anderen Spalt.

3. Wenn die Plastikkarte 1cm in den Spalt geschoben werden kann, ist Ihr Auto bereit für den Easymount Halter.

4. Sie können jetzt die EasyMount-Halterung, wie zuvor die Plastikkarte in den Spalt schieben.

Hinweis: Ältere Autos haben oft größerer Spaltmaße. Hierfür ist eine transparente Kunststofffolie beigelegt. Diese Folie wird verwendet, um die größeren Spaltmaße auszugleichen.
Die Größe der Folie kann mit einer Schere angepasst werden.

Sicherheitshinweis: EasyMount ist stark genug, um jedes mobile Gerät zu halten.
Bei Versuchen konnte eine Haltekraft von 1kg* ermittelt werden.
Wir empfehlen jedoch keine mobilen Geräte mit einer Bildschirmdiagonale von größer 6" bzw. einem maximalen Gewicht von 300g auf EasyMount zu montieren.
* Das Prüfverfahren und die Testergebnisse sind auf Anfrage erhältlich.
Bitte beachten Sie, dass die Haltekraft abhängig von der Dicke des Akkudeckels des Handys bzw. der Dicke der Handyhülle ist.

Lieferumfang:

  • EasyMount Halterung
  • 2 Stk. Plastikfolien (3x6cm, um größere Spaltmaße auszugleichen)
  • 4 Stk. Thinplate für bis zu 4 mobile Geräte (3x6cm, Gegebenenfalls können Sie die Thinplate mit einer Schere auf die beliebige Größe zuschneiden)
  • Anleitung

FAQ (Häufig gestellte Fragen)

Kann der Magnet mein mobiles Gerät zerstören?

Speicherkarten sind keine magnetischen Speichermedien und nehmen deshalb keinen Schaden, wenn sie statischen Magnetfeldern ausgesetzt werden.
Handys und Smartphones enthalten allesamt nicht-magnetische Speichermedien. Statische Magnetfelder in der Nähe dieser Geräte können daher keine Daten löschen. Im Handel sind unzählige Hüllen mit Magnetverschluss sowie magnetische Halterungen für diese Geräte erhältlich, was ebenfalls gegen eine Schädigung durch Magnete spricht.

Mein Auto hat große Spaltmaße. Hält EasyMount in diesem Spalt?

Ja.
Hierfür ist eine transparente Kunststofffolie beigelegt. Diese Folie verwendet man, um die größeren Spaltmaße auszugleichen.
Die Folie steckt man so weit in den Spalt bis sie mit der Abschlusskante des Amaturenbrettes bündig ist. Somit ist die Folie nicht mehr sichtbar.
Das garantiert auch bei Autos mit größeren Spaltmaßen, dass EasyMount hält.
Bei Bedarf schneidet man die Folie auf die gewünschte Größe zu.

Noch Fragen?:

Bitte Email an info.easymount@gmail.com

Danke für die  Unterstützung!

story:
Connect your Bluetooth sensor directly to the Internet without your cell phone

------  Now with water/flood sensor option --

The Need

As a pioneer in network sensor development we at Esensors often see a need for products before others. Our current vision is that Bluetooth LE (Bluetooth Smart) wireless sensors are likely to become popular for smart buildings and the Internet of Things (IoT). Currently Bluetooth sensor applications are focused mostly on mobile and personal sensing connected to smart phones. However for smart buildings and many IoT applications a fixed location connection to the Internet is needed, specifically a Bluetooth gateway. You can help us develop a link that will make Bluetooth sensors much more accessible on the Internet.

Sensors Everywhere

The IoT concept is that sensors, as important IoT elements, are numerous and their use is able to improve the environment in which people live by large and small ways. These sensors must be able to automatically communicate with each other (M2M, machine to machine) on a real time basis and the information read anywhere on the Internet.  In addition to being interoperable without human intervention, implying standards, the sensors themselves, together with the communications, must be low enough in cost to justify their assigned task. Bluetooth, as one of the lowest cost networked wireless offers the most realistic path to this goal. It already is becoming a reality for mobile applications. We now need to do the same for non-mobile applications – smart buildings and smart grid.

 

 

 The Development Process

Normally we like to design our own circuits and lay out our own printed circuit boards but in this case we will save time (and money) by using an off-the-shelf Linux board (Raspberry Pi or equivalent). The software will translate the cell phone format into Internet format, process the sensor data and display the data on a dashboard similar to that below for a power meter.

 

  Brief Specifications

 

  • Bluetooth 4.0 (LE, low energy) compatible
  • Range: 50 to 200 meters LOS
  • 10/100 Base T Ethernet – path to Internet
  • Line powered (5v) supply (included)
  • Case 3.9”x2.5”x1.2”                                                                           
  • USB (future options such as WiFi)
  • Linux platform with 500 MB of memory
  • User and remote programmable
  • Basic and custom APIs for sensors are provided


 

Business Model

We are betting that developers in the smart building area will recognize the advantages of Bluetooth LE for sensors (see white paper) and are willing to back the development of an Internet gateway as a necessary component. We chose a list price of $149 which is several times less than Bluetooth gateways (access points) on the market, few of which are LE. The $35k goal allows a sufficiently high production volume to sell the gateway at this modest price. Since most Bluetooth sensors are low-cost a low gateway price promotes a low system cost, especially for multiple sensor systems. Our gateway will provide data in a standard format. As manufacturers release new Bluetooth sensors (e.g. TI SensorTag), we intend to provide matching API/Apps for a fee ($20) to convert their smartphone data protocol to the Internet standard.


Sensors for the Internet of Things

Here is a partial list of sensors for IoT---

  • Smart Grid
  • Remote Controlled Appliances
  • Intrusion Detection
  • Patient Monitoring
  • Air Quality
  • Water Leakages and flooding
  • Smart Lighting


Mobile vs Fixed Sensors

We think some sensors are best suited for mobile applications, such the personal air quality monitor we are selling. Other good examples are heart rate monitors. These are naturals for smart phones and iPads. They could connect to a fixed gateway but do not need to. We are aiming our gateway at sensors which are often not close to a smart phone – the smart building or smart grid.

Wireless Choices for Networked Sensors

Bluetooth LE is a very good choice for networked sensors but not the only one. Here are popular choices:

  • WiFi (especially low energy)
  • Bluetooth LE
  • Mesh (Zigbee, 6LoWPAN, ISA100)
  • SubGHz (proprietary)
  • 4G cellular

Each has application areas in which they do well and we do not expect a clear winner in the near future. What is needed is a common way of presenting the data to ease interoperation.

Standards

We support standards for sensor data communication and believe that the wider use of wireless sensors is being inhibited by incomplete, narrowly focused standards. When the IoT sensor standard (IEEE/ISO 21451) is released, we will comply with the format. In the meantime we will provide the same format used for our power meters and Websensors which has proven popular.

 

Water/flood Sensor --- Bluetooth enabled

A valuable sensor for smart buildings, this flood sensor will detect water or moisture on the surface on which the sensor is placed, usually a basement or bathroom floor. A long-life coin battery is sealed inside. It is based on our reliable capacitance sensing technology which uses a sponge at the case bottom to wick up the water. It can be read directly be a Bluetooth enabled smart phone or, better, by our gateway which is always on-line.  It operates continuously and sends an alarm at a predetermined threshold.


Non-contact power meter – stretch goal of $100k

 Looking into the future we wish to introduce a series of Bluetooth enabled sensors starting with a low-cost, thin non-contact power meter which slips onto 2- and 3-prong plugs. If we receive $100k in funding we expect to have this available by November.

Thank you

For supporting the development of the Bluetooth sensor gateway for smart buildings, smart grid and IoT.


_____________________________________________

These sensors must be able to automatically communicate with each other (M2M, machine to machine) on a real time basis and the information read anywhere on the Internet.  In addition to being interoperable without human intervention, implying standards, the sensors themselves, together with the communications, must be low enough in cost to justify their assigned task. Bluetooth, as one of the lowest cost networked wireless offers the most realistic path to this goal. It already is becoming a reality for mobile applications. We now need to do the same for non-mobile applications – smart buildings and smart grid. 
  
 
 The Development Process

Normally we like to design our own circuits and lay out our own printed circuit boards but in this case we will save time (and money) by using an off-the-shelf Linux board (Raspberry Pi or equivalent). The software will translate the cell phone format into Internet format, process the sensor data and display the data on a dashboard similar to that below for a power meter. 
 


  Brief Specifications

 

Bluetooth 4.0 (LE, low energy) compatible
Range: 50 to 200 meters LOS
10/100 Base T Ethernet – path to Internet
Line powered (5v) supply (included)
Case 3.9”x2.5”x1.2”                                                                            
USB (future options such as WiFi)
Linux platform with 500 MB of memory
User and remote programmable
Basic and custom APIs for sensors are provided

 
Business Model
We are betting that developers in the smart building area will recognize the advantages of Bluetooth LE for sensors (see white paper) and are willing to back the development of an Internet gateway as a necessary component. We chose a list price of $149 which is several times less than Bluetooth gateways (access points) on the market, few of which are LE. The $35k goal allows a sufficiently high production volume to sell the gateway at this modest price. Since most Bluetooth sensors are low-cost a low gateway price promotes a low system cost, especially for multiple sensor systems. Our gateway will provide data in a standard format. As manufacturers release new Bluetooth sensors (e.g. TI SensorTag), we intend to provide matching API/Apps for a fee ($20) to convert their smartphone data protocol to the Internet standard.

Sensors for the Internet of Things
Here is a partial list of sensors for IoT---

Smart Grid
Remote Controlled Appliances
Intrusion Detection
Patient Monitoring
Air Quality
Water Leakages and flooding
Smart Lighting

Mobile vs Fixed Sensors
We think some sensors are best suited for mobile applications, such the personal air quality monitor we are selling. Other good examples are heart rate monitors. These are naturals for smart phones and iPads. They could connect to a fixed gateway but do not need to. We are aiming our gateway at sensors which are often not close to a smart phone – the smart building or smart grid.

Wireless Choices for Networked Sensors
Bluetooth LE is a very good choice for networked sensors but not the only one. Here are popular choices:

WiFi (especially low energy)
Bluetooth LE
Mesh (Zigbee, 6LoWPAN, ISA100)
SubGHz (proprietary)
4G cellular
Each has application areas in which they do well and we do not expect a clear winner in the near future. What is needed is a common way of presenting the data to ease interoperation.
Standards
We support standards for sensor data communication and believe that the wider use of wireless sensors is being inhibited by incomplete, narrowly focused standards. When the IoT sensor standard (IEEE/ISO 21451) is released, we will comply with the format. In the meantime we will provide the same format used for our power meters and Websensors which has proven popular.
 
Water/flood Sensor --- Bluetooth enabled
A valuable sensor for smart buildings, this flood sensor will detect water or moisture on the surface on which the sensor is placed, usually a basement or bathroom floor. A long-life coin battery is sealed inside. It is based on our reliable capacitance sensing technology which uses a sponge at the case bottom to wick up the water. It can be read directly be a Bluetooth enabled smart phone or, better, by our gateway which is always on-line.  It operates continuously and sends an alarm at a predetermined threshold.


Non-contact power meter – stretch goal of $100k
 Looking into the future we wish to introduce a series of Bluetooth enabled sensors starting with a low-cost, thin non-contact power meter which slips onto 2- and 3-prong plugs. If we receive $100k in funding we expect to have this available by November.

Thank you
For supporting the development of the Bluetooth sensor gateway for smart buildings, smart grid and IoT.

_____________________________________________

story:
We do apologize for the delay in updating you. 
We have to let you know that we have not received funds for this project from Indiegogo and therefore we wont be able to fulfill our obligations.
Until now we have tried to understand the reason for that, however we have not received any decent explanation from Indiegogo.
Please, contact Indiegogo for the refund, as they have your money
Thank you so much for your support and as a thank you once the product will be in mass production, we make the special price Indiegogo price for you. (You will have to use the same email address, so we identify you in our system)
Once again, we do apologise for the inconvinience caused


LAZYLOCKS is designed to fit any door. It can be easily installed next to your existing lock without removing or replacing anything - it takes just a few minutes.
The LAZYLOCKS presents a contemporary new look for an old-fashioned lock: a sleek, modern device in brushed metal with LED light showing the lock/unlock status. Its elegant simplicity fits with any home decor.


Easy to Install

LAZYLOCKS is easy to install - you don’t have to replace your existing door lock neither your keys. Attach LAZYLOCKS next to your existing lock on the inside of the door and fix 6 screws. Pair it with your Android phone or iPhone and you are ready to control your lock through the LAZYLOCKS apps. LAZYLOCKS can be installed without any professional support within 5 minutes. Just configure it within the LAZYLOCKS apps and you are ready to use it.
We have made locks both for right - hand door or for left - hand door

Lock Status Always Available

LAZYLOCKS displays the status of your home door right on your smart phone wherever you are. An access log and notifications will keep you updated as well. No more doubts and uncertainties about your door.

Make sure you have any computer operating devices with Wi-Fi or Bluetooth Connection turned on  

     

Share Access with Family & Friends

LAZYLOCKS comes with free apps for Android and iOS. 
You can grant access codes to friends and family. 
LAZYLOCKS comes with two pre-configured security codes:
1st – which you will use on your daily basis
2nd – which you can give to your guests and then restrict their access.     

            



Do not let anyone interrupt you, when you are extremely busy!

At times LAZYLOCKS might be a necessity.

Sometimes every little detail helps

There are moments in life, when every second is precious and you don't want to miss a thing let along bother with the door opening


The dimensions of the LAZYLOCKS



Lock & Unlock Anywhere

With the help of the LAZYLOCKS it is possible to lock and unlock your door from anywhere. It allows you to not only operate LAZYLOCKS from within Bluetooth reach  (approx. 10 m), but also via a mobile data connection from anywhere. 

Battery life

LAZYLOCKS will last for 400 openings on standardized AA batteries, which is almost 2 months of frequent using. Once your battery runs low, LAZYLOCKS will notify you both on your smart phone and via your door lock well in advance. You will receive a notification via your app as well as the LAZYLOCKS will be blinking with red light. You will have at least 20 openings since the 1st time you will receive the notification.

Wi Fi and Bluetooth VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER. 

You have the unique opportunity to make a pre - order for an extra Early Bird price of $49! Hurry up!!! The Offer is limited - 50 pieces only!!!


Wi Fi and Bluetooth VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER - reach up to 110m. 
 Once your guest presses the button - you will receive a notification on your phone, with photo or video (depends on your settings) 
 VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER will last for 600 notifications on two standardized AA batteries. It will synchronize with LAZYLOCKS application.
The kit set includes a special waterproof case for outdoor use

The dimensions of VIDEO SPY HOLE DOOR VIEWER are:
8 x 4.5 x 1.5 cm/ 3.1 x 1.8 x 0.69 inches


Mission

At LAZYLOCKS our mission is to make door locks smarter and physical keys irrelevant, thanks to your phone. We are thrilled to take on this challenge because we believe in the power of mobile technology innovations to facilitate the daily live of you and me. We tested and developed different models and strive for finding the best working solution to solve this problem. However, every project carries risks with it. The most common risks are potential delays in production, obtaining supplier materials, packaging and shipping. We do everything do reduce these risks but it has to be said that they can never be completely eliminated.

Hardware requires a long chain of manufacturing steps to produce a high quality product. Delays in any of the steps tend to ripple down and delay the whole process.

Other companies have attempted to create a product like this and failed. We have solved the main challenges that discouraged previous developers.

We have a Plan B and Plan C for the most important features.

Still, there is a lot to get right - ease of use, reliability, cost, and delivering a beautiful product on time.

story:
Dear contributors. We come closer to the end of our campaign and it is obvious we will not reach the goal. 

While thanking you, we have already proceed to refund your contributions, not being able to produce the item in such of small quantity at the promised quality. For this reason we have now zero contributors. (we had 10 contributions.) WOW!


THANK YOU ALL 10 CONTRIBUTORS! REALLY!


What was about:

A simple, practical accessory for iPad Pro and Pencil, KLIP is a transparent rubber half ring with a tiny magnet insert.

Use KLIP together with Pencil to attach it to the screen side. Like a real artist.

We made the prototype and share it with friends. They like it.

Our intention was to share the idea hoping to produce it later by finding production capacities.

What we were needed:

We were intend to raise money for the followings:

1. Refine the prototype

2. Find production capacities

3. Setup distribution

What you were suppose to get:

This campaign had the purpose to see if any interest in such of a product.

Any contribution were considered a helping hand and suppose to be rewarded as defined perks that we now took out not to confuse visitors.

What was the story behind:

1. Function: To enable attachment of Apple pencil to Ipad Pro

2. Condition: No mechanical fixture to iPad screen, no glue, pressure or scratch to Pencil.

3. Overall design: As less as possible noticeable, and no physical impact to both tablet and pencil.

By analysing the iPad screen, we found the existence of magnets with different polarities inside, used for Smart Cover. EVRIKA!

We were testing all kind and sizes of magnets and we found that a round magnet, 0.1 inches (3 millimetres) in diameter, fit perfect on upper right corner side, both in portrait and landscape mode.

So here we are: transparent rubber ring, gently fit around Pencil and simply clip to screen side.

We were test it so much to make sure it is no disturbance to the screen or possible scratch. For this reason, the tiny magnet has also a protective foil over his shiny surface.


NOW...campaign comes to the end, without success, so...thank you all again.

story:
Read More About Us:

                 


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

World’s First, Smartphone-integrated Radar Module for Cars!

Radarboys is developing a revolutionary, Bluetooth®-enabled radar module, named iC2, that shows drivers the distances and speeds of other cars sharing the road with them. Information is displayed on the user’s Android or iOS-enabled smartphone via a free downloadable app, which triggers both audible and visual alerts when the driver approaches a potentially hazardous situation. This allows the driver time to react and return to safety.


The iC2 device increases the driver’s awareness of his or her surroundings and improves safety, especially at night and in hazardous driving conditions.

Radarboys’ iC2 device records all radar data, distances, speeds and directions, which can help with insurance claims and assist police during accident investigations.

Whether you are commuting to work running errands around town, or on a family road trip, Radarboys iC2 gives you peace of mind and the promise of safer travels on the road.

Product Highlights:

  • Easy, suction-cup mount installation
  • Free, easy-to-use smartphone app (Android/iOS)
  • Stylish colors
  • Great design
  • Use globally

Our motivation and beliefs

Radarboys iC2 is more than a great tech gadget. We believe it will help improve driver safety and save lives. Each year, there are more than five million traffic accidents in the U.S. alone, and more than 30,000 of these incidents involve a fatality.

At Radarboys, we are passionate about creating life-saving technologies that are affordable, easy to use, reliable, and built with the world's best materials and components.

Why we need funds

Today we have developed several a few working prototypes of our iC2 module, but we still need funds to improve some of the firmware before putting the product into mass production.

Proposed Schedule:

  • 1st month – Finalize electronics optimization and prototype testing of the iOS & Andriod phone app,
  • 2nd month – Development/testing of beta versions.
  • 3rd month – Final product testing and certification.
  • 4th month – Begin mass production.
  • 5th month – Delivery of Radarboys iC2 to you, our backers.

The proposed schedule outlined above is set with a reserve, because we do not want to let our backers down or cause unnecessary delays.

We expect to launch Radarboys iC2 into mass production and our backers will be able to get new device much earlier and cheaper than those who will want to buy it in future.

Your rewards

You'll enjoy some amazing rewards and perks for backing Radarboys!

  • Everyone who contributes $159 will receive Radarboys iC2 before the normal retail sales on Radarboys.com and in retail stores.

  • A special perk for the first 100 iC2 modules preordered:



    Free Wiper Shark Fin (a $10 value). This unique fin-shape automotive gadget attaches to the windshield wiper and flaps when drivers get too close to the car in front of them.

  • All perks of $159 reflect a 47 percent discount off the normal retail price of $299.

  • Deeper discounts for multiple-unit orders.

Choose Your Favorite Color!

  • White with blue cover - $159
  • White with pink cover - $159
  • Black - $159

$10 shipping cost not included. Please add this to your perk.

Help spread the word

Even if you can't contribute, we ask for your help in raising awareness in our campaign. We would be grateful to you for sharing our story on social media with the IndieGoGo sharing tools below, or emailing this page to someone you feel could benefit from the convenience, control and cutting-edge technology that Radarboys provides.


Radarboys iC2: A smart radar module 

Radarboys iC2 is pioneering radar technology for the smart, connected car. While the inaugural product will be able to record event data, we plan to offer "over-the-air" updates to give you even more features in the future.  

Free mobile app

The Radarboys iC2 app is “appsolutely” free and does not use the monthly cellular data budget allocated by your wireless service provider. It is available for both iOS and Android devices, and is designed with features we know you'll like. 

         

Key Features:                          

                                                              

 Highway/City: The Highway selection shows a single front view traffic including distance and speed. It shows traffic information from multiple lanes. The City view shows traffic information for cars traveling in the opposite direction on the left portion of your screen.

Short range: This mode shows traffic information up to 160 feet, and is preferable when driving at lower speeds or when traffic is more dense.

Long range: This mode shows traffic information up to 500 feet, and is preferable when cruising at higher speeds.

Auto range: Depending on speed and traffic the display switches automatically from Long- to Short-range modes.


Easy setup

Your Radarboys iC2 module can be adjusted to respond to your driving preferences:

  • Units selection: USA: mph, feet; EU: km/h, meters

  • Alert levels: Set to high, medium, or low, or just switch them off individually. 

  • Collision alert: Warns when firm brake levels must be applied to avoid a collision. Level is adjustable, and can be switched off.

  • Traffic jam: Warns when traffic is stopped ahead, or is moving at a significantly lower speed than your own car. Level is adjustable, and can be switched off.

  • Own speed: Displays your rate of travel. Can be switched off is desired.

  • Opposing traffic speed: Displays the speed of oncoming traffic (City mode only). Can be switched off.

  • Same direction traffic speed: Displays the speed of traffic traveling in the same direction as you. Available in both Highway and City modes. Can be switched off.

  • Use Day/Night colors: Automatically switches the display based on the time of day.

  • Driver side: Left- or Right-hand drive, display is adjusted accordingly.  

Note : Radar data recording mode is always on to support your insurance case if needed.     


Easy installation

Radarboys iC2 is installed in a few seconds. The suction cup mount allows fast and easy installation.


Stylish colors, great design!

Radarboys’ iC2 module is available in black, blue or pink. The device features an aesthetically pleasing design and small form factor to have a minimal visual impact.

Radarboys is global

The Radarboys iC2 module is a great solution for everyone around the world, since it operates in the 24GHz worldwide free ISM band. Additionally, it does not interfere with speed-trap devices.

 

About us & our experience

The Radarboys team is passionate about creating groundbreaking technologies that fit into your digital lifestyle.

We are fortunate for the past experience which have now reduced the learning curve for this project. Our team of engineers and production designers are experienced in developing and manufacturing consumer technology. This includes the design and development of hardware, software, mobile apps and retail packaging, manufacturing and distribution.

We know that every project has its challenges. We're confident that our experience helps us know what to expect and how to handle the unexpected!


RADARBOYS: A Vision for Safety™

engineers and production designers are experienced in developing and
manufacturing consumer technology. This includes the design and development of
hardware, software, mobile apps and retail packaging, manufacturing and
distribution.
We know that every project has its
challenges. We're confident that our experience helps us know what to expect
and how to handle the unexpected!





RADARBOYS: A Vision for Safety™

story:
We created XRMOUR™ Technologies when we discovered how damaging electromagnetic radiation can be to our bodies.  We needed a way to protect ourselves 24 hours a day, 7 days a week that was functional, comfortable and versatile. 

The XSHIRT™ was created to meet this need. 

The XSHIRT™ uses patent pending, smart, textile technology to shield a majority of it's wearer from cell phone, wifi, smart meter and other forms of electromagnetic radiation (EMR). In a world where we are surrounded by EMR it is important that we can effectively reduce our exposure to these fields. By doing so, we can improve our overall mental and physical health and reduce the chance of cancer and other medical conditions that may result from EMR exposure.

The XSHIRT™ can be worn under dress attire or worn by itself. The shirt style was created because a majority of the vital organs exposed to EMR reside in the area protected by the shirt, your torso. XSHIRT™ is a product that is comfortable to wear in formal and casual situations alike.

The XSHIRT™ contains a proprietary blend of 99% pure silver bonded to fibers.  This means that along with its EMR shielding capabilities it also has antimicrobial (odor fighting), antibacterial properties and regulates temperature to maintain a comfortable balance of warm and cool making the shirt extremely comfortable to wear.

Each XSHIRT™ is hand crafted in the USA. When you purchase an XSHIRT™ you can be confident that you are supporting jobs in America and that your shirt will be superior in design, quality and construction.


The XCASE™ is made from the same material as the XSHIRT™ which means it will help shield you from the electromagnetic radiation that your cell phone emits.

We have added XARMOUR™ material to the back of the XCASE™ but have not shielded the front so that you can still receive phone calls.

Each XCASE™ is hand crafted in the USA. When you purchase an XCASE™ you can be confident that you are supporting jobs in the USA and that your XCASE™ will be superior in design, quality and construction.


Not convinced? Don't take our word for it, checkout this brief list of compelling articles covering the dangers of electromagnetic radiation.

1) Damage Fetal Development.

2) Impact Male Fertility.

3) Contribute to Cancer.

4) Provoke Cardiac Stress.

5) Contribute to Insomnia.

6) Destroy Certain Animals Abilities to Navigate.

7) And there are hundreds more... 

We strongly encourage you to visit OpenSignal.com, AntennaSearch.com and Wigle.net to view detailed maps showing sources of electromagnetic radiation you are being exposed to on a daily basis.


Male XSHIRT™: Offered in sizes S, M, L, XL and XXL.

Female XSHIRT™: Offered in sizes XS, S, M, L, XL and XXL

We guarantee you will love your XSHIRT™. 

If your XSHIRT™ does not fit right, send it back free of charge for an exchange. (Continental US Only)

International supporters are subject to a $20 surcharge for exchanges.

After years of research and months of designing, testing, and setting up production, we are finally ready to bring you the amazing XSHIRT™. We need your help to fund our initial order. In return for your support, we are offering a limited time discounted price and a variety of special rewards.

We would like to thank the following marketing partners who are helping to make this campaign a huge success!

TDC Entertainment/Disinformation - "Mobilize" Movie
Native Unions - POP Phone
InList

Please help spread the word about our campaign through the following social channels:

Facebook - Twitter - Instagram - Pinterest

story:
Short Summary

 

  • All cables are MFI certified and will be compatible with all Apple devices.
  • Stack is really the USB Apple should have made. Its great for the car (where you really DO only have 1 port), limited USB computers and anything else you can think of. All Stack chargers come with a FREE Car charger. Because most of us already have the wall charger, and you only need one now!
  • My campaign is important to me because I'm stuck in the heart of Oil Town, Texas. Ever since I was a kid, I've wanted to escape my seemingly inevitable future in the Oil Field. Its not a bad gig! 70,000 a year, starting with no school. But that's not the life I want for myself, I want to change the world!
  • If successful, you will all get a piece of history! I want every single new iPhone Apple to ship with this Stack Cable! With proven sales, this is more than possible!
  • If the campaign is unsuccessful, your money will be given back!

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • I need a minimum of $5,000 for the first round of manufacturing. That's why I have chosen the Fixed-Limit goal. If I raised 4,000 dollars, I wouldn't have anything to do with the money, so it will all go back to you.
  • If I DO reach my goal however, you'll get your order of Stack Chargers just in time for Christmas! Plus a free car charger! I will keep you updated on ever single thing I'm doing AND you'll be able to charge up to 4 devices with one USB port! You can charge you iPhone, iPod, a friends iPhone and also use your mouse/keyboard all at once! This is the USB Apple should have made.

 

The Impact

  • This project will change the world of iThings. If successful, I plan to license the Stack design to Apple, or another iPhone charger manufacturer, so that all future iCables will be made with the exact design of stack. All thanks to you!
  • I know I look 16, but I'm actually 20. (still young, I know) but I'm a driven individual who refuses to be average and I'm confident I can bring this product to life.
  • You can follow Stack whether you donate or not at- www.facebook.com/StackUSB - There you will get more updates than any other project has ever posted, and you MAY get some FREE stuff. Depending on how successful this is ;)

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t give away money, but that's ok! You can still contribute! Just tell a friend!

  • If you like the idea, but don't want to donate, you can still help! Just a simple 'like' on www.facebook.com/StackUSB will help SO much more than you could ever imagine!
  • Indiegogo also has some cool features to spread the word right here on this page!

story:
Short Summary

Wearables are the new trend. But most parts need to be built yourself and are complicated. Here is a finished easy to use, simple to program flexible 8x8 full color LED matrix you can use right away for your project. Just connect it to your arduino and a 5V power source and you are ready to shine all the colors you want.

I was long looking for a display like this for my famous playable Tetris Tshirt. I couldn't find one so I asked a company to make me one. So here it is all ready waiting to be manufactured. All that is missing is some funding for the larger scale fabrication. The first samples are great and work perfectly. 

I decided on this 17x17cm size with (only) 8x8 LED ( spaced 2cm apart) for 3 reasons: 

1) large enough to make a cool wearable display ( like on a Tshirt)

2) only 64 LEDs so power consumption stays somewhat reasonable ( 5V, <4A max per panel) so battery powering is no problem.

3) 8x8 so it is directly compatible to existing Neopixel Arduino( or other) Matrix drivers ( just larger and flexible panel)

Dimensions are chosen so you can simply glue a few together. Plugs and connections are provided to daisy-chain the panels.  (which is also supported by existing 8x8 panel driver software)

Specs:
- 17x17cm black flexible PCB
- 20mm pitch (distance between LED centers)
5V
3,9 amp max ( when all LEDs set to max brightness)
- 8 rows and 8 columns of indiviually addressable RGB LEDs. ( each single LED can be controlled individually, set color, on/off, lightness etc) 
- WS2812B LEDs ( digitally addressable RGB)
- Input and output have connectors
- Extra, separate connection for power supply, no plug.
- Daisy-chain-able, you can connect 1 panel to another to create a bigger/longer/wider display
- Easy to glue panels together
- Use standard existing 8x8 matrix drivers 

What We Need

The samples and development are done. All that is missing is some funding to make a larger scale production for those people who would need a great panel like this for their own projects. The factory is ready to go. 

The Impact

Your contribution will help advance wearable technology and greatly simplify and make more great projects possible more rapidly by making a easy to use panel available. Practically plug-and-play. Of course this is not limited to wearables but can be used for any other project were a large flexible full color 8x8 matrix is needed.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't need a panel or just simply want to help of course you can do so, any contribution is welcome, But spreading the word will probably be the best help for me and all others who didn't know about it but who are looking for a great flexible panel.

story:
• Intrak Australia has achieved 80% reduction on H264 / AVC / MPEG 4 - AVC / MPEG 4 – PART 10 and VP8 (Web-M) video files
  • Intrak Australia has also achieved aggressive 80% reduction over and beyond compressed files produced by future compression scheme H265 (HEVC) without compromising quality 
  • Significant social impact with measured costs benefits on energy, internet infrastructure, productivity, bandwidth reduction
  • Developed 5 different applications to benefit individual users, government, business and service providers


Did you know the internet uses 300 billions watts of the worlds energy and emits 260,000 kg of CO2 pollution yearly, and uses more energy than the entire global AUTO industry?

Around 40% of the world population has an internet connection today. In 1995, it was less than 1%.The number of internet users has increased tenfold from 1999 to 2013. The first billion was reached in 2005. The second billion in 2010. The third billion will be reached by the end of 2014.

The unstoppable demand for information in motion with a click of the mouse or touch on a smart device is consuming the world's energy supplies at a staggering rate. While the world has turned its attention to green or clean energy, the online digital industry is hiding a dirty secret, and no authority in the world is taking the lead in bringing the industry to account.

Power is needed to keep the internet going at break neck speed around the clock from every corner of the globe.

The virtual world and the cloud is light years from being green or clean. There are more than 3 million data centres around the world as physical infrastructures such as power stations, electricity grids, buildings stacked with back-up generators and lead-acid batteries, which consumes 30 billion watts or electricity per year. This is equivalent to 30 nuclear power plants.

Why is there such demand for power on the internet?

With our lives increasingly online from banking, shopping, dating, travel, entertainment, social interaction, communicating, sharing photos, education, searching for goods and services  etc. our current technology and infrastructure will not cope to sustain the  massive demand into the future. 

As the online population is racing upwards video streaming and video conferencing is driving internet traffic, how we manage customer usage thresholds, power resources and infrastructure capability is crucial for the digital revolution.

CONTRIBUTE NOW

So what are the challenges?

  • There is no such thing as the 'cloud'. It is not an imaginery white fluffy thing floating in the sky. Online information and data has to be stored somewhere. The internet is a physical thing consuming 2% of the world's energy and emits 260,000 kg of CO2 pollution yearly.
  • Video streaming and video conferencing is the fastest growth area in internet traffic requiring higher bandwidth as the demand for data streaming increases.
  • By 2016 smart devices will outnumber the world's population predicted to be 10 billion.
  • Clogging of the internet or Contention will dramatically increase causing lost time, less productivity and increased costs as the infrastructure to deliver the internet is fixed.
  • Massive drain on energy resources. Passing streaming data NOT only uses energy; the steamed data itself IS energy. Globally the internet uses 300 billion watts of energy per year. so as the internet consumes more of our energy resources, so will the price of electricity soar.

Used International bandwidth

As you can see in the chart below, international bandwidth availability has soared ("used bandwidth" refers to the capacity deployed by providers, rather than bandwidth consumed by end users). From 1.4 terabits per second in 2002, it steadily climbed to 6.7 terabits in 2006 and has now reached 92.1 terabits per second. TeleGeography expects that number to hit 606.6 terabits per second in 2018 and 1,103.3 terabits per second in 2020. Jon Brodkin - May 2 2012, 2:40am AUSEST arc technica


So what is the solution to the internet explosion?

Internet Bandwidth reduction.

The engine room or core of the Internet has become streaming which is commonplace from smartphones, laptops, tablets and other computer devices.

                         

With MVFU bandwidth reduction technology achieving up to 80% beyond compression reduction.

This technology is positioned to be very disruptive to the main players on the market such as Skype, YouTube, Sky and Commercial TV channels worldwide who are relying on exsiting compression technology.
The benefit to the environment is a reduction is dirty energy and lowering co2 pollution.

MVFU is a game changer and disruptive in nature.  Benefit to users is saving time, energy and most importantly money!

             

CONTRIBUTE NOW

Latest video conferencing technology and Revolutionary New System!!

MP4 achieves up to 80% reduction, Now MVFU achieves a further 80% reduction on the already compressed files, without comprimising  on quality!!!

Where is the MVFU technology beneficial?

•Less global carbon footprint and less greenhouse gasses by reducing the energy consumed to stream Videos On-Line by up to 80%
•Doubling the number of Internet uses for existing infrastructure
•Reducing the cost of internet and smart phone bills
•On-Line Gaming (open slow internet markets)
•Social Media (more affordable and accessible)
•Military & Home-land security applications
•Live broadcast such as news, sport, .... etc.
•IP Secuirty systems
•Fast Uploads/Downloads movies to and of Clouds /Liberaries
•Reducing Mutimedia files space on hard drives & Clouds


For the “Beyond Compression” technology Intrak has not only undertaken a full development cycle for the technology, it has conducted an analysis on the demand & need for this technology. 


HELP US MAKE A DIFFERENCE AND PROTECT OUR ENERGY RESOURCES

       CONTRIBUTE NOW

 The funds from our Intrak Australia's Crowdfunding Campaign will complete the further development required to roll-out the MVFU system to provide a clear need to improve the slow performance of the internet and reduce its high energy use. These development steps are:

1.  To develop a Mac platform MVFU software version (for Apple products)

2.  To develop an Android platform version (for Android products)

3.  Once, we achieved the above steps, we then will be able to develop APPS that will be available for all users to downloads on their own devices worldwide. 

Our project time frame will allow us to achieve the above in 12 month time once we get the required development funding.


                             

What we need and what is your reward

Intrak Australia Pty Ltd needs AUD $200,000 to commercialse the MVFU system. 

To remain competitive on-going development is crucial to offer the most advanced software in bandwidth reduction technology.

Your support will fund the roll-out of the MVFU system to our broad range of target customers to allow everyone who uses the internet to SAVE MONEY.

You can support Intrak Australia by contributing AUD $25, $45, $100, $500 or $5000  through our Rewards based campaign.

YOUR REWARD FOR CONTRIBUTING

Your reward for $25 contribution is: Converter Tool for current (H264 / AVC / MPEG 4 - AVC / MPEG 4 – PART 10) to the new future compression schemes H265 (e.g. HEVC), without reduction. This is breakthrough technology for yet to be released H265 compressions. H265 is designed to utilize substantially less bandwidth thanks to advanced encoding techniques and Intrak has achieved significant breakthrough with further bandwith reduction without comprising on quality. Recommended for i7 processor of higher. 

Your reward for $45 contribution is: One USB loaded with Intrak Technology reduction software applications for video conferencing and reduction conversion tools plus 10 FREE downloads for friends, (for a 30 day trial period), to test, evaluate and provide feed back to develop the software by realtime users.

Your reward for $100 contribution is: 3 USB loaded with Intrak Technology reduction software applications for video conferencing and reduction conversion tools plus 10 FREE downloads for friends (for a 30 day trial period),

Your reward for $500 contribution is: Windows tablet Asus Transformer Book T100TA (64GB) Tablet with MVFU software applications for THE LATEST video conferencing and reduction conversion tools plus 50 FREE downloads for friends (for a 30 day trial period),

Your reward for $5000 contribution is: Our Mobile learning and working Package includes 15 x Windows 8.1 hybrid tablet. Get 15 of the latest and best Asus Transformer Book T100TA (64GB) Tablets. Either donate these 15 Tablets to your special charity, classroom or school.  Or present to your staff or customers as a 'thankyou' or 'reward'. Included is the latest MVFU Video reduction bandwidth tool and the latest Video Conferencing software. Shipping is not included.

10% of your contribution is supporting young people's potential

Intrak Australia is proudly supporting 2realise which is a charity based in The Hills area, northwest of Sydney; however works throughout the Northern Sydney Region. 2realise supports young people to develop their mental, social and emotional resilience. The objective of their programs are to improve young people’s wellbeing, educational and employment outcomes.  

One of these programs this crowdfunding initiative will help fund is Industry Bites! The aim of Industry Bites is to provide young people with a short snapshot into a particular industry or organisation, educating them on the types of career paths within and the requirements to reach these.

2realise (Australian Charity and Not-for-Profit)


HELP US MAKE A DIFFERENCE AND REDUCE INTERNET EMISSIONS

 CONTRIBUTE NOW



FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

What is MVFU?

MVFU is Mutimedia Video Frame Update

How does is work?

MVFU is an intelligent software capable of achieiving significant reduction in Video Streaming's data consumption by not allowing repetition in subsequent frames of video streaming (i.e. avoiding overlap images between frames).

What is the current development level of the MVFU technology?

MVFU is developed to the point of where the system can be demonstrated and compared to other compression system in realtime, and analysis shows significant  bandwidth reduction for Video conferencing, surveillance, Video Libraries, Gaming and Simulation.

What IP protection does Intrak Australia currently have?

Please refer to our website for a full list of IP Patents and ownership of the Company's technology. Intrak Australia IP Protection and Ownership

What milestones has the MVFU technology achieved so far?

  • Achieved up to 80% reduction in H264, AVC. MPEG-4 AVC & MPEG-4 part 10 Video Codecs / MP2, MP3 & AAC Audio files
  • Achieved up to 80% reduction on WebM Video files and supports Audio Codec Vorbis
  • Successfully couple up MVFU's players and tools with a live Server (on Linux platform), maintaining the above reduction rate and speed over line transmissions
  • Developed our own player with branded Dashboard
  • Developed BECT conversion tool to reduce files previously compressed
  • Develop and build Data Consumption Counter tool capable of real-time consumption data features log files, accurate measurements with multi-coloured auto graphics
  • Video Comparison Tool

  • IP Camera Consle Tool: full event programming features dispaly with data loggers with SDK to IP Cameras compatibility 

Who are the key customer segments for the MVFU technology?

MVFU is a platform technology that has applications in 4 wide areas:

  • Video Conferencing and Live Corresponds 
  • On-Demand and Simulation Streaming
  • Live Streaming
  • Homeland and IP Security

Who are the key Industry segments that would benefit from this technology?

  • Service Providers in Telecommunications and Media / Publishing
  • Live & Sky Channels and live international events coverage
  • YouTube and alike video liberaries 
  • Millitary Similators and trainning 
  • Borders & Homeland Security
  • Education, live lectures & training
  • Tourism, On-line promotions & 3D Presentations 
  • Medical and Emergency Services
  • Individual everyday users of the internet that want to save money & energy

What are your key distribution channels?

  • Web retail distribution for Vidoe-Conferencing (for expample Skype)
  • Security to include Business to Business and Business to Business Service Delivery
  • On-Demand and Simulation
  • Live Streaming

What are your revenue streams?

Intrak Australia Pty Ltd revenue streams will be generated from multiple areas:

1.  Royalties on licensing the Technology to:

•    Manufacturers such as Apple, Samsung…etc.

•   Service providers such as Telstra, Voda phone…etc.

•   Video Conferencing such as Skype, G talk…etc.

•   Sky & Live Channels…etc.

2.  Apps and Software programs online sales & downloads

3.  Joint Ventures and Partnerships with International organisations 

4.  Selling of Security monitoring systems.

Why are you supporting a charitable community?

To show our appreciation in receiving support from the 'crowds' in enabling us to bring the MVFU system to benefit the world; Intrak Australia wishes to donate 10% of our funds raised to support a worthy community and their initiatives to develop young people's potential. 2realise is a registered Australian Charity and Not-for-Profit that works around the Northern and Northwestern suburbs of Sydney.

One of their initiatives is Industry Bites, a program that provides young people with a snapshot into a particular industry or organisation, educating them on the types of career paths within and the requirements to reach these. In 2013, 389 students participated in this program which has grown to include 14 companies such as Microsoft, McDonalds Head Office  and Johnson & Johnson.  

What is the outcome if you do not raise sufficient funds to meet your goal?

Intrak Australia understands the significance of expediting this technology to the market now, if we do not meet our funding goal, there is lost opportunity for a global disruptive new technology on the market. Which we believe will save internet users time, energy and money. We believe the lost opportunity will be largely realised firstly in the Australian ecconomy, as this will have a negative effect on innovation and ecomonic development.  The other lost opportunity is not protecting our current and future energy resources as globally the internet uses 300 billion watts of energy per year; and the environmental problem of global power used for search engines emitting 260,000kg of CO2 pollution yearly.

Want to know more about Intrak Australia's story?

INTRAK AUSTRALIA PTY LTD


CONTRIBUTE TOWARD A CLEANER WORLD AND MAKE A DIFFERENCE


References

What is H265 and HEVC?

Internet Live Stats

Itu.int Stats / facts

New York Times - Power Pollution and the Internet

Bandwidth Explosion as internet use soars

What happens in an internet minute

Huffington Post - Internet Image

What is using all the bandwidth

Tablet use bogging down internet bandwidth
