Intrak Australia has also achieved aggressive 80% reduction over and beyond compressed files produced by future compression scheme H265 (HEVC) without compromising quality 
Significant social impact with measured costs benefits on energy, internet infrastructure, productivity, bandwidth reduction
Developed 5 different applications to benefit individual users, government, business and service providers






Did you know the internet uses 300 billions watts of the worlds energy and emits 260,000 kg of CO2 pollution yearly, and uses more energy than the entire global AUTO industry?



Around 40% of the world population has an internet connection today. In 1995, it was less than 1%.The number of internet users has increased tenfold from 1999 to 2013. The first billion was reached in 2005. The second billion in 2010. The third billion will be reached by the end of 2014. 



The unstoppable demand for information in motion with a click of the mouse or touch on a smart device is consuming the world's energy supplies at a staggering rate. While the world has turned its attention to green or clean energy, the online digital industry is hiding a dirty secret, and no authority in the world is taking the lead in bringing the industry to account.
Power is needed to keep the internet going at break neck speed around the clock from every corner of the globe.
The virtual world and the cloud is light years from being green or clean. There are more than 3 million data centres around the world as physical infrastructures such as power stations, electricity grids, buildings stacked with back-up generators and lead-acid batteries, which consumes 30 billion watts or electricity per year. This is equivalent to 30 nuclear power plants.
Why is there such demand for power on the internet?
With our lives increasingly online from banking, shopping, dating, travel, entertainment, social interaction, communicating, sharing photos, education, searching for goods and services  etc. our current technology and infrastructure will not cope to sustain the  massive demand into the future. 



As the online population is racing upwards video streaming and video conferencing is driving internet traffic, how we manage customer usage thresholds, power resources and infrastructure capability is crucial for the digital revolution. 
CONTRIBUTE NOW
So what are the challenges?


There is no such thing as the 'cloud'. It is not an imaginery white fluffy thing floating in the sky. Online information and data has to be stored somewhere. The internet is a physical thing consuming 2% of the world's energy and emits 260,000 kg of CO2 pollution yearly.
Video streaming and video conferencing is the fastest growth area in internet traffic requiring higher bandwidth as the demand for data streaming increases. 
By 2016 smart devices will outnumber the world's population predicted to be 10 billion. 
Clogging of the internet or Contention will dramatically increase causing lost time, less productivity and increased costs as the infrastructure to deliver the internet is fixed. 
Massive drain on energy resources. Passing streaming data NOT only uses energy; the steamed data itself IS energy. Globally the internet uses 300 billion watts of energy per year. so as the internet consumes more of our energy resources, so will the price of electricity soar.



Used International bandwidth
As you can see in the chart below, international bandwidth availability has soared ("used bandwidth" refers to the capacity deployed by providers, rather than bandwidth consumed by end users). From 1.4 terabits per second in 2002, it steadily climbed to 6.7 terabits in 2006 and has now reached 92.1 terabits per second. TeleGeography expects that number to hit 606.6 terabits per second in 2018 and 1,103.3 terabits per second in 2020. Jon Brodkin - May 2 2012, 2:40am AUSEST arc technica





So what is the solution to the internet explosion?
Internet Bandwidth reduction.
The engine room or core of the Internet has become streaming which is commonplace from smartphones, laptops, tablets and other computer devices.

                         

With MVFU bandwidth reduction technology achieving up to 80% beyond compression reduction.
This technology is positioned to be very disruptive to the main players on the market such as Skype, YouTube, Sky and Commercial TV channels worldwide who are relying on exsiting compression technology. The benefit to the environment is a reduction is dirty energy and lowering co2 pollution.

MVFU is a game changer and disruptive in nature.  Benefit to users is saving time, energy and most importantly money!
              
CONTRIBUTE NOW
Latest video conferencing technology and Revolutionary New System!!

MP4 achieves up to 80% reduction, Now MVFU achieves a further 80% reduction on the already compressed files, without comprimising  on quality!!!
Where is the MVFU technology beneficial?
•Less global carbon footprint and less greenhouse gasses by reducing the energy consumed to stream Videos On-Line by up to 80%•Doubling the number of Internet uses for existing infrastructure•Reducing the cost of internet and smart phone bills•On-Line Gaming (open slow internet markets)•Social Media (more affordable and accessible)•Military & Home-land security applications•Live broadcast such as news, sport, .... etc.•IP Secuirty systems•Fast Uploads/Downloads movies to and of Clouds /Liberaries•Reducing Mutimedia files space on hard drives & Clouds

For the “Beyond Compression” technology Intrak has not only undertaken a full development cycle for the technology, it has conducted an analysis on the demand & need for this technology. HELP US MAKE A DIFFERENCE AND PROTECT OUR ENERGY RESOURCES       CONTRIBUTE NOW  The funds from our Intrak Australia's Crowdfunding Campaign will complete the further development required to roll-out the MVFU system to provide a clear need to improve the slow performance of the internet and reduce its high energy use. These development steps are:
1.  To develop a Mac platform MVFU
software version (for Apple products)
2.  To develop an Android platform
version (for Android products)
3.  Once, we achieved the above
steps, we then will be able to develop APPS that will be available for all users to downloads on their own devices worldwide. 
Our project time frame will allow us to achieve the above in 12 month time once we get the required development funding.                              What we need and what is your rewardIntrak Australia Pty Ltd needs AUD $200,000 to commercialse the MVFU system. To remain competitive on-going development is crucial to offer the most advanced software in bandwidth reduction technology.Your support will fund the roll-out of the MVFU system to our broad range of target customers to allow everyone who uses the internet to SAVE MONEY.You can support Intrak Australia by contributing AUD $25, $45, $100, $500 or $5000  through our Rewards based campaign.YOUR REWARD FOR CONTRIBUTINGYour reward for $25 contribution is: Converter Tool for current (H264 / AVC / MPEG 4 - AVC / MPEG 4 – PART 10) to the new future compression schemes H265 (e.g. HEVC), without reduction. This is breakthrough technology for yet to be released H265 compressions. H265 is designed to utilize substantially less bandwidth thanks to advanced encoding techniques and Intrak has achieved significant breakthrough with further bandwith reduction without comprising on quality. Recommended for i7 processor of higher. Your reward for $45 contribution is: One USB loaded with Intrak Technology reduction software applications for video conferencing and reduction conversion tools plus 10 FREE downloads for friends, (for a 30 day trial period), to test, evaluate and provide feed back to develop the software by realtime users.Your reward for $100 contribution is: 3 USB loaded with Intrak Technology reduction software applications for video conferencing and reduction conversion tools plus 10 FREE downloads for friends (for a 30 day trial period),Your reward for $500 contribution is: Windows tablet Asus Transformer Book T100TA (64GB) Tablet with MVFU software applications for THE LATEST video conferencing and reduction conversion tools plus 50 FREE downloads for friends (for a 30 day trial period),Your reward for $5000 contribution is: Our Mobile learning and working Package includes 15 x Windows 8.1 hybrid tablet. Get 15 of the latest and best Asus Transformer Book T100TA (64GB) Tablets. Either donate these 15 Tablets to your special charity, classroom or school.  Or present to your staff or customers as a 'thankyou' or 'reward'. Included is the latest MVFU Video reduction bandwidth tool and the latest Video Conferencing software. Shipping is not included.10% of your contribution is supporting young people's potentialIntrak Australia is proudly supporting 2realise which is a charity based in The Hills area, northwest of Sydney; however works throughout the Northern Sydney
Region. 2realise supports young people to develop their mental, social and
emotional resilience. The objective of their programs are to improve young
people’s wellbeing, educational and employment outcomes.  One
of these programs this crowdfunding initiative will help fund is Industry
Bites! The aim of Industry Bites is to provide young people with a short
snapshot into a particular industry or organisation, educating them on the
types of career paths within and the requirements to reach these.2realise (Australian Charity and Not-for-Profit) HELP US MAKE A DIFFERENCE AND REDUCE INTERNET EMISSIONS CONTRIBUTE NOW

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONSWhat is MVFU?MVFU is Mutimedia Video Frame UpdateHow does is work?MVFU is an intelligent software capable of achieiving significant reduction in Video Streaming's data consumption by not allowing repetition in subsequent frames of video streaming (i.e. avoiding overlap images between frames).What is the current development level of the MVFU technology?MVFU is developed to the point of where the system can be demonstrated and compared to other compression system in realtime, and analysis shows significant  bandwidth reduction for Video conferencing, surveillance, Video Libraries, Gaming and Simulation.What IP protection does Intrak Australia currently have?Please refer to our website for a full list of IP Patents and ownership of the Company's technology. Intrak Australia IP Protection and Ownership What milestones has the MVFU technology achieved so far?
Achieved up to 80% reduction in H264, AVC. MPEG-4 AVC & MPEG-4 part 10 Video Codecs / MP2, MP3 & AAC Audio files
Achieved up to 80% reduction on WebM Video files and supports Audio Codec Vorbis
Successfully couple up MVFU's players and tools with a live Server (on Linux platform), maintaining the above reduction rate and speed over line transmissions
Developed our own player with branded Dashboard
Developed BECT conversion tool to reduce files previously compressed

Develop and build Data Consumption Counter tool capable of real-time consumption data features log files, accurate measurements with multi-coloured auto graphics
Video Comparison Tool

IP Camera Consle Tool: full event programming features dispaly with data loggers with SDK to IP Cameras compatibility 

Who are the key customer segments for the MVFU technology?MVFU is a platform technology that has applications in 4 wide areas:
Video Conferencing and Live Corresponds 

On-Demand and Simulation Streaming
Live Streaming
Homeland and IP Security
Who are the key Industry segments that would benefit from this technology?
Service Providers in Telecommunications and Media / Publishing
Live & Sky Channels and live international events coverage
YouTube and alike video liberaries 
Millitary Similators and trainning 
Borders & Homeland Security
Education, live lectures & training
Tourism, On-line promotions & 3D Presentations 
Medical and Emergency Services
Individual everyday users of the internet that want to save money & energy
What are your key distribution channels?
Web retail distribution for Vidoe-Conferencing (for expample Skype)
Security to include Business to Business and Business to Business Service Delivery
On-Demand and Simulation
Live Streaming
What are your revenue streams?
Intrak Australia Pty Ltd revenue streams will be
generated from multiple areas:
1.  Royalties on licensing the Technology
to:
•    Manufacturers such
as Apple, Samsung…etc.
•   Service providers such as Telstra, Voda
phone…etc.
•   Video Conferencing such as Skype, G talk…etc.
•   Sky & Live Channels…etc.
2.  Apps and Software programs online sales & downloads
3.  Joint Ventures and Partnerships with International
organisations 4.  Selling of Security monitoring systems.Why are you supporting a charitable community?To show our appreciation in receiving support from the 'crowds' in enabling us to bring the MVFU system to benefit the world; Intrak Australia wishes to donate 10% of our funds raised to support a worthy community and their initiatives to develop young people's potential. 2realise is a registered Australian Charity and Not-for-Profit that works around the Northern and Northwestern suburbs of Sydney. One of their initiatives is Industry Bites, a
program that provides young people with a snapshot into a particular industry
or organisation, educating them on the types of career paths within and the
requirements to reach these. In 2013, 389 students participated in this program
which has grown to include 14 companies such as Microsoft, McDonalds Head
Office  and Johnson & Johnson.  What is the outcome if you do not raise sufficient funds to meet your goal?Intrak Australia understands the significance of expediting this technology to the market now, if we do not meet our funding goal, there is lost opportunity for a global disruptive new technology on the market. Which we believe will save internet users time, energy and money. We believe the lost opportunity will be largely realised firstly in the Australian ecconomy, as this will have a negative effect on innovation and ecomonic development.  The other lost opportunity is not protecting our current and future energy resources as globally the internet uses 300 billion watts of energy per year; and the environmental problem of global power used for search engines emitting 260,000kg of CO2 pollution yearly.Want to know more about Intrak Australia's story?INTRAK AUSTRALIA PTY LTD CONTRIBUTE  TOWARD A CLEANER WORLD  AND MAKE A DIFFERENCEReferencesWhat is H265 and HEVC?Internet Live StatsItu.int Stats / factsNew York Times - Power Pollution and the Internet Bandwidth Explosion as internet use soarsWhat happens in an internet minuteHuffington Post - Internet ImageWhat is using all the bandwidthTablet use bogging down internet bandwidth

story:
Completely open source IP (network) camera. Think OpenWRT, but for network video cameras.

Over several years we've worked very hard to provide the best GPL drivers for our MPEG-4 and H.264 hardware compression cards. With IP cameras becoming increasingly popular, we feel the same is needed on the network.

We believe in open source software. So, like our capture cards, we're releasing everything under standard open source licenses to work with the community and other projects. You'll be able to customize everything, from the bootloader to our own web and streaming interfaces. This means users can try new versions and the latest enhancements from us and the community right away. We're working with well established open source projects to deliver the best experience for developers, and following best practices for contributions (including no copyright assignments).

Our cameras will feature a 533Mhz ARMv5 processor, 256MB of system memory and 32MB of flash.  Most will have POE (Power over Ethernet).  Some will have Wide Dynamic Range (WDR), an infrared cut filter (ICR), and two way audio.

We include a free license for our Linux-based surveillance DVR software, but you aren't limited to our software. Bluecherry IP cameras will work with most existing surveillance applications using RTSP and / or MJPEG - and you can always modify the software to support new systems.

Risks and challenges

Using (and contributing back!) to open source projects will let us develop a high quality open interface for our cameras. The biggest 'headache' will be implementing real-time notifications on the back end (when a setting is updated from the Web UI, notify the affected services). Developing proper documentation for our API (hardware motion detection, audio streaming, configurable bit rates, etc) will also take time.

Some of the software we use:

- Linux kernel (2.6.18) (Upgrade to latest to 3.x planned) 
- uClibc 
- Busybox 
- Dropbear 
- SQLite 3 
- lighttpd with FastCGI, IPv6, OpenSSL, zlib

Camera models

We plan to have our first cameras rolling out in December. The following models will be available first:

Bluecherry 720p development module (Estimated price $145)

  • Bluecherry 720p development module
  • 720p resolution (realtime recording @ 720p) 
  • 12VDC (POE option available in bulk)
  • Audio input / Audio output
  • 3.6mm fixed lens


Bluecherry outdoor 720p megapixel mini dome (Estimated price $145)

  • Outdoor rated (IP66) mini dome (Note: No infrared support for this model)
  • 720p resolution (realtime recording @ 720p) 
  • Power over Ethernet
  • Audio input / Audio output
  • IR cut filter
  • 3.6mm fixed lens
  • Wide Dynamic Range
  • MicroSD card support



Bluecherry outdoor 3 megapixel infrared camera (Estimated price $250)

  • Outdoor rated (IP66) infrared camera
  • 3 Megapixel resolution (realtime recording @ 1080p / 2032x1936 @ 14 FPS)
  • Power over Ethernet
  • 12 infrared LEDs (night vision range of ~100 feet)Mechanical IR cut filter
  • 2.8-12mm manual focus lens


Bluecherry indoor 3 megapixel box camera (Estimated price $250)

  • Indoor auto-iris box camera
  • 3 Megapixel resolution (realtime recording @ 1080p / 2032x1936 @ 14 FPS) 
  • Power over Ethernet
  • SD card support
  • Mechanical IR cut filter
  • 2.8-12mm auto-iris manual focus lens


Bluecherry outdoor 3 megapixel mini dome (Estimated price $190)

  • Outdoor rated (IP166) mini dome (Note: No infrared support for this model)
  • 3 Megapixel resolution (realtime recording @ 1080p / 2032x1936 @ 14 FPS) 
  • Power over Ethernet
  • Audio input / Audio output
  • IR cut filter
  • 3.6mm fixed lens
  • Wide Dynamic Range
  • MicroSD card support

story:
Hello,

My name is Roman, I am 18 years old and I am a developer. I wrote many (8 - to be honest, I'm not sure, that it is a big amount, but all apps are supported) applications for Ubuntu Touch and I want to continue. But I have no phone to do it. I had a tablet (thank you, Canonical), but I broke it (first time ever, really! I like my gadgets and take care about it). I want to continue development and use features, which tablet simply doesn't support (like FM Radio and phone functions).





 I started from PHP (sites development) when I was 13 years old. It was awesome experience. I think, that you can understand me. Every programmer, language is not important. So, until Ubuntu Touch release I was sure, that won't migrate from web apps to native apps. But I wanted to try, because I loved (and love) Ubuntu on desktop and was thrilled by it's interface. In two words, UT changed my life as programmer.

I wanted to write apps for OS, because I know, that it is hard to join market without good applications. So, I started to write applications: for all and for Russian market.

I want to write a bit about apps, which are popular (more-less) in Ubuntu Store.

1. zBird
Flappy Bird clone for UT. Still one of the most popular games in Store. It had many problems (because of different API changes), but now it works good!



2. zMusic


Local app (for Russian market). As far as I understand, the most popular UT app in Russia and one of the most popular in CIS+Ukraine. Music player, which uses VK API (VK - one of the largest social networks in Europe).



Old version screenshot from manta. Current version (sorry, I told, that I have no UT device to post screenshots) has OnlineAccounts support, LifeFM integration (album image in background) and many another features.

3. VK Messenger

Messenger for VK social network. In fact, it is in development, but alpha version was released a week ago.



And etc. List of other applications:

4. Simon Says game for children.
5. zConverter - very simple currency converter.
6. zTTT - Tic-Tac-Toe.
7. zRace - first game with accelerometer. Very simple, I have no opportunity for making normal graphic, I am not a designer.
8. FM Radio - it was released, but doesn't work now because there is no FM radio support in Ubuntu Touch. It should be landed soon and it will work. Trust me, it will be good app, I love to listen FM radio and simply can't do a bad app.

I want to continue. I want to make free apps with Bluetooth support (with Multiplayer too), apps with NFC support, great games, but I need a device. There are two devices with Ubuntu support (with FM, Nexus devices haven't it): BQ Aquaris 4.5 and Meizu MX4 Pro. Depend from your donations, I'll choose a phone. i want to buy a Meizu phone, because it has more different sensors and functions (which is great for making apps), than BQ. If I'll have free money, I'll will use it to improve design of my apps.

I hope, that you understand me and will help me to make the best apps for your favourite OS.

Thanks,
Roman

story:
Your mobile phone already knows where it is, how you're holding it, and what’s around it. What if you could use it to control your own inventions? ServoDroid is a tiny board that allows you to control motors and LEDs directly from your phone. With ServoDroid you can build Robots, camera mounts, Light activated lamps, and basically anything that contains a servo or LEDs.


What can ServoDroid do?



Robotic Arm

Using just 4 servo motors you can easily build a Robotic Arm just like this. By contributing $80 and selecting the Robotic Arm Perk, you'll get the required laser cut acrylic parts + a servodroid board to build your own Robotic arm.


Camera Mount
With just one servo motor you can build a super cool camera mount. The camera can be turned using your phone's compass, accelerometer, by touch or any other sensor of your phone.


No programming experience required.

Our ServoDroid Studio Android App makes creating your program easier than ever. More details below.


ServoDroid Compatible Android Apps


ServoDroid Studio

With the ServoDroid Studio Android App you will be able to create programs to control your inventions directly from your phone. With this app you can take advantage of most of your phone’s sensors to create the most amazing programs for your inventions.



Servo Controller

A simple, clean and responsive app that does what it’s name says. It simply controls the servo motors and LEDs connected to the ServoDroid board. This app is ideal for those simple projects which don't require a custom app.


SDK Library for Android

An SDK Library for Android will be released. This will allow any Android developer to create custom Android Apps to suit his project needs.




Technical Specifications





Timeline



Why Contribute?

I have been funding ServoDroid myself for a year now. I have done everything I can to make sure the ServoDroid board reaches the expected standards. The board is functional and ready for mass production. I need your help with the initial production run. PCBs are expensive to manufacture however if I can order in bulk, prices will be cheaper and the ServoDroid board will be affordable.


Perks







A little about me

My name is Melvin Zammit, I am a 20 year old Electrical Engineering student currently doing my studies at the University of Malta. I've been coding since I was 11 years old and I never remember a time when I didn’t love creating and building stuff. I have been selected as a finalist for Google Science Fair 2012, Intel Science and Engineering Fair 2012 and EUCYS 2011. I can say that the past 3 years of my life have been mostly about Android Apps. I have been busy creating all sorts of apps, and last summer I came up with the idea of ServoDroid.

Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/MelvinZammit

This is me presenting one of my previous projects at Google Headquarters.



Risks and Challenges

Risks and challenges come with every innovative project and ServoDroid has no exception. I have worked hard to ensure that ServoDroid is delivered on time and as advertised.

One challenge I face is the diversity of Android. There are many Android phones out there and it would be impossible to test ServoDroid with all of them. That being said, I have tested ServoDroid with many phones and Tablets and never found any issue. To further test ServoDroid, I'm releasing a few beta units before the final mass production.

I'm absolutely certain that with your support ServoDroid will be mass produced in time and with the quality you deserve.

Contact me

Email: melvin@neurondigital.com

My name is Melvin Zammit, I am a 20 year old Electrical Engineering student currently doing my studies at the University of Malta. I've been coding since I was 11 years old and I never remember a time when I didn’t love creating and building stuff. I have been selected as a finalist for Google Science Fair 2012, Intel Science and Engineering Fair 2012 and EUCYS 2011. I can say that the past 3 years of my life have been mostly about Android Apps. I have been busy creating all sorts of apps, and last summer I came up with the idea of ServoDroid.
Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/MelvinZammit

This is me presenting one of my previous projects at Google Headquarters.


Risks and Challenges
Risks and challenges come with every innovative project and ServoDroid has no exception. I have worked hard to ensure that ServoDroid is delivered on time and as advertised.
One challenge I face is the diversity of Android. There are many Android phones out there and it would be impossible to test ServoDroid with all of them. That being said, I have tested ServoDroid with many phones and Tablets and never found any issue. To further test ServoDroid, I'm releasing a few beta units before the final mass production.
I'm absolutely certain that with your support ServoDroid will be mass produced in time and with the quality you deserve.

Contact me
Email: melvin@neurondigital.com

story:
-- Update 29/4/14 --

Refer and win!

We are happy to announce our first Referral Contest on Indiegogo. Show us your social network skills!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Boost your LTE signal on your smartphone and say good-bye to frustrating weak signal situations.

We are proud and excited to present LINKASE PRØ LTE - a signal enhancing protective case which dramatically improves your LTE (AT&T & Verizon) signal on your iPhone 5/5s. 

Simply slide out the EMW ELEMENT implemented on the case and enjoy a boost on LTE signal. 

Here are some of the situations LINKASE PRØ LTE would help you:

- On the road, when you need to find the direction of your destination and your map is not loading…

- During a video chat, when you’re talking to your loved ones and the video keeps getting stuck…

- On the go, when you desperately need to download an important file and the speed is too slow…

- On vacation, when you want to share a beautiful sight with your friends and the photo won’t upload…

- Right before a meeting, when your client is expecting that important email and it won’t send…

- And of course, when you drop your phone! 

Just don’t expect it to work when your are in the middle of the dessert or the ocean where there’s no signal to begin with!

The technology behind LINKASE PRØ is called EMW - Electro Magnetic Waveguide. As smartphones continue to get slimmer and upgrade to larger screens, antenna spaces are getting smaller. That’s why most phones are struggling with reception! By the law of physics, the smaller the antenna volume, the less likely it is to achieve a good performance. EMW connects with your iPhone’s antenna wirelessly and boosts its performance.

In January 2014 we came out with a WIFI and 3G signal enhancing case which also happens to support LTE for T-Mobile users, and we wanted to take it further by allowing users from other LTE networks to benefit from our technology. 

That’s how we started working on AT&T and Verizon LTE networks. The challenge we faced to develop a LINKASE PRØ for AT&T and Verizon LTE networks was that their bands operate at a very low frequency (698MHz ~ 798MHz). The lower the frequency is, the larger the volume is required for the antenna in order to have a good signal. We did countless rounds of designs, prototypes, lab testing, and field testing to verify and backup our solution. 

Now we are very happy to say that our LINKASE PRØ LTE can help achieve a boost in signal when you most need it (min. 4dB gain) and and optimise your iPhone battery by 20%!

We conducted numerous field test while developing the technology and we were able to see a 4dB signal gain (lab test report) when the LTE EMW was pulled up. 

Everybody can verify this performance upgrade in 3 ways. The easiest and most immediate way to verify the performance upgrade is via RSRP* in the Field Testing Mode**. You can check the real time RSRP value which is updated every 2 seconds.

*RSRP (Reference Signal Received Power) is an LTE specific metric that averages the RF power in all of the reference signals in the passband.

**Field Test Mode is activated by calling *3001#12345#* from your iPhone.  Once Field Test Mode is activated, a numerical value for signal strength appears in the upper left hand corner of the screen (where the signal strength was previously displayed in bars). The closer the number is to zero, the better the reception, so -80 is a stronger signal than -90. Anyone can perform this test on their iPhone, but it should be noted that the results will vary according to each situation. The RSRP value can be located by selecting the “Serving Cell Measurements” menu.

The other 2 ways to verity the performance upgrades are checking the dB value in Field Test Mode* and doing a speed test*. 

*Speedtest.net Mobile Speed Test is a downloadable app which can test the current speed of your network. 

After extensive field testing we were ready for the ultimate test by applying for a CTIA authorised test lab report. And the results speak for itself! In the official test report we can see at least a 4dB increase in gain from 698MHz to 798MHz. 

We’re transparent about our signal testing results, so please feel free to download the complete report here.

As our EMW is assisting in the iPhone’s antenna effort, it makes power use more efficient and thus providing a longer battery life for users*

*Saving battery life with EMW becomes more effective when running in lower signal conditions.

While we put most of our emphasis on the signal enhancing and battery saving functions, our design team has also been working hard to create a stylish case. It conceals all the technology and provides the users an easy-to-use and long-lasting protective cover. 

We use shock-resistant polycarbonate —which ensures a tight grip with the iPhone— and a multi-layered custom paint finish —which is highly resistant to scratching and dirt repelling—. 

LINKASE PRØ LTE looks great with your iPhone 5/5s and feels great on your hand. 

LINKASE PRØ LTE for iPhone 5 and iPhone 5S 

Compatible with LTE subscribers from AT&T and Verizon*

Length: 4.97in (126mm) / Thickness: 0.4in (10.8mm) / Width: 2.4in (61.2mm) / Weight: 0.86ounces (24.6g)

At the moment, we are offering the 2 most classic colours: Coal Black and Frost White. 

However, we have some exciting ideas for our stretch goals and we are always open to suggestions!

We’ve spent most of our resources on developing and testing the EMW for these particular band frequencies used by AT&T and Verizon. And we need your support to take the next step!

We already have a working mock-up and with your support we will have enough funding to pay for the manufacturing process. 

Help us bring LINKASE PRO LTE to you and every iPhone 5 and 5s user that suffers from weak signal. You're helping yourself, us and everyone else on the other end of the line.

We’ve spent the last 12 months refining LINKASE PRØ LTE. This included perfecting the technology and making sure the EMW element is easily accessible and durable. We have identified all the manufactures that will be making LINKASE PRØ LTE. As we have collaborated with them before, we have confidence in their experience. Also, they share our values for quality control and quality assurance.

Our latest prototypes have past all of our testings, which means that as soon as our project has been funded, we will immediately start the process for mass production.

The tooling process will take 6-8 weeks; after that we will get into injection and assembly. We will then need roughly 2 weeks for painting and final assembly. Meanwhile the packaging production will happen simultaneously. Our team will be inspecting the whole production process, working hand in hand with our manufacturers to ensure that everything exceeds our high standards. 

We expect to have everything ready for the final assembly by the end of June and we will begin shipping the final LINKASE PRØ LTE to our backers by the beginning of August. The entire process will take approximately 60 days. 

Having been through the process of production before, we are confident that we can follow our timeline, and of course we will do our best to try to deliver earlier. 

Since launching our first LINKASE WIFI signal enhancer in 2013, we have had a lot of media from around the world testing and reviewing our products, here are a few of the quotes:

"The app recorded a significant improvement in the upload and download speeds" - New York Times

“"WiFi signals are typically much better with the EMW element extended" - Gigaom

"Once the 3G EMW is pulled up, the signal almost always increases by 1 bar" - Engadget Chinese

You can also check out some of the video reviews we’ve had on our Youtube channel

We are a group of experts on Antenna Technology, Mechanical Engineering and Design. And we’ve come together to develop an ultimate solution for mobile users. 

For a long time, we have experienced and heard too much criticism on modern mobile shortcomings such as short battery life, weak reception and poor physical structure. We look around for products to solve these issues, but there isn’t an ALL-IN-ONE solution on the market today. Protective cases are meant for shielding only, an external battery is the only way to extend the cell life, and for better reception, they suggest the user to move closer to the window!

That’s why we’ve poured our heart and soul into EMW, a patented technology that can apply to protective cases to maximise the reception of your mobile phone, and ultimately leads to a longer lasting battery life.

As smartphones have become a significant part of daily lives, we believe we can make the experience better for our users. 

We know we can’t do this alone and we need your help to spread the word! Help us reach our story to more people, people who might suffer from connectivity problems.

Furthermore, check us out on our Facebook, Twitter and Youtube channel, where we constantly make new updates.

Your support means the world to us!
Thank you for believing. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer: Please note that all the photos of LINKASE PRØ LTE are of our latest prototype/mock up, the final product may vary slightly due to the difference between the mock up process and mass production process, and we try the best to represent the colours in the photos, which may vary depend on your displays. 

We understand there might be complications even for the best laid plan, however, our team already have experiences with the production process and have collaborated with our manufacturers before to minimise the risks. We will keep our supporters updated if there are any unforeseen challenges (such as adjusting the tooling or unexpected painting results) that would delay the production.

It is critical and important for us to deliver the perks on time and we will be supervising the entire production personally to make sure everything is on track. Having prior experience with product design —from prototyping, testing, packaging as well as sourcing injected moulded goods from manufacturers—, we possess the proper knowledge and relationships to confidently carry out the tasks.

Please also feel free to let us know your concerns, we look forward to hear from the community and we will address each inquiry to our best capability.

story:
Video full english version

Video Italian version

The Project Remshoot 3.0

    Our project was initially designed to control few digital cameras as Nikon D50, but it can control many other digital cameras (our focus will be on Nikon and Canon DSLR and Coolpix or Powershot compact series) using the PTP standard, everything depends on the specific functions provided by the camera you own.
Once connected to the USB port on the camera, with the function of discovery capabilities, Remote Shooter 3.0 knows which commands and properties are available. For limited features as Focus&Release combined with Time Lapse, a stereo jack 2.5 port is available. Just buy a cable suitable for your remote control port specific for your camera.

Our goal is produce a flexible, upgradable and open Camera Control, for appassionate and professional at lower price possible!

 

Main features:

  • Remote Shoot;
  • Time Lapse (interval in sec,repeatition);
  • Shutter Speed Settings;
  • Aperture Settings;
  • Iso Settings;
  • Bracketing on/off;
  • Shake&Shoot (using your android phone accelerometer);
  • Sound&Shoot (adjustable level using your android phone mic);
  • Read&Shoot (programmable actions by a simple scripting language)
  • Thumbnail on app of the last shoot
  • USB PTP mode connection for full control (depends on camera)
  • Jack port 2.5mm for simple focus and release control
  • I/O port expansion for external sensor/actuator (eg light sensor or flash,may need a board interface)
  • Wireless firmware Upgrade (many other features on plan)
  • Li-Po Battery rechargeable from any phone microusb power supply
The app on Android or Windows PC, is released in OpenSource, radically extending the usability of the device.
With a language of simple and intuitive controls, you can control your camera.
We use Google App Inventor for Android to create the GUI editable by anyone, so it will be easy to implement custom functions so far unthinkable.
If you have no programming skills, you can write a sequence of commands to a text file, click a button on your smartphone and will be read and executed by the application.
 
PTP Command.txt
//Script to activate Time-Lapse ,
100 shots, one every 30 seconds

TIMERIP=100.       Set number of shot
TIMEINT=30.         Set interval between shot, in seconds
ENTIMER=1.          Enable Time Lapse

 Technicality for geeks! :-)

Processor                             PIC24FJ64GB002 16BIT, USB-OTG 8K Ram,16Mips@32Mhz

Program Memory                  64K Flash

Communication                    Bluetooth serial module class2 certified 30ft/10mt coverage

Power supply                        3,7V 750mAh LiPo onboard battery

Size                                    60 x 60 x 25 mm, 50 grams

 

Firmware tested so far on:
Nikon D50 (full features, see video)
Nikon Coolpix AW100
Canon Powershot A300
Canon Poweshot S500

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Hello guys, we Need €16,500 to make RemShoot 3.0 project become reality!

With your help, we'll raise the €16,500 that we need to:

•Get the boards CE certified – Regrettably, In Italy this is an expensive process for the certification lab to give us the ability to distribute the product.
•Produce the first run of boards – In the past we've been prototyping previous versions through very small but expensive batches of boards.
•Develop and test compatibility over a wide range of Digital Cameras (as many possible, but at the beginning our primary goal will be on Nikon and Canon DSLR or Coolpix and PowerShot compact series) 
Today we plan to develop mainly on:
Canon EOS 30D,EOS 40D,EOS 60D,EOS 400D,EOS 450D,EOS 500D,EOS 550D, PowerShot SX220 HS
Nikon D50,D60,D70,D90,D300,D700,D5000,D5100,D7000,Coolpix 7900
If you decide to contribute, please specify which digital camera you have.

After the previous versions based on our Pic-Ap-Board, (that hardware was thought for a wide variety of applications, not only for photography),  we're now reached enough knowledge and ready for starting this new project, RemShoot 3.0. But, the only way to make RemShoot 3.0 reasonably priced for everybody, is to do a reasonable volume production run of the boards. So in our budget plan, €16,500 is the minimum amount we need for Certification, assembly and manufacture of the first run of boards, including rechargeable  LI-PO batteries and the self made resin enclosure box.

If you are a fan of Creative Photography and HI-Tech, we toughly recommend the RemShoot 3.0 Limited Edition at €75 each (Italy shipping included; add 15 euro for International shipping).

With this Kit, you'll get a finished product in a resin, original enclosure box, in one of 4 color at your choice (Red, Black, Blue or Yellow), the board fully tested and programmed with the latest firmware available. Each RemShoot 3.0 kit contains  moreover a rechargeable LiPo battery, with it’s dedicated micro USB port for charging, 1 Bluetooth module to wireless interact with the application on Android devices or a PC running Windows S.O, the app RemShoot for Android, (including source code) , the customized Pc Windows tool to easily upgrading via Bluetooth the board.

Last but not least, we plan to make several upgrades and implement other features to enrich RemShoot 3.0 Project, so it’s wireless firmware upgradable from a PC Windows  via Bluetooth. You can free your creativity with RemShoot 3.0

 Impact

You can become one of those people who gave love for creating the best upgradable, flexible and open camera controller . Help us to free your creativity!

Became an actor of this project and let's become RemShoot 3.0 a reality!

FAQ

Italy shipping included; + €15 for International shipping
For International Shipping  you'll need to add an extra €15. How do you add this money? When you select a contribution level, you'll be prompted to enter the total contribution amount just below. Add the €15 to the cost of the reward there. eg second batch november'13 of RemShoot Limited Edition:  75+15= 90€

What if I forgot to add the €15 for international shipping?
After the project is funded and we're ready to ship, we'll contact each contributor to confirm shipping details. If you didn't add shipping when you contributed, you can add it then.

 RemShootSupporter gift sample photo:

About Us

Agostino Mosillo is a expert Java, C and Android programmer employed for many years in several software house.

Gian Luigi Perrella aka Menteblu61 on Flickr community, is a middle age man, employed for years in telecommunication companies, but in the past worked in electronics, since he was a child passionate of photography.

 

Help us

We need you to get the word out. Share this campaign with your friends and family, anyone that you think would be interested in photo and electronics. Share this page on Twitter, Facebook, and Google+ to help spread the word about RemShoot 3.0.

Many Thanks.

Last but not least, we plan to make several upgrades and implement other features to enrich RemShoot 3.0 Project, so it’s wireless firmware upgradable from a PC Windows  via Bluetooth. You can free your creativity with RemShoot 3.0



 Impact
You can become one of those people who gave love for creating the best upgradable, flexible and open camera controller . Help us to free your creativity! 
Became an actor of this project and let's become RemShoot 3.0 a reality!

FAQ
Italy shipping included; + €15 for International shipping For International Shipping  you'll need to add an extra €15. How do you add this money? When you select a contribution level, you'll be prompted to enter the total contribution amount just below. Add the €15 to the cost of the reward there. eg second batch november'13 of RemShoot Limited Edition:  75+15= 90€
What if I forgot to add the €15 for international shipping? After the project is funded and we're ready to ship, we'll contact each contributor to confirm shipping details. If you didn't add shipping when you contributed, you can add it then.
 RemShootSupporter gift sample photo:

About Us
Agostino Mosillo is a expert Java, C and Android programmer employed for many years in several software house.
Gian Luigi Perrella aka Menteblu61 on Flickr community, is a middle age man, employed for years in telecommunication companies, but in the past worked in electronics, since he was a child passionate of photography.
 
Help us
We need you to get the word out. Share this campaign with your friends and family, anyone that you think would be interested in photo and electronics. Share this page on Twitter, Facebook, and Google+ to help spread the word about RemShoot 3.0.
Many Thanks.

story:
Short Summary

Thanks for evaluating this campaign!  

My name is Joe Newell, and for over 25 years, I have been passionate about the sport of racquetball.  For the past 4-5 years, I have been developing the Racquetball Challenge website application.  This is a FREE web application for running racquetball challenge ladders and leagues, finding players, finding clubs, learning how to play, and much more!  Now, I need your help to raise the funds to have IOS and Android applications built to interface with and enhance this website.

This website, and the proposed mobile applications are important because they eliminate the fundamental obstacles to growth in the sport:  

  1. No programs at local clubs - Fully automated racquetball programs (challenge ladders and leagues) for your local club can be created in minutes and maintained with almost no effort!   
  2. Can't find anyone to play with - You can easily find someone to play with, evaluate their skill level and historical statistics, and contact them for a match!
  3. No-one knows what is going on - The communications of this website will stimulate competition at your club.  Match results are emailed to all participants which keeps everyone informed and excited about who is winning/losing.  Comments can also be sent to all ladder/league participants when looking for a match, selling a racquet, or whatever else is of interest to the ladder/league members.
  4. Can't find a place to play - If you are travelling, you can search our extensive database for a place to play, view their website, view their location on Google maps, and call them.
  5. No one to coach me - the website has an extensive collection of instructional videos and other media for you to learn how to play, and how to play better.  You can also search and find a coach, often a coach for free!

You will be able to perform all of the above activities in the new mobile device applications.  How exciting it will be, as soon as you step off the court, to submit your match results, find your next opponent, and contact them for a match after evaluating their stats, all from the convenience of your IOS or Android device.

These applications have been built to remove all obstacles to playing racquetball, and to stop the trend of local clubs re-purposing racquetball courts for other purposes.  I know you are as upset as I am every time you see a racquetball court that now looks something like the picture above. 

These applications will have a huge impact on making racquetball the number one racquet sport in the world.

What We Need & What You Get

Funding Goal:  $25,000

This project is all or nothing.  If we do not reach the goal, you will not be charged and the applications will not be developed.

The main perks of this project are the mobile apps themselves which you will receive free of charge.  If that doesn't interest you, but racquetball does, you will know you have taken a step toward making racquetball the number one racquet sport in the world.  If recognition or fame are of interest, you will be recognized on our founders pages and in your profile for reward levels of $10 or more.

The Impact

These applications have impact!  Over 32,000 unique visitors came to the website in the past year alone and viewed over 85,000 pages.  That is a lot of racquetball training and local club participation.  With your help, and these applications, we can grow these numbers exponentially and make racquetball the number one racquet sport in the world!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, you can still help!  

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign with your contacts and your social media accounts.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Sign up at the Racquetball Challenge, start a challenge ladder / league for your club, and invite your friends!

Our Team

I will be leading this project from start to finish, so you know I will see it through as I have the website for over 4 years.  However, this time I will have a team working with me!  I have contracted with DevDigital to get these applications in your hands in approximately 2 months from the end of this Indiegogo funding.  They have a large and qualified staff providing services for clients throughout the world.  They are located in Nashville, Tn, so I will be able to go to their offices and closely collaborate with them in the design of these applications.  I have met with their team and am confident they will see this project through to mobile applications that you will love.

 

Existing Website Functionality

What I am going to tell you about next is what the website currently looks and functions like.  While you consider this, imagine having this in the palm of your hand.  The mobile device applications will look even better than the current website as I will have a team of professionals working on its design.

The challenge ladder & league page is the most critical page in the website.  Here you will find who the #1 player is!  You can see what all players rankings are based on the challenge ladder rank, league matches won, or total league points.  You will also see everyone's wins/losses stats, and can click on their name to go directly to their profile.  You will come here to submit a match, send a comment, and invite your friends to join the ladder/league.

 

The full league schedule is where you can see all scheduled matches and their match results if they have been played.   There is also a tab showing just YOUR scheduled matches.  The league schedule can be viewed with results from any date range you can imagine. 

 

The submit a match page is where any player on the ladder can submit their match results.  You can even have the results added attractively on your Facebook wall at the same time.

 

The racquetball player profile page is what you will find addicting!  You can evaluate your opponent's wins, losses, points scored/allowed, match history, etc.  You can send them an email directly from this page. This will be a key feature in the new mobile applications.  You may click on the image above to see my profile live.

 

The match results email is what you will receive every time a match is submitted on your ladder / league.  It is fully clickable, so you can go directly to the player's profiles by clicking on their names, or to the ladder by clicking on the ladder name.  If you do not like a lot of emails, you can unsubscribe to match results emails from your profile.  

These are just a few of the key pages in the current application.  For more details and screen shots, please take a look at our more information about Racquetball Challenge page.

 

In Summary

 

I hope you are as excited about having mobile device applications for racquetball as I am.  All reward levels get the new application as soon as it is completed.  I hope you are excited enough that you will choose one of the higher reward levels to ensure this Indiegogo campaign gets funded completely and rapidly.  Let your funding level reflect how much you want racquetball to grow!

There has never been an application this powerful specifically for racquetball.  I hope you want to grow racquetball as much as I do, and will join me in this campaign to make racquetball the number one racquet sport in the world!

story:
PRICE REDUCTION - NOW ONLY $20!!!

A HUGE thanks to everyone who has already purchased a case at the original price of $30! We have been working with our suppliers to reduce the production cost and have managed to reduce our costs drastically. 

This means Coconut cases are now available for just $20! 

Existing Funders:

For those who have already purchased at the original price, don't worry. All extra profits from your order will be donated to the charity directly. This means every case purchased at the original price you will fulfill an extra 4 metrics. For example, if you purchased the BLACK case this will now have the power to heal 25 children of worms.

Thank you for all your support!

Campaign Update - April 2nd

Thanks to everyone who has supported the Coconut campaign so far. Your support will help change the lives of many.

We know a few people had issues with choosing which color and design. Please don’t worry, at the end of the campaign we will send out a questionnaire. In this questionnaire you can choose which cause beacon and design you would like.

Once again, thanks for supporting the Coconut movement!

Love,
The Coconut Team

AVAILABLE FOR:

iPhone 4(S), iPhone 5, Samsung Galaxy S3, S4 and Galaxy Note 2

 

Press:

 

Awesome Looks. Awesome Protection. Awesome feeling.

Coconut cases are a fashion product that empowers YOU to make a change. With every purchase of a Coconut case, people in need are provided with services that will enhance their living situations exponentially. Whether it is providing clean water or vaccinations for polio, the money raised will go to a socially conscious cause.

 

Coconut cases empower YOU to make a change.

Each color represents a different cause, for example red for AIDS, pink for polio, blue for clean water etc. When you buy a case, a donation is given to the supporting charity to further their global projects.

For example, buy the black case and through the help of One Day's Wages we can heal 5 children of worms.

How it works.

The case is divided into two parts, the canvas and the cause beacon.

Canvas

To ensure we have awesome graphics on our cases, we harness the creativity of artists and designers from around the globe. These designers and artists can draw cool graphics or illustrations and simply take a quick snap with their phone and upload to Instagram using the hash tag #cocovote. All submissions have a chance of becoming the next Coconut case graphic.

Here are our first 6 designs, sourced from designers all around the world.

 

Cause Beacon

Each colored beacon is paired with a cause, a charity, and a specific metric. For each beacon purchased, we will fulfill the metric tied to that cause with the help of our charity benefactors. We're giving YOU the power to change the World! 

POVERTY: Black - One Day's Wages 

For the 1.4 billion people living on less than $1.25 a day, basic health care remains out of reach or completely unavailable. The ODW Health Fund seeks to address this lack of access to medical care in the developing world by funding quality projects on the ground. For every black case purchased, One Day's Wages can heal 5 children of worms.

 

WATER: Blue - Canned Water 4 Kids 

30,000 people die every week from unsafe drinking water. For every blue case purchased, Canned Water 4 Kids will be able to provide clean drinking water for 10 people.

 

POLIO: Pink - Global Poverty Project 

Polio is a distant memory in much of the world, thanks to global efforts to vaccinate children everywhere against this debilitating disease. Yet we cannot forget that there is still more to do to wipe out this disease for good. For every pink case purchased, Global Poverty Project will be able to provide 1 polio vaccination.

 

AIDS: Red - Keep a Child Alive

34.2 million people worldwide are living with AIDS and 72% of children in need of HIV treatment are not receiving it. For every red case purchased, Keep a Child Alive can provide 2 days of treatment for someone suffering with AIDS.

 

CHILDREN: Yellow - Soles4Souls

The Haitian earthquake in January 2010 devastated a country that was barely holding itself together in the first place. For every yellow case purchased, Soles4Souls will provide shoes for 2 children in Haiti that so desperately need them.

 

ENVIRONMENT: Green - African Wildlife Foundation

The Mau Forest is suffering. Over the past 20 years more than 25 percent of the forest has been degraded or destroyed, taking a great toll on the rivers and lakes whose water originates there. For every green case purchased, African Wildlife Foundation will plant 2 trees in the Mau Forest to increase its prospects of survival.

Our Story - The Beginning

The idea for Coconut was born at SZCEIT, an electronics development and manufacturing firm in Shenzhen, China. The case brand was the combined vision of Ben Dolgin-Gardner, Malcolm Russell and Steve Murray.

Having migrated to China due to the lack of opportunity for young designers in the western world, Malcolm and Steve wanted to create a meaningful brand which gives designers the opportunity to use their creativity to make the world a better place. 

This idea evolved into what you see here today, Coconut, a brand that gives designers and artists worldwide a platform to design for charity.

"What we really want to do with this brand is combine great design with charity. It's all about giving designers exposure and raising awareness for global causes." -Steve Murray

Our lives have revolved around this project for the past 6 months. We've finalized the case designs, partnered with charities, sourced awesome designs, and now the only part left is YOU!

What are we going to do with the money?

The money raised here on Indiegogo will go toward building the Coconut brand. It will fund the initial range of products so you can enjoy your Coconut case ASAP. Additional money will go toward marketing efforts to expand our brand.

Manufacturing - We know you want your Coconut case as soon as possible, so we are already working with our manufacturer on production. We have already made the mold for the iPhone 5 case and we need the money to make the molds for a full range fo cases for various phones.

Growth - As we grow, we want to increase our support for global designers and causes. This means regularly releasing new designs, cases, and electronic accessories.

Why are we on Indiegogo?

Distribution - We want to make Coconut products available to as many people as possible. To do this, we need to extend our distribution channels through ecommerce and retail outlets such as RadioShack, Target, Apple Store etc.

Marketing - YOU are the voice of this movement! In order to build momentum, we need you to share Coconut with your friends/family. The easiest way to do that is through social media: POST ON FB, TWEET, & INSTAGRAM A PHOTO!

 

Perk Levels

As a donor, you can receive any of the following perks. You can receive

Coconut Cases, Cause Beacons, or a comination of these perks.

FAQ

If my question isn't answered here, how do I ask?

Just email us - whatsup@coco-email.com.

When will my case be delivered?

iPhone 5 Shipping Date: 05.01.2013

Other Cases Shipping Date: 06.15.2013

We know you want to receive your case ASAP, so we are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible.

How do I clean my Coconut case?

We recommend cleaning your case with mild soap and water, most stains can be removed using this process. We do not recommend machine washing as this will have some adverse affects on your case.

For the Canvas part of the case with a gloss finish, a contact cleaner should work if something more than mild soap and water is needed. The Cause Beacon has a soft touch coating, don't attempt to clean, with anything other than a damp soft cloth as chemicals will likely cause the soft-touch coating to peel.

Please keep in mind that we do not warrant our product for finish damages caused by any type of cleaning or attempts at cleaning.

Do your products come with a warranty?

All of our products carry a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects. If you feel your product has a manufacturing defect, please contact us and we'll look into getting you a replacement.

My case cracked, peeled, scratched or otherwise does not look like it did when I bought it - what do I do?

Don't worry, we'll take care of it. All of our products carry a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects. If you feel your product has a manufacturing defect, please contact us and we'll look into getting you a replacement.

My Slider Case seems to be stuck on my iPhone, how do I remove it?

The case can be removed by using a latex glove to grip the case and pulling the top portion off from the bottom where the sliding portion meets the top portion. Squeezing the case from the sides will just make it more difficult to remove. It will take quite a pull to come off so it might be a good idea to get assistance. Please contact us if you have any problems.

Is the case waterproof?

Our cases do not provide any protection against water damage.

Are Coconut cases available in retail stores?

Not yet, but they will be soon! Coconut products will be in retail stores in 2013.

What percentage of donations go to the charities?

Each case comes with a metric which is carried out with the purchase of the case. We want our customers to see very clearly the social impact their purchase has on the world rather than a simple dollar amount.

For example, for every yellow case purchased, Soles4Souls will provide shoes for 2 children in Haiti that so desperately need them.

Where are the cases manufactured?

Coconut cases are designed and manufactured in Shenzhen, China. The facility has passed the ISO9001 and ISO14001 audits. 

Is there a charge for International Shipping?

Yes, there will be a $10 charge to ship internationally. 

If you have any specific questions about your location, please email us at whatsup@coco-email.com

Join the Coconut adventure!

There are a few ways you can help:

1. Buy a case!

With your purchase, you'll be making a real difference in the world.

2. Tell your friends about Coconut!

Share the link to this site on all your social media platforms. Spread the coco love!

3. Intern with us in Shenzhen, China

If you really want to be part of the Coconut adventure then get yourself on the next flight to Shenzhen. If you're interested in an internship then please send your resume to whatsup@coco-email.com

         

Facebook | Website | Vimeo | Youtube | Twitter | Instagram

iPhone 5 Shipping Date: 05.01.2013
Other Cases Shipping Date: 06.15.2013
We know you want to receive your case ASAP, so we are working hard to get them manufactured and ready to ship as soon as possible.
How do I clean my Coconut case?
We recommend cleaning your case with mild soap and water, most stains can be removed using this process. We do not recommend machine washing as this will have some adverse affects on your case.
For the Canvas part of the case with a gloss finish, a contact cleaner should work if something more than mild soap and water is needed. The Cause Beacon has a soft touch coating, don't attempt to clean, with anything other than a damp soft cloth as chemicals will likely cause the soft-touch coating to peel.
Please keep in mind that we do not warrant our product for finish damages caused by any type of cleaning or attempts at cleaning.
Do your products come with a warranty?
All of our products carry a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects. If you feel your product has a manufacturing defect, please contact us and we'll look into getting you a replacement.
My case cracked, peeled, scratched or otherwise does not look like it did when I bought it - what do I do?
Don't worry, we'll take care of it. All of our products carry a 1 year warranty against manufacturing defects. If you feel your product has a manufacturing defect, please contact us and we'll look into getting you a replacement.
My Slider Case seems to be stuck on my iPhone, how do I remove it?
The case can be removed by using a latex glove to grip the case and pulling the top portion off from the bottom where the sliding portion meets the top portion. Squeezing the case from the sides will just make it more difficult to remove. It will take quite a pull to come off so it might be a good idea to get assistance. Please contact us if you have any problems.
Is the case waterproof?
Our cases do not provide any protection against water damage.
Are Coconut cases available in retail stores?
Not yet, but they will be soon! Coconut products will be in retail stores in 2013.
What percentage of donations go to the charities?
Each case comes with a metric which is carried out with the purchase of the case. We want our customers to see very clearly the social impact their purchase has on the world rather than a simple dollar amount.
For example, for every yellow case purchased, Soles4Souls will provide shoes for 2 children in Haiti that so desperately need them.
Where are the cases manufactured?
Coconut cases are designed and manufactured in Shenzhen, China. The facility has passed the ISO9001 and ISO14001 audits. 
Is there a charge for International Shipping?
Yes, there will be a $10 charge to ship internationally. 
If you have any specific questions about your location, please email us at whatsup@coco-email.com

Join the Coconut adventure!
There are a few ways you can help:
1. Buy a case! 
With your purchase, you'll be making a real difference in the world.
2. Tell your friends about Coconut! 
Share the link to this site on all your social media platforms. Spread the coco love!
3. Intern with us in Shenzhen, China
If you really want to be part of the Coconut adventure then get yourself on the next flight to Shenzhen. If you're interested in an internship then please send your resume to whatsup@coco-email.com
         
Facebook | Website | Vimeo | Youtube | Twitter | Instagram

story:
We have revolutionized the way iOS devices (iPhone, iPad) communicates with various entertainment units. Instead of expensive mini-USB, we use standard audio jack to communicate with various entertainment units, making it a cost effective and simple user friendly product. Our signature product Ri transforms your iPod Touch, iPhone, or iPad to a truly universal remote control. With Ri there is no need to waste time finding the right remote or worry about batteries. Just plug Ri into the audio jack of your iOS devices, open the app and select the model from the list, and you are set to go. It is that simple!

What is Ri? 

Ri is universal app optimized for iOS devices (iPhone, iPads) screens. Recently Android phones come with built-in IR (Infrared) and remote control apps while there is not much focus on iOS devices. With over 1M downloads, RiTv is a simple and easy to use app with an intuitive UI. All you need to do is configure your favorite remotes by selecting the entertainment unit you want and RiTv does the rest for you. Once you have configured one or more remotes you are ready to click away. You do not have to worry about setting up codes, buttons, battery or even wireless link. It is that simple. 

Our proprietary Infra-Red (IR) dongle which communicates with Ri app and your entertainment unit is also designed by us. The IR dongle is unique in a way that it communicates using audio jack instead of mini-USB specific to iPhone and iPad without the need for battery. 

Key Features

  • Works with all iOS devices - iPod, iPhone, iPad. System requirement: iOS 4.2 or higher. 
  • Infrared (IR) remote for all your entertainment (TV, DVD, Home theater, Audio devices), work (Mac, Projector), or just basic needs (Lighting). 
  • You do not need to capture any IR code or even have the original remote - Ri app comes with everything you need. 
  • Currently, Ri supports over 233 most popular brands, over 74 Different device types, and over 875 devices. And we are adding more every day.

3 Easy Steps to Universal Remote 

  • Download free RiTv and Ri App from iTunes or Apptwee website (www.apptwee.com) 
  • To add a remote select your entertainment brand, and touch ADD tab, the app will configure the remote for you 
  • Plug in Ri dongle, app will auto detect it and the dongle indicator light turns green 

Value Proposition

  • RiTv and Ri app are production ready and have been released to iTunes 
  • Over 1M downloads of RiTv app, top 50 apps in Asia 
  • Over 20k email requests to expand globally and looking for Ri dongle! 
  • Plug and play, dongle seamlessly integrated to app as we designed both 
  • Cost effective as our dongle uses standard 3.5mm audio port instead of expensive USB

    • We need your help

    Our product is ready for production. While Android phones already come with built in IR and remote control apps, we specialize in bringing that functionality to your favorite iOS devices. We already have more than 1M+ RiTv app downloads making us one of the top downloads in iTunes. We got tons of emails asking where to buy Ri dongle worldwide or support specific models and enhancement requests. We have enhanced the graphic in RiTv app and been able to further reduce the cost of Ri dongle with use of analog circuit techniques. We have signed contract with manufacturing company and setup distribution channel across the globe. Now we need your help to satisfy the minimum manufacturing requirements. With your help we can approach more entertainment unit manufacturers who will work with us, share their codes so that we can expand our support. Please help Ri reach global audience.

story:
Short Summary

We are a collection of young driven people and:

We formed Nespec because we were sick of having to deal with all the frustrations that come with the current process of sharing files between digital storage devices on the market. We felt it was time a digital storage device was built that was extremely easy to use and also utilized the latest technologies available, facilitating the sharing process.

Through these thoughts and by addressing the issues we have uncovered through market validation we have design the Strata Drive.

Strata Drive is important to us because we are all strong believers in a design lead approach to problem solving. The design process is such a powerful tool and we love the satisfaction that comes from solving a problem with an elegant solution, such as the problems around digital storage. 

We have done everything in our power to get the Strata Drive as close to production as possible. What we need your help with is taking the final step.

We really believe in this product, and hopefully you can see the benefits in it as well. Help us to revolutionize the experience we all have around the sharing of digital files.

 

 

What You Get & What We Need

Strata Drive is a physical hard drive that is designed to seamlessly connect through its unique ‘one clip’ mechanism. We have designed an App for smart devices that will ‘talk’ to the drives once they are connected and act as a remote enabling easy sharing of files between the drives without the need to go through a computer.

With your help and funding we hope to produce at least 1000 units and make them available for sale. What we plan to do with the money is:

  • Purchase the hardware components
  • Manufacture the electronic boards
  • Manufacture the hard drives cases
  • Develop the final stages of the app for iOS and Android
  • Establish distribution channels

We have optimized the Strata Drive’s file transfer system enabling you to transfer files without the need of a computer. Saving you endless amounts of time waiting for your files to copy, time you could spend doing more productive things!

You may be thinking ‘but what if I’m the only one of my friends with this drive?’ Don’t worry we have thought of that as well. And through our hardware engineering we will make it possible to connect standard hard drives using USB technology to the Strata Drive, still enabling sharing from the Strata Drive to the standard drive via the smart device app.

 

 

The Impact

We feel anyone using the Strata Drive would find it a great asset because of the ease of its use and also the experience you will have using it.

Sharing in its very nature is such a strong emotional, connection between people. And being able to apply this concept of social sharing to digital storage using the latest technology is fantastic.

We really encourage you to get in contact with us for whatever reason you desire! Whether it’s to tell us how awesome you think our product is, perhaps you have a suggestion on how we could improve it or simply a question. Get in touch with us through all the usual channels:

Facebook

@Nespec_SDS

contact@nespec.co.nz 

 

Tech info (How we plan to make it work):

Strata drive places hi-end technology at the consumers fingertips. Utilising a 2.5" disk with wireless capabilities we are able to establish a connection via our Strata Share mobile application. The internal LiPo battery powers the drive whilst data transfers between the drives, removing the need for an external power supply. When two Strata drives are used the up time for data transfer is greatly increased, as opposed to using Strata coupled with conventional storage units. An onboard higher intelligence is needed to facilitate communication between drives, we utilise a microprocessor to handle this data flow.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love the idea of our product but can’t contribute, don’t worry you can still help!

Spread the word, tell anyone about the product who you think will be interested in it. Even people who might not be, who knows, it could rock their world!

Remember to use the easy share tools Indiegogo provides as well.

Thanks for reading, we look forward to revolutionizing the way you share files!

 

*Please note that by contributing you are entitled to recieve the corresponding perk only.

story:
Socialbambi is a platform which lets people with similar interests connect over activities locally in a fast, fun, convenient and safe manner. Spend less time online and more time meeting up with real people doing things you like doing the most. 

You have the option to list the activity and the time, and people with similar interest can match and meet for the activity. The platform is built to list the objective upfront to increase transparency, cut through endless conversations and get directly to what we love doing the most – socializing with real people.  

 

 

 

 

Using Socialbambi is very simple. You can start meeting up with real people with shared interests post the launch. The platform is user friendly and is built to get people to meet in real life versus spending long hours on the app. We intend to be the medium for a real-world connection.

 

 

Socialbambi was expertly designed to be a simple and intuitive social platform. With so much time spent online, Socialbambi’s goal is to get people offline and meet up in real life. There is freedom to create your own activities, find people with similar interests and discover new activities you wish to be a part of. The app is versatile and user friendly, people of all ages and skill levels can join Socialbambi with ease and start meeting up. 

 

Join us for all updates: http://www.socialbambi.com

Follow us on Facebook :http://www.facebook.com/socialbambi 

Check what we are up to on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/socialbambiapp
