story:
For the Pleasure of Exploring This Beautiful World


The world around you is full of wonders. 

So much so that we need a device and applications that under no matter what condition, anyone can get around safely and see things they’ve never noticed before. 

That is why we built Telepathy Walker, the world's first eyewear for personal navigation and discoveries while walking. 





It’s highly intuitive user interface will make navigating and exploring a breeze -Lumoid

Featured in "A night of gadgets and gear as CES 2016 opens (pictures)" -C|NET

Walker is probably the smallest smart glass product I’ve seen yet -xdadevelopers

Featured in "New technology with a focus on everyday life shines at CES" -ALJAZEERA

Featured in "Vision Technology Steps Into the Spotlight at CES 2016" -VISION MONDAY

Featured in "10 Most Hardcore Gaming-Capable Android Tech at CES 2016" -Hardcoredroid



Why Walker Excels at Navigation & Local Discovery


Handsfree & Multitask-Friendly


Click here for full SMART-WARS Movie

Walker's navigation/discovery app responds to voice commands. It’s totally handsfree, allowing you to look ahead even if you are carrying luggage in both hands. You can even have a VoIP call on Walker's chat application at the same time.



Navigation & Discovery Of, By, and For "Walkers"


The problem with navigation apps is that they’re designed for driving, not walking. The detail you want is 20 feet at a time, not 100 feet or a mile. Worse if you are directionally challenged and unable to read maps.

Considering all the problems with existing navigation apps, we are currently developing a pre-installed navigation & local discovery app that adopts augmented reality and very intuitive user interface so that anyone, even the directionally challenged, never have trouble using while walking. 



( VIDEO: See how people are reacting to Walker's new walking and navigation experiences) 

All you have to do to get to destinations is tell Walker where to go and simply follow the arrow!




*Walker's actual navigation has audio guidance. 



*Indiegogo backers can use Walker's navigation app for free of charge. The monthly fee for those who purchased Walker after this Indiegogo campaign will be Approx. $5 (pricing is subject to further changes). Regarding the use of the application, the terms & conditions may apply.



Walker is More Than Just A Navigation/Discovery Device


In addition to our navigation/discovery app that people will never have trouble using, we are also developing other outdoor applications so that you can explore the world in completely new and entertaining ways.

Some of the applications we are developing include, but not limited to the following:


Location-based Augmented Reality Games


Turn the world into playground 

Video: How Augmented Reality Looks Like through Walker 

(Estimated time of launch: Early 2017)


Vision Sharing


Let your friends see the world you actually see

 (Estimated time of launch: June or July 2016)


Simultaneous Interpretation


Don't let language hold you back in exploring the world


(Estimated time of launch: Winter 2016)


We are also building our own web-based app marketplace where anyone can develop, distribute, purchase, and/install apps for Walker. Walker runs on Android 4.4 Kitkat, so anyone who has developed apps for Android OS can develop apps for Walker with ease. We will start developing mobile-friendly app marketplace once we succeed in this campaign and in fulfilling all the rewards.

We are now doing everything we can to create a vibrant developer community through communications, incentives, and technical supports.



Why Indiegogo? -Ready for Mass-Production


Walker is more than just an idea. We have recently finished the final stage of prototyping and are ready to start mass-production. In fact, we successfully demoed Walker for 4 consecutive days. 


(Demo at CES)


(Demo at Pioneers Asia)


There are no other devices that run on Android 4.4 and are cheaper and of better quality than Walker. Walker is also ready for production enough to stand with 4-consecutive demo days at CES 2016.

The thing about hardware is, however, it’s hard. It takes hard money to go to production. With this Indiegogo campaign, we‘re looking to raise funds mainly to get us into mass production. We firmly believe in Indiegogo's strong, innovative community and hope to explore this beautiful world together.


Features


Portability Reimagined


Walker is very light and small.

It weighs only less than 55 grams and the size is as small as this:



Walker also has the world's first foldable optical module, so you can put it in your breast pocket when not using it! 


Last, but not least, we developed an original head mount whose magnet allows you to attach and detach Walker with great ease. The head mount ensures screen stability and can be worn over your prescription glasses too.

Head mount prototype (Design will be further brushed up and more sophisticated by the estimated delivery date)



Wearable over prescription glasses



Head mount covered underneath the hair



Walker is wearable over either of your eyes



Bright, High-resolution Display Even Under Intense Sunlight


One of the problems with smartphones and smartglass is that you can't see clear image under bright sunshine. With Walker's patented display technology, you see a bright, high-resolution image no matter what the lighting condition may be.



Keep Your Natural Vision

What's more, unlike any other smartglasses, we designed our device so that you see both the screen and the world around you clearly at the very same time. Your eye doesn't need to focus on the image because it appears at the same natural distance as your naked eye. What this means is that you can walk around safely with your natural vision unaffected.


Made In Japan  

Walker is designed and developed in Japan. We have a very strong strategic partnership with a Japan-based top global electronics manufacturer, and are going to manufacture the device in Japan. Made-in-Japan quality at this price range is a STEAL!


Specs 

*There may be slight modifications to the product design. 

Each of Editions includes the following: 

  • AC-USB Charger 
  • USB Cable 
  • Head Mount 
  • Tutorial 


*We are trying our best to enable voice commands for all the applications installed on Telepathy Walker, but voice commands may be only available to navigation/local discovery ap and several other applications at the time of delivery. We will keep backers updated about our development progress until and after delivery.



Reward


①


②


③




Schedule




In-depth Tech Descriptions for Tech Enthusiasts


Electronics



In an attempt to create a small, light, and portable smart eyewear, we developed a brand-new SoC made up of CPU, memory controller, and input/output. By layering memory and storage device on top of the SoC, we successfully materialized a smart eyewear with a very small footprint.



Optics


Walker's optical design consists of two separate parts: eyepiece and display parts. This separation creates a space between the two, which enables natural vision that is not interfered by the device's components.

In order to attain natural vision and high usability, virtual image is located 2 meters ahead from the eyepiece. By this, we successfully reduced the moving distance of focus between background and virtual image.



We also invented a small, lightweight, high-light-efficiency, and low-power-consumption display module specialized for smart eyewear from scratch. Our optical design with reflective LCD enables a small display module with minimal cover on the wearer’s face. In addition, the optics with separated units enables see-through vision.

For high light efficiency, we used reflective liquid crystal for display device. Three colors of LEDs are used as a light source, and the adoption of sequential color suppresses the reduction of aperture ratio. In addition, we adopted a simple optical structure to reduce the loss of light efficiency derived from the optical parts. Due to this cutting-edge optical structure with integrated lens technology, we are able to show a world's best-in-class resolution, color reproducibility, and brightness with minimal components.



Risks & Challenges

[See above for the product, technology, and this Indiegogo campaign.]

We think that the production risks are quite low since we have already produced "Telepathy Jumper", our B2B smart eyewear product, for various industrial customers and have done extensive trials in terms of hardware, middleware, OS(Android 4.4), and applications.

Our cutting-edge virtual display and optical system technologies have received extremely good reputations from industrial customers. These core technologies are used in Walker too and ready for high-volume manufacturing in cooperation with a Japan-based experienced electronics giant.

The components of Walker are already in production. we are working with well-established component suppliers and entire supply chain is already in place. Assembly site is also in Japan, which enables us to provide "Made in Japan" hardware quality.

Moreover, we successfully demonstrated several Android applications running on a prototype version of Walker at CES 2016, which proved that our product is ready for mass-production.

The risks are therefore minimal for producing Walker in volume for our Indiegogo backers, but there are certain risks that we would like to be honest and clear about.

For one thing, delivery date may be delayed approximately for a month or so, depending on FCC(USA) and IC(Canada) approval process.

Another risk is that whereas we are in talks and working with various application developers, some of the aforementioned applications EXCEPT for navigation/local discovery app may not be delivered at the expected launch dates. We are also trying our best to enable voice commands for all the applications installed on Telepathy Walker, but voice commands may be only available to navigation/local discovery app and several other applications at the time of delivery. We will keep backers updated about our development progress until and after delivery.

Lastly, if the device and/or attachments were malfunctioning or damaged at the time of delivery for some unexpected accidents, we will exchange the device with another unit if you contact us within the week after the delivery date. This return policy applies to every edition that includes one or more units of Telepathy Walker, even though the Hacker Edition, Early Bird Edition, Standard Edition, and Walker In Black Edition do not come with warranty.

*Indiegogo backers can use Walker's navigation app for free of charge. The monthly fee for those who purchased Walker after this Indiegogo campaign will be Approx. $5 (pricing is subject to further changes). Regarding the use of the application, the terms & conditions may apply.

In addition to our navigation/discovery app that people will never have trouble using, we are also developing other outdoor applications so that you can explore the world in completely new and entertaining ways.
Some of the applications we are developing include, but not limited to the following:

Location-based Augmented Reality Games

Turn the world into playground 
Video: How Augmented Reality Looks Like through Walker 
(Estimated time of launch: Early 2017)


Vision Sharing

Let your friends see the world you actually see
 (Estimated time of launch: June or July 2016)


Simultaneous Interpretation


Don't let language hold you back in exploring the world

(Estimated time of launch: Winter 2016)


We are also building our own web-based app marketplace where anyone can develop, distribute, purchase, and/install apps for Walker. Walker runs on Android 4.4 Kitkat, so anyone who has developed apps for Android OS can develop apps for Walker with ease. We will start developing mobile-friendly app marketplace once we succeed in this campaign and in fulfilling all the rewards.
We are now doing everything we can to create a vibrant developer community through communications, incentives, and technical supports.



Why Indiegogo? -Ready for Mass-Production

Walker is more than just an idea. We have recently finished the final stage of prototyping and are ready to start mass-production. In fact, we successfully demoed Walker for 4 consecutive days. 


(Demo at CES)


(Demo at Pioneers Asia)

There are no other devices that run on Android 4.4 and are cheaper and of better quality than Walker. Walker is also ready for production enough to stand with 4-consecutive demo days at CES 2016.
The thing about hardware is, however, it’s hard. It takes hard money to go to production. With this Indiegogo campaign, we‘re looking to raise funds mainly to get us into mass production. We firmly believe in Indiegogo's strong, innovative community and hope to explore this beautiful world together.


Features


Portability Reimagined


Walker is very light and small.
It weighs only less than 55 grams and the size is as small as this:



Walker also has the world's first foldable optical module, so you can put it in your breast pocket when not using it! 


Last, but not least, we developed an original head mount whose magnet allows you to attach and detach Walker with great ease. The head mount ensures screen stability and can be worn over your prescription glasses too.
Head mount prototype (Design will be further brushed up and more sophisticated by the estimated delivery date)



Wearable over prescription glasses





Head mount covered underneath the hair




Walker is wearable over either of your eyes





Bright, High-resolution Display Even Under Intense Sunlight

One of the problems with smartphones and smartglass is that you can't see clear image under bright sunshine. With Walker's patented display technology, you see a bright, high-resolution image no matter what the lighting condition may be.



Keep Your Natural VisionWhat's more, unlike any other smartglasses, we designed our device so that you see both the screen and the world around you clearly at the very same time. Your eye doesn't need to focus on the image because it appears at the same natural distance as your naked eye. What this means is that you can walk around safely with your natural vision unaffected.


Made In Japan  

Walker is designed and developed in Japan. We have a very strong strategic partnership with a Japan-based top global electronics manufacturer, and are going to manufacture the device in Japan. Made-in-Japan quality at this price range is a STEAL!


Specs 
*There may be slight modifications to the product design. 

Each of Editions includes the following: 


AC-USB Charger 
USB Cable 
Head Mount 

Tutorial 




*We are trying our best to enable voice commands for all the applications installed on Telepathy Walker, but voice commands may be only available to navigation/local discovery ap and several other applications at the time of delivery. We will keep backers updated about our development progress until and after delivery.



Reward
①


②

③




Schedule







In-depth Tech Descriptions for Tech Enthusiasts


Electronics



In an attempt to create a small, light, and portable smart eyewear, we developed a brand-new SoC made up of CPU, memory controller, and input/output. By layering memory and storage device on top of the SoC, we successfully materialized a smart eyewear with a very small footprint.



Optics


Walker's optical design consists of two separate parts: eyepiece and display parts. This separation creates a space between the two, which enables natural vision that is not interfered by the device's components.
In order to attain natural vision and high usability, virtual image is located 2 meters ahead from the eyepiece. By this, we successfully reduced the moving distance of focus between background and virtual image.






We also invented a small, lightweight, high-light-efficiency, and low-power-consumption display module specialized for smart eyewear from scratch. Our optical design with reflective LCD enables a small display module with minimal cover on the wearer’s face. In addition, the optics with separated units enables see-through vision.
For high light efficiency, we used reflective liquid crystal for display device. Three colors of LEDs are used as a light source, and the adoption of sequential color suppresses the reduction of aperture ratio. In addition, we adopted a simple optical structure to reduce the loss of light efficiency derived from the optical parts. Due to this cutting-edge optical structure with integrated lens technology, we are able to show a world's best-in-class resolution, color reproducibility, and brightness with minimal components.


Risks & Challenges
[See above for the product, technology, and this Indiegogo campaign.]
We think that the production risks are quite low since we have already produced "Telepathy Jumper", our B2B smart eyewear product, for various industrial customers and have done extensive trials in terms of hardware, middleware, OS(Android 4.4), and applications.
Our cutting-edge virtual display and optical system technologies have received extremely good reputations from industrial customers. These core technologies are used in Walker too and ready for high-volume manufacturing in cooperation with a Japan-based experienced electronics giant.
The components of Walker are already in production. we are working with well-established component suppliers and entire supply chain is already in place. Assembly site is also in Japan, which enables us to provide "Made in Japan" hardware quality.
Moreover, we successfully demonstrated several Android applications running on a prototype version of Walker at CES 2016, which proved that our product is ready for mass-production.
The risks are therefore minimal for producing Walker in volume for our Indiegogo backers, but there are certain risks that we would like to be honest and clear about.
For one thing, delivery date may be delayed approximately for a month or so, depending on FCC(USA) and IC(Canada) approval process.
Another risk is that whereas we are in talks and working with various application developers, some of the aforementioned applications EXCEPT for navigation/local discovery app may not be delivered at the expected launch dates. We are also trying our best to enable voice commands for all the applications installed on Telepathy Walker, but voice commands may be only available to navigation/local discovery app and several other applications at the time of delivery. We will keep backers updated about our development progress until and after delivery.
Lastly, if the device and/or attachments were malfunctioning or damaged at the time of delivery for some unexpected accidents, we will exchange the device with another unit if you contact us within the week after the delivery date. This return policy applies to every edition that includes one or more units of Telepathy Walker, even though the Hacker Edition, Early Bird Edition, Standard Edition, and Walker In Black Edition do not come with warranty.

story:
Full Video Review

The Concept

The modular mounting system was something we thought up many years ago but felt the technology wasn't quite there....until now. 

This product is a culmination of years of experience designing and manufacturing high end mobile accessories such as our Ultima universal car mount and our universal tablet stand, AirStand. The Modular Mounting System takes something from both products, rolls them into one and then some.

Used to mount smartphones, tablets or even the Nintendo Switch to many different surfaces including, glass, walls, virtually any mostly flat surface with a relatively glossy surface. Use it almost anywhere such as in the car, the kitchen, bathroom, garage, office or gym.

 

Premium Design + Materials

The entire product other than the suction cups is made of metal (aluminium and steel).

Each part is beautifully CNC machined and anodised for a high end feel and finish.

Magic in Magnets

The systems magic is in it's aluminium core, featuring extremely high quality and high strength magnetic ball joints at either end. They have a holding force of 20kgs a piece and can conformably hold up to 1.5kgs at any angle.

The angle adjustability achievable is unprecedented in a mount all without any impending locking screws. 

Industrial Grade Suction Cups

Made of extremely high quality and highly  versatile with the ability to suction to many different flat surfaces. They can also withstand essentially a lifetime of attaching and detaching making it an essential daily carrier but if needed are also easily user replaceable.

Easily Remove Modules using Leverage

You may be wondering what the chrome looking little cylinder is or maybe you even figured it out. It has 2 purposes, to enable maximum angle adjustability and also to give clearing and leverage for easy module removal as show in the below video.

The Power of Leverage

You may be wondering what the chrome looking little cylinder is or maybe you even figured it out. It has 2 purposes, to enable maximum angle adjustability and also to give clearance and leverage for easy module removal as show.

Virtually Limitless

You can connect up to 3 magnet cores to 1 ball so you can truly expand the system to create the exact mount you need for your specific application and then change again when your situation or needs change.

Future Proof

As this is a modular system, there will be more modules to come in the very near future as we build a community around the user customisable mounting system. We want to hear from you, which modules you would like to see.

story:
WE HAVE RE-LAUNCHED POSTIFIER.

     

Click on the logo to view the article

Say goodbye to checking an empty Postbox!

The Postbox has been around for centuries. We check them every day before entering the comfort of our home, apartment or flat and far too often find it's empty. Postifier is about to change all that.

Postifier was designed to provide the solution to those pointless frustrating walks to your Postbox and back, empty handed. With smartphones as popular as ever we developed a device which sends an notification to your smartphone if mail arrived during the day.

  • Postifier supports iOS and Android
  • Uses Bluetooth SMART (Low Energy)
  • Has a battery life over 9 months (Usage dependant)
  • Average pairing range of 30metres or 100feet

Perfect for these situations

  • For the elderly and those with mobility impairment - Prevent them making fruitless trips to check an empty Postbox.
  • Long driveways - save those walks back down the driveway or the need to get out of your car to check your Postbox.
  • Retrieve and secure credit card, bank and retirement statements before they get into the wrong hands.
  • When you are inside your home and waiting for the mail - go to the front door with your smartphone and you will know if the the mail arrived (more useful when its raining and you don't fancy that walk outside in the cold).
  • Extreme temperatures or just pure laziness.

   

Where we are at

Our first prototype was developed based off the original Bluetooth 2.0 version. This was a proof of concept project and allowed us to iron out any issues and to focus on getting Postifier to do exactly what it is suppose to do.

Once we were satisfied with the results, we started work on the next generation Bluetooth SMART (Low Energy) version using a TI system on chip module. We chose this as it increased the battery life significantly.

The size of Postifier is also important. We wanted something that sat inside the Postbox and wasn't obtrusive. We have managed to squeeze all the components into a size similar to a box of matches.

We partnered up with experts in the electronics field specialising in sensors and wireless technology. Our engineers have spent the last 9 months designing several PCBs, coding firmware and testing many different sensors and Bluetooth modules.

Real world testing has been completed and we are extremely happy with the results. Since our first campaign was unsuccessful, we re-thought our goals and were able to make modifications and negotiate with manufacturers to reduce the total funding required to get Postifier off the ground.

Why we need your help

All internal electronics, firmware, connectivity and iPhone app is complete. We focused all our efforts in getting this core area developed first. However we still have work to do.

We are asking for $12,000 which will go directly to:

  • The design of the custom, small and weatherproof enclosure
  • Final PCB revision
  • Component order/procurement (Initial estimated production run of at least 500 units)
  • Component assembly
  • Regulatory testing and approval
  • Android application development
  • Packaging design

With the funds raised we are confident we can achieve all of the above and get Postifier into your Postbox.

Here's How It Works

Postifier has reusuable adhesive, so you stick it to the inside roof panel of your Postbox. The sensor detects change in infrared light when mail is inserted into your Postbox. The Bluetooth module then activates and waits for pairing with your smartphone.

You need Bluetooth enabled and the application running (minimised) in background and that’s all there is to it. You will now be notified on your smartphone before you reach your Postbox, or when you drive into your driveway and never again open an empty Postbox!

Once the notification appears on your smartphone, the application opens and you press OK. This will get Postifier ready for the following day. It really is that easy!

   

FAQ’s

1. Can we ship internationally? Yes! Please add $10 for international shipping outside of Australia.

2. Which smartphones are compatible? It will work on all current or future iPhone’s (4s, 5 or later) and Android smartphones that support Bluetooth SMART (Low Energy). It will also work with the iPod Touch 5th Gen or later. Please consult your smartphones manual to confirm if it supports Bluetooth SMART (Low Energy).

3. How many smartphones will Postifier work with? Up to 3 smartphones can be paired to receive notifications.

4. What is the battery life expectancy? Based on our testing results, we are achieving a life of over 9 months (depending on usage). The batteries are replaceable.

5. What is the range of Postifier? We achieve an average pairing range of 30metres or 100feet during testing; however this depends on factors such as line of sight. We have tested with a metal and wooden Postbox.

6. How do I get the Postifier application? It will be available via the Apple App Store or Google Play - FREE!

7. What temperatures can Postifier operate in? Based on the components datasheets it can operate in -25°C to +85°C. Perfect for all parts of the world.

8. How can I get in contact for further information? Please email info@postifier.com for any questions.

9. You're a distributor or reseller and would like to carry our product? Contact us at info@postifier.com

story:
We are a dedicated team of developers, designers & problem solvers. We believe that everyone has a right to data privacy and because of this we are building CloudFleet, a hardware and software solution that will allow you to communicate safely & securely via email.

Problem of centralized cloud services

A lot of us use centralized cloud services like Gmail, Yahoo & Dropbox. They are free and easy to use, but also give the service providers access to everything you do. Every email, personal message, political statement, even your general attitudes and tastes expressed through these services are exposed and surveilled. This personal information is then used to serve you targeted advertisements as your digital profile is sold to other companies. This is not done just with your data alone — the same is done for millions of other cloud service users. Imagine what dystopian future movie scenarios could potentially become a reality if this continues. No central entity should have that much power!

The good news is that with recent software and hardware advances, there really is no reason for it to be this way! That smartphone you have in your pocket now is more powerful than the old email servers used in enterprise environments 10 years ago. With the CloudFleet Blimp, we want to use these advances in order to put a personal data center in every home and decentralize cloud services once and for all!

What exactly is a CloudFleet Blimp?

The CloudFleet Blimp is an easy-to-use device that enables you to communicate securely via email. You set up your own email service just by simply plugging it in! After that, you use it just as you would any other cloud service — using any device and from anywhere. The only difference is that your data is stored on your Blimp and available only to you. Nobody else can access it — not even us. This screencast shows how easy it is to send an encrypted email using your CloudFleet Blimp.


All of the software running on your CloudFleet Blimp is open source (published on GitHub under the AGPLv3 license), so by backing the campaign you also sponsor the work on our project as well as other open source projects we package on the Blimp. For example, we helped the Mailpile developers both through code contributions and financially.

Over time, the CloudFleet Blimp will get new features like contacts, calendar, tasks, notes, file sync... We want it to grow into your own smart personal assistant that protects your privacy. Our container-based software architecture allows for easy extensibility.

For a more detailed description of the CloudFleet features, check out our technical documentation. Below we give a shorter, more high-level overview of the features.

Features

The central CloudFleet Blimp dashboard allows you to manage your user settings, credentials and gives you access to all individual apps.


The CloudFleet Blimp Dashboard

For the email app, we use the open source app Mailpile, developed by our friends we are closely collaborating with.

The Mailpile email app

We will offer an easy way of importing all of your existing Gmail emails.

In addition to email, the CloudFleet Blimp will allow you to manage your contacts and calendar entries.

As part of the CloudFleet service, we will provide automatic software updates to keep your software free from security vulnerabilities and to bring you new features that we develop. Check out the stretch goals for some of the features we plan to implement if we collect enough funding.

How does the CloudFleet Blimp protect my privacy?

When you order a CloudFleet Blimp, you pick your own web domain. We set it up for you so that you can communicate to it securely via the encrypted https protocol. The emails that you write to others from your CloudFleet Blimp can be encrypted using the PGP encryption algorithm.

All of your data is stored on an encrypted hard drive that can only be accessed using a USB key that you will receive. We carefully developed the Blimp startup workflow so that not even we can access your private data. When you first receive your Blimp, your personal encryption key is generated on the USB. The startup workflow is explained in more details here.

Finally, as part of the CloudFleet services, we will provide zero-knowledge backups where the data is encrypted on your device, so that even we cannot access it. You can use the encrypted backup data using your encryption USB key to restore your data in case of Blimp damage or theft.

When and how will I get my Blimp?

When we finish development and testing, the backers who selected a perk that includes a CloudFleet Blimp will get their reward. The steps are easy:

  • pick a custom domain you want to use for your email (e.g. johndoe.com)
  • enter your shipping information
  • we send you the CloudFleet Blimp, you plug it in and start using it (e.g. at https://blimp.johndoe.com)

You will be able to choose among a number of Blimp colors as well:

  • Bone White
  • Jet Black
  • Steampunk Copper
  • Sky Blue
  • Transparent
  • Titanium

Blimp Colors

What will we do with the collected funds?

The 50,000 € amount we are asking for is the minimum we need to bring a working version of the CloudFleet Blimp to our backers. It unlocks better bulk order prices for the hardware materials we need. If we collect the targeted 50,000 € goal, we will use 40% of the money to cover material costs of assembling the CloudFleet Blimps and preparing other IndieGoGo rewards. After covering these costs, taxes and IndieGoGo fees, we will have about 20,000 € in funding left. We plan to use this amount to finance our team to work full-time just on CloudFleet and to be able to focus completely on developing the remaining features, thoroughly testing the software and making sure the engines of the fleet work smoothly.

Stretch goals

Even though the 50,000 € scenario would allow us to build the first version of the CloudFleet Blimp product, we are optimistic and hope that we can get enough of you interested in the project and that we can reach some stretch goals! :) This extra funding would allow us to dedicate more time to developing the CloudFleet Blimp and bring you an even better data autonomy solution.

For each of these stretch goals we have some cool additional features that will be included with the CloudFleet Blimp!

  • 100,000 € - The Well-Tempered Engine - we will complement your Blimp with apps for tasks and notes in your self-hosted cloud to help you keep everything organised.
  • 200,000 € - The Sky Sailor - travel anywhere, knowing that your files are synchronized with your CloudFleet Blimp file sync app.

The future

After the campaign is finished and we have successfully delivered all the rewards to our backers, we plan to continue growing CloudFleet as a company. Others will be able to buy their own Blimps and we will continue offering the CloudFleet services subscription to make Blimp usage safer and easier. The planned prices are:

  • 200 € - a CloudFleet Blimp
  • 8 € / month - the CloudFleet services subscription
The CloudFleet services subscription gives you:
  • custom domain registration and renewal
  • software upgrades & security patches
  • Pagekite public frontend for global access to your Blimp
  • zero-knowledge backups - automatic encrypted backups of all your data that you can only access using your private encryption key
  • public-IP mail relay - for white-listed email transport (mail servers from dynamic IP addresses are often blacklisted as spam by other mail providers)

During this IndieGoGo campaign, backers have access to exclusive CloudFleet prices. Don't miss your chance. Back CloudFleet now and help us help you take control of your data!

We set it up for you so that you can communicate to it securely via the encrypted https protocol. The emails that you write to others from your CloudFleet Blimp can be encrypted using the PGP encryption algorithm.All of your data is stored on an encrypted hard drive that can only be accessed using a USB key that you will receive. We carefully developed the Blimp startup workflow so that not even we can access your private data. When you first receive your Blimp, your personal encryption key is generated on the USB. The startup workflow is explained in more details here.Finally, as part of the CloudFleet services, we will provide zero-knowledge backups where the data is encrypted on your device, so that even we cannot access it. You can use the encrypted backup data using your encryption USB key to restore your data in case of Blimp damage or theft.When and how will I get my Blimp?When we finish development and testing, the backers who selected a perk that includes a CloudFleet Blimp will get their reward. The steps are easy:
pick a custom domain you want to use for your email (e.g. johndoe.com)
enter your shipping information
we send you the CloudFleet Blimp, you plug it in and start using it (e.g. at https://blimp.johndoe.com)
You will be able to choose among a number of Blimp colors as well:
Bone White
Jet Black
Steampunk Copper
Sky Blue
Transparent
Titanium
Blimp ColorsWhat will we do with the collected funds?The 50,000 € amount we are asking for is the minimum we need to bring a working version of the CloudFleet Blimp to our backers. It unlocks better bulk order prices for the hardware materials we need. If we collect the targeted 50,000 € goal, we will use 40% of the money to cover material costs of assembling the CloudFleet Blimps and preparing other IndieGoGo rewards. After covering these costs, taxes and IndieGoGo fees, we will have about 20,000 € in funding left. We plan to use this amount to finance our team to work full-time just on CloudFleet and to be able to focus completely on developing the remaining features, thoroughly testing the software and making sure the engines of the fleet work smoothly.Stretch goalsEven though the 50,000 € scenario would allow us to build the first version of the CloudFleet Blimp product, we are optimistic and hope that we can get enough of you interested in the project and that we can reach some stretch goals! :) This extra funding would allow us to dedicate more time to developing the CloudFleet Blimp and bring you an even better data autonomy solution.For each of these stretch goals we have some cool additional features that will be included with the CloudFleet Blimp!
100,000 € - The Well-Tempered Engine - we will complement your Blimp with apps for tasks and notes in your self-hosted cloud to help you keep everything organised.
200,000 € - The Sky Sailor - travel anywhere, knowing that your files are synchronized with your CloudFleet Blimp file sync app.
The futureAfter the campaign is finished and we have successfully delivered all the rewards to our backers, we plan to continue growing CloudFleet as a company. Others will be able to buy their own Blimps and we will continue offering the CloudFleet services subscription to make Blimp usage safer and easier. The planned prices are:
200 € - a CloudFleet Blimp
8 € / month - the CloudFleet services subscription
The CloudFleet services subscription gives you:
custom domain registration and renewal
software upgrades & security patches
Pagekite public frontend for global access to your Blimp
zero-knowledge backups - automatic encrypted backups of all your data that you can only access using your private encryption key
public-IP mail relay - for white-listed email transport (mail servers from dynamic IP addresses are often blacklisted as spam by other mail providers)
During this IndieGoGo campaign, backers have access to exclusive CloudFleet prices. Don't miss your chance. Back CloudFleet now and help us help you take control of your data!

story:
The Barman is an easy-to-use drink mixing platform that uses Bluetooth 4.0 and your Smartphone to mix up any drink in seconds.

Just place your glass on the Barman, pick the drink you want to make, select your drink size, and mix! The Barman will tell you what to pour, and when. It has an easy to read progress indicator that shows you how much of each component you have left to pour. In addition, your drink glass will turn from blue to red alerting you to stop pouring. In seconds, you will have your favorite cocktails mixed like a pro.

The Barman App has hundreds of popular drinks, but if for some reason you don’t find one you like, make your own! The Barman will allow you to enter in your own drink recipe using the “Drink Learn” feature. Just enter the drink components into the app, mix up your drink, and the Barman will learn the proportions of each component and store the recipe.

Once you have finished making your drink, you can post it to Facebook or Twitter. Your friends can then download your drink to their Barman and mix one of their own. Share a drink with a friend that lives across the country, or even in another part of the world. You can also add your drink to the “User-Submitted Drinks” for others to try. You can vote on drinks other users have submitted, and have others vote on your drinks.

No matter what drink you create or download, the Barman will allow you to fine tune your drink exactly to your liking. Increase or decrease any component, make a drink stronger or weaker, or add and remove components. You can then save that drink to your personal drink library, which allows you to recreate that drink perfectly every time.

Why did we make it?

Everyone wants to be able to mix great drinks quickly, easily, and precisely the way they like it. Whipping out a large recipe book and measuring shots with jiggers is a pain. You have to look at the recipe, hold the jigger in one hand, the bottle in the other, trying not to over-pour, then look back at your recipe, and so on… It’s not an easy task.

The idea for the Barman came to me in 2007 while struggling to make the perfect Long Island Ice Tea for my wife. I thought, there has to be a better way to easily mix drinks accurately.

There had been some DIY drink mixing machines that emerged in the past. They often required a large footprint, a long setup time, many tubes and pumps that had to be sanitized after using, were expensive, and then you had to find a place to store it all when you were finished. No one wants to spend all that time setting up, taking down, and cleaning something especially when they are only going to make a few drinks with it. They also had some major pitfalls. They were not very good at dispensing carbonated beverages and were not capable of mixing solids such as sugar or salt which are found in many cocktail recipes.

My goal was to make a product that made drink-making easy, accurate, and fun. Early prototypes of the Barman allowed us to make the drinks we wanted. Unfortunately, the “ease” factor wasn’t there. These prototypes only allowed us to store only a dozen recipes. Updating those recipes required the removal of an SD Card from the unit to download new recipes from a computer. It wasn’t something I thought wasn't worthy of the masses. With the evolution of Smartphones with Bluetooth, the version of the Barman I had imagined became possible. 

The Barman is everything we set out to create.  It’s small, easy-to-use, accurate, can mix carbonated components, can mix solids such as sugar and salt, and it’s fun. My high school electrical technology teacher always said, “Keep it simple.” That is just what we did!

How does it work?

The Barman uses a combination of hardware and software to prepare perfect cocktails. It utilizes something called differential weighing, a technology found in most commercial-grade postage machines. Inside the unit is a load cell that measures mass and interfaces with software on the onboard microcontroller. This allows the Barman to measure only the components of the drink while excluding things like ice, glasses, and drink shakers. The result is an accurate drink making machine with an easy user interface.

When the unit is powered on, it goes into “standby”, waiting to receive a drink recipe. When the user selects a drink and drink size from the application on their Smartphone, the drink recipe is sent via Bluetooth to the Barman unit. In less than a second, the recipe is processed and the Barman is ready to mix your drink. Because the Barman uses proportions in its drink recipe database, the recipe is perfectly scaled to make any size drink, while keeping the taste exactly the same.

-Mixes any drink, any size (within reason).

-Customizes any drink to your specifications.

-Lets you know what drinks you can make with the ingredients you have.

-Gives you the capability to share or download drinks with your friends anywhere anytime.

-Saves your favorite drinks so you can replicate the perfect drink every time.

-Mixes any type of liquid component including carbonated beverages.

-Allows you to mix in solids such as sugar and salt.

Disclaimers:

The appearance and design of the Barman may change between now and final production. It is likely to be smaller and thinner and it may not be made out of wood.   Because the Barman uses mass to measure the drink components, touching the unit or glass during mixing may throw off the measurements. By modifying the software, we have controlled this issue so that a minute touch will not affect the measurements. However, a substantial or prolonged bump of the unit may throw off your recipe.

International orders can be tricky.  Therefore, we reserve the right to cancel and refund any international pledges that exceed the shipping fee. We will try our best to ship all international orders.  This project is a project of EBC Services LLC. The device featured in this project is Patent Pending.

Please support us!

It has been a very hard, long, and rewarding journey. I am pleased to see something I had imagined for so long finally become a reality. Now I want others to enjoy it.

Risks and challenges

The challenge we currently face is getting our product into production and finishing the development of the Android Barman App (IOS has been completed), however, we have done our homework and are ready to go. We are currently in pre-production and testing our first samples. Our manufacturer has 100+ employees, 10 R&D Engineers, and are ISO:9001, CE, and Rohs certified. They also have extensive experience working with load cells and both Bluetooth and Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0. 

Some things may change as we finalize the design for manufacturing. Our manufacturer suggests that the Barman be thinner and smaller, black in color, made of quality durable ABS, and have a tempered glass surface. The LCD will be mounted underneath the glass preventing liquids from destroying it. We plan to keep the LCD backlit in blue, however we may switch from a 16x2 LCD to a customized LCD if funding permits. This customized LCD will serve the same function as the 16x2 LCD, it will just have a different appearance. We are planning to keep the functionality of the Barman the same. We will only change the functionality of the device if we believe it is an improvement, or the change is necessary for the device to function properly.

Our team will then extensively test the units and provide feedback to the manufacturer for final adjustments. Once we are satisfied with the design, we will give the green light for production. 

We need YOU to make it happen!

story:
The PokeDock is a Battery Charging, Smart Phone Holding, Pokémon Catching Accessory.
Designed to hold a battery pack, the PokeDock keeps your phone battery full while out searching for Pokémon. Holds up to a 10,000 mAh battery pack.



Enabling Hands Free Pokémon Hunting With Any Phone, On Your Bike, Scooter, In Your Car, Or Just About Anywhere.
Designed to hold any smartphone, in any case, the PokeDock is a very versatile dock.



Multiple Mounting Options To Keep You Moving Faster Than Walking Speed.
Walking will never get you enough pokéstops to level up quickly. The best part of the PokeDock is having your phone in front of you. Your phone will have a full battery, whether you are on a bike, in a car, or whatever other vehicle you find most efficient.



Guaranteed To Level You Up Faster, No Matter How You Hunt.
You will hit far more pokéstops with your pokedock on a bike, than your friends walking around with battery packs in their pockets. The PokeDock comes with a variety of mounts. It is fully adjustable and allows for any size smart phone with any case. Simply adjust the dock to fit your phone and enjoy one hand mounting and retrieval of your device. It holds the charging cord at the precise place that it needs to be so that your phone slips down onto the charge port seamlessly every time.


EVERY PHONE FITS!
The PokeDock comes with a Micro USB cable and one Clamp-on mount. Lightning cables and USB-C cables will be available to purchase as additional accessories. A mount bundle with all available mounts will also be available to purchase as an additional accessory. We will notify you before your perk ships for you to choose any additional accessories you may want.


FREE 10,000 mAh Battery Pack To The Highest Contributing Team!


Rally together with your team, and contribute so you can win a free 10,000 mAh Battery Pack! Declare your loyalty to either Mystic, Instinct, or Valor and compete to win! The highest contributing team wins a free battery pack for each contributor. For more information click HERE.


The PokeDock Has Many Uses
The PokeDock is designed to be used with any vehicle to allow for full time use of your phone without having to worry about your battery being drained. A built in compartment holds up to a 10,000 mAh battery pack. A layer of felt protects your phone from scratches or scuffs as it is maintaining the phone's charge while in use. The PokeDock's adjustability is simple, just loosen a few screws, adjust the dock to fit your phone, snug the screws and never have to adjust again.


Mounting Options
We like options, so we have provided a couple different mounting options for the PokeDock.


Handlebar Clamp-on Mount

This mount also has a long, flexible arm that can be bent into many different configurations. This mount can clamp onto cylindrical objects like a bike or scooter handlebar, or the handles of a stroller.


Standard Mount
This is the most versatile mounting option for a car. Its suction cup can be used on many different surfaces including glass, flat trim pieces in the car, and textured dashboards, even if they are slightly curved.

 

Long Flexible Mount
This mount has a long, flexible arm that can be bent into many different configurations. Like the standard mount, it can suction to a variety of different surfaces.



Air Vent Mount
The air vent mount clips to the lowest part of your air vent, and in many vehicles is the most ideal place to mount for car use.


CD Player Mount
This mount gives new life to an old CD player.  The mount simply slips into the CD slot, and then expands to make a firm mount for your PokeDock.



Delivery Of Perks
We know from our previous campaigns how hard it is to bring a product like this to market and to deliver perks on time. We have set a reasonable funding goal, and as soon as we hit it, work will begin. Our delivery timeline takes minor manufacturing and supply setbacks into account. The timeline is aggressive, but we feel it is attainable. The second we reach our funding goal, we get started mass producing the PokeDock.

The timeline is as follows:

Day 1         Goal is reached, production starts.

Day 20     Sample received for approval.

Day 30     Mass production begins.

Day 45     Receipt of product, shipment of perks begins.    

We are no strangers to the difficulties of getting a product to our backers in a hurry. We will use everything we have learned in our previous two campaigns to make this one successful as well. We are committed to getting this product into your hands as fast as possible.


What You Get
By contributing to our campaign, you are reserving your PokeDock now. Shipments will go out in the order that contributions were made. The PokeDock comes with a micro-usb cable, and a handlebar clamp- on mount. We will have lightning and USB-C cables available for purchase as additional accessories. Also, we will be offering a mount bundle with all other mounts included, as well as a couple of options for battery packs to purchase as additional accessories. We will notify you to allow you purchase any additional accessories before your perk is ready to ship.


How The PokeDock Came To Be
I was always told as a kid, “Necessity is the mother of all invention.” That is why the PokeDock was born. 

My brother called me one night to inform me of a new necessity. A dock that would hold your phone and maintain it charged while searching for Pokémon. I had previously been designing a new car dock and we decided to incorporate a slot for a battery pack, so that it could be used not only in a car, but anywhere that didn't have power readily available. 

At this point we have perfectly functioning prototypes of the PokeDock as seen in our video. All we need to do to get this product into the hands of people all over the world is a successful crowd funding campaign. I have been very pleased with the responses of my previous campaigns. I want to let the people who are interested in this product fund it, and bring it to market. 


Lessons Learned From Previous Campaigns.
The engineering and prototyping phase of a product is nothing new to us. That part is done. We have a great working prototype. The next phase is getting the product mass produced. We have done every thing we possible can, and at this point we are only waiting on funds to start the mass production. We already have great relationships with the factories we will be using to produce the PokeDock. As soon as we meet our funding goal, Work will start mass producing the PokeDock. We feel that we can minimize set backs and streamline the process, since we have already done it twice. Our goal is to have this product ready to ship in record time. 


Shipment Information
Will I have to pay for shipping?  How much will it be?

Yes. When you perk is ready to ship, we will contact you via Email. At that point you will have the chance to purchase additional accessories and select your shipping service.

Domestic USA shipping for one PokeDock will start at $6. Faster shipping options will be available for an additional cost.

International shipping for one PokeDock will start at $24. Faster shipping options will be available for an additional cost. 

International backers will be responsible for any customs and duties associated with their perks. 

The PokeDock will be available to ship world wide.

story:
IMPORTANT: While this campaign has failed to reach its target, kinko.me is not dead. Read on!

ACHTUNG! Auch wenn diese Crowdfunding-Kampagne fehlgeschlagen ist, ist kinko.me nicht tot.  Mehr erfahren!


1. Email security for everyone!
kinko.me brings secure email into your home as an easy-to-use package.


kinko.me finally allows everyone to protect their emails from the prying eyes of the likes of Google, your internet provider, and the government. And this project is built with regular people in mind: that means you and your mom. We went out of our way to give you the best user experience possible, and we are proud of what we achieved so far!

2. What's in the box?

kinko.me comes in a box that you simply plug into your home network. Once up and running, your email will be encrypted using proven technology.

This means that
  • You can use secure email from wherever you are with all your devices, including your smartphone and tablet
  • Your emails stay in your home
  • You can share your box with friends and family: one box is good for multiple email accounts and users


3. What makes this project stand out?

In the past many projects attempted to provide accessible solutions for secure email. Most of them replaced traditional email. Our vision of a private and secure internet is different however: we build on the software and standards that you and millions of other people are using every day.

We do not want to force you to change the way you work with email. With kinko.me you can continue using email in your browser and keep your email software like Outlook and Thunderbird.

We also rely on proven open technologies (like PGP) to achieve our goal. This makes our software more secure and gives us more time to focus on the important thing: making it easy for you to secure your email!

      Also: we have a cat :)


4. What will your money be used for?

We are asking for a lot of money, and you should know how we plan to spend it. 40% of the budget will be spent on your hardware perks; another 10% will be used for other perks. 5% will be spent on a security review, 25% are going towards fees and taxes, and the remaining 20% will allow us to keep working, to pay our bills and for the occasional drink in a bar.


5. ...and more: if we exceed the target

The campaign target will give us enough money to fund the final touches on our software and to produce the first batch of boxes. However, we have a much broader vision than just securing your email. We will implement the following features if we reach their respective goals:

We will build these extensions regardless of whether those goals will be reached, but your support will speed up our work tremendously.


6. Privacy as a social issue

One year after Edward Snowden it is clear that we cannot wait for governments to protect our privacy online. We must take matters in our own hands. We see kinko.me as part of the movement for digital self-defense.

Therefore we will not stop at building kinko.me: we will also build an active community to steer this project and to support other efforts to secure people's privacy. To help with this we'll also make it possible for everyone to install kinko.me on their own hardware.

In any case please consider supporting us with your donations. Every little bit helps us to finish our software!


7. Project status

We were able to showcase working devices to members of the press, and have presented our box at the EFF's Crypto Usability Price workshop in Menlo Park, California in July 2014.

By the end of September we expect to finish an alpha release of the software. The first alpha boxes will probably be shipped by the end of October. A release for general use will be no farther away than 3 to 4 months.


8. The shuttle service

When you're on the road you will be able to connect to your box by means of our internet-based shuttle service, effectively allowing you to use secure email wherever you are. This service is also secure, so that no one – not even we – can read your email. There will be a small fee for this service, but most perks include a free first year.


9. Team members

We are a team of sophisticated IT engineers with a knack for security and privacy. We are located in Berlin and supported by a group of volunteers.

Learn more about our team at https://kinko.me/team-2.


10. Our efforts so far

We started working on kinko.me in October 2013. 

We have presented our concept at the 30C3 Chaos Communication Congress in Hamburg, and on a number of other conferences and events around the globe from Bukarest to Hamburg, Berlin and California. We qualified for the 2nd round of the German IT-Sicherheitspreis 2014 (final result still outstanding).

On the whole we put about 40 months of hard work into kinko.me, building software and devices, discussing our solutions and preparing this campaign. 


11. Thank you!

Thanks to: Claudia (Photos), Norman (Consulting), Regina (Facebook), Edward (Infos), Phil (PGP), Alex (Animation), CCC (Stage), Heidi (Bed & Breakfast), co.up workspace (Homebase), friends and family (patience & critical listening), Nora (the voice of kinko.me), Sam (Noob bashing), Pauline (you know), Gerrit (video equipment), Sascha (Facebook), Carolin (sound), Michael & Pit (kinko in Bukarest), Annabel Church (Hacks&Hackers), Magdalena and Krystian (Berliner Gazette), Stina Onescheit (Voice over)...

Thanks to these individuals, groups and companies for their support. We couldn't have made it that far without you:

- ownCloud https://owncloud.org

- TausendElefanten http://www.tausend-elefanten.de

- Alexander Lehmann http://AlexanderLehmann.net

- co.up co-workingspace http://co-up.de

- Zentrifuge Games http://www.zentrifuge-games.eu

- Die Schittigs http://www.dieschittigs.de

- mediapeers http://mediapeers.com

- PORT ZERO http://port-zero.com

Also, we are all standing on the shoulders of giants: we want to thank the open-source community for providing us with a stable foundation for pretty easy privacy.


Thank you for supporting the kinko.me team.
Privacy is Pretty Easy!

story:
A butane-powered, amazingly compact device that charges your smartphone up to ten times with a single refill.

- Standard manufacturers warranty.

- Zero cost to backers if the campaign is unsuccessful.

- Perfect for emergency situations when there is no electricity available.

- Once refilled can keep the energy for years.

- Watch this demonstration video to see it in action: DEMO VIDEO

Yes, there are portable chargers. However, they rely on batteries as well. You have to charge them beforehand. Durable ones are bulky and expensive, not for everyday use. It would be fantastic to see a compact, truly portable one that could charge your device ten times.  

    

That's why we designed the Smart Charger - simple to use, charged just in a minute, and outrageously durable. Not good enough? This unique design is precision machined from solid aluminum, complementing the design language of smartphones and tablets in the market.

Recharging is a breeze. Just use a universal lighter refill to fill the tank inside. It takes just a minute. The good news is you can find such a lighter refill in any convenience store or market.

                                     

Amazingly practical - There is a regular USB port that fits all of your USB-charged devices. 

Where can you use it?

The Smart Charger can be especially useful in places where electricity is not always available. Whether you’re walking around downtown on foot and your battery dies, on a camping trip for the weekend or even in an emergency situation, this portable charger can make a world of difference.

A simple yet effective mechanism - Thermocouples are used in many devices as a heat sensor, as well as more advanced devices to generate electricity. They are also found in battery-less radios in isolated areas. Wait for it... They are even used in NASA projects; for instance, the Curiosity Mars Rover, and space stations. 

Almost 100% thermal efficiency - The specially-designed catalytic heater is at the heart of your Smart Charger. The catalytic heating unit guarantees that every drop of your precious butane energizes your device.

Safety is our primary concern - The device is safer than your regular lighter thanks to the insulation coatings. The ignition mechanism will only work when your smartphone or tablet is plugged into your Smart Charger; Thus, it can never run in your bag, or your pocket by accident.

Technical Specifications:

Dimensions - 120 x 60 x 20 mm

Weight -  Around 200 grams (empty)

Nominal Energy – 37Wh (~10 times a regular phone’s battery)

Charge Voltage – 5V

Charge Current – 1A

Tank Capacity - 0.06 Liter

Charging port – Standard A Type USB

Chassis - Aerospace Aluminum 

Type of Fuel – Butane

How we will do it

The team consists of one designer/ electrical engineer, one product analyst, and a public relations expert. The plan is simple. After the project is funded, the founder of the Team Kobion, Onur Cem Altun will go see our East Asian manufacturers, and supervise the production in order to ensure the quality is not compromised. 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q- How many refills can you get from a can of fuel?

A- A regular can of butane is 300ml. And the fuel tank inside the device is ~60ml. That means, you can refill The Smart Charger 5 times with a can of fuel.

Q- Once the tank is filled completely, how many times can I charge my phone until the tank is emptied? 
 
A- Once fully refilled, the device is capable of supplying 37.2 watt hours of energy.
 
The battery of an iPhone 5 is 5.45 watt hour, which means you can fully charge your iPhone 5 -7- times. On the other hand, a Nokia C5-03 has a 3.70 watt hour battery, which means it can be charged up to 10 times. Look at your phone's watt hour measurement to be sure.
 
Q- How do you know if the fuel tank is full or empty?
 
A- In the final production version of the product that you will be shipped out, there will be a line of glass next to the butane tank where you can see how much fuel is remaining.
 
Q- How does the ignition button work? Do you twist/turn it or push it?
 
A- In the production version of the product, the ignition button, which you push, will work to ignite the heater. This is called piezo ignition and the same mechanism is used in camping stoves, gas grills and some lighters. The valve this button controls will also stop sending fuel to the heater when the device is running.
 
So, you will push the same button to stop and start charging.
 
Q- Does it know when the device is fully charged, or does it keep on charging?
 
A- For the sake of simplicity and reliability, there is no mechanism to sense how much your mobile phone is charged.  You will be able to turn it off manually after your mobile phone is fully charged. 
 
The Smart Charger is intended to be a mobile, on-the-go device to have at your side and use when your normal charger or outlets are not available.

What is under the hood? 

In basic terms, a thermocouple, a cooling fan, a heating unit, and a butane tank… A thermocouple is a device that converts temperature difference to electricity. They are widely used in industrial applications as heat sensors. The specific name of the thermocouple that is used for generating electricity is the thermoelectric generator. There are semiconductor p–n junctions inside. The typical efficiency of such a device is 5%-8%. However there are devices that have an efficiency around 10%. 

The cooling fan is needed to keep the thermal gradient stable through the thermoelectric generator. The efficiency greatly increases when a cooling fan is added. It also supplies air to the combustion chamber which increases the efficiency of burning. 

The catalytic heater used in the device enables 95% thermal efficiency. There is no visible flame in the catalytic heaters. The advantages of such heaters are flameless heating, and full control over the temperature. 

The butane tank is a regular butane tank used in cigarette lighters. The only difference is the size. Also, there are additional insulation coatings for safety concerns. 

Who we are

We are members of Team Kobion who have been relentlessly working for months to make a dream come true. All of us have expertise related to our key roles in the team. Onur Cem Altun is an electrical engineer graduated from Koç University in İstanbul. Ferah İlhan is a graduate student in biomedical engineering in Bogazici University. Our public relations expert, Mitch Morrison graduated from George Washington University in D.C with a degree in International Relations. You will be able to meet us at the Exclusive Launch Party in İstanbul. 

Where We Are In The Development

We have a working prototype, but it costs a lot. To make it affordable for the consumer market, we have to produce a relatively large quantity. The only way to do this is to crowdsource the demand upfront, which is why we are here. We need your support to make our dream come true. The figure below illustrates how much we need, and how we will use the funds for the mass production.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know there are folks out there who just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

You can use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word. 

Here is the quick share link for you: igg.me/at/smartcharger

You can visit us at kobion.com 

Thank you for your valuable support!

story:
What is MyQI ?


MyQI is a wireless mobile charger for smartphone.

                     


MyQI is WIRELESS

MyQI charger uses the QI technology, which means you do not need a cable to connect your smartphone to your charger. The QI technology makes it possible to charge your smartphone just by putting the smartphone on the MyQI charger, and touch the power button.


MyQI is MOBILE

Once your MyQI is full of battery, after having charged it while connecting it to your laptop or other USB device, you can carry on and use it wherever and whenever you want !

MyQI does not need to be connected to any devices to be used as a charger.


MyQI is for SMARTPHONES

Every smartphone can work with MyQI charger. Some of them have already the QI technology integrated and do not need complementary accessories to be compatible. And, some need complementary accessories to work with.

Smartphones with the QI technology included:

  • Blackberry Z30
  • Google Nexus 4-5-7
  • Most of HTC models
  • Most of Nokia models
  • Most of LG models
  • Most of Motorola models
  • Most of SHARP models
  • Future Iphone 6

Smartphones that need a complementary accessory:

  • Iphone 4 & 4 S
  • Iphone 5, 5C & 5S
  • Samsung Galaxy S3
  • Samsung Galaxy S4


MyQI details

MyQI is a charger with a pebble shape.

Colors: White, Black and Yellow

Dimensions: 78x62x20mm

Net weight: 150g

Working voltage: DC5V

Working current: 1.5A

Included with the charger: 2 micro USB cables (1.5M, 0.3M)

        



QI technology:


The QI is a wireless energy transfer of up to 5 watt. The wireless power transfer occurs through electromagnetic induction. With inductive charging the required power reaches the device not through a traditional cable but rather wirelessly through the use of electromagnetic fields. The principle is very simple: the Qi Sender (Charging Station) transfers the required energy to the Qi receiver (the mobile phone). The only requirement is that both parts – the sender and the receiver – fulfil the Qi specifications.



Why MyQI ?


Nowadays, everything goes faster, we are hurry, and we are looking for devices that help us to make us more efficient by losing less time.

Smartphones are really important for our generation and take an important place in our life. We use our smartphone for personal tasks, as well as for business tasks. Smartphones are essential, but their battery life is not unlimited, and we can run out of battery anytime.

MyQI is the solution to this problem.

With MyQI, the only wireless mobile charger, you can charge your phone everywhere. You do not need to have a power outlet or another electric source.


At home


Outside




How it works with complementary accessories ?


Samsung Galaxy S

Samsung Galaxy S smartphones work with the MyQI wireless charger thanks to a receiver module, which is a really thin card to hitch on the smartphone's battery.

                     


                     


Iphone 4/4S

Iphone 4 and 4S work with the MyQI charger thanks to a receiver case. The receiver case is available in 2 colors: black and white.

                                           


Iphone 5/5S/5C

Iphone 5, 5S and 5C work with the MyQI charger thanks to a receiver module, or a receiver case. 

The receiver module is a really thin card to put at the back of the smartphone, under a soft case.

                       


                       

The receiver case is available in 2 colors: black and white.

                                          





Our perks:


Iphone : 4/4S, 5/5S/5c

·  Wireless charger receiver module (5/5S/5C) $20

              

·  Wireless charger receiver case (4/4S or 5/5S ; black or white) $30

              

·  MyQI charger (white, black or yellow) + receiver module $77    

        

·  MyQI charger (white, black or yellow) + receiver case (black or white) $87

     

     

·  MyQI charger x3 (one of each color) + receiver module x3 $230    

  

·  MyQI charger x3 (one of each color) + receiver case (black or white) x3 $260

             

     


Samsung Galaxy S3-S4

·  Wireless charger receiver module $20

                    

·  MyQI charger (white, black or green) + receiver module $77

        

      

·  MyQI charger x3 (one of each color) + receiver module x3 $230

     


Smartphones with QI included

·  MyQI charger (white, black or yellow) $60

      

·  MyQI charger x3 (one of each color) $150

      




Frequently Asked Questions:


Does MyQI charger work with my smartphone ?

MyQI works with every smartphone that has the QI integrated, the iPhone 5, 5C, 5S, and Samsung Galaxy S2, S3 and S4 with a receiver module or case.


How many time does MyQI take to charge my smartphone ?

MyQI charger, with full battery, takes 40 minutes to charge a smartphone completely.


Does my smartphone get hot while it is charging?

No. MyQI does not make your smartphone getting hot while it is charging.


When will I get my MyQI perks ?

If our goal is reached, we will send the perks on the (29th of August), so you will receive it in the four following weeks. If our goal is not reached, you will get your money back.


What if I want to upgrade my perk?

If you want to upgrade your perk, you just need to make a new contribution for the difference of the new perk you want, and send us a private comment.


Is the receiver modules compatible with all kind of cases ?

The receiver module for Samsung Galaxy is compatible with any cases. However, the receiver module for Iphone 5/5S/5C is compatible with any soft cases and some hard cases (medium hard cases).
