                       MyQI is WIRELESS
MyQI charger uses the QI technology, which means you do not
need a cable to connect your smartphone to your charger. The QI technology
makes it possible to charge your smartphone just by putting the smartphone on
the MyQI charger, and touch the power button.
MyQI is MOBILE
Once
your MyQI is full of battery, after having charged it while connecting it to
your laptop or other USB device, you can carry on and use it wherever and
whenever you want !
MyQI does not need to be connected to any devices to be used
as a charger.
MyQI is for SMARTPHONES
Every smartphone can work with MyQI charger. Some of them have
already the QI technology integrated and do not need complementary accessories
to be compatible. And, some need complementary accessories to work with.
Smartphones
with the QI technology included:

Blackberry Z30
Google Nexus 4-5-7
Most of HTC models
Most of Nokia models
Most of LG models
Most of Motorola models
Most of SHARP models
Future Iphone 6
Smartphones
that need a complementary accessory:

Iphone 4 & 4 S
Iphone 5, 5C & 5S

Samsung Galaxy S3
Samsung Galaxy S4
MyQI details
MyQI
is a charger with a pebble shape.
Colors:
White, Black and Yellow
Dimensions:
78x62x20mm
Net
weight: 150g
Working
voltage: DC5V
Working
current: 1.5A

Included with the charger: 2 micro USB cables (1.5M,
0.3M)
         
QI technology:
The
QI is a wireless energy transfer of up to 5 watt. The wireless power transfer
occurs through electromagnetic induction. With inductive charging the required
power reaches the device not through a traditional cable but rather wirelessly
through the use of electromagnetic fields. The principle is very simple: the Qi
Sender (Charging Station) transfers the required energy to the Qi receiver (the
mobile phone). The only requirement is that both parts – the sender and the
receiver – fulfil the Qi specifications. 
Why MyQI ?
Nowadays,
everything goes faster, we are hurry, and we are looking for devices that help
us to make us more efficient by losing less time. 
Smartphones
are really important for our generation and take an important place in our life.
We use our smartphone for personal tasks, as well as for business tasks. Smartphones
are essential, but their battery life is not unlimited, and we can run out of
battery anytime.
MyQI
is the solution to this problem. 
With
MyQI, the only wireless mobile charger, you can charge your phone everywhere.
You do not need to have a power outlet or another electric source.
At
home
Outside
How it works with complementary accessories ?
Samsung Galaxy S
Samsung Galaxy S smartphones work with the MyQI wireless charger thanks to a receiver module, which is a really thin card to hitch on the smartphone's battery.                                            
Iphone 4/4S
Iphone 4 and 4S work with the MyQI charger thanks to a receiver case. The receiver case is available in 2 colors: black and white.                                            Iphone 5/5S/5C
Iphone 5, 5S and 5C work with the MyQI charger thanks to a receiver module, or a receiver case. The receiver module is a really thin card to put at the back of the smartphone, under a soft case.                                                The receiver case is available in 2 colors: black and white.                                           
Our perks:
Iphone : 4/4S, 5/5S/5c

· 
Wireless charger receiver module (5/5S/5C) $20               · 
Wireless charger receiver case (4/4S or 5/5S ; black
or white) $30               
· 
MyQI charger (white, black or yellow) + receiver
module $77              
· 
MyQI charger (white, black or yellow) + receiver
case (black or white) $87            
· 
MyQI charger x3 (one of each color) + receiver module
x3 $230        
· 
MyQI charger x3 (one of each color) + receiver
case (black or white) x3 $260                    


Samsung Galaxy S3-S4
· 
Wireless charger receiver module $20                     
· 
MyQI charger (white, black or green) + receiver
module $77                
· 
MyQI charger x3 (one of each color)  + receiver
module x3 $230      
Smartphones with QI included
· 
MyQI charger (white, black or yellow) $60       
· 
MyQI charger x3 (one of each color) $150       


Frequently Asked Questions:

Does MyQI charger work with my smartphone ?MyQI
works with every smartphone that has the QI integrated, the iPhone 5, 5C, 5S,
and Samsung Galaxy S2, S3 and S4 with a receiver module or case. How many time does MyQI take to charge my smartphone
?
MyQI
charger, with full battery, takes 40 minutes to
charge a smartphone completely.
Does my smartphone get hot while it is charging?
No.
MyQI does not make your smartphone getting hot while it is charging.
When will I get my MyQI perks ?
If
our goal is reached, we will send the perks on the (29th of August), so you will receive it in the four following weeks. If our goal is
not reached, you will get your money back.

What if I want to upgrade my perk?
If
you want to upgrade your perk, you just need to make a new contribution for the
difference of the new perk you want, and send us a private comment.
Is the receiver modules compatible with all
kind of cases ?
The receiver
module for Samsung Galaxy is compatible with any cases. However, the receiver
module for Iphone 5/5S/5C is compatible with any soft cases and some hard cases
(medium hard cases).

story:
When playing a variety of games mobile games, you can enjoy more vivid games through the vibration delivered to the game console. The Existing console for a phone is simply made to have the ability to mount a mobile phone, so the game may feel boring and may result in poor performance of the mobile game. Anytime and anywhere, simply connect a mobile phone to Haptic Console to feel the vivid details of Haptic vibrations from the reaction of the gun, the footsteps of the enemy, the sound of artillery fire in the movie, and even the sound of the singer's voice in the theater.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

TNB Tech developed its Haptic technology, acquired domestic and international patents. TNB Tech Haptic is the only mobile electronic device in the world that uses this unique technology. It may sound arrogant, but we introduce and emphasize the Haptic Console as “First in Universe” with confidence. 

Introducing the Haptic Console, an attractive gaming gear that has never been before.

 

 

 

Obtained international and domestic patents. TNB Tech's haptic gaming gear, "Haptic Console", proud to state "first in the universe" with unique haptic technology. The haptic console pad can be enjoyed realistically with "haptic" vibration that fits perfectly into specific situations. It is smooth and linked to the sound, rather than a noisy and cumbersome vibration that works with a general motor.

 

This haptic technology is our unique technology and our pride, confident to introduce it as "the first in the Universe". Among the products currently released as smartphone accessories, we are proud to say that the product that transforms the sound of a smartphone into vibration is definitely a revolutionary technology. Haptic console with haptic technology can be used in all genres such as FPS games, racing games, rhythm games, and RPGs. It is also very effective when conveying a sense of realism in the sound of shells, music, and shouts in videos such as YOUTUBE, dramas, and movies.

 

**The Haptic vibrations respond to all sounds. In order for intensified and vivid game, please turn off the background music when playing the game.**

 

 

 

 

The handle part was designed ergonomically after continuous modification, with the fourth rendering process compared to hundreds of hands for the best grip for anyone to enjoy the Haptic console comfortably.

The details and modifications of the console offer a perfect grip. Fits perfectly on your hand!  Sleek, clean, and simple design. The mounting structure made it easy to attach and detach the smartphone, which adds convenience. It has a perfect grip that does not cause discomfort or pain to the wrist even when you lie down and miss a mobile from your hand or play a long game.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The product using this vibration module can properly implement the haptic vibration function with the delicateness. The instant response of vibration compared to other products that are linked to PC or mobile products. The response time for a person to feel a simultaneous vibration sense with visual information should be within 15ms. However, the response time of the product using the eccentric rotating vibration motor used in the existing vibration mouse and other vibration products are 250 to 400ms slow. The vibration mouse with the linear motor is also 50 to 70ms, which is not sufficient for the user to feel the same way. Also, the vibration motor is difficult to implement and the amount of vibration cannot be adjusted due to the residual vibration that occurs after the vibration. To resolve these issues, we applied the Haptic Vibration module to the products. With the application of the module, it enables real-time responses with a response time of 7ms or less and enabling users to feel the simultaneous response to visual and auditory information. Allowing realistic vibration by controlling the vibration in a wide range of frequencies.

 

 

 

A hard case to protect the haptic console from impact is enclosed in the package. A sturdy hard case that is not easily damaged by impact, and is an all-purpose pouch with a waterproof function! Feel free to carry around Haptic Console anywhere, safely.

*Pouch size: 190 (horizontal) mm x 130 (vertical) mm x 65 (height) mm*

 

 

 

 

 

 

TNBTech was founded in 2010 as a semiconductor, module, and solution provider, providing optimized solutions and various technical services, as well as supplying semiconductor components. We developed a Haptic mouse for PC and the Haptic Console for smartphones by applying the "TNB Tech Haptic Module". In implementing sound as vibration, the general motor method is somewhat slow, coarse, and uniform vibration, while our TNB Tech Haptic Module delivers sound as real-time vibration and enables detailed vibration expression. It is the world's first technology with international and domestic patents.

story:
Another free service is closing down!

Another free service bites the dust because priorities have changed. Google is focussing on their other innovations, but their loyal users need to move their data.

For Reader users, this sucks.

This will not be a free service. This will not depend on investors pouring in money into a startup. This reader app will be about paying customers.

What we want to do with the reader app

The first priority will be to bring back the Google Reader online experience.

Secondly we will focus on finding integration with the other apps you've used in combination with Google Reader, like the awesome Reeder application.

The goal is to have a comparable service available in a hosted fashion.

We built it with these values 

The underlying principles and values we use to create this reader app:

  • Designed to get out of your way
  • Your data is yours, we don't have other priorities with it
  • Listen to customers feedback and needs actively
  • Continiously improve the application
  • Build a ecosystem around your subscriptions through an awesome API

Pricing

Currently we're looking to price this service at €5.- per month. The perks have been set to reflect this price. This means if you take the €40.- perk you will have €20.- discount in the first year.

Proven track record

Nice to meet you, we are Firmhouse. We're a Dutch company in business for almost 5 years. We specialize in web projects supporting startups and online innovations. Our goal is to become a company with a portfolio of multiple products. This project fits in perfectly.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you're not a Google Reader fan or current user. You can still help out! Help us spread the word so other people will be aware of this alternative after Google closes down their Reader app.

story:
Hi there,

I’m Patricia Ju, CEO/CTO of Hackerbilt, Inc. I started Hackerbilt because I have a passion for inventing productivity tools that make work fun. I’d like to introduce you to our brand-new creation: “The Scrumball.” What's Scrum? It's a project management methodology that allows fast, iterative, agile creation of products, services, even businesses. The Daily Stand-up is one technique in Scrum and other agile methodologies used by 75% of surveyed software development companies.

The Daily Stand-up is a status meeting that replaces weekly/monthly long meetings run in hierarchical organization structures with instead daily 15 minute (or LESS!) meetings driven by self-organized, highly-engaged flat teams. How do you have a team status meeting in 15 minutes or less? Each member stands, literally. (The meeting goes faster if people have to stand!) Then, each member in turn answers these questions:

“What did I do yesterday?” “What will I do today?” “What blockers do I have?”

When done right, the entire team hears the succinct status and blockers. Relevant members discuss among themselves later in the day if they need further details. As a Scrum Master who's run multiple Scrum teams, I’ve found two main issues that crop up at the Daily Stand-ups:

  • We run out of time when people don't stick to the three questions.
  • In the heat of the moment, we often forget what we wanted to say. 

Wouldn’t it be great to have a tool that let you know how much time you had left? That reminded you of what you planned to address in the meeting? That would allow you to literally toss your ideas around the room?

 

The Solution

The Scrumball combines your smartphone, the fun of a rugby ball, and the power of our custom productivity apps to do just that. The smartphone fits into the rugby ball enclosure, and is kept secure from short passes and drops. (The iPhone Lite App is in Beta and the Android version will come out late summer).

 

The Lite and Pro Apps

The free Scrumball Lite App shows a large counterdown timer so you can see how much time you have left. The three status questions help you focus on answering those. When you're done, throw the Scrumball to the next team member for their turn. 

 

The Scrumball Lite free iPhone app (Android version coming late summer)

The Scrumball Pro App lets you set up connections to email, calendars, issue trackers, source control logs, and Agile project management tools (i.e. Basecamp, Pivotal Tracker, Rally, JIRA, VersionOne, and any others we can get our hacker-hands on). With the Scrumball Pro’s account link feature, you can quickly scroll through what you did yesterday all in one place and share your status updates with the team. You can even quickly prepare ahead of time by marking the important status items which float to the top of the screen, ready for you when it's your turn. The Pro version will be a premium subscription service available to individuals and teams, and is planned to launch in the first calendar quarter of 2013.

 

The Ball

The Scrumball itself is a rugby ball-shaped smartphone enclosure that securely holds a smartphone, allowing you to control the companion apps, toss the ball to the next team member, and take advantage of accelerometer features for a fun and invigorating Daily Stand-up.

 

Early prototypes of the Scrumball and the Scrumball apps.

Closer but how does that iPhone get inserted or removed?

 

A more recent 3D model

 

The Team

Our team consists of several talented members hand-picked for their unique, top-notch work experience and creative productivity to drive us toward success. Well, I didn't hand-pick myself (I'm hosting this party! :) :

  • Patricia Ju founded Hackerbilt in 2012 to build a suite of fun productivity tools needed in the workplace. She is an innovative Leader, Technical Architect, and Certified Scrum Master with 16+ years of experience developing high-transaction, high-subscriber Web sites and apps for Fortune 100 firms. She is Associate Director, New Media Technology responsible for Mobile development at Consumer Reports and managed platform engineering and eCommerce for the 3.4M paid subscriber site. Patricia is a mentor at The Founder Institute accelerator, was CTO of The Belgrave Trust (retailing carbon offsets) with co-founders Jeff Stewart and Nick Baily, and was CEO of MassMind Co. (developing wearable computer software).
  • Marc Simony (CMO) is a Marketing&Sales juggernaut who holds a BA in Communication from the University of New Hampshire, and an MBA in Global Management from Thunderbird. He is Director of Marketing for a BI startup and specializes in corporate, competitive, and brand strategies.
  • Larry Peacock (Mechanical Engineer) is a creative inventor tapped to design the initial prototypes and 3D models for the Scrumball device; he has 16 patents filed, 15 with IBM (10 granted). 
  • Chris Baily (Designer) is a UX and Game Designing genius with clients such as Sharp Entertainment and ThoughtWorks, and Jason Griffin (Designer) is a brilliant viral artist. They're both so good at what they do, I share their name with everyone and their contact info with no one.
  • Gabe Zichermann (Advisor) is a Gamification thought leader and Chair of the Gamification Summit. Gabe is the NYC Director of Founder Institute, and he has laser-sharp vision into the heart, problem, and solution of any product concept. Add to this his expertise in Gamification, and Hackerbilt, Inc. is assured to be on a great path.
  • You (Customer-Fan). Your forward-thinking excitement, feedback, and funding are critical to our success in making The Scrumball a reality.

 

Current Status & Positive Discoveries

The Scrumball Lite iPhone App Beta launch coincides with the start of this fundraising campaign. Apply for the Beta-Test Program here. Again, the Lite App is entirely free. 

We've been using the alpha version in real scrum teams, tossing it around in a protective case, triggering the accelerometer, and iteratively improving the user experience to be ever simpler and more intuitive. We've already made positive discoveries in that since my team started using the Scrumball Lite App, no one's gone over their 1 minute time limit except me. (Bad ScrumMaster, Bad!) And the reason I went over is because I was fumbling around trying to get to my calendar to see what I did the day before. Enter, further proof of the need for the Scrumball Pro App.

We also now have quotes from several manufacturers for the next phases of prototyping, tooling, and mass manufacturing of the Scrumball (which will be made of a non-toxic foam and bear color graphics). This is where you come in - we need your pledges to get through these phases, to launch the Scrumball Lite App, and to get started on the Scrumball Pro App.

I personally can't wait until the first machine-produced prototype is in my hands to play with-currently we're using a surgically reduced toy football of a popular brand as well as a very protective foam iPhone case. We can toss and drop (oops?!) the phone in this case, but it just still pales to the feel and fun of tossing around a rugby ball.

The Plan

  • March: Start The Scrumball ball and apps design [DONE]
  • April:  Complete initial manual prototype and 3D models of The Scrumball [DONE]
  • May: Alpha Launch The Scrumball Lite app [DONE]
  • May: Complete and send out RFP and get quotes from manufacturers [DONE]
  • June: Finalize UI/UX design of The Scrumball Lite app [DONE]
  • June: Complete Beta version of The Scrumball Lite app [DONE]
  • June (mid): Launch Fundraising Campaign and Beta-Test [DONE]
  • July (mid): Complete Fundraising Campaign and Beta-Test [DONE]
  • July (end): Award project to manufacturing vendor. Manufacturing is led with quality assurance by a US company, with manufacturing done in China. App development done by the Hackerbilt team. [DONE]
  • August: Launch The Scrumball Lite iPhone App, Build Android Lite App
  • August (end): Approve final Scrumball prototypes and begin tooling, Launch Android Lite App
  • October: Launch The Scrumball for retail sales
  • March 2013: Launch The Scrumball Pro App

Join the Beta-Test Team

If you'd like to be considered for the exclusive Beta-Test Program, simply apply here. A limited number of people will be selected to test the apps and/or the Scrumball. (We're a bootstrapped startup, so quantities are limited).

We really appreciate your donations to help us make this product a reality. Together we'll make your status meetings fast, fun, and productive.

Thanks, and I’ll see you at Scrum!  

Best,
Patricia Ju
CEO/CTO Hackerbilt, Inc.
Fun at Work

We also now have quotes from several manufacturers for the next phases of prototyping, tooling, and mass manufacturing of the Scrumball (which will be made of a non-toxic foam and bear color graphics). This is where you come in - we need your pledges to get through these phases, to launch the Scrumball Lite App, and to get started on the Scrumball Pro App.
I personally can't wait until the first machine-produced prototype is in my hands to play with-currently we're using a surgically reduced toy football of a popular brand as well as a very protective foam iPhone case. We can toss and drop (oops?!) the phone in this case, but it just still pales to the feel and fun of tossing around a rugby ball.
The Plan

March: Start The Scrumball ball and apps design [DONE]
April:  Complete initial manual prototype and 3D models of The Scrumball [DONE]
May: Alpha Launch The Scrumball Lite app [DONE]
May: Complete and send out RFP and get quotes from manufacturers [DONE]
June: Finalize UI/UX design of The Scrumball Lite app [DONE]
June: Complete Beta version of The Scrumball Lite app [DONE]
June (mid): Launch Fundraising Campaign and Beta-Test [DONE]
July (mid): Complete Fundraising Campaign and Beta-Test [DONE]
July (end): Award project to manufacturing vendor. Manufacturing is led with quality assurance by a US company, with manufacturing done in China. App development done by the Hackerbilt team. [DONE]
August: Launch The Scrumball Lite iPhone App, Build Android Lite App
August (end): Approve final Scrumball prototypes and begin tooling, Launch Android Lite App
October: Launch The Scrumball for retail sales
March 2013: Launch The Scrumball Pro App
Join the Beta-Test Team
If you'd like to be considered for the exclusive Beta-Test Program, simply apply here. A limited number of people will be selected to test the apps and/or the Scrumball. (We're a bootstrapped startup, so quantities are limited).
We really appreciate your donations to help us make this product a reality. Together we'll make your status meetings fast, fun, and productive.
Thanks, and I’ll see you at Scrum!  
Best, Patricia Ju CEO/CTO Hackerbilt, Inc. Fun at Work

story:
Short Summary

This beauty is made of one solid block of aluminium, it’s sturdy, lightweight, compact and customizable. Make it unique with colors and graphics; you can even provide your own custom graphics to really give it your own style.

Case Features:

- Lightweight: Under 160g
- Sturdy: Made of a solid block of aluminium
- Beautiful: Machined from the start
- Compact: A regular smartphone size
- Backlit Raspberry Pi logo
- Easy to install
- Optional colors: Choose from silver, black, red, yellow-green, orange, or blue (many more colors available for larger batch orders)
- Optional graphics on top: Choose from a selection of different graphics to have laser engraved
- Optional customized graphics: Send me your custom picture to be laser engraved

Dimensions:
Raspberry Pi: 85.0mm x 56.2mm
Arcol’s case: 95.0mm x 72.0mm

Future Plans ($5,000 or more raised):

- Optional stainless steel VESA mounting (100x100mm and 75x75mm)
- Optional stainless steel table stand
- More colors for everyone to choose from

Raspberry Pi Features:

CPU: 700 MHz ARM11 core (BCM2835)
GPU: Videocore IV H.264@1080p30 encode/decode
Memory: 256MB
Storage: SD card
2x USB (Model A: 1x USB)
Video output: HDMI, Composite RCA
Audio output: HDMI, 3.5mm jack
100mbit ETHERNET (Model A: none)
Power usage: 2.5W (Model B: 3.5W)
Power input: MicroUSB or GPIO pins

 

 

Optional colors:

The following colors available:

Some closeups:

The RED:

 

 

The ORANGE:

 

The GREEN:

 

 

The BLUE:

 

 

The BLACK:

 

 

Backlit logo and graphics:

If you choose the graphic option, you will have a backlit logo, where the five leds of the Raspberry Pi pcb are conducted to the surface of the case via optical fibers.

They are arranged into the nice Raspberry Pi logo.

The graphics are laser etched onto the surface.

Pic:

 

Default graphics:

Here is the finished case with Raspberry icon alignement, also not five seeds of the logo is illuminated.

Custom graphics:

Want a personal touch, or your name/company name on your case? Download the template graphics and design your own. Please make sure you own the right of the graphics you choose.
As this graphics are custom and manufactured in less quantity, its a bit more expensive.
There are basically two options:

- Public Domain: This is the cheaper option. Your graphics are public domain and others can choose it.

- Super secret: Your graphic is handled discretely. No one will know what was on your case. This is great if you want your own custom company logo, or anything you simply don’t want to share. This is the more expensive option, and it is handled on a one-by-one basis.

About the backlit Raspberry Pi logo:

I got a positive response from Raspberry Pi about using their logo on the case. I was asked to change the name of the case from Arcol's Raspberry Pi Aluminum Case to Arcol's Aluminum Case for Raspberry Pi, which I did.


Otherwise we are good to go, so the final product can and will include the backlit raspberry log as showed here!

Its really illuminating:

Shipping fee:

Within Europe:  6 USD

Worldwide (USA, Asia, Australia, etc): 7 USD

Shipping fees will be collected after the campaign is over, in a separate confirmation email.

Computer not included

Please note, the Raspberry Pi computer is not included in either bundle.

 

Archived infos:

Here is my querry about using raspberry pi logo on the case:

I think using the Raspberry Pi logo on our case fits within Raspberry Pi's trademark rule, quoting from the site:

"(iii)      The Raspberry Pi Marks must appear less prominently than the product name and your brand/business name (if applicable)."

Here is a very early prototype (the backlit is dummy on that case), the graphics are bad manufactured, this is NOT how the laseretching will look like. (I show you mainly where the Raspberry Pi logo is imagined on the case).

 

I sent the following letter to Raspberry Pi folks to be on the safe side licensing-wise:

"""
Dear L**,

I just launched a new Raspberry Pi Case campaign on indiegogo:
http://www.indiegogo.com/arcol-raspi

I will offer custom graphics option on top of the case, and I would like to know if I can get approval to use the Raspberry Pi logo and/or the Raspberry Pi name on this case.
Here is an early prototype of the graphics, you can see The Raspberry Pi logo and text at the top right corner:
http://farm6.staticflickr.com/5441/7188897845_4...

The final version of the logo is slightly bigger and will be backlit (the five LEDs are conducted into the the seeds of the raspberry fruit, so it illuminates)

Just to let you know, this letter is public. I also published it at the end of the campaign. And I would like to publish your answer (or an excerpt from it) to the campaign too. I hope to get the green light from you.

Best,
Laszlo
http://arcol.hu
"""

story:
ARE MACS THAT GOOD?

Hey Mac users out there! Why are Mac computers so special? I've never had one and would love to find out! I've gotten comments and requests to "not forget Mac users" and give Mac "some love." I've been helping beginners to Linux since 2010 and it's now time to try something else :) 

LET'S TELL THE WORLD ABOUT THIS

Your suggestions will help shape the reviews and tutorials to help other beginners. You may even be invited to chat about this project and tell the world!

Over the years, I've gotten many wonderful comments including a cancer patient who appreciated the work I did and somehow helped brighten his day. All I can say is I put people first and technology second.

IF THE GOAL ISN'T REACHED

The goal is simple: without your help I can't do this. I was born to help others and now I need your help. If the goal isn't reached I won't give up since I don't believe in quitting but it WILL make it virtually impossible accept any Mac requests.

Can't contribute but would like to help?  Cool! Just tell everybody you know about this. Thanks!

story:
Overview

2Go Products brings you the most useful iPhone case ever -- The EverCase™. Convenient, portable, attractive, and durable, the EverCase™ will prove itself to be a staple in your daily life with its multiple storage options and features. You can purchase your EverCase™ NOW on Indiegogo at a discounted price and receive it immediately!

All proceeds will be used for funding future developments for other iPhone models (like the iPhone 7 plus, and iPhone 8), as well as to help us purchase more inventory. We appreciate your support!

Multiple Storage Options

3.5mm Adapter Cable -- Right in Your Case!

The EverCase™ star feature is its special slot on the outside of its body for the iPhone's 3.5mm Headphone Adapter. Plug in and listen to your music on the go.

 

USB Charger Cable on the Go

The EverCase™ second outside slot is dedicated to Apple's MFi-Certified Lightning Cable. If you have a portable charger or there is a nearby outlet, you will never have to worry about dead phone batteries. Included in your initial package. 

 

Securely Hold Your Credit Cards

Inside the EverCase™ is a space dedicated to your credit cards. Securely holds up to 2 credit cards plus cash so you can be rest assured that your finances are safe and easily accessible. 

 

Travel Friendly -- SIM Card Storage

Also inside the EverCase™ is a SIM Card Holder and a respective Ejector Pin to extract your SIM Cards. Safely carries up to 2 Nano SIM Cards. SIM Card Ejector Pin is included in the package. 

Handy Features

Super Portable

Multi-functional and versatile, attached is a twistable Ring Holder, making the EverCase™ easy to carry in your hands and fasten to your bags.

 

 

Hands-free Viewing

Built into the phone is a kickstand that you can swing open to prop your EverCase™ upright. With the option of two different viewing angles, the kickstand is perfect for viewing and spontaneous pictures!

 

Full Drop Protection -- Perfect for the iPhone7

The EverCase™ is also solidly built with anti-scratch and non-slip Matte-UV Coating for durability and complete protection. Expect your phone and all of its accessories to be safe!
 

Dimensions

An ergonomic design that allows for comfort and efficiency. Flat and thin, the EverCase™ is easy to keep beside you.

The Full Indiegogo Package

Shipping

The EverCase™ is available for purchase right now! Receive ONE 2Go™ EverCase™ for $25 or TWO for $40. All EverCase™ for the iPhone ship within 1 week.

EverCase™ for the iPhone 7 Plus ship in 8-9 weeks. 

 

What is Included in the Box?

Inside the EverCase™ package is:

  • 1 x iPhone 7 Multi-Storage Travel Case
  • 1 x 160mm Apple MFi-Certified Lightning Cable
  • 1 x SIM Card Ejector Pin

 

Perks

Back us with $25 and you will recieve ONE EverCase™ package for the iPhone 7, which contains ONE iPhone7 Multi-Storage Travel Case, ONE 160mm Apple MFi-certified Lightning Cable, and 1 SIM Card Ejector Pin. All items ship within 1 week.

At the $29 level, you will receive the same package as above, except for the iPhone 7 Plus. All items ship in 8-9 weeks.

At the $40 level, you will receive the TWO iPhone 7 packages. All items ship within 1 week.  

About Us

The Company

2Go Products is a growing company based in San Diego, California. We offer high quality, innovative and helpful household items to make your home and life more comfortable. All are manufactured and designed to be of top class quality. We are dedicated to providing the highest level of customer service. The EverCase™ is 2Go Product's newest item and we are excited to provide you and others the most useful case ever. 

 

The Team

Contact Us

For any  questions or concerns, reach out to us by:

Email: alisa@2goproducts.com

Phone: 858-360-7780

FAQs

Does the EverCase™ come in different colors? 

Currently, we only have the case in black, however once funded we will consider adding more colors.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we ship internationally.

What are the dimensions of the phone case?

The EverCase™ is 4.10 x 2.7 x 0.63 in

When will my EverCase™ ship?

Within a week of your confirmed payment.

How will I know if my EverCase™ shipped?

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days. You can check the status of your package at any time through Indiegogo.

What is and isn't included in my EverCase™ package?

Included in your EverCase™ box is:

•    1 x iPhone 7 Multi-Storage Travel Case
•    1 x Apple MFi-certified Lightning Cable
•    1 x SIM Card Ejector Pin

Not included is the:

  • 3.5mm Headphone Adapter 
  • Nano SIM Card

What is your return policy?

We accept returns for any damaged units within 14 days and will offer a full refund. 

Do you sell your EverCase™ elsewhere?

We also offer our EverCase™ on the official website, www.2gocase.com, and on Amazon at https://goo.gl/qfkhxw. However, only on Indiegogo will we offer a discounted price!

story:
Why CrowdFunding? Indiegogo is an incredible platform where a community can come together over projects they feel passionate about. Crowdfunding is the best way to kick-start and gather grassroots support for the Acorn brand and to go directly to the UK users who’ve loved the Acorn name for 40 years.

Acorn aims to offer the ultimate goldilocks product, the perfect blend of function, form and value for money- and to put a UK name back on the international Tech Map.

Why a Smartphone? Theres lot of smartphones available, so why do a smartphone? Acorn’s first computer in the 1980’s dominated the market by bringing affordable computers to the masses. Many people (including lots of the UK developers & children in education) cut their teeth on a Micro and have since created the digital world around us. Everyone loves their smartphone (essentially a computer, and now mostly powered by ARM® processors), but we now live in a world of £1000 phones, which we think is ludicrous!! Acorn’s mission is to create devices for people that we actively recommend a good deal to :- our mothers & fathers, brothers & sisters, family & friends.  Everyone loves their smartphone, and the Micro is just the start…

Can you do it? The Acorn team, developers and manufacturing partners have experience successfully bringing products like this to market. As with any complicated new product there can be pitfalls along the way, the team have likely already encountered them, and with this knowledge can hopefully avoid them. We promise our complete devotion to bringing the new Micro into production and into our backers homes!

Communication We promise transparency and we will communicate on a regular basis with our backers. There are answers to many FAQs as part of this webpage, and you can connect with Acorn at any time by visiting www.AcornComputers.com/contact (or via this Indiegogo page) or check out our social media!

Production, Certification, Approval and Licensing We aim to deliver the exact spec billed on the Indiegogo page, however, we are aware that we may be required to make changes to meet manufacturing, certification, approval and licensing requirements. Any changes we need to make will reflect our original design intentions and commitment to our backers, and you can be assured we will keep you updated all the way.

Is Acorn Acorn? The UK team that created Acorn in the late 1970s have moved on to amazing things, and the original company is no longer operating after various takeovers and mergers. The 'new' Acorn has the rights to use the name and aims to see one of the most famous and important brands in electronics flourish, rather than gathering dust in the history books. 

By backing this campaign, you arnt just getting an awesome new smartphone, you are helping to revitalize Acorn, and icon for Britain.  We share the same vision, values and passion for this incredible, historic marque (we just updated the logo to make it a bit more modern- hope you like it)!

Company Name                          Acorn Inc Ltd

Registered Company No          09430040

Website                                          www.AcornComputers.com

What about the Future? Acorn is optimistic about its future. The team is committed to creating a sustainable business, with end-to-end support for our customers now and as the brand develops. We hope you have the same excitement and nostalgia as we do for the Acorn name, we want to make useful & serious tech products that improve daily life, help in education and bring people together, we don’t just want to make one-off retro games consoles!

After the Indiegogo campaign Acorn aims to expand its portfolio and work with Corporations, Schools and Universities, Retailers, Investors, Acorn Enthusiasts & Hobbyists. Manufacturing back in Britain is one of our primary goals. We need your support to make Acorn great again!

Its a lot of money to ask for right? There will be 48,000,000 smartphone users in the UK in 2018 and we hope a tiny fraction (3000) people share our dream of an Acorn phone.

Getting a new Smartphone into production and into your hands only works when manufacturing efficiently at volume. The Acorn team is committed about the targets we have set, and want to be realistic about how we get there. In electronics term, 3000 units is actually really small!

Acorn is committed to being a Responsible Corporation. We commit to remaining on-shore in the UK, and paying all the relevant taxes, VAT and Corporation Tax as well as being responsible for the end of life WEEE costs. To us it just makes sense.

Are you making a profit? Acorn is making a small profit as well as covering our expenses. This is primarily being fed back into the company to help reinvigorate Acorn as a UK tech company.

Is it better than iPhone or Galaxy? The Micro is our flagship product and we love it, but spec for spec it doesn’t aim to compete with these super-high-end phones, both which are excellent (if you want that kind of thing and are willing to pay a premium). The Micro is designed to be a “#SmarterPhone”- a better choice for most people's daily needs- while delivering great value for money! We arnt trying to be in the same premium market as these giants, even if some of their success can be traced right back to the Acorn pioneers!

 

 

About

What is it?​

Simply put, the Micro Phone C5 is a modern, big-screen Android smartphone with four cameras and fingerprint security, 4G and Wi-Fi connectivity, and a great overall spec.

Our team thinks it lets the most people get the best of modern digital life, at the optimum value for money.

Where is it being made?

We're a small, lean, passionate team based in London & Brighton, collaborating with international partners including Google™.  The Micro Phone will be assembled and packed in China, and overseen by independent third parties to international standards and certifications. Our ultimate goal is to bring manufacturing back to the UK, but first things first!

Why are you crowdfunding?

We love crowdfunding! For us, it's a perfect solution to ensure we meet minimum order quantities for the first production batch and to gain grassroot support from Acorn lovers in the UK

The Micro Phone will only be produced with a fully funded Indiegogo campaign – so we need your backing to make Acorn great again!

How much does it cost?

There are various “Perks” you can see at the top of this webpage. Perks are 'Indiegogo speak' for what you get in return for backing a campaign, in this case an awesome phone!

Where can you buy it?

Only on Indiegogo! You can’t buy this product anywhere else and it won’t happen without your support!

Whats in the box?

5.7” Micro Phone  C5 Smartphone

UK USB Charger 5V,

Quick Start Guide,

SIM Tray Pin,

12 Month Warranty,

UK Tech Support.

Will you make accessories?

The accessory bundle for the Micro, including 2 x Cases & 3 x Screen Protectors are sold separately.

 

Whats Next?

What stage are you at now?

We have a fully working and rigorously tested Engineer’s Prototype that our team is confident will pass the required statutory certifications and Google approvals to bring it to market in the UK.

We believe the Micro Phone is compliant with the Android CDD (software and hardware requirements for a compatible Android device) and the firmware can pass the Android Compatibility Test Suite (CTS), GMS (Google Mobile Services) approval and relevant Widevine requirements for digital content. 

What happens after its funded?

After the campaign is (hopefully!) funded we will finalise all the manufacturing details (mainly the latest firmware security) updates and start producing!

We will then start the final GMS approval process that will run simultaneously while the hardware is compiled, SMT’d and assembled. Once we have the final sign-off the approved firmware will be added and the Quality Assurance process will start.Your Micro will be fully tested before it goes in the box!

 

 

Shipping

When can we expect it to arrive?

Orders are expected to be delivered towards the end of May.

Where do you ship?​

To offer our customers the best experience and technical support, the Micro Phone is shipping to the UK only.

What about taxes?

UK backers will have all UK VAT paid by Acorn (its included in the price).

What are the challenges of delivering late?

Certification and GMS approval is an external process. While we have taken this time into our schedule, there may need to be adjustments.

In case of any delays to the shipping process we will keep all backers fully updated.

 

Customer Service

Is there a warranty?​

Yes, the Micro Phone comes with a 1 Year Warranty. You can find full details of our Warranty Terms at www.AcornComputers.com

What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?

See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Backer Enquiries: www.AcornComputers.com

Support: www.AcornComputers.com/support

Press & Investment: www.AcornComputers.com/contact

 

 

Disclaimer

*Requires signup for free Google Account, and free downloads. Some services require Network or Wi-Fi connectivity, Location Services, and other personal data to perform. Computer generated images illustrative of device, actual product may vary due to manufacturing processes. Third party devices cannot not supported by our Tech Support Engineers, and we cannot offer compatibility advice.  If a Micro SD card is added this occupies the position of the Nano SIM Slot (which then cant be added). 32GB = 32 Billion bytes. Actual formatted capacity is less and storage quoted excludes storage occupied by Android OS and pre-loaded Apps (~3GB). 15GB Free Google Drive Cloud storage correct at time of press. Some apps shown are not pre-loaded but all are available at time of press, some may be chargeable. Acorn is not responsible for functionality of thrid party apps and services.

Google, Android, Chrome, Assistant, Play Store, Drive, GMail, Play Books, Play Magazines, Play Games, Play Movies, Photos, Google+, Maps, YouTube, Google Now, ‘OK Google’ Hangouts and their respective icons and screenshots are trademarks of Google Inc. Asahi® Dragontrail™ is a trademark of Asahi Glass Co., Ltd. ARM® is a registered trademark of ARM Ltd. SONY is a trademark of SONY EUROPE LIMITED. BBC is a registered trademark of British Broadcasting Corporation. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners. Terms and Conditions apply. Specification subject to change. GMS Approval is subject to Google and 3PL processes, the Micro C5 is not currently certified but it will be before shipping.  12% more screen refers to the increase from a standard widescreen 16:9 to 18:9 aspect.  Acorn Inc Ltd has no affiliation to Acorn Computers Ltd (1978) or Chris Curry (just a huge amount of love!).
story_txt:
Why CrowdFunding? Indiegogo is an incredible platform where a community can come together over projects they feel passionate about. Crowdfunding is the best way to kick-start and gather grassroots support for the Acorn brand and to go directly to the UK users who’ve loved the Acorn name for 40 years.Acorn aims to offer the ultimate goldilocks product, the perfect blend of function, form and value for money- and to put a UK name back on the international Tech Map.Why a Smartphone? Theres lot of smartphones available, so why do a smartphone? Acorn’s first computer in the 1980’s dominated the market by bringing affordable computers to the masses. Many people (including lots of the UK developers & children in education) cut their teeth on a Micro and have since created the digital world around us. Everyone loves their smartphone (essentially a computer, and now mostly powered by ARM® processors), but we now live in a world of £1000 phones, which we think is ludicrous!! Acorn’s mission is to create devices for people that we actively recommend a good deal to :- our mothers & fathers, brothers & sisters, family & friends.  Everyone loves their smartphone, and the Micro is just the start…Can you do it? The Acorn team, developers and manufacturing partners have experience successfully bringing products like this to market. As with any complicated new product there can be pitfalls along the way, the team have likely already encountered them, and with this knowledge can hopefully avoid them. We promise our complete devotion to bringing the new Micro into production and into our backers homes!Communication We promise transparency and we will communicate on a regular basis with our backers. There are answers to many FAQs as part of this webpage, and you can connect with Acorn at any time by visiting www.AcornComputers.com/contact (or via this Indiegogo page) or check out our social media!Production, Certification, Approval and Licensing We aim to deliver the exact spec billed on the Indiegogo page, however, we are aware that we may be required to make changes to meet manufacturing, certification, approval and licensing requirements. Any changes we need to make will reflect our original design intentions and commitment to our backers, and you can be assured we will keep you updated all the way.Is Acorn Acorn? The UK team that created Acorn in the late 1970s have moved on to amazing things, and the original company is no longer operating after various takeovers and mergers. The 'new' Acorn has the rights to use the name and aims to see one of the most famous and important brands in electronics flourish, rather than gathering dust in the history books. By backing this campaign, you arnt just getting an awesome new smartphone, you are helping to revitalize Acorn, and icon for Britain.  We share the same vision, values and passion for this incredible, historic marque (we just updated the logo to make it a bit more modern- hope you like it)!Company Name                          Acorn Inc LtdRegistered Company No          09430040Website                                          www.AcornComputers.comWhat about the Future? Acorn is optimistic about its future. The team is committed to creating a sustainable business, with end-to-end support for our customers now and as the brand develops. We hope you have the same excitement and nostalgia as we do for the Acorn name, we want to make useful & serious tech products that improve daily life, help in education and bring people together, we don’t just want to make one-off retro games consoles!After the Indiegogo campaign Acorn aims to expand its portfolio and work with Corporations, Schools and Universities, Retailers, Investors, Acorn Enthusiasts & Hobbyists. Manufacturing back in Britain is one of our primary goals. We need your support to make Acorn great again!Its a lot of money to ask for right? There will be 48,000,000 smartphone users in the UK in 2018 and we hope a tiny fraction (3000) people share our dream of an Acorn phone.Getting a new Smartphone into production and into your hands only works when manufacturing efficiently at volume. The Acorn team is committed about the targets we have set, and want to be realistic about how we get there. In electronics term, 3000 units is actually really small!Acorn is committed to being a Responsible Corporation. We commit to remaining on-shore in the UK, and paying all the relevant taxes, VAT and Corporation Tax as well as being responsible for the end of life WEEE costs. To us it just makes sense.Are you making a profit? Acorn is making a small profit as well as covering our expenses. This is primarily being fed back into the company to help reinvigorate Acorn as a UK tech company.Is it better than iPhone or Galaxy? The Micro is our flagship product and we love it, but spec for spec it doesn’t aim to compete with these super-high-end phones, both which are excellent (if you want that kind of thing and are willing to pay a premium). The Micro is designed to be a “#SmarterPhone”- a better choice for most people's daily needs- while delivering great value for money! We arnt trying to be in the same premium market as these giants, even if some of their success can be traced right back to the Acorn pioneers!  About

What is it?​

Simply put, the Micro Phone C5 is a modern, big-screen Android smartphone with four cameras and fingerprint security, 4G and Wi-Fi connectivity, and a great overall spec.
Our team thinks it lets the most people get the best of modern digital life, at the optimum value for money.



Where is it being made?
We're a small, lean, passionate team based in London & Brighton, collaborating with international partners including Google™.  The Micro Phone will be assembled and packed in China, and overseen by independent third parties to international standards and certifications. Our ultimate goal is to bring manufacturing back to the UK, but first things first!


Why are you crowdfunding?

We love crowdfunding! For us, it's a perfect solution to ensure we meet minimum order quantities for the first production batch and to gain grassroot support from Acorn lovers in the UK
The Micro Phone will only be produced with a fully funded Indiegogo campaign – so we need your backing to make Acorn great again!



How much does it cost?
There are various “Perks” you can see at the top of this webpage. Perks are 'Indiegogo speak' for what you get in return for backing a campaign, in this case an awesome phone!


Where can you buy it?
Only on Indiegogo! You can’t buy this product anywhere else and it won’t happen without your support!


Whats in the box?

5.7” Micro Phone  C5 Smartphone
UK USB Charger 5V,
Quick Start Guide,
SIM Tray Pin,
12 Month Warranty,
UK Tech Support.



Will you make accessories?
The accessory bundle for the Micro, including 2 x Cases & 3 x Screen Protectors are sold separately.

 Whats Next?

What stage are you at now?

We have a fully working and rigorously tested Engineer’s Prototype that our team is confident will pass the required statutory certifications and Google approvals to bring it to market in the UK.
We believe the Micro Phone is compliant with the Android CDD (software and hardware requirements for a compatible Android device) and the firmware can pass the Android Compatibility Test Suite (CTS), GMS (Google Mobile Services) approval and relevant Widevine requirements for digital content. 



What happens after its funded?

After the campaign is (hopefully!) funded we will finalise all the manufacturing details (mainly the latest firmware security) updates and start producing!
We will then start the final GMS approval process that will run simultaneously while the hardware is compiled, SMT’d and assembled. Once we have the final sign-off the approved firmware will be added and the Quality Assurance process will start.Your Micro will be fully tested before it goes in the box!


  Shipping

When can we expect it to arrive?
Orders are expected to be delivered towards the end of May.


Where do you ship?​
To offer our customers the best experience and technical support, the Micro Phone is shipping to the UK only.


What about taxes?
UK backers will have all UK VAT paid by Acorn (its included in the price).


What are the challenges of delivering late?

Certification and GMS approval is an external process. While we have taken this time into our schedule, there may need to be adjustments.
In case of any delays to the shipping process we will keep all backers fully updated.


 Customer Service

Is there a warranty?​
Yes, the Micro Phone comes with a 1 Year Warranty. You can find full details of our Warranty Terms at www.AcornComputers.com


What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?
See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Backer Enquiries: www.AcornComputers.com
Support: www.AcornComputers.com/support
Press & Investment: www.AcornComputers.com/contact

story:
HOLD YOUR SMARTPHONE comfortably and securely for taking pictures and filming like a pro!

MOBBO, HANDDO AND NANO, a tripod mount, camera grip, stand and handle that will convert your smartphone into professional photo and filming gear. 

 

 

 

MOBBO is a tripod holder, a camera grip and a stand for your smartphone. It fits almost all models and is extremely secure

With MOBBO you will be able to hold your smartphone in many different ways for taking wonderful pictures and videos. Its grip range goes from 48 mm up to 90 mm and thanks to its pressure screw and its rubber pads, MOBBO will hold your phone securely even under extreme conditions. MOBBO can be used with almost any smartphone. with or without a case. No matter if you use an iPhone, a Galaxy, a Nexus, an Xperia or any other model. It has a 1/4-20 tripod thread at its base, so you can mount the MOBBO on any tripod. If you fix the MOBBO to the right side of your smartphone, it will work as a camera grip. It stands on it own, in both landscape or portrait mode, so you can take "selfies", panoramas or time lapse movies when travelling. You can also use it as a desk stand for browsing or edditing your pictures and clips.

 

 

NANO is a grip extension for your MOBBO

NANO is a small grip extension for your MOBBO. It is made from black anodized solid aluminum and will convert your MOBBO into a comfortable camera grip for taking better pictures and filming steady videos. MOBBO + NANO just slips into your pocket and is perfect for travelling and sports. If you're looking for a full handle, you might preffer selecting the HANDDO. Take a look below!

 

 

HANDDO is a universal handle that can be attached to your MOBBO or to any other camera.

HANDDO is an ergonomic handle machined from solid aluminum that can be attached to your MOBBO or to any other camera. With HANDDO you will be able to take steady video clips, "stretch-arm" portraits or film yourself. Experiment with low shots or high angle views, ... and yes, you can also use your HANDDO if you already own an iPhone tripod mount like the "glif". It is finished with durable black anodized coating and includes a rubber pad to protect your camera.

 

 

 HOW to use it

 

 

 

 

CHOOSE a perk

 

3 IMPORTANT THINGS FOR CONTRIBUTING!

 

THIS IS A CROWDFUNDIND PROJECT, YOU MAKE IT POSSIBLE

Crowdfunding is a new way for transforming creative ideas into reality. Our goal is to reach 45.000€ for funding the plastic injection moulds and the toolling required for manufacturing. If enough people "pre-order" the MOBBO and the HANDDO on this site before August 18, we will be able to make this project possible. In the meanwhile, Indiegogo will retain all the funds and will only give us the money at the end of the campaign if we succeed. If that occurs, we will manufacture the MOBBOs and the HANDDOs and will ship them to you by the end of November. In case we don't reach our goal, then you will get your money back, we will not receive a cent and the project will not be done. If you want to help this project come true, you can choose one of the perks on the right column and make your contribution.

 

PRICES ARE IN € BUT YOU CAN CONTRIBUTE IN US$ OR IN ANY OTHER CURRENCY

Prices are in EUROS because our design studio is based in a EURO-ZONE country. Anyway, once you make your contribution, PayPal will automatically convert your charge into your local currency according to the official exchange rate.

 

PLEASE ADD "MANUALLY" YOUR SHIPPING COSTS!

Remember adding your shipping costs if you order from outside the province of Barcelona. Shipping costs are 8€ for most perks and 21€ for the 3 FRIENDS PACK. For doing so, once you are in the contribution screen you will have to EDIT MANUALLY the price that appears in the white bar. Delete the prize you see (for example €39) and type the new amount including your shipping costs (for example €47) That will mean that you are contributing with 39€ for your product + 8€ for your shipping costs. 

 

  

WE ARE TAMBAKUNDA, a design studio from Barcelona

We are a team of engineers, architects and designers that help companies to innovate through design and technology. We design products, services, spaces and brands, but some months ago we decided to create a brand of our own, SHOULDERPOD, and our first products; MOBBO and HANDDO, a holder and a handle for helping people tell better stories with their smartphones. For knowing us better and for getting in touch, please visit www.tambakunda.com and www.shoulderpod.com

 

Why we need your help?

Because we need a minimum number of pre-orders to fund the injection moulds and tooling required to manufacture the MOBBO and the HANDDO. At the moment we have completed the design process, we have built and tested the prototypes, we have designed a wonderfull packaging and we are ready for investing in production. And here is where you come in. So if you want to participate in making this project possible, you can support us by placing a pre-order, and only if we meet our funding goal, will you be charged for your contribution. In return we will send the MOBBO and the HANDDO to you as soon as they pop out from our Barcelona workshop.

 

How long will it take us?

Our Indiegogo campaign will end on August, 18. If we make it, we will receive the funds two weeks later. Manufacturing the injection moulds and tooling will take us arround two months and a half, plus three more weeks for production and logistics. We expect shipping our first units to you by the end of November 2013. Need an idea for your Christmass gifts? Here you are! During these months we'll keep you informed of the progress of the project at our website.

 

Convince your friends and save!

Convince your friends so you can benefit from our special group offers. By selecting one of our "friends" perks you will share shipping costs and save money. Only available for our INDIEGOGO backers.

  

THANK YOU all for being part of the SHOULDERPOD project, for sharing it and for making it possible!

Our special thanks to all our team; Elena, David, Jordi, José María, Juan and Sergi for participating with their huge talent during the design process. To Ricardo, our studio neighbour, for his collaboration and his patience, to Roberto for his time and his experience telling stories, to Martín for his wonderful sports clips, to Ali for the British revision of our text, to Don for his warm and friendly voice, to Alex and Mónica for their generosity with their D90, to Inés for her charming instagram moments, to Elena and Rafa for their wonderful "stretch arm" portraits, to Mariona and Asa for their touch of glamour, to Miguel and Berta for sharing their time and their family in the park, to Alexis for the professional studio moments, to Tabita for her endless smile, to Xavi and Alex for taking me for the first time to the Barça stadium, to Xavier and Maia for a great Saturday concert, to the BARCELONA DESIGN CENTER for their MID support and to the Fundació CIM, for their help with rapid prototyping. Our thanks as well to all the people that kindly accepted to participate in the video ... and to all the anonimous travellers who visit Barcelona every year for inspiring us. To all of you, smartphone storytellers, here's to you! 

THANK YOU!

 

DISCLAIMER: We are not directly associated with the brands that we showed in the video or in the pictures. Neither do any of the brands endorse us. Those images/videos are just to show potential uses of the product.

 

What the press is saying

 

Cult of Mac                       "Shoulderpod supplies sturdy stand for iPhone"

All about Symbian              "Very impressive design and lateral thinking"

All about Windows Phone   "a nicely designed smartphone grip combination"

Android Authority               "A catch-all for better photography"

Android Mag                      "Shoulderpod:Cooles smartphone-gadget für fotos und videos"

Appzd                               "iPhone摄影专用“三角架”

iPhone Club                      "a usefull toolfor the iPhone photograpers and filmmakers"

iPhone Photography School"Mobbo & Handdo, two killer iPhone accessories"

iPhones.ru                        "ShoulderPod. Держатель для iPhone-фотографов"

Life in lofi                         "a new lightweiighy universal smartphone tripod mount and grip"

No film school                   "more stability making Vines or Instagram videos"

Xataka                             "Shoulderpod sueña con dos accesorios bien diseñados para                                                         smartphones"

story:
The Dual Droid TV Stick.

 

We been investigating Android HDMI sticks for a while.  Up until now nothing has peaked our interests.  They have all been lacking.  Some lack in speed.  Some lack in space.  Some lack in memory.  Some of them just plain don't work right.

Then along came this little dual core stick.  It was cute and cuddly.  Almost furry with its 1.2Ghz brains.  Its little 1GB of ram.  And its teeny 4GB flash.

The specifications are almost standard these days.

It needed a little bite.  Some sharp teeth.

No one has actually come out with a TV stick that addresses the issues of speed, memory, and space.  With your support we will provide that solution.

We've talked to the manufacturer of the above TV stick and are having a custom version made to our specifications.  

We want to provide something that we would buy ourselves.

Sure you could buy something for the present,  or you could invest in what's coming.

It will feature the following:

Android 4.04

1.6Ghz Dual Core Cortex A9 RK3066 SOC

Mali 400MP4 Quad Core GPU

2GB of ram(because the future will come sooner than you think)

16GB of Flash Nand(4GB just isn't enough)

Wifi b/g/n with Direct Connect

Micro SD card slot

Male HDMI 1.4

Full Size USB host port

Micro USB port for power

 

Current Status:

We have received samples of the Dual Droid TV Stick and have been extensively testing it.  Although underclocked at the moment to 1.2ghz it scored a low of 6310 and a high of 6821 in Antutu Benchmark.  We expect our 1.6GHZ version to be a bit faster.

At the moment the underclocked version of the Dual Droid TV Stick consumes between 1A to 1.3A at 5V.  We expect the 1.6GHZ version to consume between 1.5A to 1.75A.

The Wifi worked very well over our router.  Web browsing is fast.  Even flash video's played well...on desktop versions of sites. 

Video has been a breeze with it's support of 1080p playback.  The stock video player is easy to use.  Hardware decoding is supported by popular players available in the Play Store.

We even tested an unofficial nightly build of XBMC on it(it was able to stream SD content with almost no dropped frames at 50% cpu usage.)

If our goal is met our aim is to have this at everyone's location before Christmas! 

Current Pictures:

Keep in mind that this is a sample we received from the manufacturer.

The casing and color will be changed. A mockup of what the Dual Droid TV Stick will look like is featured in the Gallery.

We'll be adding more pictures and videos as this project continues.

A standard US Quarter is in the picture for size reference.

  
 
 

 
 
Why We Need Your Money:
 
  •  Production of the Dual Droid Android TV Stick.
  • Shipping, Packaging, and Customs fees.

  • Website, Forum, and Bandwidth.

  • To provide samples to select rom developers.

 

 

The Perks:

 

The first perk is a Carabiner featuring an LED light and a Pen.

The second perk is the Dual Droid TV Stick at a limited reduced price.  In addition it will also ship first.

The third perk is the Dual Droid Droid TV Stick.

The fourth perk a package deal of 2 Dual Droid TV sticks at a reduced price.

When We Expect to Deliver:


It takes time to produce a product. We are having an existing product heavily modified to create something with specifications that are unmatched to date.

It also takes time to receive a large order.   When our funding goes through we are expecting to be able to deliver in December.  Hopefully before Christmas.
story_txt:
The Dual Droid TV Stick.
 
We been investigating Android HDMI sticks for a while.  Up until now nothing has peaked our interests.  They have all been lacking.  Some lack in speed.  Some lack in space.  Some lack in memory.  Some of them just plain don't work right.
Then along came this little dual core stick.  It was cute and cuddly.  Almost furry with its 1.2Ghz brains.  Its little 1GB of ram.  And its teeny 4GB flash.
The specifications are almost standard these days.
It needed a little bite.  Some sharp teeth.
No one has actually come out with a TV stick that addresses the issues of speed, memory, and space.  With your support we will provide that solution.
We've talked to the manufacturer of the above TV stick and are having a custom version made to our specifications.

story:
An Offline App - why? 

After years of studying abroad and visiting different places around the world, it became clear to us that making friends and meeting new people became harder and harder over these years. The mentality of people changed drastically. 

Back then when you wanted to become friends with someone, you would try to get to know them first, and they would do the same. Unlike today where people have this superficial swiping mentality and judge people on their “profile picture” and a few lines to define themselves with. 

So we thought, we need to do something about that and go a little bit back in time. 
 

The launch of NETME

Soon enough we figured, the easiest way to bring together what we were looking for and the  situation how it is nowadays was to build a connection between our smartphones, which are currently indispensable, and real-life meetings.

On NETME you no longer have to stress over boring online texts, discussions, bad pick-up lines or embarrassment over bad impressions. Instead you can simply browse the map, pick out somewhere to have your next lunch break and send an invitation to someone nearby to come and join you!

 

What makes NETME unique? 

CONNECT ONLINE, MEET OFFLINE - that being said.. with NETME your networking game will definitely change!

All of us know a variety of apps we use while meeting up with friends, like Yelp, Foursquare, Google maps or WhatsApp. 

What if there was an App that combines all of them and even lets you decide if you want to meet up 1:1, in a group, near your hometown or in that town you're going to stay next week? 

An app as flexible as your life style? You will find all of that with NETME. Meet up whenever, wherever and with whoever you want to, in a locality of your choice. 

Sounds too simple? Well, that's exactly it! All you have to do is take out your phone, browse the map and pick out somewhere new to have your next lunch break!

 

OUR FEATURES

 

How you can become a part 

An app is only as good as its community. Thus our goal is to keep growing to become more and more use-full to each other and our users. 

As much as we would like to offer you the best experience possible on our app, server and development costs rise the same.. 

To preserve you the handiest app you've ever used to catch up with people and meet up, we'd love to welcome you with our voucher on our app directly as a Premium User and experience our app to the fullest!

 

Challenges along the way 

There are two challenges that we've faced along the way. One is that we don't have an Android version yet which means that we only reach half of our potential users.

Secondly the COVID 19 times didn't go past us without a trace. With our app we want to encourage you to obtain a social life and to meet up more instead of the "online bubble" we all live in at the moment. 

With that said moving the online life to an offline world is not that easy with an offline world shut down. We take those forced time-off to work even harder, so that once we have bypassed those difficult times, with an environment being completely or partly shut down, to help everyone get back to a normal yet social life again. 

 

What we need and what you get 

NETME is growing and so is our user base. To keep us going and to launch the Android version of the app, we need your help! With the funds raised from our campaign, we will be developing a new group invitation functionality, further improve our app and last but not least, it will mainly serve to cover our server and maintenance costs. 

If we don't reach our financial goal, be sure that we will still try our best to keep going and make choices and only invest what is on higher priority, such as performance, User Experience and bug improvements.

 

Are there any other ways to help? 

Yes, there are! Of course we'd love to see you become a premium user in our app and help us reach our vision for NETME but you can still help by becoming a standard user of NETME. With that you help us growing and becoming active. 

And if NETME suits you and your life style - why not talk about it with your friends and family? Help us grow and rise.

You can also share this campaign by simply clicking here.

story:
Smartphone Controlled
Operated with a simple RoomBox app for Android, iOS and Windows. You easily set timers, events and other settings.
Replaces Remotes

Effectively controls every remote controlled device in your room, including TV, A/C, Stereo, DVD, Apple TV, Tivo, Verizon, and DVR.



Everyone Can Have One

It can be operated with a simple Roombox app for android, iOS, and Windows. Easily set timers, events and other settings. With SmartPlug your boiler will start working when you come back home, so you can enjoy a hot shower.
Easy to Install
It takes less than a minute to install and start using RoomBox. You just put it on the wall, and install the app on your smartphone.



Save Energy - Green
RoomBox will save energy for you! It will turn off appliances when you leave the room, and turn them back on when you return. This reduces energy bills, saves time, and guarantees convenience.
Automatic Climate Control
RoomBox automatically and efficiently maintains a cozy temperature in your room. You can set different temperature for night time, when you are out of the house, or any other time. It will turn on the A/C when you are nearing home, thereby, turning on your appliances shortly before you get home.



Smart Home for the People!

Inspired by the complicated and costly smart home industry, we wanted to create a super simple device that will work as a smart universal remote, a system that will give us total control through our smartphones.


What does RoomBox do?

The RoomBox is a universal remote for every device : Put one in each room and you could operate it from your smartphone. you can also easily set it to control any remote controlled device. Every family member can use his own smartphone as a remote. Control the TV, A/C, Stereo, DVR, Apple TV, Tivo, or any other remote controlled easily with your smartphone. RoomBox is also a climate control system. You can control your A/C through your smartphone. It will also save energy - more on that later.



Easy To Install

It takes less than a minute to install and start using RoomBox. You just put it on the wall, and install the app on your smartphone.

RoomBox app is easy to config. pick your TV, A/C, DVD and other home appliances brand and model and RoomBox will know how to talk to them.

Cloud Platform

RoomBox is a cloud base System. So you don't need to worry about updates and setup. We save and manage the data for you.


Your home Is always cozy

RoomBox will know when you are coming back home so it can turn on the A/C to precool/preheat your home, and even turn on the boiler if needed.


SmartPlug - The Solution for Non-Remote Controlled Devices


The SmartPlug is a super simple on/off switch controlled with the RoomBox App. you just plug it in, and control it with your smartphone. It could be used to turn on and off any appliance that connects to the socket.

Smartphone Controlled
Operated with a simple RoomBox app for Android, iOS and Windows. You easily set timers, events and other settings.
Replaces Remotes
Effectively controls every remote controlled device in your room, including: TV, A/C, Stereo, DVD, Apple TV, Tivo, Verizon, and DVR.
Everybody Can Have one
Every family member's smartphone can be a remote control. Don't ever look for a remote again, just use your smartphone.
Easy to Install
It takes less than a minute to install and start using RoomBox. You just put it on the wall, and install the app on your smartphone.



RoomBox will communicate with the SmartPlug so you can turn your devices only when there are people in the room or when you are at home. You can set your water boiler for when you are 1 mile away from home so the A/C will heat your home, and the boiler will heat the water for you. It can also work independently without the RoomBox, and be turned on/off with your smartphone.


Studio Apartment / Loft 

One RoomBox and one SmartPlug control your home

 

1 Bedroom 

One RoomBox and one SmartPlug control your home

 

2 Bedroom Home

3 SmartPlugs and 3 RoomBox control your home perfectly



3 Bedroom Home

4 SmartPlugs and 4 RoomBox control your home perfectly



Tech Details


RoomBox is being developed in New York City. We have been working on RoomBox for a year. We started to work on RoomBox in Tel Aviv and moved to New York for the finish.

With RoomBox, you don't need any hub or wire connections. Just connect RoomBox to your smartphone once, when you set it up, and then it will automatically connect to your WiFi network.

RoomBox uses high-quality sensors. Like occupancy sensor, temperature sensor and connectivity sensors like WiFi, Infra Red, and Bluetooth.

The software is not in your home! We run everything in our servers. This is a great feature for you because we will keep maintaining the software at all times.



FAQ
  1. What is your referral program like?

    2. If you successfully refer 4 friends to pre-order RoomBox and SmartPlug, we will refund the total price of your pre-order if their items are of equivalent value or larger. We will refund your order partially if theirs are of lower value.

  2. Can the SmartPlug work without the RoomBox? 


    Absolutely! Every SmartPlug can be controlled independently with the RoomBox App. Since the SmartPlug doesn't have the occupancy sensor it won't turn off when you leave the room automatically unless there is a RoomBox in the room.

    However, you could set it to turn off when you leave the home (The app knows when you leave the home through GPS), and you can still set timers and events.

  3. When will you ship RoomBox?

    RoomBox is planed to be shipped to the first customers in April 2015.

  4. How many do I need at my house?

    RoomBox functions work different when there is only one at home. Multiple RoomBox will make your home to work better. For example: If there are 3 rooms in your home but you have only 1 RoomBox the system wouldn't know if you are in a different room so it will save less energy.  But Still, you can use RoomBox as a climate control and universal remote.

  5. How many units do you need for a 3 rooms apartment?

    We recommend one RoomBox per room. If you don't have RoomBox's climate control will work slightly less efficient.  

  6. How do I connect my smartphone to RoomBox?

    Simply Connect your smartphone or your computer to the RoomBox with a usb cable and type your home's wifi password. Thats it.

  7. How do I add a remote controlled device to my RoomBox?

    Click on "add device" in the app and choose a brand and a model of your device.

  8. How do I know that RoomBox works with my devices?

    If it has an IR remote, it will work! 

  9. What if I cant find my model on your list?

    Don't worry, it's easy to "record" the buttons of your remote. It takes about a minute.

  10. How do I attach RoomBox to the wall?

    RoomBox is being attached to the wall by a sticker; you take off the cover and stick it on the wall. It is as easy as you read it.

  11. How does RoomBox knows when I am coming back home?

    RoomBox will communicate with your smartphone to get your location.

  12. What is RoomBox battery life?

    RoomBox battery is up to a year. RoomBox works on a  standard  battery. It is easy to find and it's easy to replace it.

  13. What Kind of smartphones do we support?

    We support android and iOS phones. We also support windows 8.

  14. Does SmartPlug support 220V or 110V?

    We will ask for your preferring when the campaign will be over!

  15. What kind of plug does SmartPlug support?

    European, American, Chinese, Korea, Israeli, eveything! We will ask for your preferring when the campaign is over.
