one of them ensured us that the preparation of such instruments and equipment
can be done in up to 14 weeks time.
The second challenge is the
quality control of the
production and the materials. We have taken the necessary steps to ensure that our
manufacturing and supply partners offer the preparation of a molding matrix, initial tests, material
suggestions, excellent quality and compliance with the necessary legislative
requirement for the production of product such as The StereoClip. 
Another challenge is the
size of our order. With larger orders the production cost can be reduced due to
economies of scale. The fact that the product is a single piece will facilitate
the production of additional quantities in short periods of time but will
however delay the production a bit. This delay is taken into consideration
while developing our plan.
In any case we will duly
inform all our backers on the progress of the project and when to expect the
product.

What We Will Use the Funds For?

We need $14,500.00 to
     reach our goal! We will use this money to pay for the tooling, molding, cover the cost of The StereoClip campaign
     perks, and pay for packaging, marketing
     and advertisement of this cool product as well as all the administrative costs
     related with the legislation. You can
     see the planned distribution of funds on the picture below:






Stretch goal: $ 20 000 – We
will add some cool new colors in order to match different lifestyles and
personal desires. They are selected taking into consideration the main colors
of popular accessories – phones, cables, MP3 players, etc. and will be:





Why You Should Back Us?



The StreoClip is really awesome little accessory that you get used to
     with very quickly. Once you start using it you can find new applications
     to this cool clip and never worry again for the bouncing cable or falling
     down earphones. 
As a
     backer, you will naturally get
     exclusive emails about the progress of The StereoClip. We will also give you a behind-the-scenes look at our production process and expected delivery dates. 
You will
     earn yourself a fine perk – The StereoClip itself. Trust
     us, it will change the way you move with
     earphones on. 


Our time plan


FAQ
Does The StereoClip support any type of cable?
Our current design fits almost
all cables of earphones – single, double, round and flat up to 2.5 mm thick. We
are planning special design for thicker cables once we reach our target so stay
tuned!
Does The StereoClip fit on any cloth?
The clip is currently designed
to fit on most of the materials. However it is not suitable for materials
thicker than 4 mm or thin slippery materials as we cannot guarantee it will
hold upside down without falling.
Do the perks include shipping?
Shipping is free only to
Bulgaria. Transport charges for all other countries are calculated automatically
when you add a perk. The couriers and postal services we have contacted promise
delivery within 5 to 20 days for all destinations.
Backers are responsible for
import duties and taxes if any. These are different depending on each country’s
import/export legislation. 
Do you ship worldwide?
Yes we do, see the previous
question.
If there are any changes concerning The StereoClip, we will
communicate these changes to our contributors in a timely manner.

story:
Who Are We?

We are certified Cyber Security professionals with a life-long passion for security and privacy. Our experience in the security field is focused in Ethical Hacking, Penetration Testing, Network Security, Computer Network Defense, and Information Privacy Protection.

We started this project because we believe every person has the right to secure and private computing. You should not have to worry about viruses, spyware, hackers, and government surveillance every time you use a computer or access the web. Our mission is to enable people to practice their right to secure and private computing by providing cost effective and easy-to-use tools. 


As featured on: 


So, What is AnonyStik?

In a nutshell, AnonyStik is a USB stick device that has its own operating system and secure storage volume. You simply plug the device into your computer (PC or Mac) and start it. All of your online activities will be contained within the device, so nothing will affect the computer or laptop hard drive (a computer within a computer basically). 

This is a guaranteed way to protect you against viruses/malware and provide you with online privacy, since nothing is saved or logged by your computer. 

It also has tools that enable you to be online anonymously (masking your IP address) so that no one can monitor your internet traffic and know who you are. 

Most importantly, AnonyStik comes with software and tools that enable you to encrypt and save files that you wish to keep with just a few clicks.

What Are The Advantages That AnonyStik Offers?

How Does It Work?

AnonyStik is very easy and simple to use:

  • If you have a PC that runs Windows or Linux, simply plug in AnonyStik PC edition to the USB port. Press the power button and immediately start tapping the applicable function key to access the boot menu (in most cases that will be F9 or F12). From the boot menu, simply choose the USB drive option and AnonyStik will start within seconds.
  • If you have a Mac, simply plug in AnonyStik Mac edition. Press the power button and immediately press and hold the Option key to access Startup Manager. Choose the USB media device option called EFI and AnonyStik will start within seconds.


How Useful is AnonyStik?

Any Prototypes Yet?

Of course! In fact, not only did we develop prototypes, but we also conducted market testing, where select a few got to try our beta product and provided feedback. We used the feedback we received to make AnonyStik better than ever.

Here are the functional prototypes we have:


Can I See it in Action?



Why Launch a Campaign?

We have taken this project as far as we can using the start-up funds that we have. Now we are asking for your support and help to fund this project and help us finish it. 

Your funding will allow us do the following:

  • Conduct final testing on the device to make sure we solve any bugs or issues. 
  • We intend on producing AnonyStik in house to ensure the integrity and quality of the product, so we need to purchase material, tools, and equipment that are required for producing and building an inventory. 
  • Plan for future features and enhancements.
  • We need your help to promote the product and raise awareness so that together we can help people protect their online security and privacy.

AnonyStik is almost finished. Through your support, we have no doubt that this project will be completed on time. We intend to ship early bird rewards by July 2015. 

For more information about AnonyStik, check out our website at http://anonystik.com

Thanks in advance for all your support!

Cheers!

AnonyStik Team @ Professionally Secure, LLC

Risks and challenges

The biggest challenge we face with AnonyStik is making the device compatible with every PC and Mac in the world, but that's difficult to guarantee. We have conducted a lot of testing on many different computers with different Operating Systems. We have discovered a couple of issues specific to certain computer models and we worked hard until they were no longer an issue. We also intend on doing more testing as we reach our funding goal and we will fix any compatibility issues we discover.

The goal is for AnonyStik to work on computers capable of booting an operating system from a USB device. Some older computers that were manufactured before 2007 are incapable of booting an operating system from a USB device. Also, some older Mac computers that do not have an Intel chips can't boot an operating system from a USB device. AnonyStik will not be able to fully function on these computers and there is unfortunately nothing that we can do.

Cyber security, privacy, and anonymity are ever-changing. Although we can't always anticipate these threats before they are known, we do everything in our power to stay abreast of vulnerabilities that threaten the effectiveness of AnonyStik.

Since shipment of the product will take longer than 30 days after the campaign successfully reaches the goal, PayPal requires us to declare the following: will make a best effort to provide the perk but delivery is not guaranteed. 

Please note that Professionally Secure, LLC absolutely does not condone the use of any of its products for illegal purposes. It is your sole responsibility to use the products within the confines of the law in accordance with local, state, federal, and international laws, policies, and regulations.


FAQ

What is the difference between AnonyStik and other Linux projects (such as Tails)?

This is a great question because this is actually an important point to make.

To start, we would like to say that Tails was, really, the inspiration for this project. We used Tails for years and we had a couple of issues with it: usability and portability. For usability, Tails almost forces you to use the TOR network, can't play flash content, can't be used to download torrents.. etc; for portability, you have to be booted into Tails in order to access your encrypted volume, so you can't access your files from a running Windows or Mac OS X operating systems. With AnonyStik, we basically took most (if not all) the amazing security features that Tails offers and we worked for about 8 months to figure a way to provide these security features while still making the product highly functional, usable, and portable.

So with AnonyStik, if you are going for hardcore privacy and anonymity, the TOR browser is there for you to use. If you just want to keep your browsing private and access flash content, then you can use Chrome or Firefox. If you want to do regular chatting, we have the tool for you; if you want anonymous chatting, a couple of more clicks and you got it. We have torrent download tools, office suite, password management..etc.

What really makes AnonyStik stand out is the fact that you can save files (encrypted if you wish) on the stick drive, plug the same AnonyStik device into a running Windows or Mac OS X operating system, and you will have access to your files (with ability to encrypt or decrypt) straight from the USB device.

In addition to the AnonyStik operating system, the USB device configuration is what makes it highly portable and unique.

So in functionality, usability, and portability AnonyStik outperforms Tails and all other Linux projects

Isn't this just USB stick loaded with a Linux operating system? Can't I just do this at home on my own?

This is actually a misconception. It is a fact that AnonyStik operating system is a customized Linux distribution that has been pre-configured to provide optimal security services. However, the USB device configuration is what makes it highly secure, portable, and unique. 

For example, the USB configuration makes AnonyStik stand out in the fact that you can save files (encrypted if you wish) on the stick drive, plug the same AnonyStik device into a running (keyword is "running") Windows, Linux, or Mac OS X operating system, and you will have access to your files (with ability to encrypt or decrypt). The configuration of the device takes highly specialized and custom tools and skills that make AnonyStik a cross-platform device with both secure OS and storage solutions. Until AnonyStik came along, no bootable USB stick device could provide this cross-platform portability. It took us nearly 8 months to come up with the tools we needed and the proper configuration to make this solution happen. You can't replicate that by simply making a regular bootable USB.

How much capacity does the AnonyStik operating system consume?

The AnonyStik operating system takes up about 1.8 GB from the USB stick capacity. The remainder of the capacity is available storage space for you to save your files.

How can I get two (or more) of the 8, 16, or 32 GB AnonyStik?

In order to get two (or more) simply make another new contribution for additional sticks. If you live outside the United States, make sure to double shipping cost for 16 and 32 GB sticks, when ordering two or more. 

Can I get expedited international shipping (to Canada, Australia, or European Union)? 
Of course you can. All you have to do is pay extra $24 as opposed to $12 for the perk.

story:
Express yourself with your iPhone® 5C and Cover Caps!

Colorful Style

With Cover Cap you can easily tell everyone about your emotions. Cover Caps are little round fillers that fit perfectly in your favorite iPhone® 5c case. Letters, emoticons and plain fillers with endless possibilities. You may choose any color you want.

Share your feelings

Cover Caps is a unique and powerful way of showing your personality and creativity. Compose anything, from: "Want to be my bf", "It is Friday", "My First Phone", "Bad Girl", "Good guy" and share it with the world.


What is in the box?

Cover Caps contains 85 caps:

  • Alphabet Letters;
  • Punctuations: !, ?, ';
  • Emoticons;
  • 10 caps - fillers.

How to use Cover Caps?

Pricing 

The price tag of our Cover Cap will be $17.99 with free shipping. You can pre-order Cover Cap on Indiegogo now for only $12.

Why Indiegogo?

We have a great product, excellent team and enormous desire to succeed. Why did we choose Indiegogo?

To start production we need only $10800 

The funds will be directed in the following way:

  • Order and purchase the tools to make the product
  • Fine tuning of the tools
  • Acquire and set-up the printer
  • Produce first batch of the Cover Caps
  • Design and produce the packaging
  • Putting things together.

We hope that our new product is interesting and will bring some fun into your life!

Cover-Cap team

* iPhone is a registered trademark of Apple Inc.

story:
Lock It Baby – the app that turns your phone or tablet into a kid-friendly, worry-free device

Here’s a familiar scene: one afternoon your child wants to watch Cookie Monster on Netflix. You set it up, turn it on, and hand it to your child. Within five seconds your kid has accidentally stopped the show and burst into tears. You restart the show and return it to your hysterical child – only to have to repeat this cycle another five times! Feeling very frustrated, you start looking for an app to lock your phone while allowing your kids to use a chosen app, like Netflix. Then you see that nothing with amazing ratings shows up. We want to change that.


Video Coming Soon!


Turn your Android phone or tablet into a kid-friendly, worry free device

We want to take the frustration out of that familiar scene. We want to create an app that will let kids use your phone or tablet to play games, watch shows, look at pictures, and more without the tantrums. We want to make an app that lets you pick which app you want to use while locking the rest of the phone. No more accidental exits, no more restarting the movie, and no more screaming.

Unfortunately, there’s no app like this in the Play store. We’ve looked. There are a few lock-screen apps available, but the majority of those are to keep your phone locked – and unusable.  The other apps keep your phone in “kid-mode” but those apps do not lock everything so your kid or you can watch a movie without accidentally touching the screen and/or buttons and turning it off.

We want to make this app available for you and your kids. We want this app to be easy and seamless. We want your kids to be able to watch their movie, play their game, or look in your photo gallery. Furthermore, we want them to do it without the screaming or hassle of “oops!”

How will it work?

After copious research and talks with our development team, we have the plans, designs, and know-how to make Lock It Baby a reality. Our Android app will lock your phone but leave it as usable as you set it to be.  Lock It Baby will make it safe for your child to borrow your phone or tablet. We have drafts of the interface and design of the app, so be sure to look through the designs.

Need to unlock your phone again? No worries. The app can be set to run on a timer, turn off when both the home and power buttons are depressed simultaneously, or be password protected. We’re still working on the exact details of this feature, so be sure to voice your opinion!

Save time and money – while avoiding frustration

You’ll be able to choose an app – like a movie or a game – to keep running once you activate Lock It Baby. Once you start Lock It Baby your phone locks – and only that predetermined app can run.

•  Does your child want to watch a movie? Great! Start up the show and then activate Lock It Baby. The screen will lock and the movie will play. No more worrying about accidental pauses or exits.

•  Does your child want to play a game? Start the game and Lock It, Baby! Your child will be locked into that game. The screen controls will still work, but that’s it.

•  Plans for additional app styles are in the planning stages.

No more frustrated children. No more screaming during car rides to the store, at the restaurant, or during home computer time. Peace and quiet – all thanks to Lock It Baby.

“I need this app! When can I get it?”

We have the designs, the specs, and the development team ready. As soon as our funding is assured, we can get working on the app. We will have it available as soon as we can. All in all, we need to raise $19,500 to make this app a reality, and with your help we can! Pledge today to make Lock It Baby a sure thing. By pledging now, you can guarantee a spot in our Beta. You’ll have access to this life-changing app months before the public can buy it.

 The funding will cover the expenses of coding this app, as this is not a simple app to develop.  It will also cover the cost of the graphic design work it will take to bring this to life, with your input as to how it looks! (Depending on your pledge)

Help us make your life easier with Lock It Baby. Pledge now.


About Us

We’re Ryan Meeks and Damon Selkow.  We’re the brains behind Lock It Baby. We both know what it’s like to have kids and technology interact. We want to make life and technology easier for you and your kids. Help us get Lock It Baby off the ground today!

story:
This is Powerbeam.

 

Powerbeam is a QI-Standard, ultra-thin wireless charger which is fast and extremely reliable. It is made of ABS and PMMA.

Powerbeam has the power to charge both wireless devices and a USB-A port. It uses intelligent charging IC and comes with 3 input ports (Different port input - different charging ability, see table below)
story_txt:
This is Powerbeam. Powerbeam is a QI-Standard, ultra-thin wireless charger which is fast and extremely reliable. It is made of ABS and PMMA.
Powerbeam has the power to charge both wireless devices and a USB-A port. It uses intelligent charging IC and comes with 3 input ports (Different port input - different charging ability, see table below)

story:
When provided to Apple a pattern of the IPhone 7 that caused indignation won concerning absence in users 3.5 connectors under earphones worldwide.
As if you didn't want, at you not to turn out to charge phone during listening of music in earphones.
Our module will correct it.

//Easier and more efficient//

             

The magnetic module will keep your entrance for charging untouched and he will serve you long time.

 

 

 

It isn't necessary to use inconvenient adapters any more.

               

 

 

 

 

Introducing a dual functioning, charge and listening add-on isn’t exactly groundbreaking. However, it’s unique selling points make the most portable, efficient and cost-effective converter on the market. 

 

 

//The minimum wall thickness//

Introduce QuickCube Power Bank

 

The world's most ultra slim power bank with wide compatibility and power capacity for multiple devices charging. With 2 cables and supports all the mainstream high-speed charging standards. Quick Cube allows the 10,000mAh battery provides up to 20V power output with PD fast charging, 30 watts of power of the Type C port gives you the capability to quickly charge your most power-hungry laptops.

 

Power Bank For Apple Fans

 

With 3 Ports, Power Your Apple Devices Meanwhile

Quick Cube could charge your iPhone, iPad and MacBook simultaneously.
It's the best power bank for Apple users.

PD 20V Output for MacBook

Perfectly match MacBook with Type-C port
The power rate of type C can reach up to 30W when charging for an individual device and support Apple laptop, such as Macbook, MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, etc.


 

Fast Charging for iPhone X

Featuring 2A fast charging,
Quick Cube charging is 2 times faster than the Apple original charger.

 

Fast Charging for Android

Quick Cube power bank also supports mostly Android

- QC3.0 Fast Charging
Quick Cube provides very high-quality QC solutions for phones use Qualcomm Snapdragon which can be found in Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi, HTC, Oneplus and etc.

- FCP Fast Charging
Compatible with FCP fast charging technology from Huawei, Quick Cube supports fast charging for Huawei Mate8, Mate9, Mate10, P20, etc.

- AFC Fast Charging
Also supports fast charging for Samsung.
Samsung S8/S9 can be powered 37% within 30 minutes and reach up to 77% 1 hour.

 

Switch Gamer Must Have

Featuring USB C PD technology, QuickCube could provide high-speed charging with 15V 20W output for  Switch. A switch could be 80% charged in just 3 hours under the 15V power output so as to the power is enough for your usage.

 

Product Specification

 

Slim but Powerful
Quick Cube provides up to 20V power output with PD fast charging for a notebook with Type-C Port. Such as:

- MacBook Pro, MacBook, Mac Air.

- ThinkPad

- Lenovo (Including YOGA)

- Xiaomi (13.3inch)

- Other 13.3inch notebooks (Dell XPS Exclusive)

- Microsoft Surface Book 2

- Huawei MateBook


Switching Smoothly between High Power and Micro Current Output
Press On-off Keying twice, the power bank will work in microcurrent charge mode, meanwhile, the power light starts blinking, your Bluetooth headset and smart bracelet can be charged. 
When the charging is finished, please press the On-off Keying one time to withdraw this mode.

 

USB-C & Micro 2 Ports both Support Fast Charging


- PD Self Recharge 
Fabricated with polymer 10,000mAh battery, QuickCube could recharge itself with PD fast charging and get a full load in within 2.5 hours.

- QC3.0 Self Recharge
Quick Cube also can recharge itself with QC3.0 fast charging and get a full capacity within 3 hours.

 

Why Quick Cube So Powerful & Slim

 

Core Technology One
Quick Cube uses premium high-density batteries, 4 times higher than traditional power bank, 30 watts of power of the Type C port gives you the capability to quickly charge your most power hungry laptops. The energy output reaches up to 18W when charging smartphone alone and can charge 3 devices simultaneously.

 

Core Technology Two
Regulating voltage intellectually, Quick Cube allows the 10,000mAh battery provides up to 20V power output with PD fast charging. Quick Cube is the smallest power bank that could power high power laptops.

 

Core Technology Three
Smart Charging Allocation Patent


One Port：
Delivers USB-C Port outputs 30W of charging power, which is enough to charge some USB-C Compatible laptops at their max charging speed.


The USB-A port features 18W of charging power, which is enough to charge Quick Charge compatible smartphones at their max charging speed.


Two Ports Used Simultaneously:
The USB-C port features 20W of charging power
The USB-A port features 10W of charging power

 

Core Technology Four
IML(In Mold Label) finish ensures an exquisite pattern, enhances grip and prevents smudges. The detailed-oriented design and finest materials enhance the way you live with your tech. 
3 Colors available which are the same as the colors of iPhone, Gold, Space Gray and Rose Gold, you can choose your favorite.

 

Multiple Safety Protections

 

Packed inside QuickCube power bank is a comprehensive safety measure, you could charge your devices with QuickCube with no risk, no worry, and no problems.

 

Product Specification

 

Huge output power with only 1,6cm thick to slide easily in your bag. 
We insist to provide a slicker, sleeker and universal power bank solution for our users. You can pop it in a jacket pocket, squeeze into your jeans, or slide it into your laptop sleeve or backpack. This makes it highly portable. It is always there when you need it.

 

Dual Quick Charge Ports Mini PD Adapter


Compact Design For Travel

Quick Cube Charger is a more compact and portable charger powering laptops with USB C ports compare with the official charger of laptops.
In the size of 58x58x28mm, and ultra light (100g), QuickCube Charger is a small but powerful adapter that boosts power supply for all your devices from laptop to mobile and more. It is the best choice for your travel or outdoor activity.

 

It's the best choice for apple users to buy another adapter for the apple devices

Quick Cube charger could charge any of your devices with Type C charging port, including, MacBook Pro, MacBook, MacBook Air.


Delivers USB-C Port outputs 20V 30W of charging power, which is enough to charge some USB-C Compatible laptops at their max charging speed.

 

Two Quick Charge Ports for iPhone

For iPhone, the USB-A port features 5V 2.4A of charging power and it is 2 times faster than the original one.


Supporting PD fast charging for iPhone, the charging speed is 3.6 times of original charger with the original USB-C cable.

 

Smart Charging Allocation

Different devices have different charge requirement. With our patented intelligent charging allocation technology, QuickCube would deliver optimized charge current for your various devices. Charge Android & Apple simultaneously with the USB-A and USB-C port. QuickCube is the world‘s first mini charger that supports PD（20V）and QC fast charging simultaneously.

Fast Charging for Android

- QC3.0 Fast Charging
Quick Cube provides very high-quality QC solutions for phones use Qualcomm Snapdragon which can be found in Samsung Galaxy, Xiaomi, HTC, Oneplus and etc.

- FCP Fast Charging
Compatible with FCP fast charging technology from Huawei, Quick Cube supports fast charging for Huawei Mate8, Mate9, Mate10, P20, etc.

- AFC Fast Charging
Also supports fast charging for Samsung.
Samsung S8/S9 can be powered 37% within 30 minutes and reach up to 77% 1 hour.

Featuring USB C PD technology

QuickCube could provide high-speed charging with 15V 20W output for  Switch. Switch could be 80% charged in just 3 hours under the 15V power output so as to the power is enough for your usage.

 

Product Features

 

Mini but Powerful

Quick Cube provides up to 20V power output with PD fast charging for the notebook with Type-C Port. Such as:

  • MacBook Pro, MacBook, Mac Air.
  • ThinkPad
  • Lenovo (Including YOGA)
  • Xiaomi (13.3inch)
  • Other 13.3inch notebooks 
  • Microsoft Surface Book 2
  • Huawei MacBook

     

    Multiple Safety Protections

    QuickCube Charger not only simplifies your charging process but also protects the battery life of your devices and you with multiple safety protections.

     

    Fast Charging For All Devices

    Supports all the mainstream high-speed charging standards currently on the market, including QC PD FCP AFC MTK PE Apple 2.4A BC1.2.

     

    Timeline


     

    Product Design & Our Team

     

    We have a professional team and have experienced substantial growth that has been generated by having a strong market knowledge that is reflected in offering a vast scope in innovative design and product differentiation. Our primary market focus is in products that range from power bank, PD adapter, and other digital products.




    ​

story:
FAQ

  • For updates, follow us at twitter @m8tec or G+ (https://plus.google.com/b/111903220328469091938/)
  • All the perks include CERTIFIED shipping costs
  • COLOUR WILL BE SELECTABLE AFTER THE CAMPAIGN. WE WILL CONTACT YOU TO ASK THE COLOUR.
  • Transparent case will be an option
 
Hi there,


My name is Fernando and I am talking to you in behalf of M8TEC LTD. It is a company just created by some friends and me with the focus on activities related with the Raspberry Pi: http://www.raspberrypi.org/

We are currently developing ideas for the Raspi that we will let you know in future, but I am here right now to talk you about our first project, a case.

As some of you already know designing a case ready for mass production at a low cost is tricky. Luck for us one of the M8TEC guys is a 3D artist with years of experience in design this kind of models.

The material used will be plastic ABS and the production system will be plastic injection. If you don’t know what is it think on any object of plastic in your life. Playstation 3 controllers, TV controller, etc.

We are already produced a prototype with a 3D printer to make sure that everything is right. The prototype is this:

 

Because this adventure won’t be possible without the Raspi, we are going to share a percentage of the cash we get with the Raspberry foundation.

Thank you and kind regards.
Fernando Manso.

story:
Hello all. Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Henry González, an electronic engineer by profession, born in Venezuela and currently living in Chicago, IL.  I came to this country to develop several of my ideas, since I also enjoy inventing. A few months ago I obtained my first patent, which is for the project I present here.

The invention is called "SWITCH AUDIO PC 5.1" and it is a switch that allows two or more computers to be connected to the same audio system, and to select which computer will be heard at any given time. So, for example, if you have a computer for general use and another for gaming, you will not need an audio system for each, nor will it be necessary to disconnect the speakers from one to connect the other, since both are connected to the SWITCH AUDIO PC 5.1. At the touch of a button you can select the computer you want to hear in the 6 speakers making up the 5.1 system.


In this stage, contributors will help me develop a physical model we will call "Prototype B," which will be the basis for the next stage, which is mass production.

I currently have a prototype I built myself. I used it for three years in my country, before I came here, and it has never malfunctioned on me. In the photo you can see it is totally homemade, analog and rudimentary. I call it "Prototype A." If I am successful in reaching my estimated target, the funds will allow me to take this rudimentary, analog and homemade "Prototype A" to being a good looking, sleek, digital "Prototype B." According to my estimates, these funds will completely cover the phases in the development stage, which are: Research, Sketching Concepts, 3D CAD, Technical Specs, Prototype, Patent Drawings & Text, Sourcing and Agreement. Each of these phases has its own cost, and they add up to the amount I hope to raise. So, the funds I raise in this campaign will be used to complete this initial objective. If I do not reach my target, I will complete as much as the funds allow me to do, and if instead I raise more than planned, the additional funds will be used to build the first units.



Since I started using "Prototype A," I have asked many people: "How many computers do you have at home?" The answers I have received, along with posts I have read on online forums dealing with the same question, have surprised me, leading me to the conclusion that despite increasingly prevalent new technologies such as smartphones and tablets, PCs are an essential tool in our lives, so much so that it is now common to see two or more in every home and even for a single user. A statistic published by Intel towards the end of 2014 caught my attention: there are more than 700 million PC gamers in the world. I know from experience that a PC assembled or purchased with the latest technology for gaming is really used just for gaming. So, in most cases, another, less powerful PC is needed for general day-to-day use, and for mothers to google recipes and sisters to listen to Justin Bieber while doing their homework.

Also, despite advances in wireless technology, as of right now there is nothing on the market that can transmit an audio signal to the six speakers that make up a 5.1 system. The technology that consumers are most familiar with and that manufacturers generally use is Bluetooth, which only supports two channels. Some of these manufacturers offer 5.1 wireless systems for PCs, but they just use sound effects to produce what they call virtual 5.1 sound, which isn't the real thing. To sum up my experience with this, I can say that people who use their computers to enjoy the excellent 5.1 sound of a movie or song, or to get into a game where you need to hear what's happening next to you or behind you, use real 5.1 systems, consisting of a center speaker, two front side speakers, two rear speakers and a subwoofer. These speakers are arranged to create true surround sound and they are connected to the PC through connectors and cables, and not wirelessly. 

           


The above reasons have inspired me to do this project, to bring the SWITCH AUDIO PC to all those users who have or need to use two or more computers and who enjoy the excellent sound that a real 5.1 system can offer.

I invite you to participate in this new project, and I invite you to do so now, before the product is created. You will have the unique advantage of being part of its creation; you will receive information about the process; you will be kept informed of the steps and objectives achieved; and you will have the opportunity to be part of the team, where your opinion in terms of design, colors, size, shape, etc., will be very important and will be taken into account. You will also have access to one-time special offers for this first stage of development, since all the respective discounts will be calculated on the factory price and not the retail price.


If you have any questions, concerns, suggestions, advice, ridicule or anything at all you would like to say, you can contact me whenever you'd like. Your opinion is very important to me.  I should mention that I do not speak English fluently, but I read and write sufficiently well to communicate. I also use translation tools to help when the need arises, and so communicating will not be a problem; far from it, actually – it will help me in my learning process.

TIMELINE

 Thank you very much for visiting my campaign. Continued success to you, and have a great day.

                                                 

Henry Gonzalez

henryzalez@gmail.com

https://www.facebook.com/sapc51

https://www.facebook.com/henryzalez

https://twitter.com/henryzalez


                                                                 


Hola a todos, permítanme presentarme, mi nombre es Henry González, de profesión  Ingeniero Electrónico, nací en Venezuela  y vivo actualmente en Chicago, IL, USA.  Me vine a este país para desarrollar algunas ideas que tengo en mente, ya que también me gusta inventar cosas, hace unos meses obtuve mi primera patente y se trata del proyecto que aquí les presento.

El invento lleva por nombre “SWITCH AUDIO PC 5.1” y se trata de un switch que permite tener dos o más computadoras conectadas a un mismo sistema de audio y seleccionar que computadora  emitirá el sonido en determinado momento,  de esta forma si se tiene por ejemplo, un computador de usos generales  y otra para juegos, no será necesario tener un sistema de audio para cada uno, como tampoco será necesario desconectar los altavoces de uno para conectar el otro cada vez que lo requiera, al estar todas conectadas al SWITCH AUDIO PC 5.1  con solo oprimir un botón se podrá seleccionar la computadora que queremos escuchar en los 6 altavoces que componen el sistema 5.1.

Esta campaña es de vital importancia para mí porque estoy dando a conocer mi invento al mundo, y al ser el primero tiene un mayor significado. Con esta campaña busco medir el nivel de aceptación y recaudar fondos para una etapa inicial la cual llamo etapa de desarrollo.

En esta etapa los contribuyentes me ayudaran a desarrollar un modelo físico que llamaremos “Prototipo B”, el cuál será la base para la siguiente etapa de fabricación en serie.

Actualmente tengo un prototipo que hice yo mismo, lo usé en mi país antes de venirme durante tres años y nunca presentó falla alguna, en la foto se puede ver que es totalmente hecho en casa, análogo y rudimentario, lo llamo “Prototipo A”. Si logro alcanzar  la meta estimada esos fondos me permitirán llevar ese rudimentario, análogo y hecho en casa “Prototipo A” a un bonito, estilizado y digital “Prototipo B”, según el estimado que tengo, con ese monto cubriré cada una de las fases de la etapa de desarrollo las cuales son: Research, Sketching Concepts, 3D CAD, Technical Specs, Prototype, Patent Drawings & Text, Sourcing and Agreement, cada una de ellas tiene un costo por separado y juntos suman el monto que espero recaudar, así que todo lo que logre obtener en esta campaña será destinado a cumplir este objetivo inicial, de no llegar a la meta avanzaré hasta donde los fondos me permitan y si por el contrario logro recaudar más de lo estipulado será destinado a la fabricación de las primeras unidades.

Desde que comencé a usar el “Prototipo A”, he preguntado a mucha gente ¿Cuántas computadoras tienes en casa?, las respuestas las he comparado con foros online de personas que han tenido la misma inquietud, los resultados me han asombrado y me llevan a la conclusión que, pese al incremento de nuevas tecnologías como los Smartphones y tablets, las computadoras son una herramienta primordial en nuestra vida, tanto así que ya es normal ver dos o más en cada hogar e incluso para un mismo usuario. Algo que llamo mucho mi atención fue una estadística que publico Intel  a finales del 2014  donde aseguran que existen más de 700 millones de PC gamers en el mundo y sé por experiencia que al ensamblar o comprar una PC con lo último en tecnología para jugar, es solo para eso, para jugar; por lo que en la mayoría de los casos se requiere de otra PC de menores prestaciones para las funciones más cotidianas, donde también mamá busca la receta de cocina y la hermanita oye a Justin Bieber mientras hace su tarea.

Por otra parte, y pese al avance de la tecnología inalámbrica, no existe hasta la fecha ninguna que pueda trasmitir una señal de audio a los seis altavoces que componen un sistema 5.1. La más conocida y empleada por muchos fabricantes es la tecnología Bluetooth y esta soporta solo dos canales. Algunos de estos fabricantes ofrecen sistemas 5.1 inalámbricos para las PC, pero son solo efectos sonoros con el cual dicen conseguir un sonido 5.1 virtual, nada que ver con la realidad. De esto último puedo resumir  que las personas que usan sus computadoras para disfrutar del excelente sonido 5.1 de una película, pieza musical o introducirse en un juego donde se necesita oír que hay detrás o a los lados; usan altavoces 5.1 reales compuestos por un altavoz frontal, dos laterales, dos traseros y el subwoofer; todos dispuestos de tal forma que crean un verdadero sonido envolvente y estos se conectan a las PC mediante conectores y cables, y no de forma inalámbrica.

Todo lo anterior me impulsan a llevar a cabo este proyecto con el propósito de poner al SWITCH AUDIO PC  al alcance de todos estos usuarios que tienen o necesitan usar dos computadores o más, y a la vez disfrutan del excelente sonido que un sistema 5.1 real puede ofrecer.

Te invito a que participes en este nuevo proyecto, y te invito desde ya, desde antes de su nacimiento. Tendrás la ventaja única de ser parte de su creación, vas a recibir información del proceso, vas a estar al tanto de los pasos y objetivos  logrados; y  podrás ser parte del equipo de trabajo donde tu opinión en cuanto al diseño, colores, tamaño, forma, etc., será muy importante y tomada en cuenta. Además podrás tener ofertas únicas solo para esta primera etapa de desarrollo, ya que todos los descuentos serán calculados sobre el precio de fábrica y no sobre el precio de venta que tendrá luego.

Cualquier duda, pregunta, sugerencia, consejo, burla o lo que desee expresar, me pueden contactar cuando gusten, su opinión será de mucha importancia para mí.  Debo aclarar que todavía no habló ingles con fluidez, pero si leo y escribo lo suficiente para comunicarme, también las herramientas de traducción me ayudan en determinado momento, por lo que no será problema mantenernos en contacto,  todo lo contrario me va a ayudar en el proceso de aprendizaje.

 Muchas gracias por visitar mi campaña, mucho éxito y que tenga un excelente día.
story_txt:
Hello all. Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Henry
González, an electronic engineer by profession, born in Venezuela and currently
living in Chicago, IL.  I came to this
country to develop several of my ideas, since I also enjoy inventing. A few months
ago I obtained my first patent, which is for the project I present here.
The invention is called "SWITCH AUDIO PC 5.1" and
it is a switch that allows two or more computers to be connected to the same
audio system, and to select which computer will be heard at any given time. So,
for example, if you have a computer for general use and another for gaming, you
will not need an audio system for each, nor will it be necessary to disconnect
the speakers from one to connect the other, since both are connected to the
SWITCH AUDIO PC 5.1. At the touch of a button you can select the computer you
want to hear in the 6 speakers making up the 5.1 system.

In this stage, contributors will help me develop a physical
model we will call "Prototype B," which will be the basis for the
next stage, which is mass production.
I currently have a prototype I built myself. I used it for
three years in my country, before I came here, and it has never malfunctioned
on me. In the photo you can see it is totally homemade, analog and rudimentary.
I call it "Prototype A." If I am successful in reaching my estimated
target, the funds will allow me to take this rudimentary, analog and homemade
"Prototype A" to being a good looking, sleek, digital "Prototype
B." According to my estimates, these funds will completely cover the
phases in the development stage, which are: Research, Sketching Concepts, 3D
CAD, Technical Specs, Prototype, Patent Drawings & Text, Sourcing and
Agreement. Each of these phases has its own cost, and they add up to the amount
I hope to raise. So, the funds I raise in this campaign will be used to
complete this initial objective. If I do not reach my target, I will complete
as much as the funds allow me to do, and if instead I raise more than planned,
the additional funds will be used to build the first units.
Since I started using "Prototype A," I have asked
many people: "How many computers do you have at home?" The answers I
have received, along with posts I have read on online forums dealing with the
same question, have surprised me, leading me to the conclusion that despite increasingly
prevalent new technologies such as smartphones and tablets, PCs are an
essential tool in our lives, so much so that it is now common to see two or
more in every home and even for a single user. A statistic published by Intel
towards the end of 2014 caught my attention: there are more than 700 million PC
gamers in the world. I know from experience that a PC assembled or purchased
with the latest technology for gaming is really used just for gaming. So, in
most cases, another, less powerful PC is needed for general day-to-day use, and
for mothers to google recipes and sisters to listen to Justin Bieber while
doing their homework. 
Also, despite advances in wireless technology, as of right
now there is nothing on the market that can transmit an audio signal to the six
speakers that make up a 5.1 system. The technology that consumers are most
familiar with and that manufacturers generally use is Bluetooth, which only
supports two channels. Some of these manufacturers offer 5.1 wireless systems
for PCs, but they just use sound effects to produce what they call virtual 5.1 sound,
which isn't the real thing. To sum up my experience with this, I can say that
people who use their computers to enjoy the excellent 5.1 sound of a movie or song,
or to get into a game where you need to hear what's happening next to you or
behind you, use real 5.1 systems, consisting of a center speaker, two front
side speakers, two rear speakers and a subwoofer. These speakers are arranged
to create true surround sound and they are connected to the PC through
connectors and cables, and not wirelessly.             
The above reasons have inspired me to do this project, to
bring the SWITCH AUDIO PC to all those users who have or need to use two or
more computers and who enjoy the excellent sound that a real 5.1 system can
offer.
I invite you to participate in this new project, and I
invite you to do so now, before the product is created. You will have the
unique advantage of being part of its creation; you will receive information
about the process; you will be kept informed of the steps and objectives
achieved; and you will have the opportunity to be part of the team, where your
opinion in terms of design, colors, size, shape, etc., will be very important
and will be taken into account. You will also have access to one-time special
offers for this first stage of development, since all the respective discounts
will be calculated on the factory price and not the retail price.
If you have any questions, concerns, suggestions, advice,
ridicule or anything at all you would like to say, you can contact me whenever
you'd like. Your opinion is very important to me.  I should mention that I do not speak English
fluently, but I read and write sufficiently well to communicate. I also use
translation tools to help when the need arises, and so communicating will not
be a problem; far from it, actually – it will help me in my learning process.TIMELINE
 Thank you very much
for visiting my campaign. Continued success to you, and have a great day.                                                 Henry Gonzalezhenryzalez@gmail.comhttps://www.facebook.com/sapc51https://www.facebook.com/henryzalezhttps://twitter.com/henryzalez                                                                 

Hola a todos, permítanme presentarme, mi nombre es Henry González, de
profesión  Ingeniero Electrónico, nací en
Venezuela  y vivo actualmente en Chicago,
IL, USA.  Me vine a este país para
desarrollar algunas ideas que tengo en mente, ya que también me gusta inventar
cosas, hace unos meses obtuve mi primera patente y se trata del proyecto que
aquí les presento.
El invento lleva por nombre “SWITCH AUDIO PC 5.1” y se trata de un switch
que permite tener dos o más computadoras conectadas a un mismo sistema de audio
y seleccionar que computadora  emitirá el
sonido en determinado momento,  de esta
forma si se tiene por ejemplo, un computador de usos generales  y otra para juegos, no será necesario tener
un sistema de audio para cada uno, como tampoco será necesario desconectar los
altavoces de uno para conectar el otro cada vez que lo requiera, al estar todas
conectadas al SWITCH AUDIO PC 5.1  con
solo oprimir un botón se podrá seleccionar la computadora que queremos escuchar
en los 6 altavoces que componen el sistema 5.1.
Esta campaña es de vital importancia para mí porque estoy dando a conocer
mi invento al mundo, y al ser el primero tiene un mayor significado. Con esta
campaña busco medir el nivel de aceptación y recaudar fondos para una etapa
inicial la cual llamo etapa de desarrollo. 
En esta etapa los contribuyentes me ayudaran a desarrollar un modelo físico
que llamaremos “Prototipo B”, el cuál será la base para la siguiente etapa de
fabricación en serie.
Actualmente tengo un prototipo que hice yo mismo, lo usé en mi país antes
de venirme durante tres años y nunca presentó falla alguna, en la foto se puede
ver que es totalmente hecho en casa, análogo y rudimentario, lo llamo
“Prototipo A”. Si logro alcanzar  la meta
estimada esos fondos me permitirán llevar ese rudimentario, análogo y hecho en
casa “Prototipo A” a un bonito, estilizado y digital “Prototipo B”, según el
estimado que tengo, con ese monto cubriré cada una de las fases de la etapa de
desarrollo las cuales son: Research, Sketching Concepts, 3D CAD, Technical
Specs, Prototype, Patent Drawings & Text, Sourcing and Agreement, cada una
de ellas tiene un costo por separado y juntos suman el monto que espero
recaudar, así que todo lo que logre obtener en esta campaña será destinado a
cumplir este objetivo inicial, de no llegar a la meta avanzaré hasta donde los
fondos me permitan y si por el contrario logro recaudar más de lo estipulado
será destinado a la fabricación de las primeras unidades.
Desde que comencé a usar el “Prototipo A”, he preguntado a mucha gente
¿Cuántas computadoras tienes en casa?, las respuestas las he comparado con
foros online de personas que han tenido la misma inquietud, los resultados me
han asombrado y me llevan a la conclusión que, pese al incremento de nuevas
tecnologías como los Smartphones y tablets, las computadoras son una
herramienta primordial en nuestra vida, tanto así que ya es normal ver dos o
más en cada hogar e incluso para un mismo usuario. Algo que llamo mucho mi
atención fue una estadística que publico Intel 
a finales del 2014  donde aseguran
que existen más de 700 millones de PC gamers en el mundo y sé por experiencia
que al ensamblar o comprar una PC con lo último en tecnología para jugar, es
solo para eso, para jugar; por lo que en la mayoría de los casos se requiere de
otra PC de menores prestaciones para las funciones más cotidianas, donde
también mamá busca la receta de cocina y la hermanita oye a Justin Bieber
mientras hace su tarea. 
Por otra parte, y pese al avance de la tecnología inalámbrica, no existe hasta
la fecha ninguna que pueda trasmitir una señal de audio a los seis altavoces
que componen un sistema 5.1. La más conocida y empleada por muchos fabricantes
es la tecnología Bluetooth y esta soporta solo dos canales. Algunos de estos
fabricantes ofrecen sistemas 5.1 inalámbricos para las PC, pero son solo
efectos sonoros con el cual dicen conseguir un sonido 5.1 virtual, nada que ver
con la realidad. De esto último puedo resumir 
que las personas que usan sus computadoras para disfrutar del excelente
sonido 5.1 de una película, pieza musical o introducirse en un juego donde se
necesita oír que hay detrás o a los lados; usan altavoces 5.1 reales compuestos
por un altavoz frontal, dos laterales, dos traseros y el subwoofer; todos
dispuestos de tal forma que crean un verdadero sonido envolvente y estos se
conectan a las PC mediante conectores y cables, y no de forma inalámbrica. 
Todo lo anterior
me impulsan a llevar a cabo este proyecto con el propósito de poner al SWITCH
AUDIO PC  al alcance de todos estos
usuarios que tienen o necesitan usar dos computadores o más, y a la vez
disfrutan del excelente sonido que un sistema 5.1 real puede ofrecer.
Te invito a que
participes en este nuevo proyecto, y te invito desde ya, desde antes de su
nacimiento. Tendrás la ventaja única de ser parte de su creación, vas a recibir
información del proceso, vas a estar al tanto de los pasos y objetivos  logrados; y 
podrás ser parte del equipo de trabajo donde tu opinión en cuanto al
diseño, colores, tamaño, forma, etc., será muy importante y tomada en cuenta. Además
podrás tener ofertas únicas solo para esta primera etapa de desarrollo, ya que
todos los descuentos serán calculados sobre el precio de fábrica y no sobre el
precio de venta que tendrá luego.
Cualquier duda,
pregunta, sugerencia, consejo, burla o lo que desee expresar, me pueden
contactar cuando gusten, su opinión será de mucha importancia para mí.  Debo aclarar que todavía no habló ingles con
fluidez, pero si leo y escribo lo suficiente para comunicarme, también las
herramientas de traducción me ayudan en determinado momento, por lo que no será
problema mantenernos en contacto,  todo
lo contrario me va a ayudar en el proceso de aprendizaje.
 Muchas gracias por visitar mi campaña, mucho
éxito y que tenga un excelente día.

story:
Update:

08/05/2013 - WeeWee prototype is out!

WeeWee Proto Site

Username: wwf
Password: weewee

What is WeeWeeFree?

WeeWeeFree is a restroom app for iPhone (android will be available in December) that lists free nearby restrooms in major US metropolitan areas (starts from New York City).  WeeWeeFree uses the current location of your mobile device to determine which restrooms are closest to you. WeeWeeFree also includes entertaining features such as jokes and games to read or play.

Why am I doing this?

After I graduated last year, I began searching for an opportunity to apply my hard earned computer science degree to real life, so I decided to stay home and watch TV for the next six months.….

After five months of being a couch potato and having gained 40 pounds, I came across a story on local news, (Read Here) : a 2-Year-Old was fined 50 dollars for public urination. I was furious, went straight to zen-it-off in my toilet bowl, and there it was, my light bulb moment: After hours of Googling and Binging around, public restrooms websites are freaking everywhere (results from binging are actually better! huh, how bout that). They are all very useful, but with one common problem, they look mad BORING….

The big question was, how to make peeing and doo-dooing more interesting? 

Light bulb moment numero dos: how about something funny to read instead of crying about why my roommate is such an @$$#*&~% (means Angel in high Valyrian)…

Here comes the glorious and majestic light bulb numero tres: ….Build the dang App …Duhh… 

What is different about WeeWeeFree?

Not a one way street: It is open to all users to rate the quality of restrooms with non-conventional rating system.

Restroom direction
Filtering options

WeeWee Drop rating:

  • 1 drop: I would rather hold it and take my business somewhere else 
  • 2 drop: Quick in and out.
  • 3 drop: Pretty clean and gets the job done.
  • 4 drop: Feel like home with birds chirping.
  • 5 drop: I would come back with a Jane Austen book!

Not a one-trick pony: WeeWee app has daily jokes and games to pass time while doing your business.

Essentially, we are building something that is FUN and useful!!

WeeWee games
Funnies

Stretch goal. 

>$50,000. WeeWee app to all American military troops’ families. We hope our app can bring some joy to their loved ones. Thank you for your service to this great nation.

>$100,000. Above and free App for all children under 12.

>$200,000. All the above and App will be free to the public for one year!

Rewards: 

Everyone who pledges $25 or more will get a WeeWee tote bag. $50 or more will get WeeWee shirt and tote bag! (See pledge section for more detail).

WeeWee bag
WeeWee shirt

Where does the money go?

  • Enhance the user interface.
  • Search more restrooms throughout the US.
  • Hire database administrators for better DB optimization and performance.
  • Collect more jokes for users to read.
  • Team up with cellphone game developers. 

Project Timeline:

July:

  • Website prototype.
  • Database schema.
  • Alpha testing.

August: 

  • Collect public and retail restrooms data.
  • Beta testing website.
  • Blueprint for mobile app. (IOS and android).
  • Alpha test for mobile app.

September: 

  • Our fulfillment to backers!
  • Pilot test and official launch of the WeeWee site.
  • Beta test for mobile app.
  • Collect more jokes. 

October:

  • Official launch of WeeWee App (iphone)!
  • Blueprint for WeeWee mobile games.

November: 

  • Alpha and beta test WeeWee games.

December:

  • Pilot test WeeWee games.
  • official launch for android phone.
 
 

Where are we at right now?

  • Completed website blueprint.
  • Frontend: layout (CSS and HTML), ~80% done. 
  • Backend: database schema complete, but have not yet optimized.

Notes:

[1] *Picnic @ central park:

Artisanal Cheese plate – Raclette, Gouda, Jarlsberg, Comte, served with quince paste and French baguette.

Fruit appetizer – California golden grapes, sliced apples, and strawberries.

Small plate - Prosciutto de Parma, Spanish speck ham and smoke salmon.

Gourmet salad – Romaine lettuce, Red butter lettuce, baby spinach, and sundried tomato with homemade oregano balsamic vinaigrette.

Buon appetito!!!

[2] *Corporate sponsorship:

A external company profile page will be attach to restrooms at the "by this user" section.

Random generator is used to determined which restrooms will be attached to the "by this user" section. it will be attach to 5 percent of the restrooms that are specifically searched by WeeWeeFree.

[3]*WeeWee Games:

WeeWee games are scheduled to be released by early 2014, it depends on the funding we received. We will try our best to make it available ASAP.

story:
Introducing prch

A MODERN SHADE STAND + MORE

Greetings Crowdfunders,

We're JETPAK and it's finally time to launch our prch to the masses.

We've all got some killer glasses, yet we carelessly toss them on the counter or by our desks without even thinking about it. It's funny how we've all become accustomed to modern desktop organizers for items like pens and paperclips. Yet, to date - nothing has ever addressed the pair of shades pushed back on your head or hanging from your v-neck.

These shades really need a home...so we designed one for them. Taking cues from minimalist design best practices and an appreciation for flowing curves and clean lines - the prch came to life right here in Columbus, Ohio.

 
A core objective for this stand was that it had to look sexy with or without glasses and other accessories.  

FLEXIBILITY + FUNCTIONALITY

Not only was the prch custom designed and purpose-built to hold classic glasses styles like Wayfarers - the flowing design also accommodates other digital lifestyle essentials.

By attaching an easily removable adhesive tab on the base, the prch is perfect for organizing earbuds and cradling iPhones and the like.

THE TEAM BEHIND THE PRODUCT

JETPAK was founded by Christian Deuber and Brian Schmitt as a product incubator of sorts.

JETPAK is a collaborative network of experts with an emphasis on 3 core disciplines: Industrial Design + Graphic Design + Public Relations. Beyond day jobs at world-class design firms and final years at local design schools - JETPAK caters to authentic design fans and "makers" with a soul.

PLEDGES

To move beyond our 3D printed prototypes, we are looking to raise money here to start a small batch production run using injection molded plastic and a local manufacturer here in Columbus - not China. With a simple price tag of $20 a pop, we will be able to deliver an authentic modern product with an extremely functional purpose and style for days.

To nail our final prototype measurements, we tested hundreds of glasses and settled on catering to the most classic design (Wayfarer style) for our first product. Please note that extremely small, excessively large or massively heavy glasses will not be ideal for this stand.

 

LIMITED EDITION ART PRINTS & STICKERS

For design community supporters that aren't into this particular product, but want to show their support - our designers have come up with some inspired, limited edition prints and sticker sets for a small pledge. This is just a little sneak peek below.

SHARE

If you dig what we've set out to do with JETPAK - please share this link with your friends and social networks. We will be indebted to you forever...and when you die, on your deathbed, you will receive total consciousness- so you've got that going for you.

story:
EZ Grade is a mobile card grader that fits in your pocket. It's a great tool to have to “pre grade” your cards, or if you are looking for the perfect set of cards to send in. The app will give scores and evaluate the corners and centering on each card and determine the potential value of a card within seconds. EZ Grade connects right to your camera and you can scan a card and get a report. It’s that simple! 

 

ISSUE: Let's say you open a hobby box of football cards and say you get two Tom Brady rookie cards. You line them up side by side and see the two cards don't line up 1:1. One is a little to the left and the other is a little to the right. How will you determine which card is more centered? 

WE HAVE THE SOLUTION: In comes EzGrade, its digitalized centering and corner analysis will help determine which cards are in the best condition and help you slim down your option when deciding which cards to send in to get graded to Beckett (BGS) and PSA. 

 

 

 

Well first off, grading is not cheap, at Beckett it costs 25$ to grade one card at a 30 day service level, and that 25$ does not include shipping both ways and insurance. Additionally PSA and Beckett currently have huge back ups and cards can take months to get graded at the lowest service level.

Rather than having to send in all 10 cards and just praying for them to be in good condition it would have more of a process behind choosing which cards to send in to get graded. 

EzGrade will allow you to decide which cards to send in and rather than take a risk and send all your cards you can only send the ones that score closer to mint on our app. EzGrade will allow for more of a process behind choosing which cards to send in to get graded, rather than just sending every card you have, including duplicates. EzGrade will be able to tell you if a card is off centered or any other discrepancies, Just one scan and it will already be paying for itself, since it costs 25$ to get a card graded.

 

 

When you have so many cards, and don’t know which are going to turn out the best when graded we can easily help. Just scan your cards, then you can see what cards are worth it to grade without the financial risk.We are offering a preliminarily way to determine which cards we have are the most valuable based on their centering and corners.  We will help answer that question, is it really worth it to grade?

 

 

 

We are two brothers who have always been card collectors. We actively send in our cards to get graded by Beckett often just to get disappointed once they come back scoring a 8/9 on centering, wishing we had just saved our 25$ and not sent that card in. We are both dedicated to bringing the only pure-play Mobile Card Grading app to people's pockets. We are set on helping the world’s sports card collections, making it easier to determine if cards are worth it to grade, and helping others save money.

 

We are fully committed to following our timeline, and see no upcoming issues with completing it as of right now. COVID-19 has had no effect on our app development teams we have lined up currently. We are fully committed to updating our backers with every new development working through them.  

We cannot promise that what EZ Grade says about the card's condition will match what PSA or Beckett may deem it as. Funding will be used to help in the app development & design process. We would greatly appreciate it if you could help back us or even just pass on our information to friends & fellow sport card collectors. 

 

 All the perks that we are offering in this campaign will be one time offers and never offered again, so get them while you can! Once our campaign is over we will only be offering one code for a 3 month subscription for $25. If you purchase a perk involving a key you will be grandfathered in at the rate you purchased it for. Perks involving keys will be distributed once the app is finished.
story_txt: EZ Grade is a mobile card grader that fits in your pocket. It's a great tool to have to “pre grade” your cards, or if you are looking for the perfect set of cards to send in. The app will give scores and evaluate the corners and centering on each card and determine the potential value of a card within seconds. EZ Grade connects right to your camera and you can scan a card and get a report. It’s that simple!  ISSUE: Let's say you open a hobby box of football cards and say you get two Tom Brady rookie cards. You line them up side by side and see the two cards don't line up 1:1. One is a little to the left and the other is a little to the right. How will you determine which card is more centered? WE HAVE THE SOLUTION: In comes EzGrade, its digitalized centering and corner analysis will help determine which cards are in the best condition and help you slim down your option when deciding which cards to send in to get graded to Beckett (BGS) and PSA.    Well first off, grading is not cheap, at Beckett it costs 25$ to grade one card at a 30 day service level, and that 25$ does not include shipping both ways and insurance. Additionally PSA and Beckett currently have huge back ups and cards can take months to get graded at the lowest service level.Rather than having to send in all 10 cards and just praying for them to be in good condition it would have more of a process behind choosing which cards to send in to get graded. EzGrade will allow you to decide which cards to send in and rather than take a risk and send all your cards you can only send the ones that score closer to mint on our app. EzGrade will allow for more of a process behind choosing which cards to send in to get graded, rather than just sending every card you have, including duplicates. story:
Short Summary

Hi. I'm Nick, and I'm the guy at Geppetto Electronics. I build little electronic things to solve problems. The big issue is that sometimes I come up with things that I think have a wide applicability, but it's too costly to build a bunch of widgets up front, where scale can result in greater efficiency.

The problem at hand is the Raspberry Pi power problem. The Raspberry Pi comes with a surface-mount micro-USB socket. You're supposed to connect up a high amperage 5 volt supply to that. There are a variety of problems with this. Among them, the surface mount connector is relatively weak. It's also fiddly (can't rotate the plug), and good quality, high current USB supplies are not always easy to come by (by contrast, crappy ones are common).

Pi Power is a switching DC-DC converter that will accept any DC input voltage from 6 to 15 volts and convert it to up to 2 amps at 5 volts. It connects to the Raspberry Pi's GPIO connector, and comes with a stacking header so you can "piggyback" other things (and power them) as well.

Pi Power works with all current models of Raspberry Pis. On the model B units, you can make use of the extra power for USB peripherals. On model A units, to use high powered USB peripherals you still need to either modify your Pi or use a powered hub. On B+ models with the 40 pin GPIO header, you can add a 14 pin stacking header to the bottom of the GPIO header next to Pi Power to raise the complete GPIO header up to the same level, or you can use the 24 pins above PiPower with peripherals that don't use the extra pins.

What We Need & What You Get

I want to fund a volume purchase and build of Pi Powers. At this point, I have a working prototype. In fact, I sell them for $15. But each one of those I have to hand-assemble. If you include my time, I'm definitely losing money doing it that way.

Here's what building 1000 of them would cost:

  1. DigiKey BOM: $3900 (T&R or DigiReel).
  2. PCB Fab: $1600 (OSHPark medium-run order for 100 panels of 10 boards)
  3. Stacking headers: $370 (4uconnector)
  4. Assembly: $1410 (Small Batch Assembly)
Total: $7280. Total cost per unit: $7.28.
The laws retail pricing say that that's what I have to do to be able to price them at $15.

There's really only one perk on offer here - a Pi Power for $15. Anyone who contributes that or more will get one. They'll be supplied just as they come off the panels, plus a stacking header for you to solder on yourself. If and when 486 people do that, the campaign will be fully funded. From there, Pi Power should be self-sustaining at the thousand-unit per batch level.

My initial estimate on the timing is that from the moment I shout "Go!" initial deliveries of the completed product should be within 3 months. I believe the PCB fab requires 4 weeks lead time, and that the assembly does as well. That leaves a month of slack for delays.

    The Impact

    I believe Pi Power is a good product. The major reason I am going through this is that I believe large numbers of Raspberry Pi users would buy a Pi Power if they knew about it, and the visibility of the project and the efficiency gains from volume purchasing are the goals here.

    With a total investment of $7280, I could build 1000 of them and purchase the parts in whole-reel quantities for maximum savings, and have parts left over on some of the reels to reduce the per-unit costs of the next batch even more.

      Risks & Challenges

      There's very little risk. I'm building these one-at-a-time right now, I'm just not very efficient at it. If it all falls through, then I just go back to making them by hand in my garage.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      This campaign really only works if we reach - or at least asymptotically approach - the goal of building and selling 1000 Pi Powers. The more people hear about this campaign, the more likely we are to meet or exceed that goal.

      Links

      • Pi Power's appearance on Adafruit Show-n-Tell
      • The Pi Power User Guide page (with schematic)

Links

story:
Convenience Rack

The RackPeace is a stand for smartphones and small tablet computers of up to 6 inches.
Prop up your device at variable angles for convenient viewing and hands free operation.

When you prop up your smart device, you enhance your overview of the device and your reach to its rich set of features and apps. Rarely or never used functions and apps become more apparent and accessible, and chances of integrating them into your all-day workflow are increased.


Right and front side view of the RackPeace

 

Feature-Packed Piece

The RackPeace is a rack with thought through features.

  • The RackPeace is independent of brand/make and fits any smartphone or small tablet. It has a high and wide tray that allows you to place your smart device at a convenient viewing height and at variable viewing angles, either vertically or horizontally.
  • Its surface around a hard material core, is made from thick, robust and sturdy skateboard wheel rubber for an ideal grip on the table and for your device's great grip on the RackPeace.
  • The deep crease in the middle fits any current and future charger jack designs and accommodates any kind of device cables with enough space to suit even thick or stiff cables.
  • You can keep using the RackPeace when your device is wired and cables can be plugged from the top, the side, front or rear whether it is the charging cable, headset, audio or data cable.
  • The structure of the RackPeace with its pillar fingers, the corrugated tray with stopper nobbles, and the stretched bottom rim in the back, shifts the balance point of the posted smart device to the outer edge of the RackPeace giving your smart device great grip and stability when working on its touchscreen.
  • The rubber material of the RackPeace is sturdy, tough and long lasting. Its surface can be easily cleaned and keeps its neat appearance for a very long time.
  • The rubber material prevents your device’s sensitive surface from being scratched. Placing your device on the RackPeace, instead of laying it on the table top, protects it from scratches or even accidental liquid spills.
  • Because the RackPeace doesn’t have any wired connections, there is no need to plug or unplug it before re-locating.
  • The RackPeace has a 1/4"-­20 mounting thread at the bottom center, to use your smartphone or tablet with any standard tripod for occasional filming, presentation, picture taking or creating panoramic photos, etc.
 

 

Design

The RackPeace has an elegant design and aesthetic appearance that fits well into any location, especially the home or office. The RackPeace can also be used in places such as a coffee shop, restaurant, hotel, library, or in transportation means such as a train or plane. It looks good in the living room, kitchen, workshop, on reception counters, cafe & restaurant tables, hotel night tables, and so on.


 

Color Variations

The base material is made of an off-white-colored rubber. Alternatively, one can choose a color variation in black or gray. Due to minimum manufacturing quantities of 1,000 pieces per color, the alternative colors can only be manufactured when enough pledges come in for them. Otherwise, pledges will receive the RackPeace in the base color of off-white.

How do I choose my color ?
At the end of the campaign, you receive an email with a link to the color selection page. There we'll probably already know which colors will be available already.

 

Customizing

  • Specialized to your home’s decor
  • Personalized for your friends & clients
  • Individually branded for your business
  • Customized advertising gift

For small quantities customized stickers
are ideal. I've setup a blog post at rackpeace.com/blog/stickers with more info, links to online print services and demo videos on how to customize stickers. Direct printing on the RackPeace is possible too, but only feasible for bulk quantities.

 

Specs

Dimensions: inches: 2.7 x 2.9 x 5.4 / mm: 70 x 74 x 136
Weight: ca. ½ pound / ca. 220g
Material: Polyurethane Compound, PP or PC Core

 

Stage

The RackPeace is ready for final production. Multiple series of prototypes have been built to test and verify the stand’s design characteristics such as dimensions, stability, material sturdiness, ergonomics and usage suitability.

Several eligible manufacturers in China have been identified and pre-checked on multiple criteria. Discussions have been held at length and product details have been exchanged. The quotes from these manufacturers for tooling, item production, packaging and gift box production as well as on-device printing have been received.

Once the campaign has been successful, the lead time for the tooling is 30 days and the lead time for actual manufacturing is another 30 days. Then it's safe to add 2 weeks for shipping and handling via Shipwire. If all goes as planned, you will be holding your RackPeace in your hands about 3 months after the campaign ends.

 

Notes

Due to manufacturing, copyright or processing necessities, the final product and packaging may have differences to the simulated versions and prototype for example as following:

• Due to copyright differences between media and item production, the logo for the RackPeace is being updated, and this is how the new logo probably looks.

• The final material’s off-white color may differ in reality to the pictures and movies due to the difference between simulation and real product. Over time, white rubber colors can change giving it a more natural tone.

• The lettering and logo will be embossed on the rear of the RackPeace.

• A fine beveling is planned to run around all edges, like it is at the bottom.

 

Indiegogo

What’s so amazing about crowd funding is that it is changing the world. Working out an initial idea and presenting it to the public for funding has never been this way before. Indiegogo's approach of international crowd funding with fixed or flexible funding methods fits to so many more cases. For idea developers this is an ideal platform: work out the idea, present it to a community, prove that there is demand, build the right relationships for manufacturing and shipping, and if the campaign is successful, create the product and deliver it to the people.

 

Shipping

To keep shipping distances and costs low, RackPeaces will be imported to multiple local warehouse centers in the U.S., Canda, Europe and Asia.  Please note, shipping costs should NOT be part of your pledge. We'll inform you of your shipping costs after production of the RackPeace. Click to enlarge the example matrix of shipping costs on the right, so you have an idea for your destination.

You've may been wondering about the RackPeace bulk sizes of 48, 96, 240 pieces, instead of for 50, 100, 250 pieces. This is because adding those additional pieces, disproportionally scales packing and would cause higher shipping costs for all items in the shipment.

 

Invoice

A deductible invoice for your pledge will be enclosed to your shipment. Local sales taxes and / or VAT may occur, which we’d email you for payment, so we can prepare your order accordingly.

 

Funding Use

The funding proceeds will be used for production costs including tooling, manufacturing and packaging. Additionally, the funds will be used for shipping to and storing at the fulfillment centers, customs duties, taxes and all other related costs.

The RackPeace has been developed with the highest quality standards in mind. The prototype has been finalized and the requirements established with the manufacturers and order fulfillers. Now your help is needed to achieve the funds necessary to start the production. Indiegogo pledgers will receive the RackPeace ahead and at a lower price than retail, and will be eligible for later Special Pledger Offers at RackPeace.com.

 

Press & Media

List in progress and to be updated.

 

To You

Thank you for checking out the campaign. The RackPeace is a labor of heart. In my little atelier I’m passionate about bringing ideas to life. I design material or immaterial items, create visualization, build prototypes, research and source and set up funding campaigns. It was a great time working through the RackPeace project with lots of fun and inspirations from many sides, which I hope will be transmitted to you when using your RackPeace.

 

Spread the Word

Please help to spread the word. In our online world using social networking to share a campaign has enabled developers like never before to approach and inspire people.

Please take a moment and use the social links below to share the RackPeace campaign with your friends. That would tremendously help this project to succeed.

Thank you
