story:
Hi, we are Marcel, Siegmar, Farzad, Lukas and Anna, as the the root-point team we develop this solution for you.

In our first step we build the technical infrastructure for root-point


First, we build the motherboard. 


Secondly, we use this to produce the root-point console. 

Thirdly, we ship the hardware via DHL/UPS. (You'll receive your device within 7 days.)
 


The root-point synchronizes, shares, and organizes your data.

As simply as with calenders, e-mails, notes, file sharing, and online shopping.

:root-point - between you and the world wide web.

  • It's hardware for use at home. Be your own mail provider.

  • It's anonymous. Be your own cloud data sharing box.
  • With AntiSpam, AntiVirus and easy to use.

  • Multi-encrypt yourself.
  • Connecting all your devices.
  • No Server configurations.
  • Your data remains your data.
  • Whenever you want it to.
  • And Affordable.

:root-point. supports you.

  • Datasafe

  • Easy.

  • My.      

Encryption, simply and from anywhere.


Do you have any other ideas of how anyone could help us? Perhaps you can think of something else? Something we're missing?  Better english perhaps;-) Then mail us at welcome@root-point.de, encrypted if you like!

We're interested in you, NOT in any potential advertisers or professional data mining and tracking services. Please contact us for more information.  You're the creator and author, and therefore owner of your digital footprint.

How many can we rally to ensure that private data remains private – encrypted and blocked from unauthorized access.

It's optimized and preconfigured for all those looking for an alternative to public cloud services. Simply plug in and get started!

The root-point immediately informs you when something remarkable happens within your digital activities – from unasked communication trials, curious scripts on websites or to tracking of meta data.

Our focus is on all users of digital media: individuals, families, those subject to professional confidentiality, such as journalists, doctors, attorneys, and, of course, everyone interested in privacy, you included!


We'd also like to thank the debian OS developers and other open source communities. A great open source community has build the tools und täglich komen neu Dazu.

We pay our manufacturers fairly and our prices are transparent.

We're part of a peaceful movement.

                     Hamburg, August 1st, 2013

           Marcel Nagel, Siegmar Schweppe,
 Anna Weiß, Farzad Zanjani, Lukas Nagel


With the help of "Afterburner" www.TecnoAndroid.it  - Thank you.

Questa non è un'innovazione, solo una combinazione di open source di successo e di principi di sicurezza ben collaudati su hardware neutro.

Puoi sincronizzare, condividere, accedere. Controlla i tuoi dati e la tua identità online.Facile come calendario, mail, note, filesharing, shopping online è

:controlDRUID - tra il web e te.

  • è l'hardware per uso domestico. Fai il tuo sistema di posta elettronica.
  • Con AntiSpam, AntiVirus, di facile utilizzo.
  • Connette tutti i dispositivi,

  • Nessuna configurazione del server.
  • Dove vuoi.
  • A prezzi accessibili.

  • è anonimo. Fai il tuo cloud-data-sharing-box.


  • Può essere criptato più volte

  • Mantiene i tuoi dati proprio tuoi.


: controlDRUID ti supporta.

Anonimo.
Facile.
Mio.

Tuoi otto minuti d'attenzione potrebbero servire come pacifica e indipendente autarchia.

Dette er ikke en nyskabelse, kun en kombination af vellykket open source og et godt forsøgt på sikkerhedsprincipper for neutral hardware.
Brug din egen synkronisering og fildeling. Kontrollere dine egne data og idensitet på internettet.

Det er ligeså let som at bruge en kalender, E-mail, noter, fildeling og handel på nettet.

:controlDRUID – mellem hele verden og dig.


  • En hardware som er til brug i hjemmet. Gøre det til dit egen leverer post systemet.
  • Er Anonymous. Du har din egen cloud-data-deling-box.
  • Tilbyder Antispam, Antivirus og det er let at bruge.
  • Du krypteret flere gange som beskytter dig selv.
  • Forbinder alle dine enheder.
  • Ingen server konfigurationer.
  • Holder dine data for dig selv.
  • Hvor du ønsker – lige meget hvor du er.
  • Det er overkommeligt.

:controlDRUID - støtter dig.

Anonymt.
Let.
Mig.


Er ist eine bezahlbare und einfache Hard- und Software-Infrastruktur zum nötigen Schutz der Privatsphäre auf Linux-Basis für Internetnutzer/innen. Sehr leicht zu bedienen, auch für Nicht-Techniker!

  • Fünf Programmierer, Informatiker und Digital-Natives liefern eine Hardware-Box mit vorkonfigurierten Sicherheitsstandards. Das Gerät wird als Protection of Privacy Firewall zwischen dem Internetanschluss und deinen Endgeräten zuhause geschaltet. Das Gerät bildet ein Netzwerk um auch die mobilen Endgeräte zu sichern.
  • Du hast zu jeder Zeit die volle Kontrolle über deine digitalen Spuren und kannst immer und überall deine Datenspuren jederzeit löschen oder exportieren.
  • Der :controlDRUID alarmiert dich, wenn etwas merkwürdig erscheint in der Benutzung des www, wenn du ausspioniert wirst oder werden könntest.

Das System bietet dir einen eigenen E-Mail Dienst mit eigener Cloud Funktion für die Termine, Aufgaben und Notizen. Der Cloudterminal mit Home-Server und Kommunikationssystem steht bei dir zuhause.

Deine Daten bleiben deine. 

Kennst du noch andere Wege wie man uns helfen kann? Vielleicht fällt dir noch etwas ein? Etwas das uns fehlt? Dann maile uns an welcome@root-point.de gern auch verschlüsselt.

Unsere Aufmerksamkeit gilt dir und NICHT den potenziellen Werbekunden, professionellen Data-Mining und Tracking-Diensten. Gern mehr über welcome@root-point.de. Du bist Urheber/in und Autor/in und damit Eigentümer deiner digitalen Spur.

Wir respektieren die Gemeinschaft und handeln für die Gemeinschaft - OHNE WERBUNG und Nutzerdatenverwertung.

Wie viele können wir werden, damit Privates privat bleibt - verschlüsselt und ohne Einblick von Dritten.

Wer kann uns in anderen Sprachen helfen?

Who can help us in other languages?



Our 

Risks and challenges

We are also well aware that success of the root-point depends on critical mass of users (minimum 2,500 units). We use Plywood to sheets the Hardware-Box. It can vary in thickness. The root-point system with the root-point carries risks like any other engineering project. The developing of the hardware cost us about € 70.000 additional the purchasing of one of the fastest ARM SoC, Co-Processor for encryption and Debian Cluster Server hardware compel us to the high cowdfunding amount of $ 250,000. The test system is still running on our normal infrastructure.

We therefore choose to make root-point suitable, attractive and accessible to everyone. A instructional manual and clear video statement will be made. We proactively address each possible risk that can affect the delivery and quality and consequently the satisfaction of its users.

The root-point team has a proven track record and 12 years of combined experience in delivering complex products containing hardware and software on time. We have already built products requiring supply chain management and production & quality control.

###

30-Day Money Back Guarantee: Your complete satisfaction with our product is guaranteed or items may be returned or exchanged within thirty days from when it was shipped, with a Return Merchandise Authorization. The customer only pays return shipping fees.

We bring Onion-Routing Method with the Privacy Protection Wall on another level - to be three steps ahead.

################################################################################


Plus $30 for shipping outside the E.U. 30-Day Money Back Guarantee: Your complete satisfaction with our product is guaranteed or items may be returned or exchanged within thirty days from when it was shipped, with a Return Merchandise Authorization. The customer only pays return shipping fees.
story_txt:
Hi, we are Marcel, Siegmar, Farzad, Lukas and Anna, as the the root-point team we develop this solution for you.

In our first step we build the technical infrastructure for root-point






First, we build the motherboard. 


Secondly, we use this to produce the root-point console. Thirdly, we ship the hardware via DHL/UPS. (You'll receive your device within 7 days.) 





The root-point synchronizes, shares, and organizes your data.
As simply as with calenders, e-mails, notes, file sharing, and online shopping.
:root-point - between you and the world wide web.

It's hardware for use at home. Be your own mail provider.
It's anonymous. Be your own cloud data sharing box.
With AntiSpam, AntiVirus and easy to use.



Multi-encrypt yourself.

Connecting all your devices.
No Server configurations.


Your data remains your data.
Whenever you want it to.
And Affordable.


:root-point. supports you.



Datasafe


Easy.



My.      



Encryption, simply and from anywhere.


Do you have any other ideas of how anyone could help us? Perhaps you can think of something else? Something we're missing?  Better english perhaps;-) Then mail us at welcome@root-point.de, encrypted if you like!
We're interested in you, NOT in any potential advertisers or professional data mining and tracking services. Please contact us for more information.  You're the creator and author, and therefore owner of your digital footprint.
How many can we rally to ensure that private data remains private – encrypted and blocked from unauthorized access.
It's optimized and preconfigured for all those looking for an alternative to public cloud services. Simply plug in and get started!
The root-point immediately informs you when something remarkable happens within your digital activities – from unasked communication trials, curious scripts on websites or to tracking of meta data.
Our focus is on all users of digital media: individuals, families, those subject to professional confidentiality, such as journalists, doctors, attorneys, and, of course, everyone interested in privacy, you included!


We'd also like to thank the debian OS developers and other open source communities. A great open source community has build the tools und täglich komen neu Dazu.
We pay our manufacturers fairly and our prices are transparent.
We're part of a peaceful movement.
                     Hamburg, August 1st, 2013
           Marcel Nagel, Siegmar Schweppe, Anna Weiß, Farzad Zanjani, Lukas Nagel

story:
Meet ARING.


Use only one hand and speak, ARING will delivery your voice command to the smart phone and then the smart phone will do what you wanna do.

  • ARING allows you to use cell phone more flexibly and efficiently, and you will spend less time looking the phone screen.
  • Where fashion meets technology, ARING is new technology that you can wear, looking cool!
  • Extended applications in the future. Stretch your imagination.


    Features

    ARING takes notes for you by recording voice and linking it to ARING's App, recording voice and converting speech to text at the same time.



    ARING can perform Google search with Google Chrome in many languages.
    For search using one of the four “Apps”, “Images”, “Maps”, or “Videos” categories, you simply say to ARING the chosen search, followed by the category to start a new search. For example, simply say "Taipei 101, Images" to ARING, and it will show you images of Taipei 101. This search tool will initially be supported for Traditional Chinese and English only.


    ARING allows you to remotely control your smart household appliances, such as the Phillips Hue. Through ARING, you can turn the lights on and off, change the color (Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Purple), and change the brightness of your Phillips Hue lights.



    ARING works with Chromecast. Through ARING, you can search popular videos through YouTube and play them directly on the big screen with Chromecast.



    ARING can also work with your Belkin Wemo switch. Through ARING, you can turn on and off on your Belkin Wemo switch, and anything connected to it.


    Gallery

    At the back of your hand.


    At the palm (for better reception).


    How to Use

    After installing the application on your mobile device, just put ARING on your finger and you are ready to go.

    • Short click the button once for voice command and Google search  mode. Once the blue LED light appears, speak, and then press again to end. (ARING allows you to set customized voice commands).
    • Long click the button once for notes mode. Once the blue LED light appears, speak, and then press again to end.


    Specifications

    • 2.5-3 hours of constant speaking.  (If being used at 30 sec intervals, it can reach 300 times.)
    • Up to 3 days on standby.
    • Battery: Rechargeable 20mah.
    • Bluetooth IC: CSR.
    • 10 meters transmission distance.
    • Waterproof: IPX5 water resistant rating.


    Compatibility

    • Android (ver 4.2 or higher ver).
    • ARING uses Google Chrome for Google search.
    • Languages, we have tested traditional Chinese and English. However, for other languages users, please try to use the Google voice input (ARING uses the Google offline speech recognition), and if it can understand your language and keywords. You can use ARING with your language.


    ARING Size & Color

    After the crowdfunding has reached its goal, we will send out the notification letters to you. Please tell us the color you want to have, and the ring size of your forefinger in millimeters. We will collect the size information from all backers/supporters, and then categorize them into three to six groups for you to choose the one that fits your forefinger. The available inner circumference of ARING : 18mm~22mm.


    Starting from Scratch

    ARING and USB charger.


    Stretch Goal

    Reach US$100,000, and ARING will be ready for production and shipping.


    Why do we need your support?

    We have been working on ARING for the past year and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make ARING available to you and the millions of people who have never before had a smart ring before. Let's make life easier and our home smarter — together.

    Be the first one to get an ARING!


    What is Next -> Cloud Service

    We need your help to accomplish this step, in order to help ARING move forward with more features in the future. A Voice Cloud is able to store voices and texts for users and allow sharing, backup, and more.


    A deal to share!

    By backing each ARING Kit and using the above sharing tools to share this campaign post with your friends through Facebook, Twitter, and Google+, we will give you one more charger for free!



    Pledges and Rewards





    Each ARING Kit Contains

    ARING、ARING App (Google Play)、USB Charger、Box & Manual.


    Meet the team

    Canner Tang, Founder - A lover of Arduino and App inventor 2. He has PMP certificate and more than 7-year experience in IT industry.


    Dr. Shaw, Partner & Consultant - assists in proceeding the project, and he believes ARING can bring greater convenience to the people.

    Paco, ID Designer - he has received Germany Red Dot Designer award before.

    Bang, UI Designer - he has more than 10-year experience in the UI Designer based on user experience.

    Adms, Software Developer - he has more than 16-year experience in App and Cloud service developer.

    Nina, Partner - backs up the startup with a sharp sense of beauty and intuitive operation.

    Partner Alpha who is a team member of the Belay Engineering Group in Taiwan. He is a professional on RF Safety & Compliance Management. Partner BMFJ who is a dialogue designer between contemporary metalwork and people. Partner CS who is an expert on Bluetooth technology and a solution maker.… More, ARING is a fashion work by combining the power of a group of people.


    Timeline to ship



      Risks & Challenges

      • At present, wearable devices market is attracting worldwide attention, but none of the applications  can really fulfill needs in our daily lives. ARING, a combination of the right service and right form factor, is one that we hope will bring a fulfilling experience to our users. In the beginning, we challenged ourselves to design a very small device that would bring a new experience to the public. Our team has worked extremely hard and with your help, we will be able to bring ARING to life. Our idea for ARING is that it will be able to be extended into unlimited applications in the future. can be unlimited extended in the future.
      • We are reaching closer to our goal, and now all we need is everyone's encouragement and help.


      Legal Disclaimer

      "Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."


      Thank you for backing our campaign.

Meet the team



Canner Tang, Founder - A lover of Arduino and App inventor 2. He has PMP certificate and more than 7-year experience in IT industry.
Dr. Shaw, Partner & Consultant - assists in proceeding the project, and he believes ARING can bring greater convenience to the people.

Taiwan. He is a professional on RF Safety & Compliance Management. Partner BMFJ who is a dialogue designer between contemporary metalwork and people. Partner CS who is an expert on Bluetooth technology and a solution maker.… More, ARING is a fashion work by combining the power of a group of people.

At present, wearable devices market is attracting worldwide attention, but none of the applications  can really fulfill needs in our daily lives. ARING, a combination of the right service and right form factor, is one that we hope will bring a fulfilling experience to our users. In the beginning, we challenged ourselves to design a very small device that would bring a new experience to the public. Our team has worked extremely hard and with your help, we will be able to bring ARING to life. Our idea for ARING is that it will be able to be extended into unlimited applications in the future. can be unlimited extended in the future.
We are reaching closer to our goal, and now all we need is everyone's encouragement and help.

story:
BudNGo Wireless Ear Bud Built-in MP3

Tired of earphone wire tangling together? Our product goal is for music lover to have a tangle-free solution for their current wired earphone and able to listen to music without having to drain your phone battery. 


BudNGo is a tiny Wireless Earbud with 8GB Built-in MP3. It gives high quality bass and audio sounds. It comes with a touch screen controller which connects to the earbud through Bluetooth LE that enable you to control the music . This controller include internal compartment to store the ear bud. It also display the current song that is playing now on controller. There is a keychain hook on the controller to allow you to attach it onto anything and anywhere. 

BudNGo charges and is able to transfer songs through the USB cable.  

Attach it to key, bag and anywhere you like.


What We Need & What You Get

Early Adpoter($199 USD):

Get 1 standard black unit of BudNGo inclusive of the controller.

Special Package($399 USD)

Get 1 unit of BudNGo inclusive of controller(Choose the color either black or white) + 1 set of Earbud cover with different sizes & colour +Free International Shipping

Utimate Combo($599 USD)

Get 1 unit of BudNGo inclusive of controller + 1 set of Earbud cover with different sizes & colour Choose your own color for the BudNGo (White, Black, Red, Silver, Pink, Blue) + Free International Shipping


If we reach the funds, we will use the funds for research of the technology in the earbud and development of the earbud. With more fundings, we are able to expand our team to develop the product for you. 
If we do not reach the funding, we will return the money back to you.


Risks & Challenges

Few of risks that we might face is by the time we are going start manufacturing, the technology might obsolete, we need to do research on the new technology to overcome and include in our earbud.
Another risk is when it is being manufacture, some quality of the ear bud might be faulty. Before sending the product to customers, we will do a quality check to ensure all product that is send out is of high quality. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do share our idea through Indiegogo share tools to music-lovers and people you know and help us make our idea happen.

Attach it to key, bag and anywhere you like.   What We Need & What You Get
Early Adpoter($199 USD):

Get 1 standard black unit of BudNGo inclusive of the controller.
Special Package($399 USD)

Get 1 unit of BudNGo inclusive of controller(Choose the color either black or white) + 1 set of Earbud cover with different sizes & colour +Free International Shipping
Utimate Combo($599 USD)
Get 1 unit of BudNGo inclusive of controller + 1 set of Earbud cover with different sizes & colour
Choose your own color for the BudNGo (White, Black, Red, Silver, Pink, Blue) + Free International Shipping

If we reach the funds, we will use the funds for research of the technology in the earbud and development of the earbud. With more fundings, we are able to expand our team to develop the product for you. 
If we do not reach the funding, we will return the money back to you.
  
Risks & Challenges
Few of risks that we might face is by the time we are going start manufacturing, the technology might obsolete, we need to do research on the new technology to overcome and include in our earbud.
Another risk is when it is being manufacture, some quality of the ear bud might be faulty. Before sending the product to customers, we will do a quality check to ensure all product that is send out is of high quality. 

  Other Ways You Can Help
Do share our idea through Indiegogo share tools to music-lovers and people you know and help us make our idea happen.

story:
NODZ is the next generation social network. Specifically designed to safeguard our privacy, simply eco-responsible.

Developed by independent minded people for independent minded people. It’s an alternative social platform, powered by Peer-to-Peer distribution and protected by End-to-End Encryption. 

NODZ offers an affordable, intuitive and eco-responsible solution allowing everyone to share personal memories and communicate without jeopardizing its privacy.





PEER-TO-PEER DISTRIBUTION
At the heart of NODZ is a decentralized network, based on the Torrent Open Source protocol. Thanks to the Peer-to-Peer technology, we bypass immense carbon footprint hungry Data Centers. Your data is stored on your network node, a little device connected to the Internet that you simply keep plugged in to your home network.

Whenever you make a post, the data is sent to your network NODE which then directly distributes the post to the nodes of the members of your community bypassing any unknown intermediary servers.



END-TO-END ENCRYPTION

Cryptography is the key element in NODZ network security. We use state-of-the-art symmetric and asymmetric cryptography technics based on Open Source PGP standard to provide true End-to-End Encryption.

All published data is firstly encrypted on your smartphone or tablet, then transmitted via the P2P network and finally decrypted on the mobile device of the members of your community. Meaning that your data is fully encrypted throughout the entire storing and transporting process over the Internet.

There is no need to worry about the encryption and decryption processes, as they are fully automated.



THE APP
NODZ is designed to be as simple as possible. Based on a straightforward newsfeed, you will be able to share photos, videos and comments as well as schedule events and communicate with instant messaging.


In order to access the NODZ network, you will need to download a free app for your smartphone or tablet, running iOS or Android.


DATA EXPIRATION & RIGHT TO OBLIVION
By default, a  post’s life span is 7 days. However, if you benefit from particular attention from your community, your post’s life span will increase.

In addition, you can cancel your user account at any time. This will immediately erase all of your data from the NODZ network.



THE NODE
A NODE is a little device connected to the Internet that you simply keep plugged in to your home network. It is your personal micro-server and every member of the NODZ network must have their own or alternatively, run BeagleBone Black Rev. C. Board 100% compatible gear. 

The NODE comes with a 32G microSDHC memory card. It stores, manages and distributes your data to every members of your community. Furthermore, it is equipped with an USB 2.0 Port to which you can plug in an external hard drive to increase your storage capacity.

To bring the best possible product to the market we collaborated with Swiss industrial designer Davide Oppizzi from DCUBE and together we successfully brought the concept to fruition.

The finishing color of the NODE Standard Edition will be voted for
 by crowdfunding contributors.


THE  MAIN BOARD
Obviously, we have opted for Open Hardware technology since its development is shared and supported by a large passionate community worldwide.

We entrusted the production of the main board to our Swiss partner Gigatec S.A. who specializes in development and production of cutting-edge technologies.

Our customized main board is based on the open specifications of the BeagleBone Black Board Revision C. from the BeagleBone.org foundation. However, the specifications are accessible to all, so you could build your own “hacker style” in your garage.



MEMBERSHIP FEES
Our business plan is not to profit from your personal data, but to protect your privacy. To insure the good running of the infrastructure and the continuous development of the platform, access to the NODZ network will be granted against a small monthly fee.



THE NODE KIT
The NODE kit will be put on sale as of October 2015 and the finishing color will be voted for by crowdfunding contributors.



To start with, it wouldn't work without you! And regardless, it would make no sense to do it without you.

The NODZ project is well under way though a lot more development is needed. The raised funds will allow us to expand with the arrival of two new members and will give our consolidated team the means to work full-time on the project.

Finally, we need you to spread the word!





As a contributor, you fully understand that this is a reward based crowd funding campaign and that you invest your money for the development of a new secure and eco-resposible social network, not a file sharing service.

We guarantee that all material rewards will be delivered on time and that we will honor our commitment to follow our roadmap and successfully reach our goal.





A big thank you to all the people without whom this project would not have been possible: Valérie, Grégoire, Carolyn & Mehregan, Martha & Nicolas, Jean-Rodolphe & Jacqueline, Jennifer, Philippe & Ivan from //DIY

story:
It's been a long road for BearTek and we reached $60,000 in our campaign which was well above our goal!  Most of that was within the first 5 days of the campaign.  However, additional challenges have come up where we have to take BearTek into hibernation for a little while until we find the right partners/investors to help take this to the next level and beyond.

We want to be as transparent with this campaign, and true to our last 4 years of delivering a great product and making deliriously happy customers. Stay tuned as you should not be surprised to see BearTek resurface shortly stronger than ever,

In the meantime, we have processed refunds for all the contributions on the campaign so no one will be charged until we are sure we can deliver as promised.

Stay tuned - Team BearTek!


What is BearTek?

Imagine being able to use one bluetooth glove to control multiple devices, use an App to configure the glove based on your preferences, and seamlessly post pics of your epic adventures by simply tapping your fingers together. And, that’s not all... Gen II also provides developers with the freedom to customize BearTek remote control gloves to control any App, device, machinery or piece of equipment. Now that’s a SMART glove that gives you unlimited control of your world!!



Evolution Of The Revolution

Did you see BearTek Gen I remote control smartgloves on SHARK TANK?
Well let us wow you with BearTek Gen II - the next evolution in smartgloves!


The next evolution in the remote control smart glove revolution is here! Our raving fans told us what they wanted over the last few years and we believe we are delivering well beyond that.  BearTek was already the ultimate control device for people that wear gloves, now BearTek Gen II will add the flexibility you have desired.... and that BearTek App is just ridiculous!  Now that’s a SMART glove that gives you unlimited control of your world!!

BearTek Gen II Features



Endless Control of Your World

Wirelessly Control Your Devices



Keep your phone in your pocket and your hands protected while remotely controlling your phone and GoPro camera. Simply tap your thumb to a touchpoint on your fingers to answer a call, play music, or take a picture.

Functions for phones include Answer| Ignore Call |Hang-up Call |Change Volume | Activate Sir. Functions for GoPro cameras include Camera Power | Take Picture |Record |Burst. Now that’s CONVENIENT! 

Simply Control Your Favorite Apps


Enjoy the activities you love while simply tapping your fingers together to control your phone and favorite music Apps. 

Functions for music Apps include: Play | Pause | Change Track | Change Volume. Functions for Camera App include Zoom in | Zoom Out | Take Picture. Functions for Periscope App include Start | Stop. Functions for Instagram & Facebook include Share Last Picture. Now that’s CONTROL! 

Seamlessly Share with Your Friends


Never miss a moment to immediately take a pic of your awesome adventure and instantly share with your friends. Simply tap your fingers together to take a pic with GoPro camera and post to Facebook or Instagram. Now that’s SMART! 

Easily Customize Your Experience



Tailor your BearTek glove based on your preferences and favorite activities. Use our new BearTek App to customize touchpoint commands, switch between phone or GoPro camera, and select the Apps to your like to use. Now that’s FREEDOM!

Effortlessly Develop for Your Needs


You have the imagination; we have the tool. Use our Software Development Kit to customize the glove to control your Apps, devices, equipment and machinery. We’ll create the Powered by BearTek glove in the task specific glove you need. The possibilities of how you control your world are endless. Now that’s EXCITING!

Smoothly Transition Between Activities 


Buy one and done. Simply remove the wireless control module and plug it into a different BearTek glove depending on your activity for the day. The module is interchangeable with any "Powered by BearTek" glove. So, you can enjoy the convenience of BearTek during any activity that requires a glove. Take BearTek skiing or snowboarding, running, snowmobiling, biking, cycling, hunting or simply commuting during a cold winter day. Now that’s CLEVER!


Here's Where You Can Use BearTek Gen II




How it Works

What happens when you take two of the biggest technological advancements in the 21st century and cram them in a pint-sized box? The awesome power of BearTek Generation II Technology. That's what! (alright we may be overstating the impact just a bit).

We took the best of our Phone and Camera modules and combined them into one 'ultimate' module.
Tech Specs include:
  • Bluetooth Low Energy (standard)
  • Developer Options: Standard Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, BTLE, and we'll deliver Ant+, RF or other versions if the demand is there
  • Gen1 got you up to 80 hours of battery life before needing recharging.  We think it is safe to say we are going to far exceed that with Gen2

Is BearTek Gen II Really Better?

The original BearTek Gloves already lived by our trademark "Every Other Glove Is Obsolete".  Now BearTek Gen II is the Evolution of the Revolution!  We didn't even list other great features like ladies styled gloves (-;


What You Get

Every BearTek Gen II glove kit will come with a glove (yes, you get both left and right), a BearTek Gen II BTLE module, the BearTek App, and an instruction manual.

Developers Kit:  You guys will get a pair of gloves, a module with your choice of standard BlueTooth, Wi-Fi, or BTLE radio, and 1-hour of our engineering time.
 

Available Styles

BearTek GEN II smartglove styles are up to you, so as Spice Girls said "Tell us what you want, what you really really want"! The ladies have been screaming for a pink snow glove - we will deliver that with Generation II.

Yes, your favorite BearTek Gen I styles will still be available with Gen II tech




From our Raving Fans

Real testimonials from real customers of Gen 1 (we've got a lot of them):

Seriously amazing... "OK, seriously, these are amazing. What a great invention!” 

So Easy..."With the BearTek gloves, controlling my music is so easy I don't even need to think about it” 

Priceless... "Not having to take a glove off and pull out my iPhone to change a song, pause, or lower the volume has been priceless.” 

Excellent... "Technology as advertised. Excellent pair of gloves is a bonus!” 

I feel safer... “I feel safer riding with these gloves because I don't have to remove my left hand from the handle bars. I ride a 900 lb. Harley and like the ability to keep both hands on the bike.” 


Over Three Years In The News

Here's just a small sampling...



The BearTek Team

Willie Blount – Founder: The brain behind the BearTek technology. An avid motorcycle rider that came up with the idea for BearTek when trying to safely control his music and phone while riding. Former Marine and Director of Information Systems to the Legislative Counsel of the United States Congress.

Tarik Rodgers – CEO:  Kept losing his friend on the slopes of Breckenridge because he could not answer calls before they went to voicemail. Wishes he had BearTek to stay connected with his friends on the slope while keeping his hands warm. Accomplished entrepreneur and engineer with a MBA from Kellogg School of Management and 21 years of experience starting, managing, and growing diverse businesses.

Brian Preston Smith – CSO:  Wishes he had BearTek remote control glove when he dropped his phone off of the lift trying to change tracks. Serial entrepreneur and executive with a Masters in Engineering Management from George Washington University and 24 years of leadership experience starting, managing and growing technology-based businesses.

Jason Peat – COO:  Jamaican turned wanna be boarder. With a Master’s degree in Architecture from Florida A&M University, Jason has over 15 years of experience managing complex design/technical projects, business operations and cross-functional teams for start-ups and Fortune 100 companies.

Jim Smittle – CTO:  Mil Spec trained engineering geek that fell in love with BearTek upon first site.  We dream it and Jim makes it possible. He has been critical to meet the demands of some of our engineering partners.

Catherine Fox-Simpson – CFO:  Counting your money and keeping us on track


Shipping:

Please note that shipping to any country outside North America and Canada may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. In a case of cancellation we will refund your pledge. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.  The beauty of dealing with a company that has already successfully launched a product and shipped internationally is we have the experience to fulfill major orders.  We will continue to work diligently to deliver you an unbelievable Generation 2 of our popular BearTek Gloves!

FAQ's

  • Waterproof?  You can't take a bath or shower in them, but the water resistant pouches have been known to keep the technology operating.  Follow smart drying if you do get them too wet.
  • How many modules?  We used to have two modules, but Generation 2 will allow you to control both your phone and GoPro camera when you pair it with the BearTek app.
  • Battery Life?  Gen1 got you up to 80 hours of life.  I think it is safe to say we are going to far exceed that this time.
  • How will I pick my glove style?  When we complete the campaign we will query all our backers for their preferred glove size and glove style preference.  If you really want that pink equestrian glove then make sure you get a lot of your friends to also back that and make that request because we won't be able to fulfill every desired style.  If your style didn't get enough selection then we will work with you on a proper substitute style.
  • Can I just keep my current gloves and use BearTek Technology?  You sure can this time.  we are introducing a liner version that will work beneath your other gloves of choice.
  • iPhone or Android?  We work them both.  We originally launched BearTek with just iPhone controls, now we work them all (we actually even work Blackberry if you still have one).


Risks & Challenges

You can rest assured that we are going to work as hard this time as we did delivering you the highly ambitious Gen I BearTek smartglove.  Gen II will be ambitious too and one thing we know having been on the market for 3 years is perfection is a pursuit.  On top of delivering a fantastic product, it has always been BearTek's mission to create "Deliriously Happy Customers" and check our reviews... our customer service is as highly touted as our product is.

Engineering, supplier, and delivery issues are very real concerns in any business, but know we will be upfront with you as we deliver the BearTek Generation II vision.


Become An Advocate of BearTek

Just about everyone that wears gloves could use a pair of BearTek Gloves to control something in your world.  But if you just don't wear gloves for your sports, work, or general protection from the cold, then share this campaign with others that do.  We know they will love it and you just may help them have a more safe and convenient experience.  #BearTekUp

Team BearTek!

story:
Labx is transcending the traditional laptop sleeve with an innovative 3-in-1 design. It provides the safety and protection of a sleeve, the ergonomy of a laptop stand, and a look that lets you commute in style.

 
 

Labx greatly improves the user experience while working with a laptop. It provides comfortable viewing and typing angles by raising the laptop and helps to effectively relieve the pressure on the cervical vertebra that results from uncomfortable working angles.

Designed with a sleek and foldable structure, Labx can be folded up into a stand from a laptop sleeve in literally one second. The stand raises your laptop for a better viewing and typing angle.

 
  •  How to Turn Labx Sleeve into A Stand 
 
  • Hands On Review

Check this unbiased Labx Hands-on Review from OSReview. Thanks so much for his awesome work!

 
 
  • Unique Structure for Both Laptop and Surface

Featuring a unique solid architectural structure, Labx can be used for laptops and surfaces in completely different ways.

  • The Most Sleek Laptop Sleeve You’ve Ever Seen

Labx is supremely sleek, has a modern aesthetic, and is perfect for daily commuting.

 

Labx fits all laptops and tablets on the market. It can be used in any location such as the office, home, library, cafe or on the go. You can even use it to create a comfortable workstation on the couch or in bed without carrying an extra stand.

  • Architectural Structure

Featuring a sturdy triangle structure, Labx is stable enough to support your devices up to 6kg, providing a comfortable typing experience that keeps your laptop securely in place while working.

  • Supreme Soft-touch Feeling

Thanks to its ultra-smooth inner microfiber material, the interior has a soft-touch feel and protects your laptop from scratches. By using a high-quality PU leather, it’s more eco-friendly and sustainable than traditional animal leather. Labx is also waterproof so you can safely travel in any weather.

  • Magnetic Closure Design

To keep your laptop secure inside the sleeve, there is a magnetic closure at the top. It also helps to maintain support of your laptop when you fold the sleeve to transform it into a stand.

 
  •  Adjustable angle for Various Devices

Labx boosts your comfort and productivity with three adjustable angles. You can choose to put your surface pro in a different angle you like.

 
 

About Labx

Labx is a design company focused on innovative, beautifully crafted products. We are on a mission to create happy, meaningful lives for the people that everyday carry.

The origin of Labx comes from Ryan---the founder of Labx. Like many people who work at a desk, Ryan suffers from Spondylodynia – pain in the vertebra of the spine caused by working for long periods of time in uncomfortable positions. In fact, with one’s head angled at 30°, the spine will suffer from pressure equivalent to 18 kg. With one’s heads at 60°, the spine will suffer from pressure that is equivalent to 27 kg.

However, if the workstation screen can be raised and placed at the proper viewing angle, it will effectively relieve pressure on the spine. Although there are all kinds of laptop stands on the market, there aren't many products that can act as both a laptop stand and sleeve in one. As a result, Ryan decided to design an innovative product that cleverly combines the two together--Labx.

story:
What is OneCase

OneCase is an iPhone audio Case with a premium headphone amplifier and a high resolution DAC. That is the best you can get in the market. It has THX AAA™ Amplifier built in to it. What's more, to add some convenience to our users, it also comes with battery and storage up to 256Gb for your iPhone. And of course some other features like a kickstand and lens and a sim card storage will always handy.

  • 3.5mm audio jack
  • High Fidelity and powerful audio
  • Internal battery
  • SDXC memory card slot
  • Wide angle lens
  • Other handy features

Everything in OneCase

 

3.5mm Audio Jack with Microphone Input

With the 3.5mm Audio Jack coming back on OneCase. iPhone  7 users can now use their good earphones and headphones without throwing them away! What makes a difference is this 3.5mm Jack can get the job done. You can listen to music, enjoy movies and even make a call with the inline mic and pickup. Easy.

For Technies, below are some information you may want to know. If you find them too nerdy, nevermind, it just tell you one thing, it's the best sounding thing in the world.

High Fidelity Audio

  • High dynamic range 32bit, 384kHz sampling rate high resolution DAC
  • Supports 11.2MHz DSD streaming
  • Low Noise and Distortion THX AAA™ Amplifier
  • 3.5mm Audio Jack support in-line pick up and in-line microphone input

32bit, 384kHz DAC

Comes with Asahi Kasei Microdevice AKM4490EQ high performance DAC. OneCase supports up to 32bit 384kHz PCM format audio and DSD 11.2MHz audio Streaming. Ideal for high resolution internet audio streaming.

Supported resolution:

THX AAA™ Amplifier Technology

As a proud official partner of THX we created OneCase with THX AAA™ Amplifier Technology which gives you maximum performance with the brand new THXAAA-28 Amplifier. Designed by THX®, a leader in the audio industry, THX AAA™ Technology delivers the most accurate and powerful performance of any amplification technology available, revealing every detail of even the most dynamic high resolution content. Indiegogo backers will be the first to experience the very best of their headphones are capable of. Where there is THX® Technology inside, the highest quality audio guaranteed!

 
Powerful Amplifier
To enjoy even lower distortion, the THXAAA-28 Amplifier can power up professional 300 Ohms headphones @ 16mW. And for normal consumer 32 Ohms earbuds / headphones, it offers up to 9 times the power compare to most mp3 player or cellphones.

Memory Extension

Support micro SDXC card up to 256Gb. Never need to worry about memory storage anymore. It transform you iPhone 6 16Gb into a 272Gb version!

  • Micro SDXC card up to 256Gb
  • Ample room for high quality lossless audio, movies and photos
  • One Touch backup with Wattamp iOS App
  • Easy to use push type mirco SD slot

​Extended Power

OneCase is equipped with an internal battery to provide an extra kick of energy for your iPhone® You can unleash your crave for powerful music! 

  • 4-6 hours of extra fun with your iPhone for a long day
  • 1200 and 1500 mAh for 4.7"iPhone and 5.5" iPhone
  • Battery management system safely monitor the battery

 

Fully Integrated Design

Elegant, simple, compact, ergonomic and convenient to use. The thickness of OneCase is 14.5mm. All these features packed in OneCase with just 7.5 mm added thickness to your phone.

 

Modular Design

From day one, we define OneCase to have a modular design for these benefits:

  • An outer ring to absorb the impact force and protects your iPhone
  • Parts are Replaceable if damaged
  • Allows upgrade from iPhone 6, 6s to 7 without getting a new OneCase
  • Lens can be removed when not in use

Choice of material

Careful choice of material for a long lasting product

  • Best in class electronics components for high fidelity audio
  • High impact engineering plastic for protection
  • Ergonomic design with Anodized Aluminum trims
  • Quality optical glass for Lens
  • Authentic Apple components for most reliable performance

    Handy Features

    Day to day handy features to helps you with a free hand while you are on the road.

    • Wide angle lens for group photos and selfies
    • Kickstand for unlimited hands free movies
    • Extra Sim card storage
    • Use your Lightning® cable to charge both OneCase and iPhone® in one go

    iOS Application

    • Memory and battery status overview
    • Audio equalizer
    • Media player
    • File management 
    • One touch backup
    • Intuitive user interface

    iOS App Tutorial

     

    Color Choices

    Works with below iPhones​

    Press Coverage

      

      

     

      

    Refer to your friends and win a FREE OneCase!

    Every 8 backers you referred and pledged any of the perks in the campaign.You will get a free OneCase of any size or color.

    Simply follow below instructions : 

    1. Login to Indiegogo, if you do not have an account, sign up now.
    2. Visit the “OneCase - Integrated iPhone multi-function case” Campaign. Press the “link” button as shown in below picture.
    3. Then copy the pop up link, save it and sent to your friends!Email, Skype, Whatsapp the link to your friends or put into your webpage.
    4. When your referees click on the link, it will take them to the OneCase campaign page. 

    If 8 or more people pledge any perks, we will notify you have won a free OneCase!

     

    Prototypes

     

    Electronics​


     

    Team behind OneCase

     

    Timeline

    FUND US NOW

    We need your funding to have the project go ahead into production. We need funding for the tooling and more importantly the initial capital to purchase materials for production and paying the EMS manufacturer the production costs. If you like this project, please, fund us now by pledging on Indiegogo and we will work hard to bring this product to you.

    FAQ

    http://www.wattamp.com/faq.php

    Disclaimer: 
    Apple®, iPhone® and Lightning® are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. 
    THX® and THX AAA™ are registered trademarks and trademarks of THX Ltd.

story:
A Wireless, Portable, & Rechargeable Coffee Warmer


By LAVACLIP, Inc. 

Buying a cup of hot beverage, whether that's a hot latte in a cold winter day, or a dark Colombian coffee before starting a busy day, for most of us it has become a part of our daily lives.

The sense of warmth we get from sipping on our hot drink is one of the key elements of this joyful everyday experience. But most of the times these moments don't last long, by the time we walk back to our office or library desk we realize that our beverage has gotten cold. And what's more unpleasant than the bitter taste of coffee when it gets cold?

MEET LAVACLIP

LAVACLIP is a revolutionary coffee warmer that will re-define our drinking coffee experience. It is designed to attach to the bottom of most paper cups and heats your beverage using rechargeable batteries. 

With an advanced clipping mechanism in place, LAVACLIP attaches to the bottom of various paper cup sizes while the heater is in direct contact with the bottom surface of the cup. Because of its light weight, LAVACLIP stays attached to the bottom of your cup while you walk around, run errands, shop, along performing other activities.

The micro-USB port enables you to charge LAVACLIP using any standard USB outlet whether that's your laptop, PC or you cellphone charger. 

Among all the devices that keep beverages warm, LAVACLIP is the only one that is portable and rechargeable and made specifically for beverages served in paper cups.

Wait, your taste buds react to different temperatures?

In a recent study, scientists discovered how taste receptors inside our taste buds react to molecules at different temperatures.

The research has found that "certain taste receptors are most sensitive to food molecules that are in the 20 to 35 degree Celsius, in other words, molecules that are at or just above room temperature. The taste receptors in question don’t always register molecules that are much hotter or colder than this range, and thus we don’t taste them.

They concluded that "hot coffee around 60-70 degree Celsius range may seem less bitter than room-temperature coffee because our bitter taste receptors aren’t as sensitive to bitter molecules in the coffee when those molecules are hot. Ofcourse, the same goes for other hot beverages."  

On the other hand, electric mugs can only be used to heat up beverages that are served in them. For the 'to go' coffee buyers, this leaves us with no option but to carry a bulky device with us wherever we go, not to mention that we'd need to wash it after each and every use.

We addressed all of the above problems by creating LAVACLIP. A portable & rechargeable coffee warmer designed specifically for "to-go" cups. With it's elevated heating plate, accustomed to fit cups of various sizes, LAVACLIP maximizes the amount of heat transferred to the beverage.

FEATURES

At less than 3" tall, LAVACLIP packs easily in a purse, backpack or carry-on bag so you never have to worry about your beverage getting cold. For working professionals, you can always keep it in your office on your desk.


And it’s particularly a great accessory to have in the winter; a beverage warmer would certainly come in handy!

Some of us may want to enjoy our hot beverage for a much longer time before the battery drains. Which is why we introduced LAVACLIP Premium. 

With a built-in wireless receiver accompanied with a custom-made wireless charger that uses a standard USB port, you can simply place your cup of hot beverage & LAVACLIP on top of the wireless charger, so that your battery is continuously being charged while you sip on your hot beverage. 


$500K MILESTONE!

LavaClip team benefits from experts in the field of heat transfer and experienced designers to bring the final product to perfection. The efficiency of the heater used in our product has been optimized while keeping the product's weight minimal. 

Lavaclip is waterproof and heat resistant, and has been tested in our labs against accidental coffee spills. The amount of heat needed to keep the coffee warm at optimal drinking temperature have been meticulously measured in different ambient temperatures and conditions.

But most of the times these moments don't last long, by the time we walk back to our office or library desk we realize that our beverage has gotten cold. And what's more unpleasant than the bitter taste of coffee when it gets cold?MEET LAVACLIP
LAVACLIP is a revolutionary coffee warmer that will re-define our drinking coffee experience. It is designed to attach to the bottom of most paper cups and heats your beverage using rechargeable batteries. With an advanced clipping mechanism in place, LAVACLIP attaches to the bottom of various paper cup sizes while the heater is in direct contact with the bottom surface of the cup. Because of its light weight, LAVACLIP stays attached to the bottom of your cup while you walk around, run errands, shop, along performing other activities.The micro-USB port enables you to charge LAVACLIP using any standard USB outlet whether that's your laptop, PC or you cellphone charger. Among all the devices that keep beverages warm, LAVACLIP is the only one that is portable and rechargeable and made specifically for beverages served in paper cups.Wait, your taste buds react to different temperatures?In a recent study, scientists discovered how taste receptors inside our taste buds react to molecules at different temperatures.The research has found that "certain taste receptors are most sensitive to food molecules that are in the 20 to 35 degree Celsius, in other words, molecules that are at or just above room temperature. The taste receptors in question don’t always register molecules that are much hotter or colder than this range, and thus we don’t taste them.They concluded that "hot coffee around 60-70 degree Celsius range may seem less bitter than room-temperature coffee because our bitter taste receptors aren’t as sensitive to bitter molecules in the coffee when those molecules are hot. Ofcourse, the same goes for other hot beverages."  
Existing beverage warmers consist of a wide flat hot plate surface which is not suitable for paper cups. Due to the elevated base of paper cups, the heater won't be in direct contact with the bottom surface. Hence, resulting in ineffective heat transfer and failing to keep beverages warm. 
USB Beverage WarmerOn the other hand, electric mugs can only be used to heat up beverages that are served in them. For the 'to go' coffee buyers, this leaves us with no option but to carry a bulky device with us wherever we go, not to mention that we'd need to wash it after each and every use.
We addressed all of the above problems by creating LAVACLIP. A portable & rechargeable coffee warmer designed specifically for "to-go" cups. With it's elevated heating plate, accustomed to fit cups of various sizes, LAVACLIP maximizes the amount of heat transferred to the beverage.FEATURES
LAVACLIP is so light that you'd barely notice that it's attached to the bottom of your disposable cup.At less than 3" tall, LAVACLIP packs easily in a purse, backpack or carry-on bag so you never have to worry about your beverage getting cold. For working professionals, you can always keep it in your office on your desk.LAVACLIP makes drinking your Mocha, Hot Chocolate, Latte, Coffee, & Tea beverage more enjoyable. You no longer need to chug on your drink just so you can catch up with your drink getting cold.And it’s particularly a great accessory to have in the winter; a beverage warmer would certainly come in handy!
Some of us may want to enjoy our hot beverage for a much longer time before the battery drains. Which is why we introduced LAVACLIP Premium. With a built-in wireless receiver accompanied with a custom-made wireless charger that uses a standard USB port, you can simply place your cup of hot beverage & LAVACLIP on top of the wireless charger, so that your battery is continuously being charged while you sip on your hot beverage. 






PREMIUM: WIRELESS CHARGING

$500K MILESTONE! Whether you'll be placing LAVACLIP in your purse or carry-on bag. A pouch will protect it from scratches and will keep it clean.

We can’t wait to deliver LavaClip but there are inherent challenges in building hardware. Though we've been methodical in our design process, have built and tested several prototypes, and believe our timeline is realistic, we won’t ship LAVACLIP until it meets our high quality standards.LavaClip team benefits from experts in the field of heat transfer and experienced designers to bring the final product to perfection. The efficiency of the heater used in our product has been optimized while keeping the product's weight minimal. Lavaclip is waterproof and heat resistant, and has been tested in our labs against accidental coffee spills. The amount of heat needed to keep the coffee warm at optimal drinking temperature have been meticulously measured in different ambient temperatures and conditions.

HOW WE GOT HEREWe went through tens of different sketches and selected a few for rapid prototyping. Among all the tested prototypes, we have chosen the perfect design which is not just a functional product but is so eye catching that you would love to carry it wherever you go!

Videography by Radu Babos

story:
Capturing the individual spirit...

In a world full of commercial noise, we hope to provide greater access to personal creativity through affordable technology.

Specs

  • Region: US Only (for now)

  • Size: 134 x 68 x 11.8mm

  • Display: 4.5 inch LCD, 720x1280 HD resolution

  • CPU: Samsung Quadcore (Exynos 4412)

  • Memory: 16GB internal, 1GB RAM

  • Network: HSPA+/WCDMA (850/900/1900/2100 MHz), GSM (850/900/1800/1900MHz) - carriers include AT&T, T-Mobile, etc.

  • OS: Stock Android ICS with planned upgrade to Jellybean

  • Camera: 8.0MP autofocus and back-illuminated rear-facing, 0.3MP front-facing

  • Battery: 2050mAh

High quality at an affordable price

The V1SION outperforms leading phones and tablets and comes at a fraction of their prices. This isn't suprising seeing as we have the smartest engineers and designers and use the same manufacturers as the big companies. We deliver high quality at a truly affordable price. 

This is what we at Sion want to tell the world. Smartphones shouldn’t be expensive! These big companies are taking advantage of consumers all around the world by taking a huge margin on these phones! This is why we created the revolutionary crowdfunding business model. We want the world to know that there are better and more affordable options for smartphones. The more people that support us and use the V1SION, the cheaper and better we can make our phones.

Consumer Empowerment

Unhappy with the limited brand selection and multi-year commitments to expensive carrier contracts for so-called "subsidized" devices, we embarked on a journey to disrupt the smartphone industry by providing consumers with an unlocked, high-end and low-cost smartphone. We were able to cram as much high-tech goodies into our beautifully designed smartphone as the "big brands", but we're pricing it at a fraction of their prices. 

The V1SION: made for the average consumer, by the average consumer.

Unlocking Your Freedom

The Sion V1SION is a fully-unlocked device, which means you no longer have to commit to long carrier contracts. You have the freedom to switch carriers and plans without having to worry about incurring steep penalties. 

Our Experiment

As the cost of staying connected continues to rise, we, at Sion, want to offer consumers a more affordable alternative to what's available on the market without having to forgo quality, design and performance. 

To highlight our purpose of disrupting the smartphone industry, we would like to propose a revolutionary experiment:

As our manufacturing cost per unit falls due to increased demand and scale, we will incrementally lower the retail price of the phone.  

501-1500 units: $349

1501-3000 units: $329

3001-5000 units: $309

5001-10,000 units: $299

>10,000 units: TBA

Our V1SION

...is unique. You won't find it anywhere else in the world.

Elegantly Sophisticated

The Sion V1SION is a beautiful device utilizing the latest manufacturing processes and technologies. The sleek unibody shell is made in the same electroplating process used on the Samsung Galaxy SIII, and the imposing 4.5 inch screen uses none other than Gorilla Glass. For the media lovers out there, we made sure we included a 720P HD display at 326 pixels per inch (same as iPhone 5's Retina display). The V1SION will be running stock Android ICS, with a planned update to Jellybean.

Ringflash

We are also introducing ring flash technology, commonly found in the photography industry, built directly into our phone. Ring flash allows for better distribution of light relative to the camera sensor compared to traditional phone flashes, which deliver light from a single direction. In macro photography, a ring flash will eliminate unwanted background shadows. Aside from pure practicality, the ring flash also looks awesome. It gives the design symmetry and makes a bold and unique statement.

Stock Android

Yes, we're running stock! No frills, just Android. The V1SION will ship with Android ICS, but you will be upgraded to Jellybean in no time!

Quality by Design

In developing the Sion V1SION, not only did we pay close attention to aesthetic detail, but more importantly, to end-user quality. We chose to work with one of the largest global electronics manufacturers to ensure lasting product quality. Our manufacturer has an extensive list of global technology customers including Toshiba, HP, and Apple.

Use of Funds

Over the past few months, we have been working very closely with our manufacturing partner to uniquely design and develop the Sion V1SION. We now have a production-ready prototype, and need your support. Your contributions will go towards:

  • FCC certifications
  • Manufacturing costs
  • Customer support

Spread the Word

As a small startup with big dreams to change the world, the main obstacle is market awareness (and of course, capital). If you are excited about this project and our experiment, please help us spread the word. Even if you're still currently in a two-year contract and not yet in the market for a new phone, please share with your friends. We are fully committed to continuing this experiment as a long-term business model, giving you an awesome option in the future.

FAQ

Why is this campaign US only?

When it comes to telecommunication hardware (mobile phones), most countries have their own regulatory bodies that must approve each product. This approval process is costly, and as a small startup, we can only afford to enter one country at a time. Since we're based in the US, it only makes sense we start here.

Also, if we start selling internationally, it will be very hard to provide sufficient customer support across different regions and languages.

If you would like to see the V1SION in your country, please let us know. If we receive enough interest to provide a dedicated regional support team, we will expand accordingly.

Why is there sales tax?

Every Indiegogo campaign that gives contributors a product or service as a perk will be subject to regional tax laws. Most perks already include this tax bundled within the price of the product or service. Why are we taking sales tax separately? Couple of reasons:

  1. Regional sales tax differs substantially, and because we make so little on each phone, we can't bundle the cost of the tax in our price and hope it's enough to cover the overall cost of delivering the phone.
  2. We want to provide our potential-contributors with a clear comparison between our phone's pre-tax price versus other devices on the market. 

How much will I have to pay for sales tax, and when do I pay?

Since we're based in California, we will collect sales tax on devices shipped to a California address. How much you pay for sales tax varies depending on where you live. We will let you know what your tax is and collect it before we ship the phone.

Remember, sales tax is calculated as a percentage of the final price - not necessarily what you contribute up-front. Unless of course you're receiving a perk with a guaranteed price.

Is $299 the floor price?

Nope! Once we approach 10,000 units, we will renegotiate prices with our manufacturer and suppliers for a better price.
story_txt:
Capturing the individual spirit...
In a world full of commercial noise, we hope to provide greater access to personal creativity through affordable technology.

Specs


Region: US Only (for now)


Size: 134 x 68 x 11.8mm

Display: 4.5 inch LCD, 720x1280 HD resolution


CPU: Samsung Quadcore (Exynos 4412)


Memory: 16GB internal, 1GB RAM


Network: HSPA+/WCDMA (850/900/1900/2100 MHz), GSM (850/900/1800/1900MHz) - carriers include AT&T, T-Mobile, etc.


OS: Stock Android ICS with planned upgrade to Jellybean


Camera: 8.0MP autofocus and back-illuminated rear-facing, 0.3MP front-facing


Battery: 2050mAh

High quality at an affordable price

The V1SION outperforms leading phones and tablets and comes at a fraction of their prices. This isn't suprising seeing as we have the smartest engineers and designers and use the same manufacturers as the big companies. We deliver high quality at a truly affordable price. 
This is what we at Sion want to tell the world. Smartphones shouldn’t be expensive! These big companies are taking advantage of consumers all around the world by taking a huge margin on these phones! This is why we created the revolutionary crowdfunding business model. We want the world to know that there are better and more affordable options for smartphones. The more people that support us and use the V1SION, the cheaper and better we can make our phones.
Consumer Empowerment
Unhappy with the limited brand selection and multi-year commitments to expensive carrier contracts for so-called "subsidized" devices, we embarked on a journey to disrupt the smartphone industry by providing consumers with an unlocked, high-end and low-cost smartphone. We were able to cram as much high-tech goodies into our beautifully designed smartphone as the "big brands", but we're pricing it at a fraction of their prices. 
The V1SION: made for the average consumer, by the average consumer.

Unlocking Your Freedom
The Sion V1SION is a fully-unlocked device, which means you no longer have to commit to long carrier contracts. You have the freedom to switch carriers and plans without having to worry about incurring steep penalties. 
Our Experiment
As the cost of staying connected continues to rise, we, at Sion, want to offer consumers a more affordable alternative to what's available on the market without having to forgo quality, design and performance. 
To highlight our purpose of disrupting the smartphone industry, we would like to propose a revolutionary experiment:
As our manufacturing cost per unit falls due to increased demand and scale, we will incrementally lower the retail price of the phone.  
501-1500 units: $349
1501-3000 units: $329
3001-5000 units: $309
5001-10,000 units: $299
>10,000 units: TBA
Our V1SION
...is unique. You won't find it anywhere else in the world.

Elegantly Sophisticated
The Sion V1SION is a beautiful device utilizing the latest manufacturing processes and technologies. The sleek unibody shell is made in the same electroplating process used on the Samsung Galaxy SIII, and the imposing 4.5 inch screen uses none other than Gorilla Glass. For the media lovers out there, we made sure we included a 720P HD display at 326 pixels per inch (same as iPhone 5's Retina display). The V1SION will be running stock Android ICS, with a planned update to Jellybean.

Ringflash
We are also introducing ring flash technology, commonly found in the photography industry, built directly into our phone. Ring flash allows for better distribution of light relative to the camera sensor compared to traditional phone flashes, which deliver light from a single direction. In macro photography, a ring flash will eliminate unwanted background shadows. Aside from pure practicality, the ring flash also looks awesome. It gives the design symmetry and makes a bold and unique statement.

Stock Android
Yes, we're running stock! No frills, just Android. The V1SION will ship with Android ICS, but you will be upgraded to Jellybean in no time!
Quality by Design
In developing the Sion V1SION, not only did we pay close attention to aesthetic detail, but more importantly, to end-user quality. We chose to work with one of the largest global electronics manufacturers to ensure lasting product quality. Our manufacturer has an extensive list of global technology customers including Toshiba, HP, and Apple.

Use of Funds

FCC certifications

Customer support

Even if you're still currently in a two-year contract and not yet in the market for a new phone, please share with your friends. We are fully committed to continuing this experiment as a long-term business model, giving you an awesome option in the future.

story:
What is MirrorBox?

MirrorBox is a portable and low-cost device that lets you wirelessly echo the display from a Miracast-ready Android phone or tablet onto your HDTV, bringing you the fun of multi-screen interaction with super smooth animation. 

You can browse the Internet, play your favorite online videos, and enjoy a slide show of your photos wirelessly on your big screen TV. In this case our phone/tablet will be used as a remote controller. This will improve the visual user experience of mobile devices a lot. It is perfect for older TV’s that no Internet and USB port ready. All you need is a TV with HDMI input and you are good to go for a wonderful journey.

Miracast Supported

MirrorBox supports the Miracast standard that is a very recent open standard form of wireless screencast. The most outstanding feature of Miracast is its mirror function like apple AirPlay Mirroring. With it, not only the videos and music from your phone or tablet, but also the complete screen can be mirrored to the HDTV, which makes it possible to play App games from your phone or tablet on TV.

 

Low Delay

No matter you are a hardcore or a casual game player, the most frustrated thing must be the continuous delays. When the delay is over 300ms, it is hardly for you to continue with the game. Now it’s time to say goodbye to them. We optimized the H.264 standard to make sure MirrorBox can perform fantastic real time transmission. This guarantee an awesome game playing experience.

 

Hi-quality transmission

MirrorBox is able to transmit the content up to 1080p HD.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pIl2mMtQLCU

No extra software needed

Simply connecting the MirrorBox with your HDTV, after a quick setup on your phone/tablet, you can play fast-action games from your phone/tablet on HDTV and enjoy it as smooth as you want.

 

Browse the Internet and play your favorite online videos

When you come across an awesome video on the web, don’t let yourself end up staring at the smaller screen. MirrorBox allows you to navigate a web page. You can plop down on the couch, turn on the TV and spend the long day on a soap opera.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dXWdgOX1nXg

Wi-Fi supports for IEEE 802.11 b/g/n

Using standard Wi-Fi technology, your smart phone or tablet screen is displayed on TV via MirrorBox without the need for cables stretching across your room. Furthermore, IEEE 802.11 n can improve network throughput over the two previous standards with a significant increase in the maximum net data rate from 54 Mbit/s to 300 Mbit/s, which largely optimizes data input and output.

Operating range up to 16.4 feet (5 meters)

This gives you the freedom to pick out a comfortable place where you sit in front the TV.

Compact and light design

You might need to do the presentation in different places. MirrorBox was so small you could pop it in your pocket, simply plug the dongle to the projection system and do your presentation from your phone.

 

Compatibility

Note: Before you back this project, please make sure your Android device is Miracast ready.

Andriod 4.2 released by Google on 29 October 2012 supported Miracast standard, and the main smartphone chipsets companies like NVIDIA, TI, Qualcomm, Marvell, and MTK also announced will integrate Miracast into their chips. This means we can see more and more device supported Miracast in near future. The supported Miracast platforms as we know:

• Samsung Galaxy S4 

• Google Nexus 4 

Specification

Dimension: 75 x 45 x 12 mm

Weight:  40 g

Processor: ARM Cortex A8  800MHz

DDR3: 256M  Byte

Flash: 128M Byte Nand flash

Port and Connector: One Micro USB port for power supply, one HDMI connector for TV connection

Our Story

Why we made this?

Dating back to 2008, we feel it’s quite inconvenient to switch over computers when we are having meetings, so the idea to connect note with projector runs into our mind. 

Through a period of hard working, based on Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g and Sigma Design platform, we finished a prototype of this product with VGA, CVBS interface. It can transmit the whole image of Windows desktop to remote projector, play low-definition video stream, and display text and image content. This prototype shown as below:

 

In 2009, 802.11n has become the mainstream. Based on 802.11 n，we improved the transmission quality by connecting FPGA and RGMI Interface directly. Thanks to this improvement, we can transfer data with high performance, with HDMI interface videos and music can transmit at same time. Simply connect to HDMI, your PC’s screen can directly mirror to the wall with 1080p HD, you can also transmit your game images with low delay (about 200ms), it looks like this:

 

the following video shows how this version works with Windows:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AY94wfDjzOE

We start to develop on Android platform at year 2011. Until the end of 2012, Android 4.2 debuted, it helped us successfully make Miracast Receiver come into being. By the means of accelerating GPU in ARM Cortex A9, we optimize H.264 to reduce the time for delay on a large scale, achieving the goal of playing smooth APP games on HDTV. All above eventually formed what MirroBox is today:

 

The biggest challenge for us is the algorithm optimization in the project. The low delay when playing games is what we are proud comparing with other similar products. 

Who we are?

There are 3 members in our team, all of them have over 5-year’s experiences in embedded system development and are good at wireless technology.

Hill Lu - Creator and chief designer of MirrorBox. Responsible for the entire R&D process. In 2001, participated in the Loongson project team (Loongson is a family of general-purpose MIPS64 CPUs developed at the Institute of Computing Technology (ICT), Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS)). 2003 worked in Microsoft Research wireless project team. All the experience mentioned above make him quite familiar with the technology of wireless field and has excellent ability on audio and video encode & decode.

Wim Zhang – 5 years embedded system software development experience, once worked in the largest communications equipment provider Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd, familiar with WiFi chip architecture and wireless specification.

Leon Nie – Near 10 years wireless device development and production experience, expert in electronic product manufacturing.

Thanks Shuyang from Seeed Studio for helping us with product test and video making.

 

(Shuyang, Leon Nie, and Hill Lu)

Acknowledge

Thanks Seeed Studio for helping making a great video and designing a  fantastic case for MirrorBox. 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OFJGHMNbnEk

Our team members have been focusing on developing wireless products for over five years. The experiences in video coding and decoding algorithm have brought us awards in the startup contests. Thanks to Miracast and the hardware upgrade, we have successfully updated previous projects in a few months, so that MirrorBox could have excellent multi-screen interaction under the Miracast framework. This simple box will bring the power of Android to living rooms everywhere. Now that we have completed prototype and the final design, including a fascinating shell of MirrorBox, our team hopes to raise funds to put MirrorBox into massive production so that more people could enjoy the endless fun brought by our product. 

Production Plan

We have selected a manufacturer with good capacity and quality in Shenzhen, China. We feel confident for an August 2013 ship date.

story:
Update: I answers some questions about why $33,500, how will the business work, and timing

 

bustripping's mission is to bring the success of comparison shopping to long distance bus service, in an easy to use and free application.

In 2011, I wanted to travel by bus from New York City to Boston to visit a friend. I knew there were a number of choices. Megabus and Boltbus were two popular options, but there also were the Chinatown buses and traditional lines like Greyhound. 

I use Kayak.com pretty much every time I buy a plane ticket, so I assumed there would be a site to search for bus tickets the same way. I looked at length and couldn't find one! It was a classic Aha! moment when I realized there was a need and an opportunity. 

I work in digital advertising in New York and have a strong base of knowledge about how to make websites and mobile apps. And, I travel a lot along the East Coast corridor, always searching for affordable modes of transportation. It seemed like a natural fit for me to create a solution to fill this huge gap in the travel category. However, a simple idea like bustripping, requires some very specific technical expertise. So . . . I started looking for help. I have the vision, know what’s possible and how it should be done. The missing link is coding an execution and that’s what I’m raising funds for.

I built a prototype website (www.bustripping.com) and a prototype mobile app that can be downloaded to iPhones and Android systems (app link). This example is far from what the final project will look like, but the feedback from travelers, marketing professionals and potential investors has been extremely positive. The consensus is that bustripping is a great idea and it’s a big piece missing from the travel business. Enthusiastic support from friends, colleagues and family has kept this idea alive and has kept me motivated to finally get a usable version to market. Today, I'm closer to making this app a real product and getting it into the hands of millions of daily bus travelers.

But, I can't do it without your help! This is an all or nothing fundraising goal and I'm hoping that your support will get me to my goal of $33,500. This will allow bustripping to become a finished working product that will be listed in the Apple iTunes store, which will make it available to everyone, completely free of charge!

At different support levels you will receive thank you gifts such as stickers, cell phone skins, and t-shirts! Check out the support levels listed along side this notice.

If you have any questions about this, feel free to send them to letsgo@bustripping.com.

Thank you for you time and support!
